name: MHB 1:1
verse:
. MEENYA ngyiramá apem matow ndwom
Meyi mo Pomfò ayɛw,
Makamfo me Hen N'enyimnyam,
N'adom no konyimdzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 1:2
verse:
. Mo Wùra dɔyɛfo, me Nyankopon,
Boa m' ma mombɔ dawur,
Memfa Wo dzin n'enyidzi no
Mentahye mbea nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 1:3
verse:
. Jesus! dzin a otu hen suro,
Ͻma ’werɛhow b՝ᴐ adze;
Ͻyɛ sanku wo abᴐn asom’,
Ͻyε nkwa nye asomdwee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 1:4
verse:
. Ɔkasa, na wotsie Ne ndze a,
Ewufo nya nkwa bio,
Akoma wѐrɛhonyi dzi dɛw,
Hianyi bùrobùro gye dzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 1:5
verse:
. Odwuruw bᴐn no tum koraa,
Otu daduanyi duam';
No bᴐgyaa tum san fifo ho,
Odzii nyim maa mo so.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 1:6
verse:
. Hom bᴐn nyina da Jesus do;
Wokum Nyame Eguambaa,
Wɔdze Ne kra so bɔɔ afɔr
Maa obiara ne kra.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 2:1
verse:
. NYIMPA a hom wᴐ wiadze nyina,
Hom mfa enyigye ndze ntow ndwom:
Hom mfa nyi Nyankopᴐn ayεw;
Hom mbra N'enyim hom mbedzi dεw.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 2:2
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 2:3
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 2:4
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 3:1
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 3:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 3:3
verse:
. Yɛdze ndaase ndwom fum W'apon m',
Yɛma hɛn ndze do wɔ sorsor,
Na asaase dze ngyirama ɔpedu,
Dze ayeyi hyɛ W'abangua ma.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 3:4
verse:
. W'ahyɛdze tserɛw tse dɛ wiadze
Wo dɔ so kodu mbersantsen,
Wo nokwar betsim dɛ botan,
Kodu Mbersantsen mfesantsen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 4:
verse:
W‘ayɛyi bɛgyegye mbea nyina,
Kɛpem dɛ ewia nnkɔtɔ bio:
	Halleluia!
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 4:
verse:
Gyirama biara ntow Pomfo n'
Ne dzin ho ndwom wo beebiara:
	Halleluja !
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 4:1
verse:
. WI n‘ase a ɔno dze nyina
Mma Bɔfo n‘ N'ayɛyi mfow sor: 
	Hallejuia !
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 4:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 5:1
verse:
. HOM mma wiadze afanan nyina ntow.
Me Nyame Hen!
Ɔsor mpo nnkrɔn biara a
N'ayɛyi nnkodu hɔ;
Asaase nndɔ pii a
N'ayɛyi nnkɛtra hɔ.
Horn mma wiadze afanan nyina ntow.
Me Nyame, Hen!
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 5:2
verse:
. HOM mma wiadze afanan nyina ntow:
Me Nyame Hen!
Asɔr nkeka m'ntow ndwom,
Biribiara nntum nnsiw kwan:
Dza okyen ne nyina nye dɛ
Akoma a abotow mbordo;
Hom mma wiadze afanan nyina ntow:
Me Nyame, Hen!
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 6:1
verse:
. DOMANKOMA ! Wo sor tsebea
Yɛ fɛw dɛ mbrɛ osɛ Nyame:
Ɔtra wimuwimu n'ekyir noho.
Mbrɛ nworaba wɔkɔ aprɔw.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 6:2
verse:
. Bɔfopanyin rotow W'Ndwom a.
N'enyim suma n'atsaban mu;
Ahotsewfo a woetwa ehyia.
Bom famu wɔ hɔ nyina som Wo.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 6:3
verse:
. Nyame, dɛtse na nso nyɛ dɛn?
Hɛn so yɛbɔsom hen Bɔfo:
Yefi bɔn na huntuma m'frɛ Wo
Kɛse, Kronkronyi, Abɔso.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 6:4
verse:
. Wɔatse Wo nka wɔ ekyirkyir,
Mbɔtoaba esua Wo dzin bɔ;
Na Wo nyansaa N'enyimnyam no
Ma hen adwen nyina tɔ sin.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 6:5
verse:
. Nyame wo sɔr, nyimpa wɔ ase,
Hɛn ndwom nyɛ tsia, na hɛn nsɛm nsuar,
Wo ho enyidzi sianka hɛn ndwom,
Hɛn ayɛyi ka hɛn anomu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 7:1
verse:
. O ƆSORSOR Hen, fi sor hwɛ famu ha,
Boa hen yɛntow W'ehumbɔbɔor nye dɔ,
Ɔrepem dɛ osunsuan ebunkam hɛn do,
Naaso gu do ara dze pii kã hɛn ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 7:2
verse:
. Hen nkwa Nyankopɔn, yɛtsew Wo dzin ho;
Hɛn edwuma nye dɛ yɛper tahye Wo dzin,
Gye hɛn ndaase wo adom a edze bɔɔ hɛn,
Atseasefo nyina bɛkyere W'ayɛyi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 7:5
verse:
. Wo dɔ ntsi yɛtow ndwom dzi ehurusi.
Yɛnye sor abɔfo ma hɛn ndze do;
Agyedzifo nyina bɔtonton Wo dɔ
Mbersantsen mfesantsen a ɔmmbɔ adze da
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 7:34
verse:
. Hɛn Egya, hɛn Wura, eyɛ Otumfo,
W'asɛm a akora hɛn ntsi na yɛrosor yi;
Ndzepa a yenya nyina fi Wo nko hɔ ba,
Hɛn gyirama na hɛn nkwa yɛdze bɔsom Wo.
	
. Dza ɔkyen ne nyina, yetow W’ayamuyie.
Agye wiadze a ayew efi bɔn na yaw m'.
Edze Wo Ba abɔ werdam apon wiadze,
De omfa hen a yetwer No mbra hen sor fie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 8:1
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 8:2
verse:
. Hom ntow No tum nye N'adom so ho ndwom:
N'atar nye ekan, No buw pretetee;
N'ebufuw tseaseanam hye senaman fua tum,
No kwan yɛ sum wɔ ehum atsaban do.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 8:3
verse:
. Asaase nye N'anwanwadze a wɔnnka:
Otumfo! Wo tum bɔɔ adze fi tsetse;
Nam 'mom a wɔnndan n' da etsim no pintsinn,
Na edze epo abᴐ no ho abᴐmprᴐw.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 8:4
verse:
. W'ayamúyie no gyirama hɛn botúm aká?
Ogú ahom wɛ wimú, ɔhyerɛn kan mu;
Ofi akoko do pem siansian sar mu,
Na ɔsɔw fénemfénem wɔ bɔw nye
nyankom mu.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 8:5
verse:
. Huntuma m' mbá a yɛnnkye so yɛyɛ mbérɛw,
Hɛn wérɛ hyɛ Wo mu, W'ayamúyie
mmpada;
Mbrɛ W'adom dua gow a otsim hɔ dú ewiei,
Hɛn Bɔfo, hɛn Gyefo, Pomfo na Dɔfo!
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 8:6
verse:
. Tum a wonnsusu! Dɔ a onnyi kabea!
Mbér a abɔfo dzé enyigye tow ndwom no,
Abɔdzé adedafamú so nam hɛn mbérɛwyɛ m'
Bɔtonton Wo atow ndwom eyi W' ayaw!
				   Amen.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 9:1
verse:
. O SƆR Ewuradze wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ fɛɛfɛw mu
Kotow N'enyim, bɔ N'enyimnyam dawur; 
Fa setsie mapa ɔnye mbrɛhoadze huanhuam,
Kotow huhor No, Ne dzin nye Ewuradze.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: MHB 9:2
verse:
. Fa w'adwendwen adzesoa to N'ananadze, 
Ɔbɔsoa ama wo wɔ N'akoma mu,
Ɔbɛkyekye wo werɛ, na oetsie wo mpaabɔ, 
Na oegya w' taataa dɛ.mbrɛ oye ma w'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: MHB 9:3
verse:
. Mma nnsuro dɛ ebɛhɛn N'abangua do hɔ, 
Dɛ ahodze a ewɔ no suar ntsi:
Afɔrbɔdze a wɔdze gu N'afɔrmbukyia do 
Nye nokwar fɛɛfɛw na ɔdɔ mapa.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: MHB 9:4
verse:
. Yinom, sɛ yɛdze ba suro na ahopopo m' mpo a, 
Ɔbɛgye wɔ dzin a ɔsorn bo no ntsi; 
Ɔbɛpepa hɛn nyinsu, ɔama yeedzi dɛw, 
Oetu hɛn suro, ɔarna hɛn awerɛhyɛm'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: MHB 9:5
verse:
. O sɔr Ewuradze wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ fɛɛfɛw mu!
Kotow N'enyim, bɔ N'enyimnyam dawur;
Fa setsie mapa ɔnye mbrɛhoadze huanhuam,
Kotow huhor No, Ne dzin nye Ewuradze.
Amen.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75

name: MHB 10:1
verse:
. HƐN akoma, nsa nye ndze
Yɛdze da nyame ase;
Ɔayɛ anwanwadze,
Wiadze dzi ho ehurusi;
Ofi hɛn na ne yamu,
Ɔdze dɔ akyɛ dze
Ehyira hɛen kwan nyina m',
Na ɔda ho yɛ hɛndze.
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649

name: MHB 10:2
verse:
. Ɔkyɛso Nyankopɔn
Ɔnka hɛn ho daa nyina,
Ɔmfa ahotɔ krɔnn,
Ɔndom hɛn akoma daa,
Ɔnkora hɛn N'adom mu,
Ongya hɛn nkɔntɔnkye m',
Na ɔmpa hɛn mbusu,
Sesei na ndaamba so.
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649

name: MHB 10:3
verse:
. Ayεyi nye ndaase
Ɔnkã Nyame sor Egya,
Nye Ne Ba Kortonoo,
Nye Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn:
Ɔkorsa Nyankopɔn
Sor nye asaase sɔr No;
Mbrɛ ahyɛse ɔtse n'.	
Ɔtse dɛm afebɔɔ.    Amen.
title: Martin Rinkart, 1586-1649

name: MHB 11:1
verse:
. YƐDZE enyigye sɔr, dzi dɛw, yɛtow ndwom,
Yɛdze hɛn siar akoma na hɛn ndze aba,
Ndaase asɛm dadaw no bodu Wo tsenabea,
Ɔwo a eyɛ enyimnyam Hɛn, Nyame yamuyiefo.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 11:2
verse:
. Dza ɔfata W' yɛdze ma W', enyidzi mapa,
Yɛnye W'abɔdze nyina, sor, asaase na po,
Bɔ m' dze W'ayɛyi ma W' wɔ wiadze mbea nyina,
Yɛdze ɔnosɛɛ tonton, huhor Wo daa nyina.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 11:3
verse:
. Wo Sunsum woo hɛn fofor, Wo Ba n' gyee hɛn,
Wo mba dzi Wo nyi wɔ dza ayɛ nyina ntsi,
Egya, Wo mba resan aba dɔ na kan m'.
Yɛreper atonton Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 11:4
verse:
. Yɛka abɔfo ho na yɛtow Wo ndwom,
Alleluia! Amà asaase aagye do,
Amen! Enyimnyam nka Wo sor nye ase,
Domankoma dɔ a ɔpon hɛn, konyimdzifo!
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 12:1
verse:
. Me kra, yi ɔsor hen ayɛw, 
Fa w' ayɛdze bra N' enyim;
Ɔapon wo, dze wo bɔn akyɛ w',
Woana mbɔ nyi No ayɛw?
Yi No ayɛw!
Yi bɛkyebo Hen ayɛw.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 12:234
verse:
. Yi N' ayɛw, Nadom na enyimpa 
Hwɛɛ egyanom ahohiam';
Yi No ayɛw, ɔnnsakyer da,
Ɔka enyim nyaa, ohyira ntsɛm:
Yi No ayɛw!
Nyimnyamfo wɔ nokwardzim'.
 
. Ɔhwɛ hɛn, dze fir hɛn dɛ egya; 
Onyim hɛn mberɛwyɛ dodow;
Ɔma hɛn do dɔ mu ara,
Ɔgye hɛn atamfo nyina nsam',
Yi No ayɛw!
Dɛ mbrɛ N' adom pem mber nyina.
 
. Sor abɔfo hom nhuhor No; 
Hom hu N' enyim na enyim;
Ewia, bosoom, hom nkotow, No,
Mber na mbea nyinam' abɔdze,
Hom nyi N' ayɛw!
Hom nye hɛn nyi Nyame ayɛw.    Amen.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 13:12
title: Anonymous: Foundling Hospital Collection. 1796.

name: MHB 13:34
title: Anonymous: Foundling Hospital Collection. 1796.

name: MHB 14:1
verse:
. HOM nyi sor Hen no ayɛw,
Ɔkora N'aban wɔ ase;
Yi ɔdɔ Nyame n'ayɛw,
Da N'akeseyɛ edzi;
Yi N'ayɛw, Ne ndzeyɛɛ ho,
Kamfo No tum kɛse no:
Ndzepa nyina fir No ho,
Sor na asaase ntonton N'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 14:2
verse:
. Hom mfa nsanku na ndwom pa 
Nkamfo daa daa Nyame n',
Akasaa na akyem ndze mbɔ m;
Nhur Ne dzin kɛse mo:
Nyia ɔwɔ ndze biara ntonton N';
Ɔsor edwindze nyina,
Hom mfa asokwadze nyina mbra,
Mbɔtow N'akoma m'ndwom.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 14:3
verse:
. Wɔmma abɔdze nyina ntow ndwom,
Mma Nyia wɔtse No mu n',
Wɔnhyɛ hɔn Bɔfo enyimnyam,
Wongu N'enyim ebiritsi:
Hom ntsew Ne dzin ho wɔ ase,
Dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ no wɔ sor;
Wɔmma abɔdze nyina ntonton 
Ewuradze aber nyina.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 15:1
verse:
. NHYIRA nka tsease Nyame!
N-hyira nka Ne dzin,
Ɔwɔ hɔ na ɔda ho wɔ hɔ,
Ɔtse dɛm daa!
Daapem Nyame kor no
Afei oeyi Noho:
Ɔwo nye Ahyɛse na Ewiei,
Onnyiewiei nye W'.
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.

name: MHB 15:2
verse:
. Onnyi bɔbea naaso
Abɔdze nyim N'adɔe;
Krɔnkrɔnnyɛ mu a, wiadze nnkotum
Akyerɛ Nedze n'.
Ɔyɛ adze nyina Wura!
Abɔdze yi N'ayɛw,
Beebiara ɔsor nye ase
Ye N'apɛdze.
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.

name: MHB 15:3
verse:
. No Sunsum no pem kwa
Kɔ beebiara a ɔpɛ:
Oduaa nkɔnhyɛfo do kasae,
'Da ho kasa.
Ne mbra nsem no etsim,
Na ɔrennsesa da,
Wɔakyerɛw no nyimpa akoma do,
Po, asaase do.
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.

name: MHB 15:4
verse:
. Ɔdze onnyiewiei nkwa ahyɛ
Ɔkra biara mu ma;
No dɔ bɛyɛ hɛn ahoɔdzen,
Daa nyinara.
N-tonton nka Nyame!
N-tonton nka Ne dzin,
Ɔwɔ hɔ na oda ho wɔ hɔ,
Ɔtse dem daa.     Amen.
title: Max Landsberg, 1845-1928; and Newton Mann, 1836-1926.

name: MHB 16:1
verse:
. MA ndwom do: na asaase ntonton,
Wɔ ebusua na kasa m',
M-fa N'ayɛyi nsan mma No,
Ma ndwom a ɔfata no do.
Amanaman, hom nhyira Ne dzin;
Hom mma No nokwar nda edzi:
Na adzekyee biara hom nka
No nkwagye no ho asem.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 16:2
verse:
. Hom nka no wɔ wi yi ase,
Wɔ ebusua na kasa m',
Hom nka mfi anapa ma nwin ndwe
Wɔ ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da m':
Hom nka dɛ hɛn Nyame dzi hen,
Ɔno na obɔɔ wiadze ntsem,
Ɔda ho ara hwɛ wiadze do
Kesi da a ɔsɛɛ bɛba.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 16:3
verse:
. Ka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ da no reba a 
Wobobu wiadze atsɛn:
Ɔsor enyimnyam bɛhyerɛn,
'Saase, po bɛyɛ ahomka.
N-yew, epo a ɔrowor no
Bɛba ne ndze mpempem do,
Na epo asorɛkye nyina
Beyi Nyankopɔn ayɛw.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 16:4
verse:
. Asaase do mfuw na nhyiren,
Bofura hɔn atam pa,
Na kwaamu ndua nyinara na
N-haban bɛyɛ kusuww:
Sɛ wiadze Otsɛmbuafo no
Bobu atsentsenenee no a,
N-sisi na bɔn bɔbɔ adze,
Afei nokwar bedzi hen.  Amen.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 17:1
verse:
. ƆSƐ na ɔfata adwontow, 
Ber na bea biara mu,
Enyimnyam nka hɛn sor Hen,
Nokwar na adom Nyame:
Hɛn nyina dze ndze dɛɛdɛw
Bɔ m' wɔ ndaase kor mu dɛ;
Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Ewuradze,
Ayɛyi nka Wo daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 17:2
verse:
. Hom adzekyee m-bakan,
Hom mfa hom ndze dɛɛdɛw
Nyi No ayɛw mber nyina,
Na mma ɔmmbɔ adze da;
Abɔfo na akɛse nyina,
Hom nyi Ɔkorsa ayɛw,
Hom ntow ndwom na hom ntwa nhwe
N'ahengua no enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 17:3
verse:
. Yenye sor adwontofo a 
Woyi W'ayɛw wɔ sor,
N-kɔr atsabandofo,
Gyedzi na dɔ ntsaban:
Wɔtow Wo ndwom 'nyimnyam mu,
Ma Eguambaa a wokum Wo;
Sɛ hɛn n-dze kɔ famu a
Dza yegyina do yɛ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 17:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 18:1
verse:
. HOM mma yɛmfa enyigye adwen
Nye Ewuradze ayew, na oye:
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 18:2
verse:
. N'ehumbɔbɔr tsim hɔ daa,
Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 18:3
verse:
. Yɛmfa Ne dzin no ntahye,
Ɔyɛ enyame mu
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 18:4
verse:
. Ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ ma kan
Baa wiadze a wɔayɛ n' fofor n'.
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 18:5
verse:
. Ɔnyɛn atseasefo nyina,
Ɔma hɔn dza wohia nyina:
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 18:6
verse:
. Ohyira hɔn a ɔapaw hɔn
Wɔ sar a etwie no do:
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 18:7
verse:
. Afei yɛmfa enyigye adwen
Nyi Ewuradze ayɛw, na oye:
title: John Milton, 1608-74

name: MHB 19:
verse:
Enyimnyam nka Egya, nye Ba, 
      Nye Sunsum, Ebiasa Kor.   Amen.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:
verse:
N' ehumbɔbor tsim hɔ daa, 
      Osi pi yɛ nokwar daa.
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:1
verse:
. Wonyi Nyame Hen ayɛw! 
Wɔmfa ayɛyindwom mbrɛ N';
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:2
verse:
. Wonyi N' ayɛw: ɔayὲ ewia, 
Dὲ ɔkɔ aprɔw daa daa nyina:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:3
verse:
. Na eso ɔayɛ bosoom, 
Ma odu anafua a ɔhyerɛn:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:4
verse:
. Wonhyira N' dὲ ɔtɔ nyankom, 
Ma ɔma edziban fifir:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:7
verse:
. Ɔama edziban a ɔsen dɛm, 
Daa daa dɛw ho ahobadze:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:8
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka, Hen dɔyɛfo 
Abɔdze nyina ntow enyimnyam,
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 19:56
verse:
. Na ɔma asaase pa so 
Oyi no ndɔbaa ma hɛn:
 
. Ɔama buber so aba, 
Ɔahyɛ hɛn asan mama:
title: Henry  Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 20:1
verse:
. AHOTSEWFO, hom mbra,
Hom nyi Otumfo n'ayɛw;
Hom mma yɛnyɛ adwen kor,
Akoma, ndze na akyen:
Abɔdze biara ntow bi,
Obiara nnka n'ano nnto m'.
Wɔmma ndzɛmba a wonnyi nkwa 
So mfa kommyɛ ntow ayɛyi.
title: George Wither, 1588-1667

name: MHB 20:2
verse:
. Adasamba so hom mbra,
Hom mbra ma yɛntow ndwom pa;
Na beebi a nyimpa ehyia n',
Hom ndzi adwontow enyim.
Hom mma Nyame ayɛyi 
Ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da do:
Ama hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
Aayɛ bɛkyebo dɛ Ɔno.
title: George Wither, 1588-1667

name: MHB 20:3
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi ofi sor dze nhyira
Bogu asaase nyina do;
Na wiadze tɛtɛr a yehu
Yɛ adwontofo asɔrdan kor;
Yɛbɛma hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
No atra mber na mbea nyina,
 Na afow edu sorsor
Otumfo kɛse n'asomu.
title: George Wither, 1588-1667

name: MHB 21:1
verse:
. KAMFO Abraham Nyame,
Nyia odzi hen wɔ sor,
Nyia ofi tsetse tse ase,
Ɔdɔ Nyame.
Nyame Kɛse MARA! 
Sor na asaase gye to m';
Mokotow hyira dzin krɔnkrɔn n'
Wɔ afebɔɔ.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:2
verse:
. Kamfo Abraham Nyame,
Ɔno a ɔhyɛ mbra,
Mosoer fi famu hwehwɛ enyigye
Wɔ Ne nyimfa.
Mopow wiadze nyina:
Ne nyansaa, dzin na tum,
Na medze No ye me kyɛfa,
Me kyɛm, m'aban.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:3
verse:
. Kamfo Abraham Nyame,
Nyia N'adom no dɔɔ so;
Obegya m'menyigye nda mu,
M'akwan nyina m',
Ɔfrɛ sunsuma N'afɛ,
Frɛ Noho me Nyame;
Na ɔnam Jesus bɔgyaa do
bɛgye me nkwan.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:4
verse:
. Ɔaka Noho ntam bi,
Migyina Ne ntam no do:
Wɔbɔsoa m' ɔkɔr ntsaban do,
Afow akɔ sor;
Hɔ na m'bohu N'enyim,
Mibedzi No tum nyi,
Na matow N'adom nwanwa ho
Ndwom afebɔɔ.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:5
verse:
. Sɛ bɔbea ahoɔdzen sa,
Na asaase wɔ hɔ a,
Canaan nkowaa do m'enyi kyerɛ
Wɔ N'asɛm ntsi.
Menam n-su bun mu,
M'enyi tsim Jesus do;
Na menam sar huuhu no do a,
Mokɔ mo kwan.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:6
verse:
. Muhu asaase pa a
Nhyira pii wɔ do no;
Asaase a fahodzi na daa
'Homgye wɔ do:
Numfunsu, wo, pem do,
Ngo na nsa ebu do,
Na nkwa ndua nyin prɔmm wɔ do daa,
Mbɔbɔrhu mu.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:7
verse:
. Ewuradze Hen tse hɔ,
Ewuradze hɛn Tsenenee,
Oedzi wiadze na bɔn do nyim,
Asomdwee Hen;
Zion bepɔw no do,
N'ahendzi tsim hɔ daa,
Ɔnye N'ahotsewfo hyerɛn kan m',
Odzi hen daa.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:8
verse:
. Ɔhwɛ Nedze do yie,
Ɔkora hɔn ntar pa fitaa dɛ
N'ayefor pa:
Ɔdze nsu a woehyira do,
Ɔdze ndua a ɔyɛ fɛw,
Ɔdze Paradisè nduadzewa,
Nyina ma hɔn.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:9
verse:
. Korsa kɛse n'enyim
Wogyina ruhuhor No,
Na woka anwanwadze a oaye,
Hɔn asaase do:
Ɔsormba no tsie bi,
Wɔma Ne dzin tahye;
Na wɔtow ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Dzin nwanwa no.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:10
verse:
. Nyame a odzi hen sor,
Bɔfo mpanyimfo tow;
Wɔtsea m'Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔhen Tumfo!
Mbrɛ ɔtse n' ɔnnsesa,
Na ɔbɛyɛ dɛm daa:
Jehovah, Egya, Kɛse MARA,
Yɛkotow Wo.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:11
verse:
. Agyenkwa n'enyim hɔ,
Hɔn a wɔapon hɔn kotow;
N'adom kɛse tɔ hɔn bobor,
Daa daa nyina:
Ɔkyerɛ No dɔ akam,
Wokua ogya no mu,
Wɔpaa m'ka wo wiadze nyina,
Eguaambaa no.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 21:12
verse:
. Konyimdzi dɔm nyina
Da ɔsor Nyame ase,
Hua Egya, Ba nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn!
Wɔtsea mu daa.
Hua Abraham Nyankopɔn!
Meka ɔsorfo ho;
Ahoɔdzen na tum nyina yɛ W'dze,
Ntonton a ɔmmbɔ adze.     Amen.
title: Thomas Olivers, 1725-99

name: MHB 22:1
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛmbɔ m'yɛntow ndwom:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Sor na asaase mfa ayɛyi mbra:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Ɔkra biara nnyan mfi bɔn mu,
Ntow ndwom dɛɛdɛw wɔ n'akoma m',
Na Jesus ntsi ɔntow ndwom dɛ:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.

name: MHB 22:2
verse:
. Hom nka no wiadze beebiara:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Yenya hɛn nkwagye wɔ Christ mu:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
No bɔgyaa hor hɛn bɔn nyina;
No Sunsum dan hɛn sum no kan,
Na ɔma hɛn kra dze dɛw ka:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.

name: MHB 22:3
verse:
. Mbrɛ hɛn kyɛfa dua yɛ enyigye a!
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
N'anohoba ma hɛn enyigye:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Adzekyee ɔyɛ Ewia na Kyɛm,
Anagò ɔbɛn hɛn ntamadan,
Ɔbɛka hɛn ho aber nyina:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.

name: MHB 22:4
verse:
. Yɛbɔtow ndwom bi wɔ Zion:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Nyew, yɛbɛtsea mu atow ndwom:
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
Ber a mbersantsen rutwa m' akɔ,
Ɔnye ɔsor dɔm nyinara,
Yɛbɔkɔ do atow ndwom dɛɛdɛw
Nyame yɛ ɔdɔ!
title: Howard Kinsbury, c. 1850.

name: MHB 23:1
verse:
. NYIMNYAN HEN, Asomdwee Hen,
Mobɔdɔ Wo;
Na dɔ no rommbɔ adze da,
Meserɛ Wo.
Ɔwo ama m' m'ebisadze,
Ɔwo etsie me;
Ɔwo hun mbrɛ mo bɔn tse,
Dze mo ho akyɛ m'.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 23:2
verse:
. Medze me nyimdzee mapa
M'bɔtow Wo ndwom,
M'akoma m' ndzepa nyina
Medze bɛma W'.
Kaansa mo bɔn kaa m'tsiaa m' mpo a,
Esaan mo ho;
Wɔpraa ano guu mo do no,
Ɔwo 'tsiee me.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 23:3
verse:
. N-da esuon na nnyɛ da kor,
M'beyi W'ayɛw;
Mudu sor mpo a, m'akomam'
M'bohuhor Wo.
Osuar, na ɔmmfata de
Medze ma Wo;
Onnyiewiei mpo yɛ tsia dɛ
Wɔtonton Wo.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 24:1
verse:
. AHOTSEWFO, hom mbra,
Hom nyi Otumfo n'ayɛw;
Hom mma yɛnyɛ adwen kor,
Akoma, ndze na akyen:
Abɔdze biara ntow bi,
Obiara nnka n'ano nnto m'.
Wɔmma ndzɛmba a wonnyi nkwa 
So mfa kommyɛ ntow ayɛyi.
title: Thomas Sternhold, c. 1500-49.

name: MHB 24:2
verse:
. Adasamba so hom mbra,
Hom mbra ma yɛntow ndwom pa;
Na beebi a nyimpa ehyia n',
Hom ndzi adwontow enyim.
Hom mma Nyame ayɛyi 
Ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da do:
Ama hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
Aayɛ bɛkyebo dɛ Ɔno.
title: Thomas Sternhold, c. 1500-49.

name: MHB 24:3
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi ofi sor dze nhyira
Bogu asaase nyina do;
Na wiadze tɛtɛr a yehu
Yɛ adwontofo asɔrdan kor;
Yɛbɛma hɛn ayɛyi ndwom
No atra mber na mbea nyina,
 Na afow edu sorsor
Otumfo kɛse n'asomu.
title: Thomas Sternhold, c. 1500-49.

name: MHB 25:1
verse:
. CHERUBIM na seraphim nyina,
Etwa ehyia Ewuradze ho,
Wɔahyɛ N'asɔrdan no mu ma
Oyi ka a na oyi agye do:
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.

name: MHB 25:2
verse:
. W'enyimnyam ahyɛ ɔsor ma
Wiadze esi ne sibea:
Ɔwo na yɛdze enyimnyam ma W',
Kronkron, kronkron, Ewuradze!
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.

name: MHB 25:3
verse:
. Enyimnyam regyegye wɔ sor, 
Asaase gye ndwom no do,
Wɔtow no dɛ, krɔnkrɔn, 
krɔnkrɔn Dɔm Ewuradze a ewɔ sor:
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.

name: MHB 25:4
verse:
. Seraph etwa ehyia N'enyim,
N'asɔr krɔnkrɔn no wɔ ase,
Ɔka hɛn bɔ m' ma yɛtonton N',
'Yi gya hɛn ma yɛtow ndwom:   Amen.
title: Richard Mant, 1776-1848.

name: MHB 26:1
verse:
. ABƆFO a hom hyerɛn a
Hom gyina Nayme nyimfa,
Na sɛ hom Wura hyɛ hom a,
Hom tu fa kan mu no,
Hom ennsuo mu a,
Yerunntum nntow
Ɔsor ndwom a 
Ɔyɛ dzen no.
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;

name: MHB 26:2
verse:
. Hom akra a hom rohom,
Hom hu hom Agyenkwa enyim,
N'enyimnyam m' dza osuar mpo
Bor hɛn adom do koraa.
Hom ntow ayɛyi
Ndwom mma Nyame,
Dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ
Wɔ N'enyim no.
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;

name: MHB 26:3
verse:
. Hom ahotsewfo pa a 
 Hom berɛ wɔ asaase do,
Hom ntonton hom sor Hen,
Ber a hom kɔ kan no;
Hom ntow dɛw ndwom,
Hom ngye dza ɔma.
Yie muo, bɔn mu o,
Hom nyi N'ayɛw.
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;

name: MHB 26:4
verse:
. Me kra yɛ w'afamudze,
Dzi konyim Nyame mu,
Na siesie w'akoma.
Wo nkwa nda nyina
Kesi ewiei,
Dza ɔma biara.
Yi No ayɛw.	Amen.
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91;

name: MHB 27:1
verse:
. ABƆFO krɔnn,
'Kɛse, nkumaa,
Hom ntow Ewuradze ayɛyi!
Sor na ase, na abodze nyina.
Nyimpa, abɔdze mu dansewa,
Hom ni Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw!
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95

name: MHB 27:2
verse:
. Wi, bosom hyɛnn,
Sum, ewiaber,
Wimu a nworaba ayɛ ma;
Mununkum, n-su na ehum,
Nyame mba a wɔtsea m' enyigye 'm,
Hom nyi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95

name: MHB 27:3
verse:
. Po do fitaa,
Ka N'enyimnyam;
Abo a epo afa do,
N-su a ɔkɔ sor ba famu bio,
Asorɛkye ba enyim san ekyir,
Hom nyi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95

name: MHB 27:4
verse:
. Botan, kokwaa,
Kwaa na supruw,
Ɔkɔr n' srɔnsrɔmbea a ɔpɛ;
Mbepɔw atsentsen a wɔyɛ kumbɔɔ,
Mbepɔw a etsifi sukwankyɛ
Hom nyi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95

name: MHB 27:5
verse:
. Nyew, esutsen,
Yi N'ayɛw daa,
Ifi bepɔw tsirm' sianee;
Nsunyiwa hyɛnhyɛnn a rowora,
Ehum dzendzen a rutu huu huu,
Yi Ewuradze Nyame ayɛw.
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95

name: MHB 27:6
verse:
. Yi N'ayɛw daa,
Odomfo pa a;
Yi Egya, Domfo Ewurade ayɛw!
Ɔkra biara a rofow kɔ sor,
Menba a dze dɛw tow ndwom biara,
Yi Ewuradze tumfo ayɛw.  Amen.
title: John Stuart Blackie, 1809-95

name: MHB 28:1
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame N' abɔdze nyina, 
Hom mma hom ndze do nye hɛn ntow
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Ewia hyeehyew, 'hyerɛn dɛ sika,
Bosoom nwinwin, 'tse dɛ dwetε,
      Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
      Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: MHB 28:234
verse:
. M-frama a itu ehum dzendzen, 
Esuwusiw a esen wimu,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Bosoom, fa enyigye yi N' ayɛw,
N-woraba, hom mbɔ hom ndzem'
      Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
      Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
 
. N-su krɔngyenn a erepem, 
Tow ndwom ma w' Ewuradze ntse,
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Ogya hurenhuren a eyɛ dzen,
'Wo a ema nyimpa hyew na kan,
     Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
     Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
 
. Asaase pa a Nyame ama 
Daa daa iyi siar ma ne mba,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Wo mu nhyiren nye nduaba so,
Womfifir nkyerɛ N' enyimnyam, 
    Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
    Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: MHB 28:567
verse:
. N-korɔfo a hom 'koma dwe nyina, 
Na hom dze bɔn kyɛ, hom so mbra,
Hom so ntow Alleluia!
Amandzehufo, 'werɛhofo,
Hom nyi N' ayɛw, mfa ne nyina nsoa N',
    Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
    Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia! 
 
. Ao, Owu, yamuyiefo a edwe, 
'Wo a itwa hɛn owu ngyam do,
Yi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
'Wo na 'dze Nyame mba kɔ fie,
Hɛn Wura Christ faa wo kwan n' mu:
   Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
   Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
 
. Ndzɛmba nyina nhyira Bɔfo n', 
Wɔmfa mbrɛhoadze nkotow No,
Nyi N' ayɛw, Alleluia!
Wɔmfa ayɛyi mma Egya, nye Ba,
Nye Sunsum no, Ebiasa Kor, 
   Yi N' ayɛw, yi N' ayɛw 
   Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia!
title: St. Francis of Asissi. 1182-1226;

name: MHB 29:1
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 29:2
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 29:3
verse:
. Ndzɛmba nyina bɔ m' yi W'ayɛw,
Wiadze ne ndze ɔpedu
Ma ndwom a ɔnnsa da do;
Mframa na po a ɔrowor,
Nhaban na ndowa hɔn dede,
Yɛnye adze nyina yi W' ayɛw.
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 29:4
verse:
. Ndzemba nyina nyi W' ayɛw,
N-su, ɔbɔsu, nyankopɔn,
Ewia a 'rokɔtɔ na fua,
N-su a ɔrepem na ehum;
Twaber na ɔpɛber so,
Yɛnye hɔn hyɛ W' enyimnyam.
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 29:5
verse:
. Adom Wura yeyi W' ayɛw,
Bɔfo Kɛse, tum Asɛm,
Sunsum a ɔwɔ beebiara,
Yɛkotow W'ananadze,
Yɛma akoma do yi W' ayɛw. 
Yɛnye adze nyina yi W' ayɛw.  Amen.
title: George William Conder, 1821-74.

name: MHB 30:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, yefi enyimnyam m'kɔ'
 nyimnyam m' yi W'ayɛw;
Ntonton nka Wo dzin, ɔnka Egya
nye Sunsum no so,
Yefi ahom mu kɔ ahom m'
nantsew Zion kwan do,
Dze kopue Nyankopɔn enyim
wɔ kurow a adze nnsa mu da m'.
title: C. W. Humphreys, c. 1906.

name: MHB 30:2
verse:
. Ndaase na enyimnyam, na ɔsom,
na nhyira nye ɔdɔ,
Akòma kor, na ndwom kor ;
  Nà ase nye sòr ahotsewfo wɔ,
O Ewuradze, daa daa nyina twe bɛn
W’asomfo,
Dua hɛn wiadze som do
    Siesie hɛn ma Wo sor edwuma.
title: C. W. Humphreys, c. 1906.

name: MHB 31:1
verse:
. Nyame da Noho edzi:
Hom mma yɛntonton No,
Yɛmfa enyidzi mbra N'enyim;
Nyame wɔ N'asɔrfi m'.
Hɔn a wɔwɔ m'nyina nyɛ komm,
Yɛmfa enyidzi ntwa nhwe N'enyim.
'No nko nye
Hɛn Nyame, Hɛn Gyefo:
Yi Ne dzin ayɛw daa.
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 31:2
verse:
. Nyame da Noho edzi:
Tsie, wɔrobɔ nsanku,
Hwɛ, dɔm n' etwa ahengua n' ho ehyia.
Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn,
Tsie dɛ ndwom n' rofow sor,
'Bɔfo, hotsewfo tow ndwom n'bi.
Kyɛn W'aso 
Tsie hɛn ha;
Ewuradze Jesus, tsie
Hɛn ayɛyi a ɔmmfata.
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 31:3
verse:
. Ɔwo nye nhyira Bura,
Bɛtsew mo sunsum ho:
Memfa mo werɛ nhyɛ Wo nko mu,
Tse dɛ abɔfo krɔnkrɔn a
Wohu W'enyimnyam no,
Ma montonton Wo daa daa nyina.
Ma Wo pɛ 
Nhyɛ W'asɔr
Wɔ asaase yi do
Dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse wɔ sor.  Amen.
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 32:1
verse:
. ABƆDZE Wura a idzi sor hen,
W'enyimnyam wɔ ewia na nworaba m';
Eyɛ adze nyina ne farbaa,
Naaso ebɛn hɔn a wɔwɔ dɔ.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94

name: MHB 32:2
verse:
. N-kwa Ewia a ikenyan hɛn
Ma adzekyee kan hyerɛn hɛn kwan mu;
Hɛn enyidado Woraba,
Wo kan no hyerɛn hɛn sum mu.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94

name: MHB 32:3
verse:
. Sɛ imuna a, hɛn bra yɛ sum,
W'adom gye a, na hɛn ewia epue;
Wo nyankontɔn kyerɛ ehumbɔbɔr,
Bɔn da nkyɛn a adze nyina Wodze a.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94

name: MHB 32:4
verse:
. Ase nye sor nkwa nyina Wura,
Wo kan nye nokwar, W'ewia n', dɔ a;
W'ahengua hyɛnhyɛnn enyim no,
Yɛnnhwehwɛ hɛnankasa hɛn kra.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94

name: MHB 32:5
verse:
. Ma Wo nokwar n' nyɛ hɛn adehye,
Nkenyan akoma a ɔhwehwɛ W',
Kɛpem dɛ W'asomfo benya
Kan krɔnn na sor gyaframee kor.
                  		Amen.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94

name: MHB 33:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 33:2
verse:
. Sor abɔfo tow W'ayɛyi,
Dom Ewuradze, ahemfo Hen;
Cherubimfo paa m' yi W' ayɛw,
Seraphfo tsea m', 'Korsa Nyame!
Wɔtsea m', Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn!
W'enyimnyam hyɛ sor na ase ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 33:3
verse:
.	Hɛn tsetse egyanom Nyame,
Tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo yii W' ayɛw,
Asomafo krɔnkrɔn kuw no
Gyina hɔ enyigye na enyimnyam m';
Ahotsewfo na nkɔnhyɛfo n'
Bɔ m' yi Wo tum kɛse n' ayɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 33:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 33:5
verse:
. Egya a W'ahendzi mmbɔ adze,
Wɔdze tum na dɔ nyina ma Wo;
Wɔtonton Wo Ba kortoo no,
Ɔnye Wo kyɛ enyimnyam na tum;
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no ma yehu
'Hotsewfo daa 'Wer ɛkyekyefo n'.
   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 34:1
verse:
. BƐKYEBO, a wonnhu Wo, O Nyansabuakwa!
Nyame, kan a yɛmmbɛn na isuma mu;
Osiarfo, Nyimnyamfo, O Tsetse Nyame!
Otumfo, Katakyi, yɛkamfo Wo dzin.
title: Walter Chalmers Smith, 1824-1908

name: MHB 34:2
title: Walter Chalmers Smith, 1824-1908

name: MHB 34:3
title: Walter Chalmers Smith, 1824-1908

name: MHB 34:4
title: Walter Chalmers Smith, 1824-1908

name: MHB 34:5
verse:
. Bɛkyebo, a wonnhu Wo, O Nyansabuakwa!
Nyame, kan a yɛmmbɛn na isuma hɛn;
Osiarfo, Nyimnyamfo, O Tsetse Nyame!
Otumfo, Katakyi, yɛkamfo Wo dzin.
title: Walter Chalmers Smith, 1824-1908

name: MHB 35:
verse:
Ɔdomfo Nyame, yɛdze
Hɛn ayɛyi afɔr yi brɛ Wo
title: Folliot Sandford Pierpoint, 1835-1917

name: MHB 35:1
verse:
. ASAASE n'ahoɔfɛw ntsi,
Osian wimu ne fɛɛfɛw ntsi,
Ɔdɔ a ofi hɛn awoo m'
Ɔabɔ hɛn aprɔw ntsi:
title: Folliot Sandford Pierpoint, 1835-1917

name: MHB 35:2
verse:
. Adzekyee na adzesaa mu
Dɔnhwer biara ahomka ntsi,
Kokwaa, bɔnsa, dua na nhyiren,
Ewia, bosoom, nworaba kan:
title: Folliot Sandford Pierpoint, 1835-1917

name: MHB 35:3
verse:
. Asowa na enyiwa ho dɛw,
Akoma na adwen mu dɛw 
Sunsum mu koryɛ a ɔka
Tsibowa na adzehu bɔ m' ntsi:
title: Folliot Sandford Pierpoint, 1835-1917

name: MHB 35:4
verse:
. Adasamba hɛn dɔ ntsi,
'Nua, 'kyerɛbaa, ɔwofo, ba,
Asaase, sor anyɛnkofo
Hɔn ho nkaakaa pa no ntsi:
title: Folliot Sandford Pierpoint, 1835-1917

name: MHB 35:5
verse:
. W'akyɛdze a odzi mu biara a 
Edze ama hɛn mbasantsen,
Honam na sunsum mu adom,
Asaase na sor nhyiren ntsi:
title: Folliot Sandford Pierpoint, 1835-1917

name: MHB 36:1234
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Otumfo Nyankopɔn! 
Hɛn ndwom bɔfow edu Wo nkyɛn anapahema;
Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, mbɔbɔrhufo, tumfo,
Nyame Baasa Kor, Ɔkorsa siarfo!
 
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, ahotsewfo sɔr Wo, 
Wɔtow hɔn sika nhenkyɛw gu ahwehwɛ po n' ho;
Cherubim nye Seraphim twa hwe W' enyim ara,
'Wo a obi annyɛ Wo, na itsim hɔ daa.
 
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn; sɛ sum dze  Wo suma, 
Na dasanyi a omuo hu W' enyim a ɔnnyɛ mpo a
Wo nko na yɛ krɔnkrɔn, obi nnka Wo ho bio,
Wo tum, Wo dɔ, Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ dzi mu!
 
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Otumfo Nyankopɔn! 
W' edwinsa beyi Wo dzin ayɛw wɔ mbea nyina;
Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, mbɔbɔrhufo, tumfo,
Nyame Baasa Kor, Ɔkorsa siarfo!   Amen.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 37:1
verse:
. KRƆNKRƆN, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Nyame! 
Ɔwo a 'yɛ Baasa Kor,
Ɔsor dɔm nye ase Asɔr
Nyina bɔ m' tonton Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 37:2
verse:
. Yɛdze konyimdzi paa mu ka
Ɔkorsa kor a wɔnnkyɛ m';
Ahyɛ wiadze nyinara ma,
Na ɔka W' enyimnyam dzin n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 37:3
verse:
. Yɛgye Wo to m', Egya krɔnkrɔn,
Yɛtonton W', 'Ba krɔnkrɔn;
Nokwar Sunsum na krɔnkrɔnyɛ,
Yɛsɔr Wo daa nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 37:4
verse:
. Nyimpa Baasa a hom yɛ Nyame,
Yɛtonton hom, dɔ hom;
Na adwontofo nyina bɔbɔ m',
Atow hom ayɛyi so.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 37:5
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, krɔnkrɔn, Nyame! 
Hɛn sor ndwom bɛyɛ yi,
Ɔno a ɔkrɔn, 'sɛ dɛ wɔsɔr N'
Wɔbɔ m' yɛ Baasa Kor. Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 38:1234
title: Edward Cooper, 1770-1833.

name: MHB 39:1
verse:
. EGYA a yɛtse Wo mu,
Na yɛkeka hɛnho,
Yenya enyimnyam, tum na ayɛyi
Fi Wo dɔ a 'dze ma n' ho.
Wɔmma abɔfo nyina
Nda Nyame ase wɔ sor;
Na asaase ntow enyigye ndwom,
Na ɔngyegye wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 39:2
verse:
. Nyame a bɛyɛɛ nyimpa,
Ma hɔn a wɔagye hɔn nyina 
M-fa hɔn nkwa nda Wo ase,
Wɔ W' adom a ɔgye nkwa;
Adom a 'dze maa abɔn n',
Sor adwontofo nka;
Hom ntsea m'; Nkwagye nka hɛn Nyame, 
Nkwagye nka Eguambaa n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 39:3
verse:
. Sunsum a eyɛ krɔnkrɔn,
Ma W'ahotsewfo nyina
Ntonton W'adom krɔnkrɔn n', nhyira
Wo tum a ɔsakyer akoma.
Abɔfo nnkotum aka
Wo dɔ no krɔn kɛse n',
Enyimnyam dɛw a onnyi kabea,
Dza wohu a woehyira do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 39:4
verse:
. Daapem 'Korsa Ewuradze,
Ma ɔsor dɔm nyina,
Ma nyimpa mba nyinara nkaa
Na wɔntsena Wo dɔ mu.
Sɛ ɔsor na asaase
Nya guan fi W'enyim a,
Ma ahotsewfo no nyinara 
Ntow Wo dɔ ho ndwom daa.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 40:1
verse:
. YƐDZE daa ayɛyi
Ma Nyame Egya n' dɔ,
Hɛn ahotɔ wɔ ha,
Na enyidar pa wɔ sor.
Ɔsomaa No domankoma Ba,
Dɛ ombowu mma nyimpa n' bɔn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 40:2
verse:
. Daa daa enyimnyam nka
Nyankopɔn Ne Ba no,
Nyia ofi daa yaw mu
 Ɔdze N' bɔgyaa tɔɔ hɛn;
Ɔtse ase afei, na odzi hen,
Na ohu Ne yaw nyina ho mfaso.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 40:3
verse:
. Nyame Sunsum dzin no
Na yɛsɔr no daa daa,
Nyia No tum fofor no
Ma tsease-ewu nya nkwa.
N'eduma wie nhyehyɛɛ kɛse n',
Na ɔma ɔkra nya enyigye.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 40:4
verse:
. 'Tumfo Nyame, yɛdze 
'Nyidzi a ɔmmbɔ adze ma W',
Baasa a wɔnnkyɛ mu no,
Baako a ɔyɛ nwanwa n'.
Sɛ adwen nntse biribi ase a,
Hɔ na gyedzi na dɔ dzi nyim.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 41:1
verse:
. NYAME yɛ dzin a me kra tonton,
Etumfo Baasa, Bɛkyebo n',
Abɔdze na adom, hɔn tum nyina,
Ka onnyiewiei a wonnyim No.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 41:2
verse:
. Wo ndze dze po na asaase bae,
Ma asorɛkye wor na nworaba hyerɛn,
Naaso Wo ndwuma nyina mu,
Biribiara nye Wo nnyɛ pɛr.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 41:3
verse:
. Abɔdze da ho ara nyin, wu,
Abɔdze gu do sesa daa;
Santsen biara nnyim mbrɛ etse,
Wo nhyehyɛɛ akɛse yɛ kor.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 41:4
verse:
. W'enyiwa hwɛ wiadze nyina,
Idzi wiadze a ɔhyerɛn nyina do;
Edze kan yɛ efuradze,
W'asomfo nye ogyaframee.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 41:5
verse:
. Adasa a hɛn ho egu fi yi
Besi dɛn atow W'ayɛyi?
Yɛda W'ananadze wɔ ekyir,
Yehu W'enyim wɔ sunsum mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 41:6
verse:
. Woana botum ahwɛ kan no?
Woana bɛbɛn gyaframee no?
Wo nko na inyim W'ahoɔdzen,
W'asɛm ma otum bɔ Wo dzin.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 42:1
verse:
. NYAMЀ a eyɛ bùn a onnyi ase!
Woana botum ehu W’ewiei?
Nsɛm bɛn na ɔbɛkyerɛ Wo krɔn
Na akyérɛ Wo suban nyina?
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;

name: MHB 42:2
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;

name: MHB 42:3
verse:
. Wo bun no wɔ hɔ fi tsetse,
Ɔtse dέ Ɔwo, onnyi ahyɛse;
Ewɔ hɔ ansaana mber kὸraa
Na nworaba reba wiadze.
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;

name: MHB 42:4
verse:
. Ewùradze pà a ennsesa da,
N-kwa po a onnyi ewiei,
W’asɛm ma biribiara nkwa;
Ɔtsé ase, na ofi Wo hɔ.
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;

name: MHB 42:5
verse:
. Wo kɛseyɛ onnyi kabea,
Kɛseyɛ a sɛ adasa
Wiadze, sor nà asaase twa mù a,
Ɔbɛhyerɛn kɛse daa daa.
title: Ernst Lange, 1650-1727;

name: MHB 43:1
verse:
. NWOMA wɔ hɔ a ɔsɛ akenkan,
Ɔkyerɛ ɔsor nokwar,
Nkyerɛkyerɛ a nyimdzefo hia,
Na akoma a no mu tsew.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 43:2
verse:
. Nyame ndwuma, ɔsor na ase,
Etwa hɛn ho ehyia,
Dɛm nwoma no mu nsɛm kyerɛ 
Mbrɛ yɛhwehwɛ Nyame.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 43:3
verse:
. Wimu fɛɛfɛw a etwa hɛn ho, 
Tse dɛ Bɔadze No dɔ,
Fua aksɛse na nkakraba
Sen komm na asomdwee m'.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 43:4
verse:
. Dzin bi a ɔsen 'nyimnyam dzin nyina, 
Nye ngyirama ɔpedu,
Ɔdomankoma po tsea mu,
Ɔtow abɔfo ndwom.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 43:5
verse:
. Hɛn wiadze ahorow ebien;
Bɔn na esiw hɛn enyi, 
Mma yennyim sor na ase esumasɛm 
Pefee dɛ po na wimu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 43:6
verse:
. Ama m' enyi a medze hu adze, 
Na ɔsom me bo pii;
Ma m'akoma a wɔdze hwehwɛ W',
Na munhu W' beebiara.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 44:1
verse:
. WIMU tɛtɛr a ɔwɔ sor,
Ɔsor dubir fɛɛfɛw dɛm yi,
 Ɔsorsor a wɔahyehyɛ n' hyɛnhyɛnn, 
Kyerɛ hɔn abɔase kɛse no.
Ewia a osi do aber nyina,
Da no Bɔfo tum no edzi;
Na ɔma wiadze mbea nyina hu
Otumfo Ne nsaano edwuma.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719

name: MHB 44:2
verse:
. Ɔnnkyɛr na ewimbir sum aba,
Bosoom suo anwanwasɛm n' mu,
Na anafua si n'awoo nsɛm do 
Ma asaase a oritsie,
Ber a nworaba nyina rehyerɛn;
Na odu okyinnworaba do a, 
Ber a wokyin n', wɔka asɛmpa no, 
Wɔdze nokwar n' kɔ wiadze nyina.
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719

name: MHB 44:3
title: Joseph Addison, 1672-1719

name: MHB 45:1
verse:
. ME kra, hyira Ewuradze!
O Nyame, esō;
Ndwuma akɛse mu
Na esuma Woho.
Wo sum nyansa n' enyim
Na tum a ennyɛe,
Adwen a ɔpɛ W' ayɛyi
Sɛ dɛ ɔtsena suro mu.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:2
verse:
. Hɛn asaase yi a
Ɔkɔ aprɔw no
Na edze mframa 
Ayɛ n'efuradze:
Ɔwo akyekyer ho,
Ewia ma no mbo.
Na afei ɔdze hɔn
Kɔ sum mu kɛda.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:3
verse:
. Biribiara esi pi,
Naaso hwee nnkye bo:
Wɔsesa dabaa,
Wodzi Wo mbra do.
Epo no bun ase 
Yɛ asaase wewew,
Na ema mbepɔw so 
Kɛhyɛ po ase.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:4
verse:
. Mununkum tɔ nsu
Fɔw asaase do,
Ewia twe nsu no
San kɔ wimu bio:
Nyimpa ne berɛ do
Na eburow fifir,
Wenyin turo ma nsa pa,
Ma n'akoma enyigye.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:5
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:6
verse:
. Hwɛ, po na ɔda hɔ n',
No bun ase na
'Sunsum ebu do,
Bi wɔ abon na nsoɛ.
Hɔn sor na ahɛn pii
Dza eguadze kɔ;
Wonnsuro asorɛkye,
Anaa ehumtu.
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 45:7
verse:
. Nyame yɛ kɛse!
Munnhu kɛse bi,
Gyedɛ Wodze nko,
M'bɛka W'ayɛyi.
Medze daa enyigye
Susu W'edwuma ho;
M'enyi gye dɛ m'bɔtow:
Me kra, yi N'ayɛw!
title: William Kethe, d. 1593.

name: MHB 46:1
verse:
. MOTOW Nyame tum ho ndwom,
Dza epegya mbepɔw n',
Dza ɔtserɛɛw po m' kɔr ekyirkyir n',
Na ɔyɛɛ wimu a ɔkrɔn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 46:2
verse:
. Mohuhor nyansa no a ɔhyɛɛ
Ewia dɛ ondzi da do n';
Ɔhyɛ bosoom ma ɔhyerɛn,
Na nworaba nyina hyerɛn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 46:3
verse:
. M'kamfo Ewuradze N'ayamuyie a
Ɔmaa asaase edziban n';
Ɔdze N'asɛm yɛɛ mbowadoma,
Na ɔkaa dɛ ne nyina ye.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 46:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, 'kyerɛ W'anwanwandze
Beebi a medan m'enyi,
Sɛ mohwɛ asaase a menam do,
Anaa mohwɛ sor a.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 46:5
verse:
. M-fuw na nhyiren nyinara
Da W'enyimnyam edzi,
Mununkum si na ehum tu a,
'Hyɛ mbra fi W'ahengua m'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 46:6
verse:
. Nyame nsa gye m' taataa dabaa, 
Ɔdze N'enyi kyerɛ m' kwan;
Ebɛn ntsi na mo werɛ befir,
Nyame a No dɔ bɛn me?
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 47:1
verse:
. EGYA a edze ndze kɛse
Frɛɛ dɛm wiadze yi ma ɔbae,
Yedzi dɛw, Wo mbɔbɔrhu ho:
Ɔtse dɛm daa na ɔnnsesa.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 47:2
verse:
. W'asɛm na ɔma biribiara gyina;
Ekyerɛ Wo dɔ wɔ biara do,
Etse W'abɔdze biara su.
Ema obiara dza odzi.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 47:3
verse:
. N-kwa Wura nye ne Mafo,
Ɔwo na ebɔ hɛn nyina ho ban,
Nsɔhwɛ ber huuhu yi mu so,
Gye hɛn fi bɔn na Satan nsa.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 47:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, eyɛ hɛndze,
Kyerɛ W'ayamuyie nyina wɔ hɛn do;
Fa asomdwee na sor enyigye
Hyɛ hɛn akoma m' ma ɔnyɛ fofor.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 47:5
verse:
. Egya, Wodze nye dɛ ema
Wo mbofra daa daa edziban;
Fura haban mu sukooko tam,
Na tsie n-konkoran hɔn su.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 47:6
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn dadwen to Wo do,
Ɔwo na inyim hɛn hia nyina;
O fa W'adom no nyɛn hɛn na 
Ma hɛn akra nkwa paanoo ndɛ. Amen.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 48:1
verse:
. BƐKYEBO Nyame, sorsor mpo
W'ayamuyie no hyerɛn wɔ hɔ;
Wo nokwar tra mununkum no,
Dza ɔkata Wo nhyehyɛɛ enyim.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 48:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 48:3
verse:
. Dza 'dze ma no ye na ɔdɔɔ so, 
Ɔso nyimpa na mbowa nyina; 
Ehwɛ abɔdze nyina do,
Ahotsewfo dze yɛ soronko.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 48:4
verse:
. Nyame, W'adom no ho tsew koraa, 
Hɛn enyidar na awerɛkyekyer fi m'! 
Adam mba a wɔwɔ ɔhokyer mu 
Guan kɔ W'atsaban nwin ase.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 48:5
verse:
. N-kwa tse dɛ nsunyiwa a 
Ofi Ɔwo Ewuradze nkyɛn,
Na Wo kan mu hɛn akra hu 
Anohoba a ɔwɔ W'asɛm mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 49:1
verse:
. WO dɔ a ɔmmpa da, na ɔnnsa da, 
Yɛmmfata so yenya;
Ɔpɛ dɛ oyi hɛn bɔn fi hɔ, 
Na ɔboa hɛn mbɔbɔryɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 49:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 49:3
verse:
. Wo papayɛ na Wo nokwar
Dɔɔ so ma obiara,
Ɔtse dɛ po a wonnhu ase, 
Bea a hɛn nsusui nndu hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 49:4
verse:
. No nsu du abɔdze nyina do, 
Na no nkorabea ebu do,
Ɔso hɛn nyina, ɔso obiara,
Ɔwɔ hɔ afebɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 49:5
verse:
. Owura, Wo mbɔbɔrhu tsim hɔ,
Botan a onnhinhim;
Anohoba mpempem kyerɛ
Dɛ Wo dɔ tsim hɔ daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 49:6
verse:
. Odzi hen wɔ wiadze nyina,
Ɔnnsesa, osi pi;
Na sɛ Nyame nokwar tsena hɔ a,
Papayɛ no betsim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 50:12345
verse:
. Ewuradze nye mo Guanhwɛfo, 
Biribiara nnkehia m';
Ɔma meda mfunoma mu,
Ogya m' kɔ nsutaae ho.
 
. Ɔdze me kra san ba nkwam' bio, 
Na ɔma menantsew
Ne ndzeyɛtsenenee kwan no mu,
Wɔ Noara Ne dzin ntsi.
 
. Nyew, sɛ menam wu bɔnsam' a, 
Munnsuro mbusu biara;
Osiandɛ 'nye m' nam, Wo poma
Na W' abaw hyɛ me dzen.
 
. Mo pon so Ɔwo ewie to 
Wɔ m' atamfo enyim;
Edze seradze asera me tsirm';
Mo kuraba ebu do.
 
. Yie na adɔe bɛka mo do, 
Mo nkwa mber nyinara,
Na medze Nyame fie bɛyɛ
Me tsenabew daa nyina.
title: William Whittingham, 1524-79 ; Francis Rous, 1579-1659.

name: MHB 51:1
verse:
. ƆDƆ Nyame nye m' Guanhwɛfo, 
Ɔno na ɔnyɛn me;
Ber a ɔyɛ medze n', meyɛ Nedze n',
Ebɛn na mibehia?
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 51:2
verse:
. Ɔdze me kɔ bea a sarmon wɔ,
Bea a midzidzi, mohom;
Afei nsu a ɔtsen bɔkɔɔ ho,
Minya dza oye wɔ hɔ.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 51:3
verse:
. Sɛ mofom kwan a, ɔtsen me,
 Ɔma m'adwen ba fie;
Nnyɛ dɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ogyaa me ntsi,
Ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no ntsi a.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 51:4
verse:
. Owu bɔnsa sunkamm no mu,
M'bɛfa mu a munnsuro,
Osiandɛ 'nye m'nam, Wo poma,
W'abaa bɛkyerɛ me kwan.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 51:5
verse:
. Ampa, Wo dɔ dɛɛdɛw nwanwa n'
Bonsusu me nda nyina,
Na dɛ ɔronntwe no ho da n',
Mayɛyi rinngyaa da.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 52:1
verse:
. ONYAME dɔ, mbrɛ odua yɛ dzen a!
Ɔwɔ hɔ daa, na ɔnnsesa;
Wɔnntse ase na wɔdze ma kwa,
Ɔbor nyimdzee na adwen do!
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 52:2
verse:
. ɔsor dɔ, mbrɛ odua som bo a!
Wɔ 'berɛ na ɔyar nda mu,
Anago yaw na apensi mu;
Ekyekye hɛn werɛ, 'hyira hɛn.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 52:3
verse:
. Ɔdɔ nwanwa a ɔka hɛn fua,
Yɛkenkan wo wimu, ɔwɔ sor,
Yɛkenkan wo wɔ asaase famu,
Po a ɔtserɛw na nsu a ɔtsen mu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 52:4
verse:
. Yehu wo yie wɔ Nyia ɔbiaa
Bɔsoaa enyimguase mbeamudua n' mu,
Egya no somaa No fii sor,
Nye hɛn bɛtsenae, bowuu hɛn wu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 52:5
verse:
. Yehu wo tum a ohyira, gye hɛn, 
Wɔ adakamaa no sum mu mpo; 
 Yehu w' bio wɔ 'wusoɛr kan mu,
Yehu wo tum no n'amayɛ.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 52:6
verse:
. Onyame dɔ, hɛn kyɛm boafo,
Hɛn abrabɔ m' mbusu nyina m'; 
 Bɛkyebo dɔ, wo mu yɛhom,
Yenya ahotɔ na nhyira daa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 53:1
verse:
. NYAME nye dɔ, N'adom da edzi,
Wɔ kwan a yɛfa do nyina m';
Okenyan siar ma sum dan kan,
Nyam' nye nyansa, Nyam' nye dɔ.
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.

name: MHB 53:2
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.

name: MHB 53:3
verse:
. Ber ɔyɛ sum dodow mu mpo,
Ɔda ho kyerɛ N'ayamuyie;
Awerɛhow mu Ne kan hyerɛn: 
Nyam' nye nyansa, Nyam' nye dɔ.
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.

name: MHB 53:4
verse:
. Ɔdze enyidar a ɔwɔ sor
Afora wiadze dadwen;
Beebiara N'enyimnyam hyerɛn:
Nyam' nye nyansa, Nyam' nye dɔ.
title: John Bowring, 1792-1872.

name: MHB 54:1
verse:
. ME kra, tsi N'ayɛyi m'
N'ehumbɔbɔr dɔ sō,
Na ɔfa ebufuw nyaa na
No bo dwe ntsɛmara.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 54:2
verse:
. Nyame nnka enyim daa;
Na sɛ ɔtwe aso mpo a,
Asotwe no suar sen hɛn bɔn,
Onndu hɛn afɔdzi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 54:3
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ ɔsor krɔn koraa
Sen wiadze a yɛnam do n',
Dɛmara na N'adom so tse;
Ɔbor hɛn adwen do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 54:4
verse:
. Ewuradze ayamuhyehye
Wɔ hɔ ma hɔn a wosuro N', 
Ɔtse dɛ awofo baatanyɛ,
Onyim hɛn adwen do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 54:5
verse:
. Hɛn nda tse dɛ nkyɛkyɛr
Anaa anapa nhyiren;
Sɛ ehum kɛse tu fa efuw do a,
Ɔnnkyɛr na akyenkyen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 54:6
verse:
. Naaso Wo mbɔbɔrhu
Tsim hɔ mfe a ɔmmbɔ adze;
Na mbasantsen nyina bohu dɛ
W'anohoba n' si pi.   Amen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 55:1
verse:
. EWURADZE nsakyer nyina wura
Adze nyina eyɛ no fofor,
Ͻwo ennsakyer       da;
Mbrɛ eyɛ biara, mbrɛ etse biara,
Wo nkorͻfo wɔ Wo mu kyɛfa,
Eda ho yɛ hɛndze.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 55:2
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 55:3
verse:
. Sunsum a ‘yɛ adze nyina fofor,
Ͻwo dzi kan, yedzi ekyir,
Hɛn sor akwantu mu.
Wo nkenyan gya hɛn ma yɛhyerɛn,
Na yɛdze ahoͻdzen kͻ enyim,
Yɛkͻ do dzi konyim.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 55:4
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 55:5
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 56:1
verse:
. W'ADOM ho nkaakaa no yɛ dɛw, 
Me Nyame, mo sor Hen, 
Ma Wo tsenenee fi ber to ber 
Ntow enyimnyam ho ndwom.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 56:2
verse:
. Nyame dzi hen wɔ sor naaso 
N'adɔe no nntsena hɔ nko: 
N'ayamuyie hyerɛn wiadze nyina,
Ɔma ehiadze nyina.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 56:3
verse:
. Abɔdze nyina hwɛ Wo kwan,
Ma aama hɔn daa edziban; 
W'ayamuyie nsa no ma hɔn nam, 
 Dze ndzepa hyɛ hɔn anomu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 56:4
verse:
. Ewuradze yɛ ayamuhyehye, 
N'ebufuw so yɛ nyaa;
Ɔnnkyɛr na ɔdze ne fakyɛ asɛm
Ma ɔkra a ɔdɔ n' n'enyi gye.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 56:5
verse:
. Abɔdze, mbasantsen nyina, 
Kamfo W', yi Wo tum ayɛw; 
Hɛn a yenya W'adom kɛse no, 
Dze dɛw hyira Wo dzin.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 57:1
verse:
. MENYE Wo ntamu dwumadzi mu n'. 
Ɔyɛ dzen ma me kra,
Dɛ obotum esuma efi
W'enyim a innhu no.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 57:2
verse:
. W'enyi bɔ wiadze nyina aprɔw, 
Hu mo soɛr na me nda,
Me bagua m' na mo nsumaa m' asɛm
Na m'akoma mu nsɛm.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 57:3
verse:
. Owura, inyim mo nsusui, 
Ansaana madwen mpo; 
Na m'bobue m'ano akà 
asɛm no, 
Inyim dza mepɛ akyerɛ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 57:4
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 57:5
verse:
. N-tsi ma W'adom n'ntwa mo ho, 
Na ɔmbɔ mo ho ban,
Na wo dɔ kɛse no nkora
Me kra mfi mbusu ho.    Amen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 58:1
verse:
. EWURADZE dzi hen;
N'ahengua si ɔsor,
Atar a ɔhyɛ no
Yɛ kan na ahentum:
N'enyimnyam hyerɛn dɛ ekan,
Dasanyi biara nntum nnhwɛ kan n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 58:2
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 58:3
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 58:4
verse:
. Enyimnyam Hen kɛse
Yi bɛbrɛ No ho adze?
Na ɔakyerɛw Ne dzin dɛ
M'Egya na m' Adamfo?
Modɔ Ne dzin, modɔ N'asɛm.
M'ahoɛdzen nyina nkamfo
Ewuardze! Amen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 59:1
verse:
. IYE na eyɛ dza oye,
Ihu obiara mbɔbɔr,
Nkanka hɔn a wɔtwer Wo, Hwehwɛ Wo mbɔbɔrhu;
Anapa wɔyɛ fofor
Dɛ egyanom ber a hɔn mba su, 
Wo mbɔbɔrhu mu 'dze kyɛ, Hɛn ehiadze nyina 'dze ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 59:2
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrhu hwɛ Wo ndwuma do; 
Dza 'dze ma hɔn da edzi,
'Da ho kora do na 'dze ma, 'Dza Wo nsa ayɛ nyina;
Edze ahwɛyie kora hɔn do,
Nyia ɔdze noho to Wo dɔ do n', 
 Eweɔn ne tsinhwi nyina,
Ehwɛ n'anamɔn nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 59:3
verse:
. Woana botum esusu
Wo nkwagye adom no? 
Adom a ɔmaa Wo Ba kor n' Bae dɛ ɔbɛgye abɔn.
M-bratofo m-pempem,
Jesus ntsi edze akyɛ hɔn,
Hɔn nsa aka W'adom ampa,
Agye hɔn efi hɛll.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 59:4
verse:
. Epɛ dɛ egye mpempem bio, 
Na edze aakyɛ hɔn;
Ebɛgye ɔkra biara,
'Bɛgye nyimpa biara:
Egya, afei gye medze a
Menam Christ do dze ma Wo no; 
Afei ka n' ɔdɔ m' kyerɛ me 
Dɛ edze akyɛ me.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 60:1
verse:
. ANSAANA Nyam' bɔɔ mbepɔw,
Nkoko na no do ndua;
Ɔhyɛɛ nsubura amaama,
Ɔpem kɔ nsutsen mu;
Ofi tsetse wɔ mo mu n',
Ɔnwanwanyi MARA
Nyaa enyigye a odzi mu,
Na Nyansa nye me dzin.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 60:2
verse:
. Ber a ɔtserɛɛw ɔsor mu no,
Tse dɛ ntamadan no,
Na ɔbɔ po yantamm ho ban,
Siiw po esuyirii ano.
Na osusuu ndzɛmba no,
Nna menye No wɔ hɔ;
Emi nye Egya n' enyigye,
Nyimpa mba yɛ medze.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 60:3
verse:
. Dɛm na Nyansa nsɛm hwehwɛ 
W'enyimnyam na W'adom; 
Hɛn a yɛmmfata yi mpo, 
W'adom enyi no hun hɛn
'Nsaana wohum nworaba;
Nyansa mu na ayɛ hɛn
Na dɔ m' na 'wui maa hɛn.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 60:4
verse:
. Ana W'enyi gyè abɔdze a
Wɔtse dɛ hɛn so ho?
Hɛn a yehum Wo yemmbu W' bi n',
Yɛsɛɛn Wo wɔ dua do?
Nwanwa a wonnhu ano,
Ɔsor esumasɛm;
Aprandaa ndze bɔbɔ mu,
Dɛ ɔbɔn, meyɛ wodze.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 61:1
verse:
. ASAASE, fa wo ndze mpempem, 
Tow ndwom yi Bɛkyebo ayɛw; 
Yi N'ayɛw, Nyia aso tsie No,
Tɛkyerɛma dze dɛw tow N' ndwom; 
Asaase dze n'enyigye ndwom
Fi ekyirkyir, mbrɛ nyimpa tse,
Bɔkotow aka W'akɛseyɛ,
Atow W'ayɛyi, ehyira W' dzin.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 61:2
verse:
. Hom mbetsie anwanwasɛm no,
Mbrɛ tsetse Nyame tumfo a
Ɔdaa N'enyimnyam edzi no,
Ɔmaa asorɛkye saan ekyir,
Ɔmaa po nsu daan afasu,
Ɔmaa yɛfaa po bun mu;
Israel mbabaa dzii ehurusi,
Tontoon tum a ɔdze gye nkwa.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 61:3
verse:
. Nyia ɔtse ase, hyira Ewuradze; 
Hom nyi N'ayɛw wɔ mbea nyina, 
Ɔdze hɛn akra san ba nkwa mu,
Ne basa suo hɛn mu gyina. 
Yɛdze enyigye dze hɛn afɔr
Bogu W'afɔrmbukyia do,
Anohoba a yɛbɔɔ n' yaw mu n',
Yɛdze dɛw tua n' anapa.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 61:4
verse:
. Ɔkra biara a osuro Nyia ɔtse
Ahengua do no Ne mbra n',
Ɔmfa enyigye mbetsie dza
Nyame ayɛ ama hɛn ntotɔserɛ;
Ber a yɛdze hɛn ndze do wɔ mpaabɔ m', 
Yehun N'enyigye nkwagye no,
Yɛkamfo No mbɔbɔrhu.
title: Edward Churton, 1800-74

name: MHB 62:1
verse:
. ƆDƆ, mbrɛ osi dɔ, tserɛw ɔkrɔn!
Ɔdze dɛw hyɛ akoma ma,
Dɛ Nyame Ba, Nyame bɛfa
Hɛn nyimpadua wɔ nyimpa ntsi.
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:2
verse:
. Ɔannsoma ɔbɔfo biara
Wɔ bea a ɔkrɔn anaa osuar,
Nankasa faa hɛn nyimpadua,
Ɔbaa wiadze a ayew yi mu.
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:3
verse:
. Wɔbɔɔ no esu wɔ hɛn ntsi,
Odzii mbuada, ɔkɔm dzee No;
Hɛn ntsi ohyiaa nsɔhwɛ yaayaw,
Ɔkaa sɔhwɛfo n' gui maa hɛn.
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:4
verse:
. Ɔbɔɔ mpaa maa hɛn, kyerɛkyerɛɛ hɛn, 
Ɔyɛɛ Ne daa edwuma maa hɛn:
No dwumadzi, Ne nsɛnkyerɛdze,
Ne nsɛm nyina mu, ɔhwehwɛɛ hɛn.
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:5
verse:
. Woyii No hyɛɛ abɔnfo nsa,
Wɔkaa No mpire, dzii No ho fɛw,
Ɔsoaa 'nyimguase mbeamudua,
Hɛn ntsi oguu ohomtsen, wui.
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:6
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 62:7
verse:
. Nyia No dɔ nnyi mbanano agye
Nkwagye ama hɛn Ne Ba mu;
Enyimnyam nka Nyame Egya,
Sesei na nfesantsen nyina. 	  Amen.
title: Benjamin Webb, 1820-85

name: MHB 63:1
verse:
. ONYAME dɔ a no bun nnyi ase, 
Jesus mu Nyame da edzi;
Hwɛ mbrɛ W'enyimnyam hyerɛn pa!
W'ayarsa nsu pem mbea nyina!
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 63:2
verse:
. Epɛ nye woananom atsena?
Ndzebɔnyɛfo, bɔnnyiayɛfo: 
Onyankopɔn, tɛkyerɛma bɛn 
Botum akyerɛ Wo dɔ na adom?
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 63:3
verse:
. Dɛw mu yɛdze akoma m' ndaase 
Gye dza Wo dɔ pɛ ka kyerɛ hɛn,
Fa W' enyigye nyina ma hɛn, 
Yɛdze hɛnho nyina ma Wo.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 63:4
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn honam, 'kra, sunsum, 
Hyɛ Wo dɔ nye W'ayamuyie nsa:
O ma Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ ntsena hɔ,
Na sɔw hɛn ano dɛ Wodze.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 63:5
verse:
. Enyimnyam Hen, W'adom kɛse n'
Bor hɛn adwen no do koraa;
Hɛn bɔn mpo dɔɔ so dɛn ara a,
W'ehumbɔbɔr bor ne nyina do.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 63:6
verse:
. Ewuradze, da Wo nkwagye edzi,
Ma hɛn akra Wo sor ahoɔdzen;
Na yennsuro dɛ yɛkɔ enyim,
Wɔ asaase na hɛll etumfo m'.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 64:12345
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, Tumfo, abɔdze nyina hen; 
O me kra, yi N' ayɛw, Ɔno nye w' ahom na nkwagye;
Hom a hom tse,
Enuaam na nkyerɛbaa, hom mbra,
Hom ntonton No enyigye mu.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze a otu w' edwuma 
    mpon, weɔn wo,
Ampaara Ne yie nye N' adom ka wo do daa wɔ ha:
Dwen ho bio hwɛ
Dza Otumfo No tum yɛ,
Sɛ ɔdze No dɔ fa w' nyɛnko a.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, ɔno a ehumtuber no mu, 
Ɔno na ber a abɔdze nyina etwa ayer wo no,
Ɔma wogyaa,
Begyabegyayɛ taa dzinn,
Ɔma ehum na po yɛ komm n'.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze, ɔno a ber a bɔn na sum agye, 
Ɔno na abosonsɔrfo dzi nyim mmbu papayɛ bi a
Ne kan hyerɛn,
Pam sum mu ewurkadze,
N' adom bɔ esiarfo ho ban.
 
. Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze! Ao, dza ɔwɔ mo mu 
     nyina ntonton N'!
Dza wɔwɔ nkwa nye ahom m-fa ayɛyi mbra N' enyim!
Wɔmma Amen
Ngyegye bio wɔ nkorɔfom'
Yɛtonton No enyigyem' daa.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: MHB 65:1
verse:
. NYAME a ofir Nyame, ifua
Onyame dɔ no krɔn, no bun, 
Yɛdze ndaase akoma tow W' ndwom, 
Hɛn akoma haahaw hwehwɛ Wo,
Dɛ ogya a ɔredzɛw dzendzen;
Bra, fa Wo ngo krɔnkrɔn no bra.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 65:2
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Tumfo, yɛkotow Wo, 
Hɛn ahwehwɛdze nyina nye Wo, 
Hɛn akoma da W'enyim adagyaw, 
Igyaa Wo daa ahengua no hɔ; 
Too W'enyimnyam pan wɔ ase ha. 
Penee, kyii bɔgya, wui maa hɛn.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 65:3
verse:
. Yɛserɛ adom wɔ asorɛkye mu.
Adom nye ɔkra ne sekyɛ,
Adom na ɔsa yar nyina,
Adom brɛ apɛdze nyina adze,
Sɛ wiadze tsew etua mpo a,
Ɔma hɛn abotar yaw mu.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 65:4
verse:
. Ma sor nyɛ hɛn kra tsenabea ndɛ,
Yɛnka Christ ho nsuma Nyame m',
Hɛn sunsum nye Nyame dze mbɔ m',
Yɛnyɛ hɛn edwuma nyina Wo mu,
Hɛn nsusui nyina ngyina Wo do,
Kesi dɛ Wo su hyerɛn hɛn mu.
title: John Wesley, 1703-91

name: MHB 66:1
verse:
. ADOM nyina Nyame,
Yɛkamfo W'adɔe,
Edze Wo Ba ama dɛ ombowu mma hɛn.
Ofi ɔsor bae,
Ribeyi hɛn ndom;
Ɔadɔ, ɔadɔ hɛn osiandɛ ɔpɛ ɔdɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 66:2
verse:
. Ɔdɔ gyaa N' ma owui,
Hɛn enyi da 'yi do,
 Ɔadɔ, ɔadɔ hɛn, yennkotum atse ase,
Yebotum aka 'yi,
 Ɔadɔ hɛn kɛse,
Dɛ ɔdze No nkwa too hɔ gyee hɛn fii hɛll.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 66:3
verse:
. Ɔagye hɛn asefo;
Yensi dɛn nkamfo
Anaa yɛntow W'adom a onnyi kabea ho ndwom?
Yennkohu hweeara
Wɔ ha akwantu yi m',
Mbom yɛtow W'adom ho ndwom kɔ paradisè.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 66:4
verse:
. Na sɛ yefi ha
Pue W'enyim wɔ sor,
Hɛn sor bɛyɛ Wo dɔ ho ndwom ara nko,
Hɛn nyina bɛkamfo,
Hɛn Nyɛnko No dɔ,
Dza wɔhyɛ ase no rommbɔ adze da.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 67:1
verse:
. EPO pa a no mu dɔ Nyame!
Woana nnkɛfa n'akoma ama W'?
Na ɔnnkɛfa n'ahoɔdzen adɔ W'?
O Jesus, adasa Dɔfo,
Woana nnkɛpɛ dɛ ɔdze ne kra,
N'adwen, n'ahoɔdzen bata W' ho?
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:2
verse:
. Wo hyerɛn no mmbɔ adze da
Wɔ gya a ɔnnhyehye enyim;
'Bɔfo dze ntsaban bua hɔn enyim. 
Naaso W'adɔe tse dɛ mframa,
Ɔbɔ fa Wo ndwuma nyina do,
Ɔhwetse ber a W'ewia pue.
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:3
verse:
. Imuna a, ahodwuruw ma
'Saase, hɛll na sor edum hinhim;
Tum a ɔyɛ hu yɛ Wodze,
Woana botum akyerɛ ɔdɔ a
Ɔtwe Wo bɛn emi dɛm yi,
Kesi dɛ ebɛyɛ medze?
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:4
verse:
. Ɔwo a idzi hen wɔ sorsor
Wɔ ndzɛmba na adze nyina do;
Edze dɛw hyɛ hɔn nyinara m',
Naaso 'pɛ dɛ eba me nkyɛn. 
Na gya m' taataa dɛ menye Wo
Bedzi hen dɛw mu afebɔɔ.
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:5
verse:
. Bura pa! Nhyira nyina pem
Fi Wo hɔ; W'amayɛ nnyim hia,
Ebɛnadze na Ɔwo hwehwɛ?
Naaso hweeara mpo nnhia Wo da;
M'akoma a ɔmmfata yi,
Iyi ara na ehwehwɛ.
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:6
verse:
. Tsetsentsetredee Ɔhoɔfɛfo!
Kan mba a hɔn ho yɛ fɛw, mbakan
Hu Wo a, hɔn 'nyimnyam hyerɛn pa:
W'enyi bɛyɛ dɛn aba mo do,
Ɔbaa ba a wonyinseen n' bɔn mu, 
Sunsuma, ahataw nye nwin?
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:7
verse:
. Sɛ ebɔ Wo tsir adze ara a,
Hɛll nsordaafo hɔn ho popo; 
Wonyim yie dɛ Nyame Tumfo
Nye asaase, hɛll na sor Hen:
Woana n'atar m'bɔgya nye yi?
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 67:8
verse:
. Nyame pa, epo a no mu dɔ!
Woana nnkɛfa n'akoma ama W'? 
Woana nnkɛfa no tum adɔ W'?
O Jesus, adasa Dɔfo,
Woana nnkɛfa ne kra adɔ W'?
N'adwen, 'hoɔdzen bata Wo ho.
title: Johann Scheffler, 1624-77

name: MHB 68:1
verse:
. OBI nnsɛ Jeshurun Nyame,
No ho yɛ dzen, ɔkrɔn;
Hwɛ! Ɔtserɛw Ne ntsaban mu,
Ɔnantsew wɔ wimu!
Israel ɔnye N'abakan;
'Tumfo Nyame yɛ wodze,
Ofi sor robɔbor wo,
Nyame a bor adze nyina do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 68:2
verse:
. Jehovah Kɛse pɛ dɛ
Ɔboa na ɔgye wo;
Daa Nyankopɔn wowaw wo,
Wo Bɔfo, wo Nyɛnko;
Israel ɔbɛn na isuro?
Mbusu biara rennhaw wo,
Abasa a ɔwɔ hɔ daa n',
Aka wo efua yie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 68:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 68:4
verse:
. Aperdzi nyina abɔ adze,
Akokoeko egyaa;
Israel nnkɛyɛ bɔn bio da,
Na ɔbɛtsena asomdwee mu;
N'atamfo nyinara kɔ,
Bɔn nnyi kyɛfa wɔ no mu,
Israel nko bɛtsena hɔ a
Jesus wɔ n'akoma m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 68:5
verse:
. Israel woehyira wo!
Ɔman bɛn nye wo sɛ?
Jesus agye w' efi bɔn m',
Ennkɛtsena bɔn mu bio,
Jesus nye w' kyɛm mpɛm esuon;
W'afowa a gya wɔ ano,
Nyame Tumfo Asɛm bedzi
Wiadze, bɛn na hɛll do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 69:12
verse:
. Oyi nye Nyame a yɛsɔr No n', 
Hɛn Dɔfo pa a ɔnnsakyer da n',
No dɔ so dɛ No tum kɛse n',
Onnyi mbanano, nnyi ewiei.
 
. Jesus, Kandzifo, Kyirdzifo n', 
No Sunsum dze hɛn bodu fie;
Yeyi N' ayɛw wɔ dza etwam',
Yɛtwer No wɔ dza ɔreba.
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: MHB 70:1
verse:
. M'ENYIDAR wɔ Nyankopɔn mu;
Ɔyɛ me gyedzi fofor,
Ogya m' fa ɔbra adandan mu,
Oye na ɔyɛ nokwafo.
Wonnyim No,
No nkotoo,
Ɔfrɛ m'akoma Nedze.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: MHB 70:2
verse:
. Nyimpa ahantan na n'enyimnyam, 
Afowa na ahenkyɛw sɛɛ no;
Ɔdze berɛ tow abantsentsen
Na ne nyina bubu gu famu,
Nyame tum,
Ber nyina nye
m'asɔrdan na abantsentsen.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: MHB 70:3
verse:
. Nyame N'ayamuyie wɔ hɔ daa,
Ne nyansaa bor adwen do:
Enyimnyam, kan na nkwa fir no,
Ahoɔfɛw mapa fir no.
Afebɔɔ
Na No mu
Aman fofor soɛr som No.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: MHB 70:4
verse:
. Otumfo Mafo no ma hɛn 
Ndzepa pii daa nyinara,
Hɛn akra enyi gye Ne pɛ ho,
'Nyigye gya hɛn bea a yɛkɔ.
No mu na
Ɔdɔ gyina;
Ɔma enyigye gyina.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: MHB 70:5
verse:
. Adasa nkɔ do ara daa,
Mfa ayɛyi afɔrbɔ 
Mma ɔdomankoma Nyame,
 Wɔ Christ a ɔdze No mae,
Jesus frɛ
Obiara:
Nyia otsie No nnhwe ase.
title: Joachim Neander, 1650-80

name: MHB 71:1
verse:
. YƐBA hɛn egyanom Nyame nkyɛn; 
Hɔn Botan nye hɛn nkwagye; 
Daa abasa nye hɔn tsenabea, 
Yɛdze yɛ hɛn tsenabea,
Yedze hɛn ayɛyi brɛ Wo,
Yɛhwehwɛ W' dɛ ahotsewfo n'. 
Wɔ mbasantsen nyina mu.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 71:2
verse:
. Onyame gya a odzii hɔn kan n'
Da ho hyerɛn dzi hɛn kan;
Ɔsor kyɛm a ɔnweɔɔn hɔn no 
Da ho so kata hɛn do;
Adom a ɔbrɛɛ abɔnfo adze,
Ahoɔdzen a ɔhyɛɛ mberɛwyɛ dzen, 
Da ho dzi nyim, hyɛ hen dzen.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 71:3
verse:
. Bɔn a ɔbrɛɛ hɔn adze no
Da ho hyɛ hɛn kra do ndɛ; 
Nyinsuwa a wokyii n' nyinara, 
Yɛdze enyito ka hɛn bɔn; 
Dɛ mbrɛ itsiee hɔn sufrɛ no, 
Dɛm na hɛn mpaabɔ fow kɔ sor, 
Na ɔdze Wo nhyira ba.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 71:4
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 71:5
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 72:1
verse:
. ME kra, hyɛ ɔsor ndwom bi ase;
Me ndze, nyan na tow ndwom,
Hɛn domankoma Hen n' ndwuma akɛse, 
Ne dzin kɛse ho ndwom.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 72:2
verse:
. Ka No nokwar nwanwa n' ho asɛm, 
Na ma No tum ntahye;
Tow N'adom anohoba ho ndwom,
Nyame nkenyan asɛm n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 72:3
verse:
. Bɔ Ewuradze nkwagye n' dawur
Ma akɔhweaban a woruwu:
Ɔdze akyerɛw dze dua a ɔnnsɛɛ da, 
Akyerɛw asɛm krɔnkrɔn n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 72:4
verse:
. N'anohoba kɛse n' hyerɛn 
Dɛ ɔwɔ ayewa do;
na sum m' 'tumfo nnkotum apepa
Akyerɛw a ɔwɔ hɔ daa n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 72:5
verse:
. N'adom asɛm biara yɛ dzen
Tse dɛ dza ɔdze bɔɔ sor;
N-dze a ɔdandan nworaba no,
Ka anohaba nsɛm nyina.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 72:6
verse:
. M'akoma a atɔ bahaw dze dɛw
Hu dɛ W'adom tsim hɔ;
Motwer ndze a ɔbɔɔ adze nyina,
Na onnhia gyedzi bio.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 73:12
verse:
. Me Nyame, mbrɛ 'dua yɛ nwanwa a 
W' ahentum ne hyerɛn a!
Wo mbɔbɔrhu egua n' ne fɛw a
Wɔ kan a ɔhyerɛn mu!
 
. Wo mfe a ɔmmbɔ adze n' no hu a, 
Domankoma Ewuradze,
Esunsum wotwa hwe W' enyim
Tonton Wo daa nyina.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 73:34567
verse:
. Mbrɛ odua yɛ fɛw, yɛ fɛw a, 
Dɛ yebohu W' enyim
Wo nyansaa bun n', Wo tum kɛse n'
Nyame W' ahotsew nwanwa.
 
. Ao Nyame, mbrɛ misi suro Wo a, 
Suro a no mu dɔ,
Na medze ahopopo enyidar,
Nnuhu nyinsu som Wo!
 
. Ma mo so maadɔ W', Ewuradze, 
Ɔwo a 'yɛ Tumfo yi,
Abɔ Wo mu adze ebisa
M' akoma brɛfo no dɔ.
 
. Egya bi nnyɛ dɔ dɛ Ɔwo; 
Na bi nndwe dɛ Ɔwo,
Wonnyi abotar dɛ mbrɛ ewɔ n'
Emi babɔn yi ho.
 
. Jesus N' egya, dɔ n' akatua, 
Na enyigye bɛn a
Dɛ m' botwa ahwe W' ahengua enyim,
Mahwɛ Wo, na mahwɛ W' !
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 74:1
verse:
. AYƐYI nka sor Krɔnkrɔnyi,
Wonyi N'ayɛw wɔ ase:
Ne nsɛm a ɔyɛ nwanwa nyina m',
N'akwan nyina tsim hɔ.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 74:2
verse:
. O hɛn Nyame Ne nyansa dɔ,
Bɔn na enyimguase mu,
Adam a ɔtɔ do ebien bae
Bɛgyee hɛn nyina fii mu.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 74:3
verse:
. Nyansa dɔ! Honam, bɔgya a
'Hwee famu wɔ Adam mu n',
Bɛsan nye tamfo no aper,
Bɛper edzi konyim.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 74:4
verse:
. Akyɛdze kɛse a ɔkyen adom
Ntsew honam, bɔgya ho;
Nyame ankasa nye No su
Na odzi dɛm dwuma n'.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 74:5
verse:
. Ɔdɔ ayamuyie nye yi,
Dɛ Nyia ɔsɛɛ tamfo n'
Nyimpa n'amandzehu mprɛnu n',
Noara so duaa mu bi.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 74:6
verse:
. Nsumaa mu, wɔ turo no mu,
Na mbeamudua no do so,
Ɔkyerɛɛ No nuamom, hyɛɛ hɔn dzen, 
Wɔ amandzehu na wu m'.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 74:7
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka sor Krɔnkrɔnyi,
Wonyi N'ayɛw wɔ ase:
Ne nsɛm a ɔyɛ nwanwa nyina m',
N'akwan nyina tsim hɔ.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 75:1
verse:
. EGYA a Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei
Dze Wo Ba kortsee n' maa abɔn,
W'adom a edze ma kwa no,
'Somaa No bɛgyee wiadze nkwa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 75:2
verse:
. Boa ma yɛnkamfo W'mbɔbɔrhu,
Ɔso, dɔ, ɔwɔ mbea nyina;
Yɛnkamfo Eguambaa a owui maa hɛn,
Adasa nyina Agyenkwa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 75:3
verse:
. Nyiyimu a ennyɛ no da n',
Edze sii Adam asehwefo do,
Na esiesie nkwagye adom a, odzi mu,
Ama obiara wɔ Christ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 75:4
verse:
. Ohun amandze dze gyee wiadze, 
Na ɔpataa maa obiara;
Ɔdze No nkwa so bɔɔ afɔr
Maa hɔn a wɔmmpɛ aba Ne nkyɛn
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 75:5
verse:
. Nyame, soɛr ma W'asɛm do,
Na frɛ amanaman nyina;
Ma Wo mbeamudua frankaa no do,
Na Wo wu n' bɛyɛ adasa dze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 76:6
verse:
. Dɛm na W' ayamuyie mmpa ara da, 
Mo nkwa nda nyinara mu;
Mo Guanhwɛfo pa, ma montow
W' ayɛyi wɔ Wo fie daa!   Amen.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 76:12345
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Hen nye mo Guanhwɛfo, 
N' ayamuyie mmpa ara da;
Meyɛ Nedze ma ɔyɛ medze aba,
Mirinnhia hweeara da.
 
. Mbrɛ nkwa esutsen fi pem no, 
Hɔ na ogya me kra kɔ,
Ɔdze sor edziban nyɛn me
Wɔ mbrɛ m-funoma wɔ no.
 
. M-ber pii na mikyiin bɔn mu, 
Na ɔdze dɔ hwehwɛɛ me;
Ɔdze me too Ne batsir do
Dze me baa fie edɛw mu.
 
. Owu bɔnsam' munnsuro mbusu, 
Ber a, mo Wura, ebɛn me;
W' abaw na Wo poma hyɛ m' dzen,
Na Woara idzi m' enyim.
 
. 'Wo na eto pon wɔ m' enyim; 
Ihue adom gu mo do;
Ao, enyigye bɛn na ofi
Wo kuraba mu bu do!
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 77:12
verse:
. Minsi dɛn mondɔ me Nyame, 
Minsi dɛn nyi N' ayɛw?
Minsi dɛn nhu N' adom no war,
Ne trɛ, no krɔn, no bun?
 
. W' adom tsen du obiara do, 
Na onnyi mbanano;
Ɔto adasamba nyina;
Ɔwɔ hɔ afebɔɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 77:3456
verse:
. Odu wiadze tɛtɛr nyina, 
Ne trɛ nnyi mbanano;
Ɔtrɛ ma onngya baako mpo,
N-kyɛ ɔpaa mo ho.
 
. Mo mfom nyinii dur sorsor no; 
W' ehumbɔbɔr traa hɔ;
Christ no mu edoom me fakyɛ,
Fakyɛ a wɔnnto n' abaw.
 
. Sor abɔfo bɛn botum akyerɛ 
Wo nkwagye dɔ n' no bun?
W' akyɛdze a onnyi kabea yi,
Ao, ma monsɔ monhwɛ.
 
. Bra ntsɛm, adom Ewuradze, 
Bɛfa Woara Wodze;
W' adaworom, bɛyɛ m' akoma
W' ahengua afebɔɔ.     Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 78:1
verse:
. M'BƐYƐ dɛn atow ahentum a
Abɔfo pɛ ho n' ndwom?
Huntuma m' huntuma nyɛ komm;
Ma sor adwontofo ntow,
Mpempem gyina W'ahengua ho,
O ɔsorsor Nyame;
Ɔpedu tow W'ayɛyi ndwom,
Na mo so nye woana?
title: John Mason, 1645-94.

name: MHB 78:2
verse:
. Wo hyerɛn da edzi ma hɔn;
Mitsin W'anamɔn do a,
Metse Nyame ndze wɔ m'asomu, 
Hɔn dze, wohu W'enyim,
'Yɛ hɔn Ewia ntsi wɔtow ndwom;
Tow nserɛmɛn to mo do,
Na beebi a heaven hyɛ ase n',
Alleluia wɔ hɔ.
title: John Mason, 1645-94.

name: MHB 78:3
verse:
. Ma gyedzi kan nhyerɛn m'akoma m',
Ma 'gya dɔ nsɔ wɔ mu;
Ma menye sor adwontofo
Aabɔ m' aatow Wo ndwom,
Musuro, mowɔ kan na gya nyina,
Dɛ m'bɛyɛ sum, na nwin;
Sɛ 'regye hɔn sika mfutuw a,
Gye mo so me dwɛɛtɛɛ.
title: John Mason, 1645-94.

name: MHB 78:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, mbrɛ idua so a,
Ekora abɔdze nyina!
Wo nyimdzee nkotoo na otum
Susu po n' trɛ na bun,
Ɔwo nye po a onnyi mpoano,
Ewia a onnyi ɔhe;
Ewɔ hɔ sesei nye daa nyina,
Na ewɔ beebiara.
title: John Mason, 1645-94.

name: MHB 79:1
verse:
. HOM nyi Ewuradze ayɛw, oye dɛ 
Hom ma akoma na ndze do kamfo N';
No su na No ndwuma gya hɛn ma 
Yɛdze enyigye yi N' ayɛw.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 79:2
verse:
. Ɔyɛɛ nworaba a wɔhyerɛn wɔ sor,
'Kan hɔn dodow, bɔ hɔn edzin;
Ne nyansaa so, onnyi ewiei,
Bun kɛse a hɛn nsusui yew mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 79:3
verse:
. Hom ntow ndwom mfa nkrɔn Ewuradze!
Ɔtserɛw No mununkum mu wɔ sor; 
Hɔ na ɔhyehyɛ nyankonsu,
Anaa ɔmma nsu nngu famu kwa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 79:4
verse:
. Ɔdze sar kata akoko do,
Na eburow hyɛ hɛn kwa amaama; 
Ne nsa ma mbowadoma edziban,
Na ɔnyɛn nnoma nyina so.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 79:5
verse:
. Ebɛn na abɔdze tum yɛ?
Nyimpa ahoɔdzen anaa mpɔnkɔ? 
Nyansa anaa ahoɔdzen so ɛ?
Yinom nyina nnka hwee wɔ N'enyim.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 79:6
verse:
. 'Hotsewfo dze, wɔsɔ N'enyi,
Ne mba ho yɛ no enyigye;
Onyim hɔn 'nyidar, hɔn suro,
Ɔhwɛ, na ɔdɔ Ne saso hɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 80:1
verse:
. MEDZE m'akoma bɛkamfo Wo, 
Maka W'ayamuyie akyerɛ adasa; 
Mbrɛ W'adom ndwuma yɛ nwanwa a! 
Medze ndwom bɛkamfo Wo dzin,
M'bedzi dɛw wɔ m'Ewuradze mu,
M'bɛda W'ase, makamfo Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 80:2
verse:
. Ewuradze bɛgye No nkorɔfo,
Ɔboa hɔn wɔ ahokyer ber m',
Hɔn a bɔn nye hɛll ahyɛ hɔn do,
Hɔn a wonyim Wo n'bɔtwer Wo, 
Ɔwo a idzi W'anohoba do
Nnkɛma ɔkra biara ho akyer n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 80:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 80:4
verse:
. Ɔkra bɔbɔfo a ɔhwɛ Wo
Otwar dɛ ohu W'enyim ara,
Na ne nsa ka W'adɔe nyina;
Dzebɔnyɛnyi a osu hwehwɛ W',
Nyia ɔhwehwɛ dɛ ɔgye dzi n',
Innkegyaa no dabiara da.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 81:1
verse:
. DZA me nsa ayɛ biara
Nnkotum agye me kra;
Fona a nyimpadua afa m' biara n', 
Ɔnnkɛma meedzi mu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 81:2
verse:
. Dza metse nka, meyɛ
Nnkɛma m' Nyame asomdwee;
Me mpaa, apensi na nyinsu,
Nnkotum asoa m'adzesoa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 81:3
verse:
. Christ, W'edwuma nko,
Botum eyi bɔn yi;
Nyame Eguambaa, Wo bɔgyaa nko
Bɛma meenya asomdwee.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 81:4
verse:
. Wo dɔ a edze dɔ me,
Nnyɛ dza medze dɔ Wo,
Na ɔbɛma meenya ahotɔ,
Na me kra eenya ahomgye.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 81:5
verse:
. O Nyame Ba, Wo tum nko 
Botum dze m' bɔn akyɛ m';
O Nyame Ba, Wo tum nko ara
Botum ebubu mpokyerɛ 'i.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 81:6
verse:
. Mihyira Nyame Ne Christ,
Motwer Onyame dɔ,
Medze nokwar akoma nye ano
Mefrɛ No M'Agyenkwa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 82:1
verse:
. TSIE enyigye ndze! Agyenkwa aba, 
Nyia wɔbɔɔ N' ho dawur n';
Ma akoma biara ngye No ntsena m'
Na ndze biara ntow ndwom.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 82:4
verse:
. Asomdwee Hen, hɛn hosanna,
Yɛdze ma W' akɔaba,
Na ɔsor abangua wosow,
Dze Wo dzin a ɔyɛ dɔ n'.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 82:23
verse:
. Ɔba bɛgye adaduafo
Fi abɔnsam ndɔmmum mu;
Ayewa mbobow bue N'enyim,
Ndadze mpokyerɛ bubu.
.
. Ɔbɛkyekye akoma a ebubu,
Ɔbesa ɔkra yar;
 Ɔdze N'adom akoradze no
Bɛma hianyi brɛfo.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 83:1
verse:
. EGYA No dɔ na ɔwoo No
Ansaana wiadze reba,
Ɔno nye Alpha na Omega,
Ɔyɛ ahyɛse na ewiei;
Sesei ndzɛmba na dza etwa m'
Na mfe a ɔreba nyina,
Afebɔɔ na afebɔɔ.
title: Aurelius Clemens Prudentius, 348-413.

name: MHB 83:2
title: Aurelius Clemens Prudentius, 348-413.

name: MHB 83:3
title: Aurelius Clemens Prudentius, 348-413.

name: MHB 83:4
verse:
. Afei mpanyin na mbofra nyina
Nka mbɔ m' ntow Wo ndwom dɛɛdɛw;
'Baawa na no wura nyi' W'ayɛw,
Mbofra so ntow W'ayɛyi,
Mbanyimba, mbasiaba mbɔ m' ntow, 
Mfa akoma pa nyi W' ayɛw,
Afebɔɔ na afebɔɔ.
title: Aurelius Clemens Prudentius, 348-413.

name: MHB 83:5
title: Aurelius Clemens Prudentius, 348-413.

name: MHB 84:5
verse:
. Irikehyia mbusu no, 
Wɔtoow ndwom yii W' ayɛw;
N- dɛ a wɔakrɔn Wo sor yi,
Hɛn so yehuhor Wo.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: MHB 84:6
verse:
.  Egyee Jewfo ayɛyi; 
Gye hɛn so hɛn mpaabɔ,
Ɔhen dɔyɛfo, yamuyiefo a
Ndzepa nyina yɛ W' fɛw. 
 	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: MHB 84:7
verse:
. Enyimnyam nye ntonton nka 
Wo, hɛn Hen Agyenkwa, 
Ɔwo a mbofra ndze dɛɛdɛw, 
Toow Hosanna maa Wo! 
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: MHB 84:12
verse:
. Enyimnyam nye ntonton nka 
Wo, hɛn Hen Agyenkwa,
Ɔwo a mbofra ndze dɛɛdɛw,
Toow Hosanna maa Wo!
 
. Ɔwo nye Israel Hen, 
Ɔhen David ne Ba a
Enam Ewuradze dzin mu
Reba dɛ hɛn siar Hen.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: MHB 84:34
verse:
. Abɔfo dɔm nyinara 
Kamfo Wo Nyame manm':
Nyimpa nye abɔdze nyina
Bɔ ose gye hɔn do.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
 
. Hebrewman mu nkorɔfo dze 
Mberɛnkɔnson huaa Wo;
Hɛn so yɛdze ayɛyi
Nye mpaabɔ ba W' enyim.
	Enyimnyam nye¬—
title: Theodulf of Orleans, c. 750-821;

name: MHB 85:1
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛnye abɔfo ntow
Ndwom ntwa ahengua no ho;
Hɔn gyirama no yɛ mpempem mpo a,
Hɔn dɛw n' dze ɔyɛ kor.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 85:2
verse:
. Wɔka dɛ Eguambaa a owui n' fata
Dɛ wɔbɔkrɔn No dɛm;
Hɛn akoma so ka dɛ ɔfata,
'Siandɛ wokum N' maa hɛn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 85:3
verse:
. Enyimnyam na sorsor tumdzi
Fata hɛn Jesus Christ;
Na nhyira a ɔkyɛn dza yɛma n'
Nka Ewuradze afebɔɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 85:4
verse:
. Abɔdze nyina bɔ m' kor hyira 
Nyia ɔtse ahengua n' do
Ne dzin krɔnkrɔn no, na wɔhyɛ 
Eguambaa n' enyimnyam.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 86:1
verse:
. NYAME Ba tumfo, daa Ɔdɔ, 
Ɔwo na hɛn yennhu W'enyim,
Yɛdze gyedzi nko suo Wo mu,
Yɛgye dza yenntum nntse ase dzi.
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 86:2
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 86:3
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 86:4
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 87:1
verse:
. JESUS dze N'adom nyina ba, 
Ɔbɛgye asehwefo;
Hɛn 'nyimnyam enyidado,
Jesus ba bɛma hɛn do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 87:2
verse:
. Ma enyikan abo nsea m',
Ma Abraham mba mbɔ ose;
Yenyi hɛn Hen brɛfo ayɛw,
Nda N' ase, ndzi dɛw, ntow ndwom.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 87:3
verse:
. Ɔayɛ hɛn nkwagye ho edwuma, 
Ɔafa hɛn akra ndɔmmum,
Ɔdze hɛn abrɛ Nyame,
Ɔdze No bɔgyaa ahor hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 87:4
verse:
. Afei yɛyɛ Nedze koraa,
Hom nnantsew dɛ ekan mba;
Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na yeenya adom,
Akoma pa, ma yeehu No.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 87:5
verse:
. Yɛbenya hɛn frɛ akatua;
Yebedzi Nyame ekyir,
Enyigye, dɔ na asomdwee,
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ bɛhyɛ hɛn ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 88:1
verse:
. YƐNAM gyedzi do nyim ampa,
Nyame Ba no aba,
Ɔada Noho edzi wɔ ha,
Na Ɔtse hɛn akoma m';
Ɔnam N'adom nye No dɔ mu 
Ama hɛn nyina ntseasee, 
Dɛ yɛnhwɛ ɔsor nhu No dɛ 
Sor nye asaase Wura.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 88:2
verse:
. Yɛtonton Nyame Otumfo, 
Ɔno a obi ammbɔ No, 
Ɔno nye daa nkwa nsunyiwa, 
Yɛsɔr No daa nyina;
N'amayɛ no mu na yenya
Enyigye a ɔnnsa da,
Yɛbɛtsena ase wɔ N'enyim dɛ 
Nkonyimdzifo daa nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 89:1
verse:
. CHRIST, m'enyidado fapem, 
Christ, me dɛw no nsubura,
Ma menda ho ntsena WO mu; 
Memfa m'ahoɔdzen nsom WO.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:2
verse:
. Ma Wo dɔ n' ndzɛw m' akoma m', 
Fa Wo ho suro hyɛ mo mu;
W'ayɛyi nyɛ mo botae,
W'anoyerɛw nyɛ m'enyigye.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:3
verse:
. 'Mandzehu ba m'akwan mu, 
Na ɔbra n'ehum tu me a,
Ma W'ehumbɔbɔr enyiwa n'
Nhyɛ me nkuran wɔ sum ber mu.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:4
verse:
. Konyimdzi fi Wo dzin m' ba
Bɛhyɛ sor dɛw ndwom no ma a, 
Ma mentse nka bi wɔ m' mu, 
Dwumadzi nye dɔ nhyɛ m' ma.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:5
verse:
. 'Bra ne dɛw, m'bɛkamfo Wo, 
Wo nsɛmpa bɛhyɛ m'ano; 
Wo kan no m'bɔsɔ n' daa nyina, 
Na m'botu sum ndwuma nyina.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:6
verse:
. Adom mbordo nsunyiwa, 
Ma minnya dza mihia kwa; 
Kɛpem mewie adasa bra n',
Menkyerɛ dɛ metse ma Christ.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:7
verse:
. Motwer Wo bɔgyaa n' ampa, 
Biribi nnkɛhaw m'akoma; 
M'botwa nsuyirii no sɔnn,
M'bodua 'Manuel bea n' do sɔnn.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 89:8
verse:
. Dɛm a, bue me abow no, 
Ma monkɔ kan bea no do;
Mehu dɛ m'tse ma Christ yi,
Munhu dɛ owu yɛ m' mfaso.  Amen.
title: Ralph Wardlaw, 1779-1853.

name: MHB 90:1
verse:
. M'APƐDZE a odzi kan,
Jesus a owui maa me;
Enyigye a mohwehwɛ, 
Wo mu nko na mubohu.
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: MHB 90:2
verse:
. M'beyi W' ayɛw, m'bohu Wo,
Ɔno nye me nhyira wɔ ha;
M'bohu Wo na madɔ Wo,
Ɔnyɛ me nhyira wɔ sor.
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: MHB 90:3
verse:
. Ewuradze mohwer Wo a,
M'abrabɔ rinnkesi hwee, 
Ewuradze, sɛ minya Wo a,
Minyim dɛ munnkowu da.
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: MHB 90:4
verse:
. Ahomgye nyina Mafo,
Ofi Wo serew mu nko, 
Asomdwee na dɛw fir Wo;
Minya Wo a, 'bɛyɛ medze.
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: MHB 90:5
title: Augustus Montague Toplady, 1740-78.

name: MHB 91:1
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: MHB 91:2
verse:
. 'Sɛmpa n' ho atɔfo, hom nhua N' 
Wɔ N' afɔrmbukyia n' do;
Hom nhua nyia hom tsia N' anamɔnm'
Na hom nhyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: MHB 91:34
verse:
. Israel mbasantsen, hom a 
Woeyi hom asehwem',
Hom nhua nyia ɔdze N' adom gye hom n',
Na hom nhyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
 
. Bɔnyɛfo, mma hom werɛ mmfir 
Bɔwen na bɔwema n';
Hom mfa hom asadze nkɔ nkɛma N',
Na hom nhyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: MHB 91:56
verse:
. Ebusua na ngyirama nyina, 
Wontwa nhwehwe N' enyim;
Na hɔn nyina wɔntow ndwom nhua
Nyia wɔahyɛ N' abɔso Hen.
 
. Ao, nkyɛ yɛnye sor dɔm yeetwa 
Yɛahwehwe N' ananadze,
Yeekua ho ma wɔaatow daa ndwom n',
Na yaahyɛ N' abɔso Hen!
title: Edward Perronet, 1726-92;

name: MHB 92:6
verse:
. Edɛw bɛn na nkyɛ ɔbɛyɛ, 
Dɛ mo wumpa no do,
Mobɔbɔ Ne dzin na matseam'
Dɛ, Wɔnhwɛ Eguambaa n'!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 92:12345
verse:
. Jesus dzin bɔ adze nyina do, 
Wɔ hɛll, nye ase, nye sor,
Abɔfo na nyimpa kotow n',
Na mbɔnsam fi enyim guan.
 
. Jesus! dzin a ɔyɛ abɔn dɛw, 
Dzin a wɔdze akyɛ abɔn;
Ɔhotse hɔn suro nyina,
Na ɔdan hɔn hɛll yɛ heaven.
 
. Jesus! otu adaduafo apo, 
Otsia abɔnsam tsir do;
Ɔdze tum hyɛ nyia onnyi ahom,
Na ɔma ewufo nkwa.
 
. Ao, nkyɛ N' adom ahonya no 
Wiadze nyina aasɔ ahwɛ!
N-kyɛ No dɔ abaw n' bofua
Adasamba nyina.
 
. Ne tsenenee na No nkwagye 
Na mobɔ no dawur,
M' edwuma nye dɛ mekam' dɛ,
Wɔnhwɛ Eguambaa no!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 93:1
verse:
. HOM mma yɛmfa ayɛyi, 'nyidzi, 
Mma hɛn nkwagye dzin pa no,
Dza mfesantsen a etwa m' no 
Wɔdze siee Nyame mu no,
Naaso yɛdzi enyigye krɔnkrɔn
Yɛatsea mu yɛatow ndwom ndɛ.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 93:2
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 93:3
verse:
. Ɔyɛ dzin a wɔdze tonton,
Wɔdze tow konyimdzi ndwom,
Dzin a wɔdze bɔ mpaa krɔnkrɔn 
Wɔ awerɛhow bɔnsa yi m',
Dzin a sorfo dze enyidzi
Kotow som enyigye mu.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 93:4
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 93:5
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 93:6
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi yɛdze ɔdɔ tonton
Dzin a wodzi no nyi yi;
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, yɛserɛ Wo,
Kyerɛw W' dzin wɔ hɛn mu wɔ ha,
Ama yefi ha fow sor a,
Yɛnye abɔfo aatow ndwom.	  Amen.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 94:1
verse:
. Eguambaa bi, nkwagye dzin bi, 
Enyidar bi nnyi sor anaa ase,
Fɔdzi nye fɛr ho guansumabew bi nnyi,
Dɛ Wo nkotoo.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 94:23
verse:
. Me gyedzi suar, m' enyidar suar, 
M' akoma ne hia nye no mbusu nko
Na ɔbɔ mu dɛ senaman wɔ mo mu
Kekam' frɛ Wo.
 
. Kaansa muwu a, Ɔwo yɛ nkwa; 
Meyɛ nwim mpo a, mo Wura, dɔ ne gya nye W'
Minnyi etsidaa, minnyi fie biara so
Gyedɛ Woara.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 95:1
verse:
. JESUS, eyɛ Ewia na Kyɛm, 
Kyɛm na Ewia afebɔɔ, 
Innkegyaa dɛ ehyerɛn da, 
Innkegyaa hɛn nweɔn da. 
Sɛ yɛrokɔ a pia hɛn, 
Gye hɛn fi atamfo nsamu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 95:2
verse:
. Jesus, 'yɛ Paanoo na Nsa, 
Paanoo na Nsa afebɔɔ,
Innkegyaa dɛ 'nyɛn hɛn daa,
Na ehyɛ hɛn dzen daa.
Kɔ do ma hɛn sor paanoo, 
Yɛnkɔ do nnom sor n-sa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 95:3
verse:
. Jesus eyɛ Dɔ na Nkwa, 
Nkwa na ɔdɔ afebɔɔ.
Innkegyaa dɛ ikenyan hɛn,
Innkegyaa dɛ edɔ hɛn.
N-kwa na ɔdɔ a yehia nyina
Wɔ Wo mu, wɔ Wo mu ampa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 95:4
verse:
. Jesus yɛ Asomdwee na Dɛw,
Dɛw na Asomdwee afebɔɔ.
Dɛw a ɔmmpa, ɔnnsesa,
Asomdwee a onngyaa hɛn.
Yɛwɔ W' mu dɛw na asomdwee, 
Seseiara na afebɔɔ.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 95:5
verse:
. Jesus yɛ Ndwom na Ahoɔdzen,
Ndwom na Ahoɔdzen afebɔɔ.
Ahoɔdzen a ɔnnsa da,
Ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Ma ahoɔdzen na ndwom yi
N-hyɛ hɛn dzen daa nyina.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 96:1
verse:
. KA enyimnyam edzin nyina, 
Nyansa, dɔ na tum bɔ m'.
Dza adasa nyim no,
Dza ɔda abɔfo do;
Iyinom nyina nntum nnkyerɛ 
Dɛ mbrɛ hɛn Agyenkwa no tse.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748
