Ma me tsibowa nhu W'asomdwee,
Kenyan me ma munhu W'adom,
Na ma mentse bɔnfatsɛ nka.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 294:4
verse:
. Sɛ mama Wo werɛ ahow a,
Na medzi nkwaseasɛm ekyir a,
W'ehumbɔbɔr no agye me,
M'awerɛhow mu epegya me a,
Adom ehumbɔbɔr Sunsum,
Ma me ahotɔ bio, na gye
Mo sunsum wɔ krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu,
Ma n' do mma onnhu amandze bio.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 295:1
verse:
. SUNSUM siarfo a wͻsͻr Wo
Ka Egya na Asɛm no ho,
Nyame na Ewuradze kor:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:2
verse:
. Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, sor Ebubur,
Ͻbͻsu a isian fi sor, ’
N-kwa ahom, ͻdͻ gya:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:3
verse:
. SunSum a ekyerɛ hɛn kwan,
Sunsum a ema sum yɛ kan,
Obi nntum nngyina Wo tum ano:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:4
verse:
. Wo a Jesus fi N’egua do
Dze Wo mae dɛ bͻboa hɛn,
Amma yaannyɛ ankonam;
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:5
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:6
verse:
. Yehwe ase a, ma hɛn do,
Na hɛn kra tͻ efir mu a,
Fre hɛn bérɛww bra Wo nkyɛn bio;
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:7
verse:
. Bra bɛhyɛ mbérɛwyɛfo dzen;
Ma abrɛfo akokodur,
Kyérɛ hɛn ma yɛnkasa yie:
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:8
verse:
. Bra bͻboa akra a wͻpɛ
Esua Wo nokwar mapa n’,
Na woenya ͻdͻ pa no;
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:9
verse:
. Fa hɛn fa kwan tseabaa n’ mu.
Sɛ yɛfom a, bͻ hɛn kͻkͻ;
Yɛbͻ mpaa a, serɛ ma hɛn.
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 295:10
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96;

name: MHB 296:1
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, hu m' mbɔbɔr,
Midzi yaw dɛ mafom Wo,
Murusu sesei yi dzi,
Tsie akoma a orusu n'.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:2
verse:
. Mo bɔn a ɔdɔɔ so pii n',
Meka ne nyina kyerɛ Wo;
Dza mayɛ etsia WO nko n',
Enyianyiakwa, Wo nko nyim.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:3
verse:
. M'aso esiw wɔ Wo frɛ ho,
Me per mu mohwe ase daa,
Fa W'aba puw me kakra,
Na mammfa Nyame enndzi agor.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:4
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:5
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:6
verse:
. 'Sɔryɛ nwinwin, apɛdze
Duum prɔwee gya tantan no;
'Mumuyɛ daadaa m'akoma,
 Ɔhyɛ Ɔwo a 'nyim n' awerɛhow.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:7
verse:
. O mannda papa biara,
Dɛ mennsu mo mfom pii n' ho,
Mannhwehwɛ W'enyimtwuw no,
Mebu enyi egu Sunsum n' do.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:8
verse:
. Minyan dwumadzi fofor do,
Yardɔm no wɔ mo wer mu;
Nyimpa enyi do sor bɔfo,
Kwatanyi wɔ Wo kan mu.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:9
verse:
. Ma m' W'awerɛkyekyer no daa,
Dom me W'ayarsa no daa;
Soɛ mo mu abotar mu,
Idzi yaw, eso hyira m'.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 296:10
verse:
. O hu me mbɔbɔr ara,
Afei midzi mo mu yaw,
Dza mayɛ etsia Wo Sunsum n',
Egya, fa kyɛ m' wɔ Ba n' mu.  Amen.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 297:1
verse:
. FA Wo mu nhyira kanea no
Bra hen su sunkamm no mu,
Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn a ’dzi mu,
’Wérɛkyekyer Nyame.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 297:2
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 297:3
verse:
. ‘W'asomdwee ba dɛ ͻbͻw:
Kyerɛ, hyɛ hɛn pɛ a ayew do,
Kͻ do bue Christ mu ndzɛmba,
’Wérɛkyekyer Nyame.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 297:4
verse:
. Damfo a edwe krͻnkrͻnyi:
Si W’asͻrdan hɛn akoma m’,
Boa hɛn ma yɛntse Wo nka,
’Wérɛkyekyer Nyame.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 297:5
verse:
. Dzi ntamugyina ma hɛn daa,
Na yɛmfa ndzé a wͻnntse mper
Hɛn ehiadzé a yenntum nnka.
’Wérɛkyekyer Nyame.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 297:6
verse:
. Abba, Egya yɛtsea mu,
Ma yenya ͻsor hyira,
Onnyiewie ahyɛnsew no,
’Wérɛkyekyer Nyame.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 298:1
verse:
. NYAME Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn;
Ber a ͻsɛ yi mu,
De mbrɛ Pentecost da n’ yɛe no,
Fa Wo tum nyina sian.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 298:2
verse:
. Yɛdze koryɛ dzi ehyia
Wͻ bea a ahyɛ ama hɛn,
Yɛtweͻn hɛn Wura anohoba n’,
Adom nyina Sunsum no.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 298:3
verse:
. Dɛ ehum kɛsé a ͻrobͻ
Wͻ asorɛkye n’ase,
Dze tum kenyan adwen nyina,
’Kra, atsenka ahom kor.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 298:4
verse:
. Fa nyansa fi sor hyɛ
Mbaabun nye mpanyin ma;
Ma hɛn ’gya akoma nye gyirama,
Mfa nsͻr, nyi ayɛw, mfa ndͻ.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 298:5
verse:
. Ekan Sunsum, hwehwɛ
Na pam isum fi hͻ;
Fa ahoͻdzen hyerɛn daa daa,
Kɛpem da pa no mu.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 298:6
verse:
. Nokwar Sunsum, gye hɛn
Wͻ nkwa nye owu mu,
Sesei, Sunsum a awo hɛn,
Boa hɛn ma hɛn ho ntsew.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 299:1
verse:
. BRA Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn, hyewbͻ gya,
Bra na fa dɛw bͻhom mo mu;
Dɛ pɛ dzendzen atwe W' aba 'i,
O bra bɛtsew m'akoma ho.
Si me kra m' asͻrfi wͻ hͻ.
Na fa W'nhotscw su tsim ha. '
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 299:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 299:3
verse:
. M’asomdwee, mo nkwa, m’ahotͻ,
M’akoradze nyina nye Woara,
M‘abayɛ ho dasefo pa,
Kurkye fakyɛ wͻ rn‘akoma m’,
Christ ntsi wͻdze mo bͻn akyɛ m’,
Dͻ ho enyimia, sor abͻbaado.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 299:4
verse:
. Me Nyame bra, kyérɛ Wo wuodzi,
Ma n' enyimia kɛse wͻ sor, ,
Ondzi Wo ho dase pefee,
Ma mentse Wo nka wͻ mo mu,
Ma mo tum nyina nhu dɛ aba,
Na Woara yɛ dɛ nsͻwano pa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 300:1
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Hyɛ mo mu nkwa fofor,
Ma mondɔ dza Ɔwo edɔ
Na menyɛ dza eyɛ.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 300:2
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Ma m' akoma mu ntsew,
Kɛpem dɛ menye W' nya pɛ kor
Dze sɔw fona, dze bɔ bra.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 300:3
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Ma menyɛ Wodze koraa,
Kɛpem dɛ me nyimpadua mpo
Nyame kan bɛhyerɛn mu.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 300:4
verse:
. Nyame ahom, gu mo do; 
Nna munnkowu ara da,
Na mbom menye Wo bɛtsena ase
Mber a onnyi ewiei mu.  Amen.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 301:1
verse:
. PETSE Wo Sunsum gu asaase,
Asaase mfa tsénenee mfafor,
W’ahendzi mbra, ͻnka hɛll nhyɛ,
Na W’akomfowa mbrɛ dͻm nyina adze.
title: Henry More, 1614-87.

name: MHB 301:2
verse:
. Ma ͻnyɛ dɛ ehum dzendzen
Mbͻ mfa atamfo nyina do,
Ͻnsakyer bͻn no kwan biara,
Ma gyedzi na dͻ nka hͻn mbͻ m’.
title: Henry More, 1614-87.

name: MHB 301:3
verse:
. Nyew, ma Wo Sunsum beebiara
Ͻnda N‘ahom kɛse n’ edzi,
Ber a ndzeyɛɛ pa, adorn n’aba
Risiesie Wo Christ N'ahenman.
title: Henry More, 1614-87.

name: MHB 301:4
verse:
. Yɛ adom, nokwar Nyame krͻnkrͻn!
Ikenyaan tsetse adzehufo,
Hyɛ anohoba n’ ma ma hɛn,
Sian, fa gya soa hɛn ahenkyɛw.
title: Henry More, 1614-87.

name: MHB 302:1
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrhu Egya, W' asɛm mu 
Enyimnyam ahyɛ ma!
Abɔdzin nyinaa nka Wo dzin
W' adom nsɛmpa yi ntsi.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: MHB 302:2
verse:
. Ha na akɔhweaban nyina 
Nya ahonya mbordo;
Ahonya a bi nnyi wi ase,
Otsim hɔ afebɔɔ.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: MHB 302:3
verse:
. Ha na nyimdzee nduadzewa fifir 
Ma hɔn a kɔm dze hɔn;
Edziban pa a wiadze nnyi bi,
Rotweɔn nyia no kɔn dɔ.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: MHB 302:45
verse:
. Ha na hɛn Pomfo N' ndze dɛɛdɛw 
Ka asomdwee kasa;
Na nkwa na dɛw a onyi ewiei
Wɔ Ne nsɛm nyinaa mu.
 
. Kyerɛkyerɛfo pa, adom Wura, 
Bɛn Wo ba daa nyinaa;
Kyerɛ m' ma mondɔ W' asɛmpa,
Na munhu m'Agyenkwa.    Amen.
title: Anne Steele, 1716-78.

name: MHB 303:1
verse:
. AO, NYAME Asɛm a abɛbra,
Ao, Nyansa a ifi sor,
Ao, Nokwar a 'nnsesa da,
Ao, hɛn wimu kadoo kan!
Yehuhor W' wɔ Wo hyerɛn ho,
Ifi siar bea ayɛ
Hɛn anamɔn ne kanea,
Hyerɛn fi ber to ber.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 303:2
verse:
. Asɔrfi no Wura dɔfo
Nsamu nyaa sor akyɛdze,
Ɔda ho ama kan no do,
Ɔnhyerɛn wiadze nyina do,
Ɔyɛ sika adakaba;
Wosie mpɔkowa pa wɔ m',
Ɔyɛ Christ nkwa asɛm no
N'ahenman mu mfonyin.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 303:3
verse:
. Orinyam tse dɛ frankaa,
Wɔ Nyame dɔm enyim,
Ɔhyerɛn tse dɛ ogyaabaa
Wɔ wiadze no sum do;
Ɔyɛ akyerɛkwan nwoma
Wɔ bra po pramee do,
Kusukuukuu, ɔbo, anhwea o,
Christ, wɔdze ba Wo nkyɛn.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 303:4
verse:
. Gyefo pa, yɛ W'asɔrfi
Sika kanea hyɛnhyɛn,
Ɔmfa Wo nokwar kan no
Nkyin aman do dɛ tsetse,
Ma W'akwantufo a worikyin
Mfa yi nhwehwɛ hɔn kwan,
Nkodu dɛ fua, sum bɛpa,
Wobohu W' 'nyim na enyim.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 304:1
verse:
. NYlMPA nyina Egya, Wo nko mu na
Yɛtse, kͻ ba, gu ahom,
Sor kan séremen kor na osian famu
Bɛsɛpɛw Wo mba ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 304:2
verse:
. W'asɛm mu na yɛhwehwɛ Wo,
Yedze hu hwehwɛ Wo,
Bue hɛn enyi na ma yenhu
Wo mbra m' anwanwadze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 304:3
verse:
. Afei ma hɛn sum no nkata
Kan a ͻhyerɛn guam’ n’ do;
Afei soma Sunsum kyérɛkyérɛfo n’,
Bue hɛn asomu ma yɛntse.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 305:1
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, bra hɛn 'komam', 
Ma yɛntse Wo tum no,
Wo na tsetse wɔdze W' hyɛɛ nkɔm,
Na kan na dɔ fir Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 305:2
verse:
. Bra, na Ɔwo na nkɔnhyɛfo n' 
Dze W' kyerɛwee, dze Wo kae;
Bue nokwar no, Ɔwo nye saafee n',
Tsew nwoma krɔnkrɔn n' ano.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 305:34
verse:
. Sor Ebubur, trɛ W' atsabanm' 
Wɔ hɛn isum no do,
Butuw hɛn kra no sum no do,
Na ma hɔ ɔnyɛ kann.
 
. Sɛ 'hyerɛn hɛn mu a, yɛnam Nyame 
Nankasa do bohu N',
Na yɛnye Wo mba nyina esusu
Onyame dɔ no bun.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 306:2
verse:
. Hɔn a wɔkan, tsie yɛ nhyira mba,
Sɛ wodzi W'ahyɛdze do a;
W'ahenman n' yebenya n' ha,
Na yeehu W'enyimnyam no,
Sɛ eba bɛtsena ase ha a,
Yenye W'eedzi hen konyim m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 306:11
verse:
. ASEKYERƐFO Krɔnkrɔn, bra,
Ma hɛn enyi mfa nkan Wo nwoma;
Aso ntsie esumasɛm no,
Nsɛm a ofi Wo nkyn ba,
Nsɛm a ɔma onnyiewie nhyira,
Yɛkora no setsie akomam'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 307:1
verse:
. SUNSUM n' gu ahom gu asɛm n' do
Na ɔma nokwar da edzi;
Afotu nye anohoba ma
Kan a ɔma ahotsew.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 307:2
verse:
. Enyimnyam hyerɛn nwoma no do
Hyenhyɛnhyɛn dɛ ewia,
Ɔma hɛn wɔ ber biara mu,
Noara dze ma, ɔmmfɛm.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 307:3
verse:
. Nsa a ɔma no gu do ma
Adom kan nye ɔhyew,
No nokwardzi soɛr aman do,
Wɔsoɛr na wɔnntɔ da.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 307:4
verse:
. Ma ndaase a onnyi ewiei nyɛ Nedze
Wɔ dɛm kan hyɛnn no ho,
Dɛ ɔma wiadze sunkamm hyerɛn
Fi sor adzekyee nserɛmɛn m'.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 307:5
verse:
. Me kra dzi dɛw dɛ ɔbɛka
Nyimpa a modɔ No n' do,
Kodu dɛ m'bohu enyimnyam
Wɔ sor man fɛɛfɛw n' mu.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 308:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, W' asɛm tsim, 
'No na yɛhwɛ nantsew,
Nyia ɔgye no nokwar
Nya kan nye enyigye.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 308:2
verse:
. Atamfo ba hɛn do a, 
W' asɛm yi hyɛ hɛn dzen,
Awerɛkyekyer nsɛmpa,
N-kwagye amandzɛɛ.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 308:5
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɔr nsɛmpa, 
Ɔboa atseasefo;
N-kwasɛm, ɔkyekye
Hɔn a wɔda wuso werɛ.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 308:6
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma yenhu 
No mu adzesua krɔnkrɔn n',
Na yaadɔ, yeesuro Wo,
Daa nyinaa yaabɛn Wo!   Amen.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 308:34
verse:
. Ɔbra n' ehum tu hɛn, 
Na sum gye hɛn do a,
Ne kan hyerɛn ma hɛn,
Na ɔkyerɛ hɛn kwan.
 
. Woana botum akyerɛ 
Ahotɔ nye dɛw a
W' asɛmpa yi dze ma
N-tsetsekwaa nyinaa?
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 309:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, bu nkwa
Paanoo n' bi ma m',
Dɛ mbrɛ ibubuu bi mu
Po no ho no;
Nwoma krɔnkrɔn n' no mu
Na mohwehwɛ W',
Mo sunsum per hwehwɛ W',
O nkwa Asɛm!
title: Mary Artemisia Lathbury, [v.1], 1841-1913;

name: MHB 309:2
verse:
. Ɔwo yɛ Nkwa Paanoo,
Ewuradze ma m'
W'asɛm nye nokwar no a
Ɔgyee me no
Ma menye Wo ndzidzi
Nnya nkwa wɔ sor;
Kyerɛ m' ma mondɔ W' nokwar
Na Ɔwo nye ɔdɔ.
title: Mary Artemisia Lathbury, [v.1], 1841-1913;

name: MHB 309:3
verse:
. Owura, ma Wo Sunsum
No mbra mo do,
Na ɔnka m'enyiwa,
Na meehu adze;
Kyerɛ m' W'asɛm mu nokwar a
Ehuntsa no,
Nwoma a eyi akyerɛ n' mu
Muhu Ewuradze.
title: Mary Artemisia Lathbury, [v.1], 1841-1913;

name: MHB 310:1
verse:
. BER a metse me dan mu komm.
Wo Buukuu n‘ nko nyɛ me damfo.
We nsem ne nkaakaa ye me dɛw.
Meka Wo pɛ a wͻakyérɛw n’ ho asɛm,
Na mohwehwɛ sor esumadze m’
Kodu dɛ m’benya akomatͻm'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 310:2
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ Wo sor adom nsɛm no
Aayɛ botae wͻ me nsɛm nyina m’!
Na m‘bɛyɛ Ewuradze kadofo,
Na ͻnye m’ bɛnantsew akasa;
Dɛm na m'akoma bohu No,
Na ͻdze dͻ adzɛw dabaa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 310:3
verse:
. Mpɛn pii a meda morohom no
Ao nkyɛ W'abodwee kasa no
Aama mo bom' akomatͻmu!
Ber a motwer m' Ewuradze,
Rotͻ nkom, moroso siar daaso
Na da a onnyiewiei ho nyikyerɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 310:4
verse:
. M‘benyan atow Gyefo ayɛyi n’
Na daa m'bͻbͻ ne nyina dawur,
Na ma W’adom kasa pa no
Mpem W'akoma mbra me gyirama do,
Fa dͻ mapa hyɛ me bra ma
Na fa m’ ka sor Asͻr no ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 311:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, yehu Wo nokwar no daa,
W'asɛm yɛ nokwar, yɛ dɔ na ayamuyie,
W'ehumbɔbɔr tsen du akra a ayew nyina do,
Ɔbɔnfo kɔbesae dan benya W'adom.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 311:2
verse:
. O ma menkamfo m'Agyenkwa mma wo,
Misi mo bo ka, Christ yɛ nokwafo;
Hɔn a wɔgye Ne frɛ do nyina benya nkwa,
Bra m'Agyenkwa hɔ, N'adom du obiara do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 311:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 311:4
verse:
. Dɛm a hom mfa ahobrɛadze ngye N'adom,
Twa hwe N'ananadze, gye No dɛw mu;
Yenya bɔnfakyɛ koraa wɔ Jesus dzin mu,
N'ahonya nye hɛn abɔdzin a yɛdze kɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 312:1
verse:
. HWƐ Nyame Eguambaa a ɔsoa
Wiadze nyinara bɔn fi hɔ!
Botoo, ɔfaa nkowaa suban
Na ɔtsenaa dɛtse dan mu;
Na yennhu N'enyimnyam no bio,
Nyame nye nyimpa bɛtsenae.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 312:2
verse:
. Hwɛ bea a Nyame-nyimpa gyina
Refrɛ N'abɔdze a ayew wɔ fie!
Da biara ɔtserɛw Ne nsamu,
Akra a wɔaberɛ, Jesus frɛ hom!
Hom mbra mbɔhom wɔ Mo bo mu;
Gye dzi na m'bɛma w' ahomgye.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 312:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 313:
verse:
Yi N'ayɛw! Yi N'ayɛw!
Ma adasa ntsie Ne ndze!
Yi N' ayɛw! Yi N' ayɛw!
Ma nkorɔfo ndzi ehurusi!
Ao, dua Ɔba Jesus do bra 
Egya No hɔ,
Na hyɛ No enyimnyam !
Ɔayɛ adze kɛse!
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 313:1
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 313:2
verse:
. Ao, nkwagye a odzi mu, bɔgya atɔdze!
Gyedzinyi biara nya Nyame anohoba n';
Abɔn mu ɔbɔn biara a ɔgye dzi ampa n',
Aber no ara onya Jesus hɔ fakyɛ.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 313:3
verse:
. Ɔakyerɛ hɛn adzeson ! Ɔayɛ adze kɛse!
Yɛnam Ne Ba Jesus do dzi dɛw mbordo;
Wɔbɛsan hɛn ho koraa, na wɔbɔkrɔn hɛn,
Hɛn ahodwiriw na enyigye ber a yehu Jesus!
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 314:1
verse:
. Ma yɛntow anwanwa dɔ bi ho ndwom, 
Nokwar ɔdɔ a,
Ɔdɔ a ofi Sor Egya N' akomam'
Rehyɛ adasamba ma:
Anwanwa dɔ
Ɔwɔ hɛn Ɔsor Egya N' akomam'.
title: Robert Walmsley, 1831-1905.

name: MHB 314:2
verse:
. Jesus, Agyenkwa n', dze dɛw sianee bae 
Bɛkaa 'Sɛmpa n';
Ɔduaa N' amandzehu pii do hwehwɛɛ
Hɔn a hɔn enyidar asa n'.
Hɔn a wɔayew n',
Otuaa kaw mbordo na ɔgyee hɔn nkwa.
title: Robert Walmsley, 1831-1905.

name: MHB 314:34
verse:
. Jesus da ho hwehwɛ hɔn a wɔayew n': 
Wokyin yɛ dɛn?
No dɔ pɛ dɛ ɔkata hɔn bɔn do:
Afonafo, hom mbra fie!
Anwanwa dɔ
Ɔwɔ hɛn Ɔsor Egya N' akomam'.
 
. Anwanwa dɔ, bra mo so m'akomam', 
Bra bɛtsena hɔ:
Tsew me kra ho na oeefi dza ɔnntsenm'-
Enyiber nye atorsɛm mu.
Ahobrɛadzem'
Na mepɛ dɛ mepɛ Wo suanyi bi.
title: Robert Walmsley, 1831-1905.

name: MHB 315:1
title: William Sanders b. 1799.

name: MHB 315:2
title: William Sanders b. 1799.

name: MHB 315:3
title: William Sanders b. 1799.

name: MHB 315:4
verse:
. Christ nko na ͻbɛyɛ hɛn kyɛfa,
Ͻrennkyɛr yebehyia m' sor,
Nkyii yeboguar po kɛse n’ mu.
Wͻ Pomfo kɛse No dͻ mu,
N‘amayɛ nyina
Na vebeyi akyerɛ.
title: William Sanders b. 1799.

name: MHB 316:1
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1829-99.

name: MHB 316:2
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1829-99.

name: MHB 316:3
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1829-99.

name: MHB 317:1
title: Philip Bliss, 1838-76.

name: MHB 317:2
title: Philip Bliss, 1838-76.

name: MHB 317:3
verse:
. Obiara a ͻpɛ n’, ’nohoba n’ si pi,
Obiara a ͻpɛ n’ betséna dabaa wͻ hͻ,
Obiara a ͻpɛ n’ benya nkwa a onnyi ewiei:
Obiara a ͻpɛ n’ ͻmbra.
title: Philip Bliss, 1838-76.

name: MHB 318:1
verse:
. NYIMPA mba, ebɛn ntsi na hom,
Hwetse dͻ nguan a wͻaba hu’i?
Nkwasea, ebɛn ntsi na horn kyin
Fi dɛm nokwar dͻ yi ho?
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 318:2
verse:
. Oguanhwɛfo bɛn na ͻdwe
Wͻ ehumbͻbͻr na adͻe ho,
Dɛ Agyenkwa a ͻbɛma
Yɛabɛtséna N'ananadze?
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 318:3
verse:
. Nyame ehumbͻbͻr a ͻtsérɛw,
Tse dɛ epo tɛtɛr no a
Ayamuyie bi wͻ ne pɛryɛ m‘,
Ͻsen fahodzi koraa.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 318:4
verse:
. Etuuyɛ wͻ hɛ ma abͻn.
Na adom pii ma apapafo;
Agyenkwa n’ wͻ ehumbͻbͻr,
Ayarsa wͻ No bͻgyaa m’.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 318:5
verse:
. Nkwagye pii wͻ hͻ ma hɛn wͻ
No bͻgyaa a wohuei gui n’ mu;
Edɛw wͻ hͻ ma hɛn nyina
Wͻ Jesus amandzehu m’.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 318:6
verse:
. Nyame No dͻ no, ͻtserɛw
Sen nyimpa n’adwen nsusui.
Na 'Domankoma N’akoma m’
Wo ayamuyie nwanwa.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 318:7
verse:
. Sɛ ͻdwe wͻ hɛn dͻ mu a,
Nkyɛ yɛbɛgye W‘asɛm edzi,
Na hɛn bra nyinara bɛhyerɛn
Wͻ Ewuradze Ne dɛw mu.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 319:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 319:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 319:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 320:5
verse:
. Sɛ menngyaa dɛ meka No do a, 
'Bɛn na nkyii m' benya?
Ɔfona, nye yaw, nye Jordan
Botwa mu.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: MHB 320:6
verse:
. Ana mese N' dɛ ɔngye m' a, 
Ɔbɛse m', Oho?
Dabi; gyedɛ sor nye asaase
Etwam' kɔ.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: MHB 320:7
verse:
. Muhu N', ka No do, meper a, 
Obehyira  m' ampa?
Ahotsewfo nye asɛnkafo
Bua dɛ, Nyew!
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: MHB 320:12
verse:
. Ana ahaw, na aberɛ, 
Na wo kɔn ebu?
Tsie! Obi dɛ, Bra, na m' bɛma w'
Ahomgye.
 
. Ana akam bi wɔ No a, 
Medze m' bohu No?
N' anan ho, Ne nsam', nye Ne mfem'
Wɔ epiratua.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: MHB 320:34
verse:
. Ana kyɛw bi so N' a ɔma 
Ɔyɛ dɛ ɔhen?
Nyew, ahenkyɛw ara ampa;
Na nsoɛ dze a.
 
. Sɛ muhu N' n a meka No do a, 
Ebɛn na m' benya?
Amandzehu, nye ɔfona,
Nye nyinsuwa.
title: St. Stephen the Sabaite, 725-794;

name: MHB 321:3
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: MHB 321:4
verse:
. Mma mmpa mo ho, Sunsum tumfo, 
'Wo na ibue furafo enyi;
Jesus Ne yie ho Dasefo,
Ka tum kasa n' kyerɛ me so,
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: MHB 321:5
verse:
. Nyame dɔ krɔnn a ɔnnsaker, 
Jesus bɔgyaa a ɔsom bo,
Nyame adom a ɔmmbɔ adze n',
Dua mo so do yi kyerɛ,
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: MHB 321:12
verse:
. Ewuradze, matse nka dɛ 
'Rowora nhyira nsu pii,
Edze rofɔw daadze a oetwie,
Ma bi nsosɔ mo so do,
                   'Mi dɛm yi.
 
. Mma mmpa mo ho, dɔyɛfo Egya, 
M' akomam' wɔ bɔn so ampa;
Ɔfata dɛ igya m' hɔ dze,
Na fa mbɔbɔr hu me so,
title: Elizabeth Codner, 1824-1919.

name: MHB 322:1
verse:
. Jesus gye ndzebɔnyɛfo; 
Bɔ adomsɛm yim' kyerɛ
Hɔn a wofi sor kwan mu,
Wɔahwe ase, reyɛ ekyim. 
Si do tow, si do tow bio; 
(Si do ara tow, Si do ara tow)
Christ ɔgye ndzebɔnyɛfo
(Christ ɔgye ndzebɔnyɛfo)
Amandzɛɛ n' ma wɔntse ase;
(Amandzɛɛ n', kyerɛ mu yie)
Christ ɔgye ndzebɔnyɛfo.
title: Erdmann Neumeister, 1671-1756.

name: MHB 322:2
title: Erdmann Neumeister, 1671-1756.

name: MHB 322:34
title: Erdmann Neumeister, 1671-1756.

name: MHB 323:1
verse:
. HOM mbra nsɛmpa aponto ase,
Abͻn, Jesus to nsa frɛ hom;
Mma obiara nnka ekyir ’siandɛ
Nyame afrɛ adasa nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 323:2
verse:
. Hom mbra, mo wura somaa m’ hom hͻ,
Ͻto nsa frɛ nyimpa nyina:
Obiara mbra, abͻnfo mpo,
Christ mu ndzɛmba nyina ayɛ krado.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 323:3
verse:
. Hom mbra, akra a bͻn retseetsee hom,
Ekyimafo a horn hwehwɛ ahomgye,
Ehiafo, mpakye, efurafo,
Akͻaba wͻ Christ mu ma hom.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 323:4
verse:
. No dͻ kɛse no hyɛ obiara,
Bra bͻsͻ konyimdzi dͻ n’ hwɛ;
Gyaa woho ma No dͻ tum no,
Na mma nnko nntsia wo Nyame bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 323:5
verse:
. Aber no nye yi, mma nntwentweͻn!
Ewuradze da a ͻagyé ato m’ nye’ i;
Ͻfrɛ wo aber yi, bra mu,
Tséna ase ma Nyia owui maa obiara n’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 324:1
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: MHB 324:2
verse:
. Hom mbra, akɔhweaban, hom mbra; 
Hom nhuhor Nyame ayamuyie,
Nokwar gyedzi, nnuho mapa,
Adom a ɔtwe hɛn bɛn N',
Wɔmmfa sika,
Bra Jesus hɔ bɔtɔ bi.
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: MHB 324:3
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: MHB 324:45
verse:
. Mma tsibowaba nnyɛ w' mma nkyinkyin, 
Mma emudzi nnyɛ w' adwendwen,
Emudzi a ɔregye ara nye,
Ibohu wo hia a ihia N':
                   'Yi ɔdze ma w';
Ɔyɛ Sunsum 'napawi.
 
. Nhwɛ! Nyame-nyimpa N' afow sor, 
Gyina No bɔgyaa do dzi ma W',
Fa woho ma N', fa ma N' koraa;
Mma adwen fofor nntwa ntamu!
           	Jesus nkotoo
na otum yɛ abɔn yie.
title: Joseph Hart, 1712-68.

name: MHB 325:1
verse:
. ABƆN, hom mbra Ewuradze nkyɛn,
Christ mu paradise wɔ hɔ bio;
Suo ndzepa a ɔdze ama w' no mu,
Adom nsɛmpa a onnyi kabea.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 325:2
verse:
. Fakyɛ a wɔdze No bɔgyaa akyerɛw,
Nyame asomdwee bata ho;
Enyi a ohu, nka a ɔtse
Esumasɛm nnuhu a ɔyɛ dɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 325:3
verse:
. Nokwar yaw a no ho yɛ har
Ɔmaa akoma a ebubu nan,
Nyinsu a ɔkyerɛ dɛ wɔdze akyɛ w',
Ahomgu a ɔdze wo kra kɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 325:4
verse:
. Bemdzi enyito, dɛw atsetsee,
Ayamuyie a onnyi kabea,
Ahobrɛadze a ɔdwe mapa
Kyerɛ anwanwa dɔ wɔ mo do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 325:5
verse:
. Ɔgye adom nwanwa tum mbordo,
Seraph bɔfo ne nkataenyim;
Anwanwadze a ɔnnka no ho
Na sor kommyɛ dɔ ne nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 326:1
verse:
. ABϽN, hom ntsie asɛmpa n’; hom
Nyɛ ntsɛm mbra m‘Ewuradze pon ho!
Mfa nyansa nhu hom adorn da n’;
Biribiara ayɛ krado‘ hom mbra!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 326:2
verse:
. Egya no ayɛ krado dɛ
Ͻbɛfew N’ammbantsɛm ba ano;
W’Agyenkwa ayɛ krado dɛ
Ͻdze Ne nsamu bͻgya kyerɛ w'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 326:3
verse:
. No dͻ sunsum n' ayɛ krado
Dɛ ͻbegye dza ͻyɛ dzen no,
Na ͻdze bͻgya n’ edzi dase,
Na ͻahor Nyankopͻn mba ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 326:4
verse:
. Abͻfo ayɛ krado rotweͻn
Edzi nyim wͻ wo siar fi n' mu;
Woesiesie nsanku na ayɛyi
Wͻ nkwagyé adorn nwanwa no ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 326:5
verse:
. Egya, Ͻba, Sunsurn Krankran,
Nye dͻm a wͻhyérɛn ayɛ krado;
Sor nyina robͻbͻ ose dɛ
’Wufo asoɛr, woehu hͻn a wͻayew.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 327:1
verse:
. ABϽN, hom nsan, hom wu dɛn?
Bͻfo n' bisa hom siantsir;
Nyame no a ͻmaa hom nkwa n’,
Na ͻmaa hom nye No tsénae n',
Obisa hom, N’abͻdze,
Siantsir a ͻwͻ dɛ horn wu;
Bͻnnyiayɛfo, ebɛn ntsi a?
Dɛ hom pow No dͻ, hom wu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 327:2
verse:
. Abͻn, hom nsan, hom wu dɛn?
Hom Gyefo n' bisa siantsir,
Nyamé a ͻpoon hom akra,
Na owui ma hom nyaa nkwa no;
Na hom bɛma oewu gyan?
Hom asɛm hom Ewuradze bio?
Abͻn a wͻapon hom, ebɛn
Ntsi na hom pow N'adom wu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 327:3
verse:
. Abͻn, hom nsan, hom wu dɛn?
Nyame Sunsum bisa dɛm;
Ͻno a ͻkoe gyee hom daa nyina,
Fofͻͻw hom baa No dͻ ho n',
Ana horn nnkɛgye N'adom n'?
Hom bɛda ho apow nkwa?
Hom a wͻahwehwɛ hom daa.
Hom bͻhow Nyame werɛ ewu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 328:1
verse:
. ABAHATƆFO, hom mbra,
M'bɛma hom ahomgye!
O Jesus Ne siar ndze no a,
Wɔtse n' yaw akoma m'!
Ɔka nyira fakyɛ na
Adom, asomdwee na
Dɛw so a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Wo dɔ a onntwa m' da n' mu.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 328:2
verse:
. 'Kyimakyimafo, hom mbra,
Na mebɛma hom kan!
O Jesus No dɔ ndze no a,
Ɔma dɛw wɔ sum mu!
Yaw hyɛɛ hɛn akoma ma,
Nna yeenya afom hɛn kwan;
Na Ɔwo abrɛ hɛn enyigye,
Ɔma yɛtow ndwom daa.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 328:3
verse:
. Hom mberɛwyɛfo, hom mbra,
Na mebɛma hom nkwa!
O Jesus Ne ndze a ɔbɔ hyew,
Na ɔboa hɛn aperdzi m'!
Ɔtamfo n'enyi aber;
Ɔko n' yɛ hu na ɔwar;
Ɔwo ayɛ hɛn akatakyi,
Na ahoɔdzenfo mbordo.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 328:4
verse:
. Na obiara a ɔba no,
Monnkɔtow no akyen!
O Jesus, akomatɔm' ndze a
Otu hɛn ekyingye;
Ɔfrɛ hɛn abɔnfo yi
Dɛ yensi m' mbra Wo hɔ,
Kaansa yɛnnsɛ, yɛmmfata a,
Dɔ kɛse a ɔmmbɔ adze da.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 329:1
verse:
. JESUS N'adͻfo nyina, hom ntwe mpin,
No dͻ brɛ n' ho adze wͻ abͻdzin enyim,
Dze frɛ horn dɛ hom mbͻsͻ No konyim n’ nhwɛ,
Na hom ndzi dɛw wͻ Jesus No dͻ n' mu hͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 329:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 329:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 329:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 329:5
verse:
. Wͻma akwatafo nyina ho san,
Ewufo tse Ne ndze soɛr fi hͻn bͻn m’;
Jesus N’ehumbͻbͻr m’ ayarfo bͻ esu,
Na wͻka nkwagye nsɛmpa n’ kyérɛ ehiafo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 329:6
verse:
. Wͻhwehwɛ N’ wohu N’, bisa, hͻn nsa ka;
Adasa Adamfo, ͻma wͻgye N’ dzi:
Wͻdan kͻ Jesus do, wͻgye“N’akyɛdze, 
Na medzé enyimpi kͻ N’adom ahenman m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 329:7
verse:
. O Jesus, per dzi nyim, W’atamfo do.
W’adͻyɛ nda edzi, Wo bͻgyaa mpetse;
Da Wo nkwagye n' edzi, kyérɛ nyimpa nyina,
Na ngyirama nyina ntow ndwom fofor no.
		Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 330:1
verse:
. O JESUS, Ͻwo gyina
Pon a wͻatow m' ekyir,
Na 'rotweͻn abotar mu,
Dɛ ebɛhɛn akͻ m’.
Fɛr nka hɛn Christian 'nuaam a
Yɛsoa Ne dzin nsɛwhyɛ n’;
Fer, o fɛr nka hɛn mprɛnsa ,
Dɛ yɛma ogyina hͻ.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 330:2
verse:
. O Jesus, Ͻwo robͻ m',
Hwɛ, Wo nsa n' ho wͻ tua.
Na nsoɛ kyew bi hyɛ Wo tsir;
Nyinsu asɛɛ W’enyim.
O ͻdͻ a ͻtra ntseasee,
Ͻtweͻn abotar mu!
O bͻn a onnyi saso,
Ͻtow abotsen mu.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 330:3
verse:
. O Jesus, Ͻwo resérɛ
Wͻ ahobrɛadze mu;
O Me mba, muwui maa hom,
Na horn bɛyɛ Me dɛn? '
Ewuradze, fɛr na yaw mu,
Afei yebue abow n’
Agyenkwa dͻyɛfo, bra m’,
Mma nngya hɛn hͻ ara da.   Amen.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 331:1
verse:
. HWƐ! Mowɔ abow no ano,
Na tise Mo ntotɔserɛ yi,
Me ndze bɔkɔɔ se; Akoma bɔn,
Ana membra m'? Ana membra m'?
      HWƐ! Mowɔ abow no ano,
      Na tise Mo ntotɔserɛ yi,
      Akoma brɛfo a bɔn ahyɛ ma,
      Ana membra m'? 
      Ana membra m'?
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 331:2
verse:
. Mosoaa nsoɛ ahenkyɛw, wo ntsi,
Motweɔɔn mber tsentsen abotar m';
Akoma brɛfo a bɔn ahyɛ ma,
Ana membra m? Ana membra m'?
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 331:3
verse:
. Monnkɔtotɔ aserɛ wo gyan;
Kaa M'awerɛhow na Me yaw!
Muwui gyee hom fii hom bɔn mu,
Ana membra m? Ana membra m'?
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 331:4
verse:
. Medze dɛw fi ɔsor brɛ wo,
Nye fakyɛ asomdwee na dɔ;
Akoma brɛfo a bɔn ahyɛ ma,
Ana membra m? Ana membra m'?
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 332:1
verse:
. HWƐ! Hɔho bi wɔ abowano!
Ɔrobɔ m' berɛww, ɔabɔ mu pɛn;
Ɔatweɔn akyɛr na ɔrotweɔn,
Nnyɛ nyɛnko bɔn biara dɛ Ɔno.
title: Joseph Grigg, c. 1728-68.

name: MHB 332:2
verse:
. Ana ɔbɛyɛ nyɛnko pa?
Ɔbɛyɛ nyɛnko ara ampa,
Nazareth Barimba n' ara a;
Wɔdze Ne ntar nuu bɔgya mu.
title: Joseph Grigg, c. 1728-68.

name: MHB 332:3
verse:
. Ma ɔmbra m' 'siandɛ adasamba
Anngye hɔho dɔyɛfo enyi;
Hɔn a ɔnye hɔn tsena no,
Gyirama nnkotum aka hɔn dɛw.
title: Joseph Grigg, c. 1728-68.

name: MHB 332:4
verse:
. Mbom hu na mma nnhwinhwin yi ho,
Bea a Jesus kɔ no, odzi hen,
Odzi hen na ɔnnkɔ obiara afa;
Hɔn a wonntsie n', ɔwɔ dɛ wowu.
title: Joseph Grigg, c. 1728-68.

name: MHB 332:5
verse:
. Akra hɔn Hen, Asomdwee Hen,
O ma W'ahendzi nyɛ prɔmprɔm!
Adwen biara mbue abow n' kɛse,
Adasa nyina nyɛ N'ahenman.
title: Joseph Grigg, c. 1728-68.

name: MHB 333:1
verse:
. Bra ma hɛn a yɛgye Christ dzi 
Ntonton hɛn Agyenkwa,
Yɛmfa enyigye ndze nkamfo
N' adom enyimnyam no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 333:2
verse:
. Ogyina bɔnyɛnyi biara 
N' akoma ekyir robɔm';
Nyia ɔasɛɛ koraa nnyi dɛ ɔpam N' bio,
Anaa ɔyɛ ma ɔkɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 333:3
verse:
. Yɛnam adom do tsie Wo ndze, 
Pen do dɛ yi hɛn bɔnm',
Yesi pi dzi dɛw enyidarm',
Dɛ Ɔwo 'bɛhɛn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 333:4
verse:
. Bra mu ntsɛmara, sor Hɔho, 
Na mma mmfi ha nnkɔ da
Nye hɛn ndzidzi, ma edziban no
Nyɛ ɔdomankoma dɔ.    Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 334:1
verse:
. EDUOKRON akron n' na wɔda sɔkyee
Wɔ hɔn nguambuw n' nwin ase,
Na kor efir edzi koko n' do,
Efi siar abow n' ho koraa,
Wɔ botan kɛse kwawee no do,
Efi Guanhwɛfo No dɔ n' ase.
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.

name: MHB 334:2
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.

name: MHB 334:3
verse:
. Hɔn a wɔapon hɔn n' mu biara ennhu
Mbrɛ esu n' si na ɔdɔ,
Na sum bi a Ewuradze faa mu n' yɛɛ kapee,
Ansaana oruhu No nguan n',
Ɔtsee no su wɔ sar no do hɔ,
Dɛ ɔyar dzendzen a orubowu.
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.

name: MHB 334:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, bɔgya a ɔsosɔ kwan m'
Wɔ koko do no fi hen?
Wokyii bɔgya n' maa nyia ɔtɔɔ gon no,
Ansaana wɔdze no resan,
Ewuradze, Wo nsamu piratua n' fi hen?
Anafua yi na dɔm pii piraa me.
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.

name: MHB 334:5
title: Elizabeth Cecilia Clephane, 1830-69.

name: MHB 335:
verse:
Agyenkwa, Agyenkwa, 
  Tsie mo mbɔbɔr su!
  Na 'refrɛfrɛ m' asɛfo yi,
  Mma mmpa mo nko ho.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 335:1
verse:
. Mma mmpa mo ho, Agyenkwa brɛfo, 
Tsie mo mbɔbɔr su;
'Reyaa W' ano kyerɛ binom,
Mma mmpa mo nko ho.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 335:2
verse:
. Mbɔbɔr ahengua enyim ha 
ma m' akomatɔm';
Mokosɔw ha awerɛhow mu
Na pa m' ekyingye.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 335:3
verse:
. Motwer Wo yie no nkotonoo, 
Mohwehwɛ W' enyim;
Yɛ mo sunsum pirafo edur,
Nam W' adom do gye m'.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 335:4
verse:
. M' aweɛkyekyer n- sunyiwa, 
'Wo 'kyɛn me nkwa mpo;
Mowɔ woana wɔ ase ha,
Anaa sor dɛ 'Wo?
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 336:1
verse:
. AYAMUYIE mu na Jesus bae
Bɔpoon me kra mbɔbɔrhu mu,
Fii 'nyimguase na bɔn bun mu,
Nam adom do gyee me.
       Ɔmaa mo do fii anhwea mu
       Ɔdɔ nsa na ɔdze twee me,
       Fii isum mu kɔr ekan mu;
       Yi N'ayɛw, ɔmaa mo do.
title: Charles Hutchison Gabriel, 1856-1932.

name: MHB 336:2
verse:
. Ɔfrɛ me ber a nna minnyim,
M'akoma bɔnfo nnyaa nnyanee
Na minnyaa nntsin N'asɛm do no,
Ɔdze kyɛɛ m', maa mo do.
title: Charles Hutchison Gabriel, 1856-1932.

name: MHB 336:3
verse:
. Nsoɛ piinara wowɔɔ N' tsir ho,
Mprɛgow dzendzen bobɔɔ Ne nsamu,
Ber a ofi dɔ kɛse mu
Gyee m' afɔdzi na yaw m'.
title: Charles Hutchison Gabriel, 1856-1932.

name: MHB 336:4
verse:
. Afei metse sorsor noho,
Me kra m' muhu dɛ oye koraa,
Naaso minnyim siantsir biara a 
Otwaar dɛ ɔma mo do.
title: Charles Hutchison Gabriel, 1856-1932.

name: MHB 337:1
verse:
. NYAME dɔɔ bɔn wiadze a ayew
Na asehwe n' asɛɛ no n';
Nkwagye a odzi mu, som bo,
Ɔdze ma hɔn nyina kwa.
   O ɔdɔ a, anwanwa dɔ a,
   Nyame dɔ a ɔwɔ ma m';
   Ɔdze m'Agyenkwa n' fi sor bae
   Ma obowuu Calvary.
title: Martha Matilda Stockton, 1821-85.

name: MHB 337:2
verse:
. Medze gyedzi gye N' dɛ medze,
Nyame Ne Ba a ɔsasoɛr,
No wu no enya apon me
No bɔgyaa ahor me.
title: Martha Matilda Stockton, 1821-85.

name: MHB 337:3
verse:
. ‘Dɔ dze ‘nyimnyam emudzi n’ ba,
Ma N’ahotsewfo hu
Siar a ofi bɔn ho ɔgye mu
Wɔ Christ gyedzi nko mu.
title: Martha Matilda Stockton, 1821-85.

name: MHB 337:4
verse:
. Akra agyendzifo dze dɛw kɔ
Hɔ na wo so benya
Enyimnyam nkahwɛ ase ha,
Wɔ sor nkwa a onnyi ewiei mu.
title: Martha Matilda Stockton, 1821-85.

name: MHB 337:5
verse:
. Wɔmma hɔn a wɔapon hɔn nyina
Nhua 'bɔnsam do konyim,
Nye owu ber mu konyimdzi wɔ 
Christ hɛn Hen Ewuradze m'.
title: Martha Matilda Stockton, 1821-85.

name: MHB 338:1
verse:
. Per gye hɔn a wɔreyew, 
Tse ma hɔn a woruwu,
Hwim hɔn fi bɔn na adakamaa mu:
Su ma dza ɔafom kwan,
Ma asehwefo do,
Se hɔn dɛ Jesus tum dɛ ɔgye nkwa.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 338:2
verse:
Per gye hɔn a wɔreyew, 
   Tse ma hɔn a woruwu,
   Jesus yɛ mbɔbɔrhu, ɔbɛgye nkwa.
 
. Sɛ wɔmmfa N' nnyɛ hwee mpo a, 
Ɔda ho rotweɔn.
'Rotweɔn ɔba a oenu noho n' ɔagye n'.
Enye hɔn nka n' ka pa,
Enye hɔn nka n' berɛww;
Sɛ wɔgye dzi ara a ɔdze bɛkyɛ.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 338:34
verse:
. Sɛ abɔnsam daadaa 
'Nyimpa n' akoma a,
Nyame N' adom twe n' ekyir a ɔyɛ:
Eyɛ no ayamuyie,
Ekyerɛ no Wo dɔ a,
Dza nkyɛ ɔnntse no afei ɔbɛtse.
 
. Per gye hɔn a wɔreyew: 
Dwuma 'i da wo do;
Ewuradze bɛma w' ho ahoɔdzen.
Frɛ hɔn ma wɔnsan mbra,
Fa abotar twe hɔn;
Se kobɔfo n' dɛ Gyefo n' wui maa no.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 339:1
verse:
. BRA, O kwantunyi a minnyim Wo,
Ͻwo a motwer Wo ’so munnhu W’!
Mo nkorͻfo edzi m’enyim kan kͻ,
Afei aka emi na W’ nko;
Menye W’ bɛtsena anafua ’i nyina
Edzi aper kɛpem adzekyee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:2
verse:
. Onnhia dɛ m'bɛka m' nyimpa ban,
M’esumasɛm na mo bͻn akyérɛ W’,
Ͻwo a abͻ me dzin afrɛ m’,
Hwɛ Wo nsamu’ na kenkan no hͻ;
Mibisa W’ dɛ Woana nye W’ koraa?
Ba Wo dzin kyerɛ me seseiara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:3
verse:
. Kwa na reper agye Woho,
Minnkegyaa Wo mu ara da!
Ͻwo nye Nyia owui maa me n’;
Ma munhu Wo nsumaa mu dͻ n’
Méreper, minnkegyaa W’ ma aakͻ da,
Gyedɛ muhu W’ dzin na Wo su.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:4
verse:
. Ana Wo dzin a wͻmmbͻ no
Ennkɛda n’ edzi akyerɛ m’?
Meserɛ Wo, ka kyerɛ me;
Mepɛ dɛ muhu no sesei.
Meréper, minnkegyaa W' ma aakͻ da,
Gyedɛ muhu W’ dzin na Wo su.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:5
verse:
. ‘Bɛn ntsi na mo honam a ͻhwer
Bͻkͻ do enhwinhwin daa dɛm?
Mobor me yaw do ka n’ hyɛ koraa,
Me mbérɛwyɛ mu na meyɛ dzen.
Na sɛ m'ahoodzen nyina pa a,
Menye Nyame Ba n’ bedzi nyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:6
verse:
. Fa Woho ma m’, na meyɛ mberɛw,
Ha migyina abagura mu daa;
Kasa, na hyira m’akoma,
Yɛ aso rna n’enyiber mpaabͻ.
Kasa, ͻno nnkefi ha akͻ,
Na rna munhu dɛ eyɛ dͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:8
verse:
. Me mpaabͻ du Nyankopͻn enyim,
Na minya adorn a onnyi kabea;
Gyedzi m’ muhu W’ enyim na enyim,
Muhu W'enyim na minya nkwa!
Mennsu ara kwa, na mammper kwa:
Wo su na Wo dzin nye Ͻdͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:9
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:10
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:11
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 339:12
verse:
. Meyɛ mbérɛw ’so mikyir sɛɛfo n’,
Midzi hɛll, wiadze na bͻn do:
Midzii dɛw huruw, tu mo kwan,
Medze twitwi kͻ fie dɛ ͻtwe
Mfesantsen nyina dze akyerɛ dɛ
Wo su na Wo dzin nye Ͻdͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 340:1
verse:
. BRA, ao, Kwantunyi nanaben,
Meda ho kura W’ na munnhu W’ !
Mo dͻm n’ edzi m’enyim kan kͻ
Ma ͻaka mo nko wͻ Wo nkyɛn;
Wͻ nkyɛn na anago yi m’bɛtsena,
Yeedzi aper ekodu adzekyee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 340:2
verse:
. Ereper kwa dɛ befi nsa,
Monnkͻgow me nsamu ara da,
Ͻwo nye Barimba a owui maa me n’?
Da Wo nsumaa mu dͻ n’ edzi;
Ereper, minnkegyaa W’ ma aakͻ,
Gyedɛ muhu Wo dzin, Wo su.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 340:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 340:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:1
verse:
. ABER, bɛn na Wo dɔ
Bɔtwe m' afam Wo bom'?
Me kra bɛsan dabɛn akɔ
N'ahomgye a onnyi ewiei m'?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:2
verse:
. Wo penkyɛr adom no
Ekyerɛɛ n' wɔ mo do kwa,
Ɔfrɛ m' dɛ monhwehwɛ W'enyim;
Kotow bisa mo dɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:3
verse:
. Mokotow W'ananadze !
Mo kɔn dɔ fahodzi,
Meper dɛ nkyii mitsie Wo frɛ
Na mopow adze nyina ma W'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:4
verse:
. Epow adze nyina
Dze agye m' efi mbusu m',
Esɔɔw bene wɔ ase ha,
Dze agye m'akoma huhuw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:5
verse:
. M'akoma huhuw ne ngyee
Maa abɔdze nyina Nyame
Ɔbɛbraa dɛ ɔdasanyi
Na owuu mpaa kwan do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:6
verse:
. M'bɛda ho ayɛ ekyim dɛ
'Dze biara a mowɔ ma n',
Motwe me kra fi wiadze ho
Ma Jesus Ne nsa aka?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 341:7
verse:
. Oho, migyaa m', migyaa m'
Moronnkora do bio,
Dɔ a oruwu n' ka m' hyɛ bun m',
Mebu W' konyimdzifo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 342:1
verse:
. BRA ma yɛmfa akoma bobɔe
Nsan nkɔ Ewuradzi hɔ;
Hɛn Nyame yɛ domfo, ɔremma
Ankonam nnkyi nyinsu.
title: John Morison, 1750-98.

name: MHB 342:2
verse:
. Ne ndze tram ehum a orutu,
Ɔma ehum no yɛ komm;
Kaansa ɔdze nsa dzendzen tsea a,
Otum so dze gye nkwa.
title: John Morison, 1750-98.

name: MHB 342:3
title: John Morison, 1750-98.

name: MHB 342:4
verse:
. Hɛn akoma m' yɛpɛ ehu Nyame a,
Yebohu N' yeedzi dɛw;
Ne mbae bɛyɛ dɛ adzekyee,
Ne ndze dɛ anapa ndwom.
title: John Morison, 1750-98.

name: MHB 342:5
verse:
. Ɔtse dɛ ha momon do bɔw,
Otu nka huan petse; 
Dɛ mpetsema a ɔdze adɔwber ba,
Ma bea a oetwei dzi dɛw.
title: John Morison, 1750-98.

name: MHB 342:6
verse:
. Ne mbae bɛhyira hɛn akra,
Na ɔahyerɛn enyigye m';
Dɛm siar adzekyee no bɛpam
Anago awerɛhow n'.
title: John Morison, 1750-98.

name: MHB 343:1
verse:
. AO NYAME, hen na montwe mbɛn
Na mombɔ m' adze wɔ W'enyim?
Ihu me dɛn wɔ W'enyi do?
Memfa bɛn mbra mbɛgye adom?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:2
verse:
. Dodow a wɔfata W'enyim,
Wɔ dɛ wɔfa W'asɛm kwan do,
Wotsiw pɛrpɛr, wonya tsema,
Nye Nyame nantsew berɛww gyedzi m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:3
verse:
. Kaansa me bra nkyii ayɛ Wodze a,
Sesei 'bra nntum mmpon dza ɔasen,
Kaansa mapow ne nyina ama Wo a,
Woara Wodze, mesan dze ma W'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:4
verse:
. Bɛn na mowɔ a wɔdze werɛ twer?
Minnyi hweeara, mennsɛ hweeara,
M'ahopɔw mpo wommbu no hwee,
Enyimguase amen m'enyimnyam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:5
verse:
. Migyina W'enyim dɛ midzi fɔ,
Muhu W'ebufuw wɔ mo do,
Ɔtsen dɛ atsɛmbu nkɔ do,
Na ɔtsen dɛ Wo Ba ewu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:6
verse:
. Jesus Eguambaa ekyi bɔgya,
Ɔsoaa hɛn bɔn wɔ dua no do,
Hɛn mpaa ho ɔbɔɔ Ne tsir adze,
Oewie! Oewu ama emi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:7
verse:
. Hwɛ mbrɛ oesi gyina ahengua enyim
Rowora konyimdzi mpaabɔ no!
Ɔdze Ne mfem' na Ne nsa kyerɛ,
Na wɔayɛ mo mfonyin wɔ hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 343:8
verse:
. Ɔtse ase daa, ɔserɛ ma me,
Ɔsɔr dɛ menye N' bedzi hen;
Amen wɔ dza Ewruadze se n' do,
Jesus, Wo mpaabɔ rennyɛ gyan.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 344:1
verse:
. JESUS ndzebɔnyɛfo Nyɛnko, 
Muguan hwehwɛ mboa fi Wo nkyɛn ,
Maberɛ wɔ wiadze ɔnye bɔn;
Tserɛw Wo nsamu na gye me.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 344:2
verse:
. Yɛ me kra a ɔyar no edur;
Wo nko na 'bɛma meedzi mu,
Mahwe ase na wɔadom me
Kɛpem dɛ Wo su n'hyerɛn mo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 344:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 344:4
verse:
. Wankasa si ɔdan no mu,
To m'akoma pan na hɛn mu;
Iyi nko bɛma mo ho atsew,
Iyi nko beyi bɔn akwa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 345:1
verse:
. MBEAMUDUA a woehyira do ase
Na akra a wɔahaw nya ayarsa,
Wo mu minya nkwa nye ahomgye;
Christ a iwui, maba!
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 345:2
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 345:3
verse:
. Maberɛ, pɛsɛankonya na
Enyigyehun a ɔmma enyidar,
W'epirakur mu na musuma;
Christ a iwui, maba!
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 345:4
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 345:5
verse:
. Sɛ mubotum mpo a, meremmfa
Me yar a Wo nko sa no nnsie,
Mokotow mbeamudua n' ase;
Christ a iwui, maba!
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 345:6
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 345:7
verse:
. Mepɛ maayɛ dza Ɔwo pɛ,
Agye m' atsew m' ho wɔ Wo mu,
Ɔnam dza W'adom yɛ m' mu ntsi;
Christ a iwui, maba.
title: Genevieve Mary Irons, b. 1855.

name: MHB 346:1
verse:
. JESUS, nokwar na adom ahyɛ W' ma,
W'adom bor mo bɔn nyina do,
Naaso meda ho hwehwɛ W'enyim;
Bue Wo nsa na yɛ me etuu,
Na ma mensan mbraWo hɔ bio,
Na kɔ do ara dɔ bɔnyɛnyi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 346:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 346:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 346:4
verse:
. Ao, Ewuradze, ma m'akoma a
No ho popo wɔ bɔn enyim;
Ma me bɔn ho nyameuro,
Dua no mo mu ma ɔngye ndwow,
Ama meesuro Wo tum no,
Na maammfom Wo dabiara da.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:1
verse:
. O KONYIM Ewuradze, bra,
Ma yenhu Wo tum no;
Fa W'asɛm no bɔdobaa no
Bubu akoma bo yi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:2
verse:
. O nkyɛ hɛn nyina ahyɛ ase
Eesu wɔ hɛn gyim ntsi,
Na yeefi bɔn nyinara ho,
Aasan hɛn Gyefo nkyɛn!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:3
verse:
. Ma yenhu hɛnho nye Wo ara,
Wɔ hɛn siar da yi mu;
Ma hɛn nnuho a ɔkɔ nkwa mu,
Na yi hɛn bɔn nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:4
verse:
. Ma yengyaa hɛn ekyingye no,
Na ma hɛn fahodzi;
Fa yaw krɔnn hyɛ ɔkra biara mu,
Na ma n' asomdwee krɔnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma hia ndwir hɛn,
Na afei ma hɛn ahonya;
Ma yenhu hɛn nyarba nyina,
Na yenhu n'ano edur.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:6
verse:
. Ma hɛn afɔdzi ho nyimdzee,
Na yi adzesoa n' fi hɔ;
Tseetsee na hor akoma a ahaw n' ho
Wɔ nkwa bɔgya no mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 347:7
verse:
. Ma hɛn bɔn tsebea yi nda edzi,
Ka dɛ wɔdze akyɛ hɛn;
Fa krɔnkrɔnyɛ siesie hɛn koraa,
Na fa hɛn kɔ sor fie.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 348:1
verse:
. O AGYENKWA, Israel Hen,
Fi Wo sor ahengua do hwɛ m',
Ma W'adom dɛɛdɛw mapa n'
Ngow me dɛm ɔbotan yi;
Nyame, dan bo yi honam,
Hwɛ m' na bubu m'akoma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 348:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 348:3
verse:
. Jesus, hwehwɛ W' nguan a wokyin,
Ma memper dɛ mebɛsan,
Ma monhwɛ Wo na munsu
Wenwennwen dɛ Peter ara,
Kɛpem dɛ W'adom bɛgye m',
Na inyim dɛ modɔ Wo!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 348:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 348:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 349:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 349:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 349:3
verse:
. Nhyira a wɔdze ma hɔn nyina a
Wɔdze kɔm hwehwɛ Wo n' wɔ hen?
Nyame ho kɔm na nsukɔm dze m';
Hwɛ dzebɔnyɛnyi a ɔahaw no,
Ma me asomdwee a ɔmmbɔ adze
Na fa Wo tsenenee hyɛ me ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 349:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 349:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 350:1
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: MHB 350:2
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: MHB 350:5
verse:
. Wonya pon me bɔn nye hɛll m' a, 
Ma menya adehye dɔm n' kɛtsená a,
M'abɔdo ndwom daa bɛyɛ dɛ,
Nyankopɔn na oehu m' mbɔbɔr.
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: MHB 350:34
title: Cornelius Elven, 1797-1873.

name: MHB 351:
verse:
Ewuradze, maba! 
    Maba Wo hɔ ndɛ! 
    Guar m', tsew mo ho, wɔ bɔgyaa a 
    Ɔpem Calvary do n' mu.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: MHB 351:1
verse:
. METSE Wo ndze dɛɛdɛw n' 
Ewuradze, dɛ erefrɛ m'
Ma maatsew moho, wɔ bɔgyaa a
Ɔpem Calvary do n' mu.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: MHB 351:2
verse:
. Kaansa meba mberɛwm' a, 
Woara bɛhyɛ me dzen:
Ebɔhor mo ho bɔn nyina
Ma mo ho aatsew koraa.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: MHB 351:5
verse:
. Wonhua Jesus bɔgyaa! 
Wonhua Jesus N'adom!
Wonhua Jesus, hɛn Ahoɔdzen
Nye Ndzeyɛtsenee!
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: MHB 351:34
verse:
. Jesus, 'Wo na efrɛ m' 
Kɔ gyedzi na dɔ mu;
Ema m'enyidado asomdwee
Wɔ ha a wɔdze kɔ sor.
 
. M'akomam' siar dwuma n' 
'Wo na ehyɛ no ma;
Edze adom gu adom do
Ma ɔhyɛ bɔn tum do.
title: Lewis Hartsough, 1828-1919.

name: MHB 352:1
verse:
. BƆN na mbusu hyɛ m' do,
Ama m'akoma ayɛ dur,
Atamfo pii soɛr tsia me a,
Mennkɛpa abaw ara da.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 352:2
verse:
. Murunntum mmfa akoma a 
Aprɔw mmba W'enyim koraa,
Ɔwo a eyɛ krɔnkrɔn, tumfo,
Edze bɛkyɛ m' ara.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 352:3
verse:
. Minyim dɛ meyɛ mberɛw,
Na meyɛ bɔn daa nyina,
Ɔwo ema hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ,
Ebɛma m' ahoɔdzen.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 352:4
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 352:5
verse:
. Mo Pomfo Ne dzin mu,
Medze moho ma Wo;
Sɛ memmfata dɛn ara mpo a,
Me Nyame bɛgye me.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 353:1
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, minyi hwee ka 
Dɛ wɔkaa Wo bɔgyaa gui maa m',
Na efrɛ m' dɛ membra Wo nkyɛn,
Nyame Eguamba, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 353:7
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, adehye dɔ n' 
Ne trɛ, no war, no bun, no krɔn,
M'bɔsɔ wɔ ha na sor mahwɛ
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 353:23456
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, monnkɔtweɔn dɛ 
Mara meper tu me kra ho fi,
'Wo na Wo bɔgyaa tum tu fi,
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
 
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, kansa aperper 
Ɔnye ekyingye piinara
Ko nye suro amen me mpo a
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
 
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, hianyi, furafo; 
Enyiwa ɔnye ahonya,
Dza mihia nyina wɔ Wo mu,
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
 
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, ebɛgye m', 'beyi m', 
Edze bɛkyɛ m', na atsew mo ho
Megye W'anasɛm dzi n-tsi
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
 
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, Wo dɔ kɛse n' 
Ebubu mpampi nyina mu,
N-kyii m'bɛyɛ Wo nko Wodze,
Nyame Eguambaa, maba!
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 354:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 354:2
verse:
. Aa! M'emumyɛ no
Ayɛ adaaben,
Onnyi mbanano so,
Bɔn ebu do;
Bɔn a ɔanndɔ Wo mpo,
Bɔn a ɔanntwer Wo na
Onnyi mbanano.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 354:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, yaw mu
Meka mo bɔn;
Meka mbrɛ metse kyerɛ W'
Mbrɛ m'tse biara;
Hor mo ho bɔn nyina,
Guar me kra ndɛ da yi,
Ma mo ho ntsew.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 354:4
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 354:5
verse:
. Ɔkra a ɔda mo mu 'i wɔ 
'Somdwee na kan;
Na menye W' bɛnantsew,
Dɔfo a yennhu W';
Motwer Wo, me Nyame
Gye me fa kwan no do a
Hwee nnyi hɛn ntamu.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 355:1
verse:
. MABERԐ asaase na bͻn adzesoa,
M'enyi tua sor, na mo kͻn dͻ, m‘bɛhɛn m’;
Hͻ adzebͻn biara nnkenya tsénabea,
Naaso metse ndze bi se me dɛ: Bra!
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:2
verse:
. Ͻbͻn a ͻtse dɛ emi, m’besi dɛn enya
Enyidar egyina bea krͻnkrͻn  no do?
M’besi dɛn ekopué ahengua fufuw n‘ ho?
Naaso abasa pii atsen rotwe m' kͻ hͻ.
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:3
verse:
. Bér a meper dɛ mubodua sor kwan mu n’,
Bͻn ammpa mo ho adzekyee nyina,
Naaso adom nsɛm no gu m'asowa m’ daa:
Nu woho, gye dzi; wobeyi w’ efi m’.
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:4
verse:
. N-dzé a metse no yɛ Jesus Ne ndze;
Ne nsa na ͻtsérɛw mu dɛ ͻrotwe m’ no,
Na No bͻgyaa na ͻgyé obiara nkwa,
Na migyina ahengua n’ enyim a mo ho asan.
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:5
verse:
. Ͻno no ohun me wͻ owu sardo n’,
Ni ͻyɛɛ m’ owuodzi wͻ sor Egya N’ Ba mu,
Na daa nyina beebi a me kra bɛtséna no,
Ͻma m’ N’adom fakɛe n’ na ͻdze ma m’ daa.
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:6
verse:
. O bͻnfakyɛ ’Damfo, ma me kra nhyɛ
Mbrɛhoadze, abotar na mpaabͻ atar,
Ama Egya N’abangua do n’, m’atar pa n’
Aayɛ Wo tséneneebea do hͻ atar.
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:7
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 355:8
title: Samuel John, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 356:1
verse:
. NYAME nwanwanyi! W'akwan nyina
Da Wo ho abɔdzin n' edzi;
Fakyɛ adom a onnyi kabea
Bor W'anwanwadze nyina do:
        Fakyɛ Nyame bɛn tse dɛ Ɔwo?
        Anaa woana wɔ adom yi bi?
title: Samuel Davies, 1723-61.

name: MHB 356:2
verse:
. Ɔyɛ nwanwa; yɛdze enyigye
Nya hɛn Nyame hɔ bɔnfakyɛ;
Hɛn adaaben bɔn ho fakyɛ,
Fakyɛ a Jesu bɔgyaa tɔe a!
title: Samuel Davies, 1723-61.

name: MHB 356:3
verse:
. Fakyɛ a ofir Nayme a yɛafom N',
Hɛn bɔn kebii no ho fakyɛ a,
Dza Jesu bɔgyaa ntsi yenya a!
Fakyɛ a ɔdze etuatsewfo ba a!
title: Samuel Davies, 1723-61.

name: MHB 356:4
verse:
. Nkyɛ adom a wɔto n' abaw a onnhyia 'i,
O dɛm Nyame anwanwa dɔ yi,
Dze ayɛyi aahyɛ wiadze ma,
Dɛ sor adwontow kuw n' ara!
title: Samuel Davies, 1723-61.

name: MHB 357:1
verse:
. JESUS a abrɛfo nya hɔn
Ahomgye a odzi ewei Wo mu,
Adwembɔnfo hɔn duyɛfo,
Bɔhwɛ me hia nye me yaw nyina;
Na ma me kra mbɛda Wo do,
Kodu dɛ atsetsee botwa m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 357:2
verse:
. M'abɔ ko efi Nyame nkyɛn,
Midzi ɔbra mu akɔnaaba,
M'ekyima mbea nyinara do,
Naaso mennya etsidaa koraa;
Metu faa aba me Nyame nkyɛn,
O nsu no da ho eyir tɛntɛnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 357:3
verse:
. Mibegyaa pɛsɛakonya mu,
Na maaba Wo hɔ nye me pɛ;
Tsen W'adom nsa fa suo mo mu,
Kɔ ɔdɔ apam-daka n' mu,
Agyenkwa, gye ɔkra brɛfo yi,
Na ma ɔnhom wɔ Wo bo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 357:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 358:1
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHU bun donkonn no,
Mbɔbɔrhu wɔ hɔ ma me?
Me Nyame No bo adwe
'Mi ndzebɔnyɛfo hen ho?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 358:2
verse:
. Mesiw N'adom kwan akyɛr,
Meyi N'ebufuw akyɛr,
Ne frɛ n' mammfa annyɛ asɛm;
M'asehwe ahaw No akyɛr.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 358:3
verse:
. Ɔsɛɛ dɛm dɔ 'i mo ho dɛn?
Bisa sor Kasamaafo n',
Hwɛ siantsir nyina wɔ N'enyim,
Wɔ adom ahengua enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 358:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 358:5
verse:
. Jesus fi sor noho bua;
Na nnyɛ ɔdɔ nye Wo wu nyina?
Ana Wo werɛ mmfir ndzebɔn?
'Pen dɛ mefew W'anan ho?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 358:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 359:1
verse:
. MIFI bun no mu su frɛ Wo,
Ewuradze, tsie me mpaa!
Adom ntsi yɛ aso tsie me,
Mma minnya abagura;
Sɛ itsin emumuyɛ do a,
Na obiara nya n'akatua a,
Woana begyina W'enyim?
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: MHB 359:2
verse:
. Wo dɔ nkotoo mu na yenya
Hɛn bɔn ho mpatadze;
Ɔbra pa biara mpo yɛ gyan,
Hɛn ndwuma nyina nnsɛ hwee;
Na obiara eenntuw noho,
Na ɔdze suro aagye W'adom,
Eehu dɛ tsenenee fir Wo.
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: MHB 359:3
verse:
. M'enyidar wɔ Ewuradze mu,
Mubu m'edwuma huntuma,
N'asɛm nko ara na motow do,
Na motwer N'ayamuyie,
Na medze moho hyɛ Ne nsamu,
Ɔyɛ m'aban, botan nye kyɛm,
Na No mboa na motweɔn daa.
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: MHB 359:4
verse:
. Na sɛ ɔkyɛr ma adze sa,
Ma adze kye bio so a,
M'akoma renngye Wo tum kyim
Na onnya abagura,
Israel mba, iyi na hom nyɛ,
Hom a Sunsum no awo hom,
Hom ntweɔn hom Nyame Ne mbae.
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: MHB 359:5
verse:
. Hɛn bɔn so, yeepira dodow,
Na yɛahwe ase sum mu;
No mbɔbɔrhu mboa nnyi ekyir,
No dɔ so kyɛn ne nyina,
Hɛn Guanhwɛfo pa a yɛtwer No,
Ɔno a ekyir 'i ɔbɔpon Israel
Efi hɔn bɔn nye awerɛhow m',
title: Martin Luther, 1483-1546.

name: MHB 360:1
verse:
. SIARFO nye nyia oenya adom, 
Oenya Nyame nkorɔfo nhyira,
Na nyansa a ofi sor ba,
Na gyedzi a ɔyɛ dɔ edwuma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 360:2
verse:
. Nyia onyim dɛ Agyenkwa n' wui ma no n'
Wɔ enyigye a onnyi kabea;
Onya akyɛdze a wonntum nnka,
Onya ɔsor ntseasee no so.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 360:3
verse:
. Ɔsor nyansa! Woana botum
Akyerɛ mbrɛ osi som bo?
Yɛpɛ nyansa kyɛn dwetɛ koraa;
Sika mapa nnye no nnsɛ koraa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 360:4
verse:
. Nkwa tsenenee ahyɛ Ne nsamu ma,
Ahonya pa a wɔkamfo daa;
Christ mu ahonya a ɔdze ma hɛn,
Na enyimnyam a ofir Nyame.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 360:5
verse:
. Ɔfrɛ hɛn nyina kɔ dɛw mapa m',
Ahosan, krɔnkrɔn, sunsum m' dɛw;
N'akwan nyina yɛ enyigye akwan,
N'atsempɔn fɛɛfɛw yɛ asomdwee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 360:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 361:3
verse:
. Aso m'bɔpow m'Egya no dɔ? 
Munnkobu N'akyɛdze no bi?
Aso m'beyi N'adom emuo?
Mbeamudua krɔnkrɔn n' no pow ntsi,
Aso ne tseneneesɛm no
M'bɛkam do wɔ m'akoma mu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 361:12
verse:
. Hen na me kra a nwanwa aka n' 
Ɔnhyɛ ase nhwɛ sor adze nko?
Onya a mefi wu na bɔn nsa,
Gyantsia a woeyi m' daa daa gya mu,
Minsi dɛn ntonton mbrɛ ɔsɛ,
Minyi Gyefo kɛse n' ayɛw?
 
. M'Egya, ao, minsi dɛn menka 
Yie a edze ayɛ me yi?
Dɛ hɛll na ebufuw nyimpa
Wɔafrɛ mo so Nyame ba bi;
M'bohu, m'bɛtse mo bɔnfakyɛ,
Ha ara m'benya sor enyigye!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 361:45
verse:
. Wiadze ntɔmpam', awartofo, 
Epoobɔfo, nwifo,hom ntsie!
Ɔrotweɔn ayɛ hom etuu;
Abɔn na N'adom gye hɔn sie;
Apaafo nnyi No ho hia;
Ɔbae bɛgyee dza 'ayew n' ara.
 
. Hom mbra, mo nuan'm afɔdzefo a 
Bɔn adzesoa retseetsee hom!
Kwan wɔ ne pirakur nom' ha,
Jesus ne mfem' tokura nom'
Ɔfrɛ hom ndɛ, afɔdzifo e!
Hom mbra, mo nuanom, hommbra fie!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 362:1
verse:
. GYEDI Farbaa, bɛkyebo Asɛm,
No Sunsum hom ogyaframee;
Gyedzi a ɔtse dɛ no Wura,
Ɔtse dɛm ndeda, ndɛ na daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 362:2
verse:
. Hɛn akoma brɛfo hwehwɛ Wo,
Ɔserɛ akyɛdze a onnyi kabea;
Ma Wo gya no ndzɛw wɔ hɛn mu,
Na wie gyedzi edwuma n' wɔ hɛn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 362:3
verse:
. Yɛgye W' dzi dɛ itum gye nkwa,
'Wo nye sesei Gyefo; gye hɛn!
Gyedzi ma yenya dza yɛpɛ,
Ndɛ dze, dza etwa m' na dza ɔbɛba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 362:4
verse:
. Obiara a ɔgye Wo dzin dzi n',
Onya Wo hɔ onnyiewei nkwa;
Na onya akyɛdze nyina ma noho
Fakyɛ, krɔnkrɔnyɛ nye heaven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 362:5
verse:
. Ndzɛmba a adwen nntum nnhu nyina,
Na onntum so nntse ase koraa n',
Dasegye dzendzen a odzi mu
Kyerɛ dɛ hɔn ntuadze fi sorsor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 362:6
verse:
. Gyedzi tow ne ntseasee nserɛmɛn,
Mununkum hotse, sum guan fi hɔ;
Na Nyia ohunta no da edzi
Ma dasanyi hu Nyankopɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 363:1
verse:
. GYEDI Sunsum, sian bra,
Yi Nyame kyerɛ hɛn;
Na ma yenhu Nyametsir no,
Mfa bɔgya n' ndzi dase,
Fa bɔgya no sera hɛn,
Ma hɛn enyiwa nhu dɛ 
Nyia owui maa abɔnfo no,
Oewu ama m' ampaara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 363:2
verse:
. Nyimpa biara nntum nnkyerɛ 
Dɛ Jesus nye Ewuradze,
Gyedɛ enyido abon n' efi hɔ,
Hom asɛm tseasefo n' do;
Ɔno yebohu dɛ
Bɔgya n' yɛ hɛn akyɛdze,
Na yɛdze dɛw aka mu dɛ
Ɔwo nye m' Wura, Nyame!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 363:3
verse:
. O nkyɛ wiadze eehu
Mpata Eguambaa no !
Gyedzi Sunsum, sian famu beyi
Ne dzin mu tum n' kyerɛ;
Adom a nyimpa bohu,
Nkwangye tum a wɔdze ma;
Kasa kyerɛ adasa nyina,
Kasa akoma biara mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 363:4
verse:
. Nyan gyedzi tseasefo n'
Ma obiara a ne nsa ka n';
Nyan dasedzi wɔ no mu daa,
Na ɔgye dzi ampa;
Gyedzi a odzi konyim,
Na otutu nkokwaa no,
Ɔgye obiara a ɔfrɛ Jesus nkwa,
Na ɔma wodzi mu ɔdɔ m'.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:1
verse:
. AO! Henfa na monkɔ?
M'adzesoa, yar na ɔberɛ;
Woana na menka m'asɛm nkyerɛ n',
Mfa ayawdzi nto n'enyim?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:2
verse:
. M'Agyenkwa pa frɛ me;
Ebɛn ntsi na mekyɛr?
Ɔfrɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo kɔ fie,
Naaso motwetwe m' ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:3
verse:
. 'Bɛn ayɛ m' akwambew a
Munntum mmfi ho koraa yi?
Ebɛn na ɔmma m'Agyenkwa mmfa
M'akoma nntsena mu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:4
verse:
. Ndom bi a minnyim na
Ɔwɔ m' mu rehaw me,
Ohonyi a munntum nntow nnkyen,
Ayɛ bɔn bɔ mo bo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:5
verse:
. Jesus, yi akwambew a 
Musuro dɛ mohwɛ n' kyerɛ m';
Mepɛ dɛ muhu dza osiw
Me Wo nkyɛn kwan no ndɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:6
verse:
. Akoma m' hwehwɛfo,
Hwehwɛ m'akoma mu;
Hyerɛn no dodoo mu nyina,
Na yi ntentan n' fi hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 364:7
verse:
. Afei megye Wo dzi,
Eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo;
Ewuradze, hwɛ me gyedzi,
O ma ɔnyɛ hɔ mma m'!   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 365:1
verse:
. MO nkwagye Nyame, tsie me,
Boa me ma mengye ndzi;
Merba Wo nkyɛn ara
Maabɛgye Wo nhyira;
Bɔn ahyɛ me ma dodow,
W'epirakur nye mo guandɔbea,
      Eguambaa, abɔn Damfo,
      Wɔkaa W' bɔgyaa gui maa m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 365:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 365:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 365:4
verse:
. Nnyɛ asɛmpa anaa adwen pa
Na medze aba ha;
Fakyɛ a munntum nntɔ a,
W'akyɛdze na megye,
Maba dɛ nkan n' misii bae n',
Mebɛgye, nnyɛ dɛ mebɛma W'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 365:5
verse:
. Agyenkwa, mirimmfi W' mfem'
Pirakur nkyɛn nnkɔ da;
Ha na medze m' sunsum sie,
Ber a m'akoma m' tsew yi,
Iyi nye m'aserɛdze
Dɛ m'benya tsenabew wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 366:1
verse:
. JESUS, Agyenkwa, Owura,
Abɔn 'brɛfo Nyɛnko,
Bra bɔboa me, ka asɛm no,
Na m'awerɛhow mbɔ adze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 366:2
verse:
. Paa mu ka nkwagyesɛm, nkwa na
Fahodzi kyerɛ me kra;
Jesus, da ndzepa a ɔwɔ Wo dzin
Mu no edzi kyerɛ m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 366:3
verse:
. 'Nyim, mowɔ gyedzi a ɔsa yar,
Ɔwo na edze ama m';
Ewɔ tum dɛ egye abɔn nkwa,
Na ama maasɛ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 366:4
verse:
. Ewɔ tum wɔ m'akoma do koraa,
Wo konyimdzi da edzi,
Na daa nkwa m' ahoɔdzen mapa
Yɛ Wodze daa nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 366:5
verse:
. Wo Sunsum a tum wɔ mu no
Dzi akomadzen biara do;
Tsew akoma daadaafo n' ho,
Na kyerɛw Wo mbra n' wɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 366:6
verse:
. Sɛ ɔbra homa kyekyer me mpo a,
Ɔwo ma mentse W' ndze;
Me kra dze akokodur bɔsoɛr
Ɔatsetsew ne nyina mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 367:1
verse:
. MOHWEHWƐƐ Ewuradze dabiara,
Misiee abotar tweɔɔn No;
Kesi dɛ ɔbɔɔ No mu adze
Na otsiee mo sufrɛ.
title: Julius Charles Hare, 1796-1855.

name: MHB 367:2
verse:
. Oyii m' fii amona donkonn mu,
Fii atɛkyɛ so mu;
Dze me nan sii ɔbotan do,
Na ogyaa me No kwan do.
title: Julius Charles Hare, 1796-1855.

name: MHB 367:3
verse:
. Ɔkyerɛɛ me kra ndwom fofor,
Ayɛyi ndwom krɔnkrɔn;
Hɔn a wohu ndzɛmba yi nyina
Dze suro bɔtwer Nyame.
title: Julius Charles Hare, 1796-1855.

name: MHB 367:4
verse:
. N-hyira aka nyia ɔwɔ 
Enyidar wɔ Ewuradze m',
Na onndzi ntsɛntsɛnfo ekyir,
Na ɔmman nnkedzi ator.
title: Julius Charles Hare, 1796-1855.

name: MHB 367:5
verse:
. Ewuradze anwanwadze bɛn a!
Wonntum nnkan, nntum nnsusu;
Edze mbɔbɔrhu nye adom,
Nye dɔ dwen nyimpa ho.
title: Julius Charles Hare, 1796-1855.

name: MHB 368:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 368:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 368:3
verse:
. Epirakur enum
Na onyaa wɔ Calvary;
Wɔbɔ mpaa dzendzenndzen
Dze serɛ fakyɛ ma me,
Wɔtsea m' dɛ, Fa kyɛ n', o fa kyɛ n'!
Mma ɔbɔn a wɔapon no yi nnwu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 368:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 368:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 369:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 369:2
verse:
. Enyidar Daduanyi, suo m' mu;
Medze me yaw nyina ba Wo nkyɛn,
Dze mpaabɔ su frɛ Wo,
Ka Wo dɔ nsumaa m' nsɛm kyerɛ m',
Ma wonhu Wo dzin wɔ mo mu,
Da w' ho edzi wɔ me mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 369:3
verse:
. Sian, pa mo ho na paa mu ka,
Ewuradze, bɔ W'enyimnyam dzin n',
Domfo Ewuradze,
Wo penkyɛr, tsema na ayamuyie;
Nyame a daa nyina ɔkaa N'asɛm,
N'asɛm a onntwa mu da.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 369:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 369:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 370:1
verse:
. JESUS, Wo bͻgyaa na tsenenee,
Nye m'ahoͻfɛw na m'efuradze;
Mohwɛ W’ nantsew wiadze hyeehyew m’,
Medze dɛw bɛma me tsir do.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:2
verse:
. Medze akokodur begyina
Pintsinn, Wo da kɛse no mu;
Woana bͻbͻ sombo etsia m’?
Mefi bͻn, suro nye afͻdzi mu.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:3
verse:
. Eguambaa krͻnkrͻn a ͻdwé a
Ofi Egya No bo mu bae,
Bɛyɛɛ mpataguan wui gyee me n’,
Ͻno nye mo wura, me Nyame.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, megye dzi dɛ Wo
Bͻgyaa a ͻsom bo na ͻsérɛ
Nyame ahengua n’ enyim no,
Wokaa gui maa emi dɛm ’i me kra.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:5
verse:
. Sɛ mosoɛr fi owu huntuma m’
Kͻ sor kɛgye me dampan no a,
Hͻ m'asɛm nyina bɛyɛ dɛ,
Jesus na owui dze maa me!
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:6
verse:
. Jesus, ayeyi nka Wo daa,
W’ehumbͻbͻr a ͻmmbͻ adze da,
Nye dza Wo nsa ayɛ nyina
Abͻ werdam ama me kra.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:7
verse:
. Ewuradze, megye dzi dɛ
Ndzebͻnyɛfo dͻͻ so koraa
Sen mpoano anhwea nyina dze,
Naaso etua kaw apon hͻn nyina.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:8
verse:
. Ao, Ewuradze, ma Wo nkowaa nyina
Tum ma wͻnka W’adom ho nsɛm,
Ma nyia ͻba W’epirakur ho
Eenya onnyiewiei nkwa wͻ Wo mu.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:9
verse:
. Onyame Tumfo, Nyame dͻ,
Ma wiadze nhu W’ehumbͻbͻr!
Ma W’asem ndzi tum obiara m’.
Fa owu na hɛll dͻm no ndͻmmum.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 370:10
verse:
. O ma ewufo ntse Wo ndze
Na hͻn a wͻapon hͻn ndzi ehurusi,
Hͻn ahoͻfɛw nye efuradze,
Jesu, nye W’ bͻgyaa na tsenénee.
title: Nikolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60.

name: MHB 371:1
verse:
. NA ɔbɛyɛ dɛ mibenya
Mfaso wɔ Agyenkwa bɔgyaa m'?
Owui maa 'mi a ne yaw fir m' yir,
Maa 'mi a mitsiiw No kɔr wu mu n'! 
Anwanwa dɔ! Ɔyɛ dɛn yɛ
Dɛ Ɔwo, me Nyame, wui maa m'?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 371:2
verse:
. Esumasɛm a! Nyame bowu;
Woana tum hwehwɛ N'akwan mu?
Kwa na seraph a odzi kan n'
Ɔper hwehwɛ nyamedɔ bun n',
Mbɔbɔrhu a! Asaase nhua,
Mma abɔfo nnhwehwɛ mu bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 371:3
verse:
. Ogyaa N'Egya 'hengua wɔ sor -
N'adom mbordo ɔdze ma kwa-
Ɔpoow ne nyina gyedɛ ɔdɔ,
Wui maa adam afɔdzifo,
Mbɔbɔrhu a! Ɔso, wɔnntɔ;
Ao, me Nyame, ɔtwee me puei!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 371:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 371:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 372:1
verse:
. Ɔdɔ Nyame baa wiadze ha, 
Ma 'wo aakɔ sor manm';
Gye dzi, gye Jesus Ne dzin dzi,
Na 'benya bɔnfakyɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 372:2
verse:
. Gye Nyia owui maa wo n' dzi, 
Ampaara, oewu yi
Wo kaw n' woetua, woebu wo bem;
Afei wo kra ho asan.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 373:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, meyɛɛ furafo!
Menntum ennhu W'enyim adom;
Afei enyido adzehu ma
Muhu W'enyim ne hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw n'.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 373:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, meyɛɛ tsitsifo!
Menntum anntse Wo ndze dɛɛdɛw n';
Afei metse dza eka enyigye m',
Medze dɛw tsie nsɛmpa a ekaa n' nyina.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 373:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, meyɛɛ mum ma
Menntum ammbɔ Wo dzin no dawur;
Afei ogya aka m'ano,
Mebue m'ano yi Wo ayɛw.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 373:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, muwui koraa!
Me kra enntum ammba Wo nkyɛn;
Afei dze, enyan me kra ma
Mefi adakamaa sum mu.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 373:5
verse:
. Ɔwo ama nyifurafo ehu adze,
Etsiw tse, emum so kasa,
Ewufo nyan; na afei dze
Mebubu mo mpokyerɛ mu.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 374:1
verse:
. JESUS ewu na ɔasan asoɛr bio,
Fakyɛ, asomdwee asan aba;
Motwer No dɛ oboguar mo ho bɔn;
Jesus gye me nkwa.
      Jesus gye m' sesei!
      Jesus gye m' sesei!
      Nyew, Jesus gye me nkwa daa nyina,
      Jesus gye m' sesei!.
title: Anonymous

name: MHB 374:2
title: Anonymous

name: MHB 374:3
verse:
. Jesus yɛ dzen kyɛn Satan nye bɔn koraa,
Satan bɔkotow Jesus,
Dɛm ntsi midzi konyim wɔ beebiara;
Jesus gye me nkwa.
title: Anonymous

name: MHB 374:4
verse:
. Awerɛhow nye yaw botwa m' ho ehyia,
Worunntum mma m'enyi mmbɔ;
Medze enyigye bɛtsea m' gyedzi mu,
Jesus gye me nkwa.
title: Anonymous

name: MHB 375:3
verse:
. Ɔdɔ, bun a onnyi ntuadze, 
Mo bɔn nyina ayew wo mu!
Ɔakata mo mumuyɛ do,
Afɔdzi biara nnyi mo do,
Jesus bɔgyaa tseam' kodu wim',
Mbɔbɔrhu, mbɔbɔrhu koraa!
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: MHB 375:4
verse:
. Medze gyedzi dɔ bun yi mu, 
M'ahomgye, dɛw na enyidar ny' 'i;
Sɛ hɛll tsiw m' a muguan ba ha
Moto m'enyi hwɛ m'Agyenkwa:
Ekyingye nye suro mfi hɔ:
Mbɔbɔrhu nko na ɔwɔ ha.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: MHB 375:5
verse:
. Ehum nye asorɛkye tu bɔ m', 
Ahoɔdzen ny e adɔfo pa m',
Me dɛw nsubura nyinaa sa,
Awerɛkyekyer nyina kɔ mpo a.
Iyi nko na me kra bɔtwer,-
Egya, wo mbɔbɔrhu nnwu da.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: MHB 375:6
verse:
. Sɛ mo honam yi prɔw mpo a, 
Mirimmfi gyinabew yi do;
Sekyɛ yi nko bɛgye me kra,
Ber a wiadze fapem etwam':
Ber no m'bohu adom mbordo n',
Ɔadɔ m' ɔdɔ a ɔmmbɔ adze da.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: MHB 375:12
verse:
. Afei menya asaase pa a 
Medze me kra sekyɛ bɔto;
Jesus Ne pira a mo bɔn ntsi
Wɔdze piraa N' wiadze ahyɛse n';
Sor na asaase twam' kɔ mpo a,
N' ehumbɔbɔr betsim hɔ daa.
 
. Egya, W'adom a onnyi eiwiei 
Ɔbor hɛn adwen do koraa;
W'abaatanyɛ mmbɔ adze da.
Wo dɔ abaw no mu da hɔ.
Regye nnuhofo ma wɔaasɔ
Mbɔbɔrhu ahwɛ enya nkwa.
title: Johann Andreas Rothe, 1688-1758;

name: MHB 376:1
verse:
. NYAME a Wo ho nsɛm yɛ esumasɛm,
Wo dɔ no egya m' berɛww ara,
Fi mo mbofraber mu,
Da me kra edzi ma onhu,
Na kyerɛ me kra ma no so onhu
W'adom a obu bem no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 376:2
verse:
. Sɛ Wo ho hu nko na minyim,
Na m'akoma edzi W'ekyir,
Nye sor kwankyerɛ nko a,
Afei dze, ma W'adom no nhu
Me tsebea a ɔatsew ho no,
Nhu Wo fakyɛ dɔ no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 376:3
verse:
. Mirinngyaa, gyedɛ mehu W' dɔ,
Meyɛ hɔho wɔ 'sɛmpa n' mu,
Fakyɛ ho enyidar n' mu;
Ewuradze, menndaadaa me kra,
Mennya mo mu dasefo a,
N-kyɛ mennya sor da.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 376:4
verse:
. Wo ho dasefo wɔ mo mu a,
Ana nkyɛ ɔnnkɛkyerɛ nye w'
Abɔ m', Jesus mu?
Ana memmfa gyedzi nntwe mmpin,
Nntsea m' 'hoɔdzen m'; Abba, Egya!
Munnhu dɛ meyɛ W' ba?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 376:5
verse:
. Dza osiw Wo fakyɛ dɔ kwan,
Sɛ bɔn a, yi fi hɔ koraa,
Ma enyimnyam nkyerɛ;
Ma akoma kyingyefo ngye ndzi,
Na hwim me fi bɔn mu koraa,
Na fa ne nyina kɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 376:6
verse:
. Egya, da Wo Ba no edzi
Mo mu, na ma me kra ntse nka
Dɛ 'yɛ mbɔbɔrhufo,
Wo dɔ esumasɛm, da n' edzi
Na ma Wo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
Ntsena m'akoma m' daa.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:1
verse:
. ƆBƆN bɛyɛ dɛn ehu
Dɛ oenya bɔnfakyɛ?
M'Agyenkwa bɛyɛ dɛn akyerɛ dɛ
Ɔakyerɛw me dzin wɔ sor?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:2
verse:
. Dza yɛatse nka, yeehu n'
Na yɛpaa mu yɛka,
Yɛbɔ n' dawur kyerɛ adasa,
Nokwar asɛnkyerɛdze n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:3
verse:
. Hɛn a yɛgye Christ dzi
Dɛ owui maa hɛn nyina,
Hɛn a yenya N'asomdwee no,
Wɔdze N' bɔgyaa asera hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:4
verse:
. Hɛn kra nya ahosepɛw 
Dɛ ɔasoɛ n'adzesoa,
Na ɔhyehyɛ noho kɛse
Wɔ Nyame enyimnyam mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:5
verse:
. No dɔ sō sen wiadze
No mu dɔ nyinara;
Yɛtse n' hɛn akoma mu ntsi
Yennsuro wu egyan biara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:6
verse:
. Ɔyɛ dzen sen owu
Nye samanadze nyina;
Yedzi konyim wɔ wiadze mu,
Yɛtse dɔ mu wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:7
verse:
. Ɔdze No Sunsum mae,
Yenyim, ɔtsena hɛn mu,
Na odzi dase wɔ hɛn mu,
Yɛda N'aba edzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 377:8
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 378:1
verse:
. 'DOMANKOMA Tsenenee Ewia,
Yi Wo sor hyerɛn no kyerɛ,
Na ma W'enyim ne nyam kɛse n'
Nhyerɛn m'akoma mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 378:2
verse:
. Ma munhu kan wɔ Wo kan n' mu,
Nye W'adom mbɔbɔrhu n';
Kenyan, gye m'enyi, hyira me,
Ɔdɔ fakyɛ Nyame.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 378:3
verse:
. Ma W'enyim hyerɛn no do daa,
Na Wo ba nnya enyigye;
Mma mununkum biara mmbotwa
Ɔnye Nyametsir N' ntamu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 378:4
verse:
. Ma Wo fakyɛ adom no do
Ma minnya asomdwee,
Ma minnya krɔnkrɔn ho dɛw,
Na meedzi dɛw wɔ sor.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 379:1
verse:
. NKORƆFO a wɔtse sum mu no
Wɔ owu bɔn nwinwin ase no,
Ehu 'nyimnyam asɛmpa da n'
Wɔ Jesus enyim fɛɛfɛw no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 379:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo nko edzi dwuma n',
Atserɛw Wo nsamu wɔ hɛn enyim
Edze abɔn ayɛ Woara Wodze
Hɔn a woriyi hɔn tokyen Wodze a.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 379:3
verse:
. Tumfo Ewuradze, Wo nsa
Na edze ama hɛn nkwagye,
W'asɛm a ɔbɔɔ adze nyina n'
Bɔɔ wiadze asɔpɔn no ara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 379:4
verse:
. Ahotsewfo ma hɔn ndze do
Tow ayɛyi ndwom ma Wo daa;
Iyi ntsi sor dɔm dzi ehurusi,
Yɛma sor enyigye do kɛse.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 380:
verse:
Nyew, m'bɔtow anwanwasɛm no 
   Christ owui maa me N'asɛm n'; 
   Menye ahotsewfo bɔtow, 
   Menye ahotsewfo bɔtow, 
   Wɔ ahwehwɛ po no ho.
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: MHB 380:1
verse:
. Mobɔtow anwanwasɛm no 
Christ owui maa me N'asɛm n';
Mbrɛ ofir N' enyimnyam fie hɔ,
Bae bowui wɔ Calvary,
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: MHB 380:2
verse:
. Meyewee; na Jesus hwehwɛɛ me- 
'Hun No guan a ɔtɔɔ gon n';
Ɔmaa mo do kaa me berɛww
Dze me baa nkwa kwan no mu,
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: MHB 380:3
verse:
. M-posuow na asehwe pii: 
Maa motɔɔ akɔtɔmborɔnsa;
M'enyi do siiw m', hu kitsaa me:
Jesus gye m' ne nyina mu,
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: MHB 380:4
verse:
. Mbusu mber da ho ba mo do; 
Menantsew yaw kwan mu dze.
Naaso Agyenkwa bɛn me daa
Ogya me, obesi yie.
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: MHB 380:5
verse:
. Ɔbɔweɔn me ara ekodu 
Esutsen no nkɔnkɔnoa;
Na ɔama mo do etwa sɔnn
Akɔ mbrɛ m'adɔfo wɔ.
title: Francis Harold Rawley, 1854-

name: MHB 381:1
verse:
. MONNKOTUM atse dza Nyame 
Ahyehyɛ dɛ onsi ase,
Dza minyim nye dɛ m'Agyenkwa
Gyina Nyame N'abanyimfa.
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 381:2
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 381:3
verse:
. Ana kwan fofor bi nnyi hɔ a
Nyame bɛfa do? Munntum nnka;
Ndaase na medze ma No daa,
Dɛ m'Agyenkwa a ɔagye me.
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 381:4
verse:
. Ogyaa Ne tsenabea wɔ sor,
Baa bowui gyee ndzebɔnyɛfo;
Ɔyɛ w' nwanwa? Ɔnntse dɛm mma m'
'Siandɛ mehu m'Agyenkwa.
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 381:5
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ owie ne nyina yɛ a,
Oeehu Ne kra awoko mo mu!
M'enyi agye N'edwuma ho n',
M'enyi aagye m'Agyenkwa ho!
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 381:6
verse:
. N-yew, sɛ metse ase o, muwu o,
M'awerɛkyekyer mfi yi mu,
Dɛ Nyia ɔtse ase dɛ me Hen n'
Nye m'Agyenkwa a owui maa m'.
title: Dora Greenwell, 1821-82.

name: MHB 382:1
verse:
. MA Nyia afei yɛyɛ Nedze n'
Nda No tum edzi nkyerɛ,
Na ɔngye ndaase ndwom nyina, 
Na akoma dɔfo nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 382:2
verse:
. Ɔkyerɛ dɛ yɛyɛ Nedze,
Ɔtɔɔ hɛn aboɔdzen;
Christiannyi tse ase ma Christ nko,
Owu so ma Christ nko.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 382:3
verse:
. Jesus, gye W'ankasa Wodze n',
Yɛ akoma n' apɛdze,
Na ma yɛntsena mma W'enyimnyam,
Yenwu W'edwuma mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 382:4
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn kra nye nyimpadua
Ma Wo enyigye mu;
Dza yɛwɔ biara nnyɛ hɛndze,
Ne nyina yɛ Wodze koraa.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 383:1
verse:
. ABƆDZE Wura, Ɔdɔ Nyame,
Yɛdze hɛnho ma Wo;
Yɛda Wo tum kɛse m' edzi,
Yɛtow W'ayɛyi ndwom.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 383:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 383:3
verse:
. Sor ndzɛmba na yɛper hwehwɛ;
Dza W'ehumbɔbɔr kyerɛ,
Dɛ Wo dɔ beberee ekyir n',
Yebisa bi ka ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 383:4
verse:
. Yeribisa dɛ ma hɛn bio;
Yebue hɛn akoma mu,
Ewuradze, kenyan hɛn nyina,
Fa W'amayɛ n' ma hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 383:5
verse:
. Ewuradze Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, bra,
Bra hɛn akoma mu,
Ama daa nyina yɛnye Christ
Aatsena Nyame mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 384:1
verse:
. Me kra nam mo Pomfo no do, 
Efi owu mprɛnu no nsa;
Woeyi m'enyi wɔ nyinsuwa mu,
Woeyi m'anan so efi hɛll.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 384:2
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi m'boguan makɔ No hɔ, 
M'enyiwa bɔhwɛ N'ahoɔfɛw,
Me kra bɛtsena ama No nko,
Na me kra nyina ehyira No.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 385:1
verse:
. JESUS, morohwehwɛ
Wo Nyame dͻ no mu,
W’ehumbͻbͻr ma adasa,
Nye W’ayamuyie no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 385:2
verse:
. Wo Sunsum tse mo mu;
W’ehumbͻbͻr nkenyan m’.
Dɛm na mo mbͻdzembͻ nyina
Bedzɛw wͻ mo mu daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 386:1
verse:
. O, Ɔwo a ifi sor bae  
Edze gya krɔnkrɔn n' rebɛma,
Sɔ dɔ a ho tsew ne gya no
Wɔ m'akoma afɔrmbukyia do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 386:2
verse:
. Ma ɔndzew hɔ mma W' enyimnyam 
Dɛ ne framee no onndum da;
Ɔmfa ahopopo nsan bio,
Wɔ ayɛyi na mpaabɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 386:3
verse:
. Jesus, hyɛ dza m'akoma pɛ ma 
Ɔnyɛ edwuma, nkasa, ndwen mma Wo,
Ma menda ho nweɔn gya krɔnkrɔn n',
Nkenyan W'akyɛdze wɔ mo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 386:4
verse:
. Mayɛ krado Wo pɛ nyinaa ho, 
M'besi gyedzi na dɔ ndwuma do,
Kodu dɛ W'dɔe bɛhyɛ ma
Wɔ wum' ma afɔrbɔ n' edzi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 387:1
verse:
. NYAME! Minyim, medze nye Wo,
Na minnkegyaa W' mu da,
Kɛpem dɛ dza mowɔ nyina
Yɛ W'dze na ayɛ m' fofor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 387:2
verse:
. Medze nsa a ɔpopo suo Wo mu,
Na minnkegyaa W' ma aakɔ,
Gyedɛ migyina pintsinn gyedzi m',
Na muhu W'ayamuyie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 387:3
verse:
. Jesus, Wo konyimdzi no a
Ihuee guu mo mu ntsi
M'anan nnkehihim ara bio;
Migyina pintsinn Nyame m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 387:4
verse:
. O nkyɛ gya krɔnkrɔn n' aahyɛ ase
Aadzɛw mo mu sesei,
Aahyew mo mu wiadze akɔndɔ
Na mbepɔw no efi hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 387:5
verse:
. O nkyɛ eefi sor aatɔ sesei,
Aahyew mo bɔn nyina!
Bra, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, mefrɛ Wo;
Ogya Sunsum e! Bra!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 387:6
verse:
. Ɔhyew-fi gya a! Dzɛw m'akoma m',
Hyerɛn me kra do, mesrɛ W';
Fa Wo nkwa petse mo mu nyina
Na tsew mo ho korakora.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 388:12
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 389:1
verse:
. NYAME Tumfo, tsie mo sufrɛ
Yɛ m’enyidar nye m’ahomgye;
Ma nyam a ͻyɛ Wo dzin no
Nsoɛr mfa enyigye nhyira me.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 389:2
verse:
. Eyɛ kɛse no iye dodow, ‘
Ͻwo nye m’Egya nye m’ Nyame;
Nkyerɛkyérɛ krͻnkrͻn ayɛ m’ Wodze,
’Dze Wo bͻgyaa krͻnkrͻn tͻͻ me.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 389:3
verse:
. Medzé akoma mbérɛw ma nsa do,
Motwer Wo nkotoo daa nyina;
Dɛ akwantufo hwehwɛ nsu n’,
Dɛmara na mohwehwɛ Wo.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 389:4
verse:
. Mepɛ dɛ meba Wo nkyɛn ntsɛm,
Nye W’ahotsewfo ahwehwɛ W’;
Muhu W’enyimnyam wͻ hͻ daa,
Nye W’adom ahentum kɛse n’.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 389:5
verse:
. Sɛ motwe moho fi Wo ho a,
Mo nkwa do atsew ara nye n’,
Me dɛw nye Wo bͻn fakyɛ no,
Ewuradze na ͻbͻ mo ho ban.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 389:6
verse:
. Mebɛma me nsa nye ndze do,
Ber a ahoͻdzen wͻ hͻ yi;
M’akoma enyi gye edwuma yi ho,
Medze me nda nyina bɛyɛ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 390:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 390:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 390:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, medze me talɛnt
Akyɛdze nye adom san brɛ W',
Na ma menyɛ Wo 'sɛnkafo,
Na mentsena mma W'enyimnyam,
Memfa me mber nyinara nka
Abɔnfo Adamfo ho nsɛm.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 390:4
verse:
. Fa ayamuyie a ɔmmbɔ adze
Bɔ m'akoma hyew, hyɛ no ma,
Ama medze m'akoma nyina
Nye nkenyan dɛ edze bɔdɔ hɔn
Medze hɔn aaba abɔhwɛ W' mfem';
Nguan no ntsi hɔn Hwɛfo no wui.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 391:1
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 391:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 391:5
verse:
. Ao, ma memfa mo nkwa 
Ne nyinara memma,
Mumbubu mo mpokyerɛ
Memfa dɛw mfora yaw;
Edze Woho maa me:
Mo so, medze moho ma W' Amen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 391:23
verse:
. Igyaa Wegya fie kan n', 
W'ahengua abɔso n',
Baa asaase sum yi mu,
Bɔbɔɔ akwankwan 'werɛhowm':
Nyew, wɔdze ne nyina gyaa m'
Megyaa biribi ama Wo a?
 
. Mo Wura, dzi asɔw me ntsi 
Gyirama bi nnkotum ka;
Awerɛhow yerɛyerɛw
Ama eeyi m' efi hɛll;
Esɔɔw m'amandzehu:
Masɔw 'bɛn mama Wo?
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 392:1
verse:
. NDƐ medze Ɔkorsa Nyame
Tum dzin no akyekyer moho,
Na medze noara mefrɛ No,
Ɔkorsa Nyame, Baasa Kor.
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 392:2
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 392:3
verse:
. Medze yi kyekyer moho ndɛ ;
Nworaba a wɔhyerɛn wɔ sor,
Enyimnyam ewia n' n'ahoɔdzen nserɛmɛn
Bosoom a ɔpaa fitaa anafua,
Enyinam hyerɛn mber pa mu,
Ekyinehyia mframa a ɔwosow,
'Saasè a ɔda hɔ, na po nkyen a
Ɔnenam tsetse botan ho.
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 392:4
verse:
. Medze yi kyekyer moho ndɛ,
Nyame tum a ɔkyerɛ m' kwan,
N'enyiwa nweɔn, No tum nkora me;
N'asowa ntsie m'ehiasɛm,
Me Nyame nyansa nkyerɛkyerɛ me,
Ne nsa nkyerɛ m' kwan, ne kyɛm ngya m',
Nyame asɛm nkyerɛ me kasa
No sor dɔm tutuw no nweɔn me.
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 392:5
verse:
. Christ mbra me nkyɛn, ɔntsena mo mu,
Christ ndzi m'ekyir, ondzi m'enyim,
Christ ndzi me nkyɛn, ondzi mo do;
Christ nkyekye mo werɛ, nhyɛ m' dzen,
Christ wɔ m'ase, wɔ m'etsifi
Christ wɔ asomdwee nye mbusu mu,
Christ wɔ akoma a wɔdɔ m' mu
Christ wɔ nyɛnko nye anana anomu.
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 392:6
verse:
. Medze Dzin no kyekyer moho,
Ɔkorsa Dzin a ɔyɛ dzen,
Na mobɔ dzin noara mefrɛ
Ɔkorsa Nyame, Baasa kor,
Bɔadze a ɔbɔɔ adze nyina,
Ɔdomankoma Egya, Sunsum, Asɛm,
Ayɛyi nka mo Wura Agyenkwa,
Nkwagye fir Ewuradze Christ.
title: St. Patrick, c. 1823-95;

name: MHB 393:1
verse:
. MEDZE m'akoma ma Wo,
O Jesus a yɛpɛ W'!
Akoma nye akyɛdze no,
Ɔwo abɔ me kra hyew;
Ɔwo nko na puhim akoma,
Ɔwo nko na edɔ akoma
     M'bɔdɔ Wo dɛ mbrɛ edɔ me,
     O Jesus a yɛpɛ W'!
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: MHB 393:2
verse:
. Afɔr bɛn na mo mbɔ
Mfa ndɔ W' dɛ mbrɛ etse?
Dɛ Ɔwo Asɛm n' brɛɛ adze faa
Nyimpadua dɛ emi medze;
'See m' dɛ fa w' akoma ma m',
Ewuradze, medze ma W'.
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: MHB 393:3
verse:
. M'akoma enya ahomgye ha,
Ahomgye a ɔhaw nnyi m',
Ɔdɔ 'hoɔdzen a nhyira wɔ mu,
Wo, Botan a wɔapaa,
Na etwa moho ehyia,
Wo nye me kra sumabew.
title: Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: MHB 394:1
verse:
. Mbrɛ metse yi ara, menyɛ Wodze, 
Mbofra adamfo a edɔ m',
