name: MHB 501:5
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, yennyim hɛn ndaamba yi? 
Yenyim Jesus, na ɔtse ahengua n' do.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 501:6
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, wu gyegye hɛn do yi? 
Jesus apansam wu na no tum nyina.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 501:7
verse:
. Ao, ɔdɔɔ so, wiadze aperdzi rennkyɛr, 
Jesus bɛfrɛ sor asomdwee mu.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 501:34
verse:
. Asomdwee pa, yaw etwa ehyia hɛn yi? 
Jesus No bom' asomdwee ara nko.
 
. Asomdwee pa, adɔfo apetse yi? 
Jesus kora hɛn do yi, hwee nnkɛyɛ hɛn.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 502:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 502:2
verse:
. Midzi dɛ enyidar m' nya yaw mu abotar,
Wo hɔ na mema m'enyi hwehwɛ mboa;
Minnya hwee, minndzi yaw, munnsuro mbusu,
Ber a Jesus bɛn me yi, nsɔhwɛ nnyi hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 502:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 502:4
verse:
. Woana botum akyerɛ nkwa m' aperper ase,
Ɔberɛ na yaw, ahopopo na ɔko?
Yardɔm, asaasewosow, kɔm nye ɔko
Kyerɛ nwanwa a Jesus Ne mbae no bɛyɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 502:5
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 502:6
verse:
. No nokwar nye adom bowura ne nyina mu,
Ɔdze m' bɔkɔ beebi a ndzɛmba pii wɔ;
M'befi amandzehu pii mu nye ogya mu,
Nsɔhwɛ, akɔndɔbɔn, ɔpɛ nye gyaframee m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 502:7
verse:
. Kapem da no Jesus na motwer no, 
Emumuyɛ nyina boguan efi N'enyim;
Ber a m'benya m'Agyenkwa n', mo bɔn boguan,
Na Jesus bedzi hen wɔ m'akoma mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 503:1
verse:
. Onyame dua kwan sunsum mu 
Na ɔyɛ N'anwanwadze;
Ɔdze N'anamɔn taataa pom',
Ɔko ehum do nantsew.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 503:2
verse:
. Asaase no bun mu noho, 
Ɔdze nyansa nwanwa
Kora Ne nhyehyɛɛ pa a ɔsom bo n',
Ɔyɛ dza Noara pɛ.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 503:3
verse:
. Esiarfo a hom suro, hom nnhyɛ ahom, 
Ifua a hom suro n' kɛse n',
Mbɔbɔrhu ma, na ɔbɛpaa
Nhyira egu hom do.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 503:4
verse:
. Mma hom mmfa hom nyimpa-dwen mmbua 
Nyame, hom ntwer N'adom,
Ber a ɔaka N'enyim esi n'
Na N'ano serew hyɛm'
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 503:5
verse:
. No botae bɛber ntsɛmara, 
Ɔbɛhan mber nyina;
Kukuduuduw n' yɛ wen mpo a,
Nhyiren n' botu huam pa.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 503:6
verse:
. Kyingyenyi furafo twar dɛ ɔfom, 
Ɔnnkɛtse No ndwuma ase;
Nyame Noara tse N'adze ase,
Ɔbɛkyerɛm' pefee.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 504:1
title: Georg Christian Neumark, 1621-81.

name: MHB 504:2
verse:
. Ma w'akoma ntɔ wo yamu,
Ɔmfa enyidar abodwee ntweɔn,
Ngye biribiara a N'adom dze ma,
Dza No dɔ a ɔwɔ hɔ n' dze aba;
Onyim hɛn ehiadze nyina,
Ɔno a ɔafa hɛn ayɛ Nedze n'.
title: Georg Christian Neumark, 1621-81.

name: MHB 504:3
title: Georg Christian Neumark, 1621-81.

name: MHB 505:1
verse:
. ƆWO a eyɛ enyiasombea na
Ema sum kebii hyerɛn dɛ kan,
Hwehwɛ m'akoma m', ɔper hwehwɛ W';
Bubu mpokyerɛ ma onya ahotɔ.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 505:2
verse:
. Hor mo ho nkekaa ma ɔnnhyerɛn,
Bɔ m'akɔndɔdze mbeamudua m';
Tsew m'adwen ho, na ma dza ɔwɔ m'
Ho ntsew dɛ mbrɛ mo Wura tse.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 505:3
verse:
. Sɛ nsu munam me kra do mpo 
Na me kra mem asorɛkye mu a,
Jesus, ma Wo mboa mbra ntsɛmara,
Yi m' pue ma minnya akomatɔm'.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 505:4
verse:
. Gyefo, bea a muhu W'anamɔn,
Midzi W'ekyir, munnsuro, memberɛ;
O fa Wo nsa suo mo mu daa,
Gye m' kɔ Wo kokwaa a ɔkrɔn do.  Amen.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60

name: MHB 506:1
verse:
. M'AGYENKWA, medze mo
Sunsum moto Wo do;
Irinngyaa me mma m'abaw mmpa,
'Siandɛ 'yɛ Nyame dɔ.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 506:2
verse:
. Medze m' werɛ hyɛ Wo mu,
Wo mu na mohom komm;
Minyim dɛ iye na etsen,
Na nyia asan mu eyi n' tsen.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 506:3
verse:
. Dza obesi nyinara,
Wɔyɛ W'apɛdze nyina;
Medze me tsir to Wo bom' sɔnn,
Munnsuro ehum a obotu.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 506:4
verse:
. Ma yie anaa mbusu mbra,
Obesi yie ama me;
Minya Wo adze nyina mu a,
Mowɔ adze nyina.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 507:1
verse:
. FA w'awerɛhow nyina
Nye w'akwan hyɛ ne nsamu 
No nokwar krɔnn nye nhwɛdo pa m',
Ɔwɔ asaase nyina do.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:2
verse:
. Ɔno a ɔkyerɛ fua kwan,
Na ehum nye po tsie No n',
Ɔbɛtsentsen w'anamɔn kwan, 
Obesiesie w'akwan m'.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:3
verse:
. Fa woho twer Ewuradze,
Na w'abrabɔ aayɛ yie;
Fa w'enyi tsim N'edwuma do,
Ama wodze eewie yie.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:4
verse:
. Ehaw woho dɛn ara,
'Rinnya mfaso biara;
Fa w'ehiasɛm nyina to N'enyim,
Otsie mpaabɔ nyina.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:5
verse:
. Wo nokwar a ɔnnsa da n',
Egya, Wo dɔ a ɔmmbɔ adze n'
Nyim Wo mba nyina hɔn ehiadze,
Na dza oye ma hɔn.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:6
verse:
. Wo tum wɔ beebiara,
Ndzɛmba nyina hyɛ W'ase;
Wo ndzeyɛɛ yɛ nhyira ara nko,
W'akwan nyina yɛ kann.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:7
verse:
. Ewuradze, sɛ esoɛr a,
'Bɛn nye W'edwuma begyina?
Dza Wo mba hia nyina edze ma;
Woana bɔbɔ W' nsa ekyir?
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:8
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:9
verse:
. Mununkum nye ehum
Ɔbɔ kwan to m' ma wo;
Tweɔn Ne ber mu, na sum bɛpa,
Na adze akye enyigye m'.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:10
verse:
. W'akoma da ho dzi yaw?
Wo sunsum abotow?
Tow adzesoa kyen, na ma suro nkɔ,
Ma dadwen nyina nkɔ.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:11
verse:
. Sɛ nkyɛ inndzi hen mpo ɛ?
Sor nye asaase nye hɛll
Tseam' dɛ: Nyame tse ahengua do,
Dzi ndzɛmba nyina do tum!
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:12
verse:
. Ogyaa N'ahentum n' hɔ,
Faa wiadze hyɛɛ N' bra ase;
Ama hom akobɔfo eehu
Ne nyansaa nye nsa dzen.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:13
verse:
. N'egyinatu kɔ sorsor
Tra mbrɛ w'adwen bodu,
Ber a oewie edwuma yɛ pɛsɛɛ n',
Wɔ dza ɔbɔɔ w' hu gyangyan m'.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:14
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, 'hu hɛn mberɛwyɛ,
Inyim hɛn akoma m' nsɛm;
O ma nsa a oenya abagura do,
Hyɛ nankoroma a agow dzen!
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 507:15
verse:
. Ma nkwa mu nye owu mu
Wo nokwar n' nda edzi
Yengu hɛn ahomsten a odzi ewiei,
Nka Wo dɔ nye hwɛpa n'.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 508:1
verse:
. DƐ mbrɛ abofra a ɔyɛ mberɛw 
Suo n'egya nsamu dzendzen n'
Na ɔdze ne mberɛwyɛ to ahoɔdzen a
Ɔgye no fi ɔhaw m' do n';
Dɛm na m'Egya, mutu bar Wo,
Dɛm na dɔnhwer biara
Medze me wiadze mberɛwyɛ yi 
To Wo tum ahoɔdzen do.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 508:2
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ abofraba ɔtwer
Na ɔhwɛ ne na enyim no,
No werɛ fir ne yaw nye suro
Ber a ɔbɔ no kɔn ho komm n',
Dɛmara na mohwɛ m'Agyenkwa
W'enyim a atsew wann yi;
Muhu ɔdɔ a ɔhwɛ gyedzi
mberɛmberɛw tse dɛ medze 'i.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 508:3
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ abofra a ɔwɔ dɔ tse
No 'wofo ne nan do,
Ɔwɔ ahotɔ m' ntsi onnhia,
Osian fie pa no ntsi,
Dɛm na metse Wo nan ho yi
M'akoma bohue no dɔ;
Ewuradze, meserɛ dɛ kyerɛkyerɛ m'
Ma mondɔ Wo mbordo.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 509:1
verse:
. GALILIE afarfo n' berɛe,
Anago n' woennya hwee;
Na Jesus bae ara pɛr na
Wɔpaa nam nyanyannyan,
Ewuradze, sɛ hɛn berɛ yɛ gyan,
Na nyimpa mboa yɛ gyan a,
Hɛn dadwen nye yaw nnsow aba a,
Bra! Jesus siarfo, bra!
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 509:2
verse:
. Ayɛ sum, asorɛkye robɔ
Hɛmba n', ehum rutu;
Na Jesus ba ma hɔ ataa dzinn,
Hɛmba n' edwir mpoano,
Ewuradze, ehum twa hɛn ho hyia a,
Na ayɛ sum, ma ayɛ hu a,
Ɔkra n'ehumtu n' nyina mu n',
Jesus siarfo, tsie hɛn!
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 509:3
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 509:4
verse:
. Agyedzifo no dze suro
Kɔr aborɔsan no mu; 
Awerɛfir m', wɔdze enyigye kyiaa
Hɔn Wura a ɔaba hɔ no,
Ewuradze, beyi hɛn mpokyerɛ m',
Na ma hɛn suro ngyaa;
Fa siar nsa n' to hɛn etsifi,
Jesus, kasa asomdwee!  Amen.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 510:1
verse:
. MO suro, fi mo do kɔ,
Mennyɛ kyingyefo bio;
Sor kan atow nserɛmɛn epue,
Nyame bɔfo siarfo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 510:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 510:3
verse:
. Sɛ dza mepɛ yie na
Ɔyɛ Nyame apɛdze,
Sɛ asaase nye hɛll siw kwan mpo a,
Minyim dɛ ɔbɛyɛ m'dze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 510:4
verse:
. Ma wɔnkɔ do ntu egyina
Mfa nsɛɛ No mom a ɔahyɛ n',
Worunntum nnsiw nhyira kwan da,
Wofi sor ahyehyɛ ama m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 510:5
verse:
. Afei menngye kyim bio,
Ne dɛw mu mohom komm,
Nyia Ne nyansaa, nokwar nye tum
Bɔ m' ma meyɛ siarfo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 510:6
verse:
. Dza ɔahyehyɛ ato hɔ n',
Abɔdze nyina dzi do;
Na ɔsor ndzɛmba nyinara
Bɔ m' yɛ edwuma ma me.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 511:1
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 511:2
verse:
. Mo kwan mu yɛ sum, ɔyɛ m' kwankyerɛfo,
Medze nye setsie, Nedze nye ɔma;
Sɛ nsunyiwa tuetue na abɔdze hera a,
Asɛm a ɔaka n' dze otsim hɔ afebɔɔ.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 511:3
verse:
. No dɔ a ofi ahyɛse n' amma manndwen dɛ
Ewiei n' obegyaa m' ma meewu esuwu;
Ber a m'enyi tua m'Ebenezer ho yi,
Obesi n' pi dɛ ɔbɔboa m' akɔ ewiei.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 511:4
verse:
. Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na muhwinwhin dɛm yi?
Nsɔhwɛ anaa yaw? Yi na ɔkaa kyerɛɛ m',
Minyim, N'asɛm ka dɛ nkwagye adzedzifo
Wɔnam nsɔhwɛ mu dzi hɔn Wura ekyir.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 511:5
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 512:1
verse:
. OWURA, yɛkɔ W'asɛndua ho
Kɛserɛ bɔnfakyɛ,
Ma Wo bra nyɛ hɛn fasusu,
Nsiesie hɛn kra mma sor.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 512:2
verse:
. Boa hɛn, atsenka pa nye bɔn m',
Yɛnsoa hɛn mbeamudua daa;
Yɛnyɛ hɛn Egya Ne pɛ dɛ ɔwo,
Yɛnye enuanom nkyɛ yaw.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 512:3
verse:
. Ma adom nku hɛn pɛsankonya,
Ntsew hɛn efisɛm nyina ho,
Na ma W' nokwar ayamuyie pii n'
Ntsena hɛn so hɛn mu.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 512:4
verse:
. Sɛ 'ma hɛn enyigye tu kɔ
Ma yaw sum da no ba a,
Hɛn so yɛbɛtsea m' mberɛw mu dɛ;
Egya, Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ!
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 512:5
verse:
. Mfɛfoe ntɛnkyew, tamfo tom hɛn,
'Nuanom hɔn nokwar sa a,
Hɛn botae bɛyɛ dɛ Wodze n',
Yɛdze dɔ bedzi nyim.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 512:6
verse:
. Yɛbɛper enya asomdwee,
Yɛdze kyɛ enya fakyɛ;
O ma yɛmbɔ akwantufo bra,
Yendzi W'ekyir nkɔ sor.  Amen.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 513:1
verse:
. WOANA susu ɔdomankoma adwen?
Mbrɛ osi hyehyɛ ndzɛmba?
Ewuradze nye Nyankopɔn!
Onnhia dasanyi apam.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:2
verse:
. Ha a ndzɛmba ayɛ sakaa yi,
Nsuyirii na ehum haw hɛn 'i,
Mo sunsum gyina fakor pintsinn;
Minyim dɛ Nyame ye!
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:3
verse:
. Mo kɔn dɔ fie ndze a etwa m',
Serew a menntse bio no;
Nyame dze m'adɔfo kɔ na
Nyame ɔnnyɛ mfomdo.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:4
verse:
. Minnyim ndaamba mu nsɛm koraa,
Nwanwa anaa ahobow a?
M'awerɛhyɛm' nye dɛ nkwa nye owu m'
N'ehumbɔbɔr dɔɔ so.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:5
verse:
. Sɛ m'akoma nye honam yɛ mberɛw
Dɛ ɔsoa yaw beberee a,
Ndzɛmbir a odzi dzɛm n' orummbu m';
Opirim na ɔhyɛ dzen mbom.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:6
verse:
. Minnyim m'ankasa m'afɔrbɔ
Na ndwuma a odzi m' dase;
Medze N'akyɛdze san ma No,
Meserɛ No dɔ dze adɔ.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:7
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi po a ɔataa dzinn ho no,
Motweɔn osutwafo n';
Ɔnnkɛfa haw ato mo do,
Pomu anaa berano.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 513:8
verse:
. Minnyim mbrɛ No supruw ano ka,
Mberɛnkɔnson kodu wimu;
Minyim dɛ munnkotum efi
No nhwɛdo na N' dɔ ho.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 514:1
verse:
. NYIA ɔda famu nnsuro asehwe,
'Bɔbɔfo nnyɛ ahantan;
Nyia ɔbrɛ noho adze no,
Nyame bɛkyerɛ no kwan.
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.

name: MHB 514:2
verse:
. M'enyi sɔ dza mowɔ biara,
Osuar o, ɔdɔɔ so o;
Mepɛ Ewuradze mu abodwee,
'Siandɛ ɔgye nyia ɔtse dɛm.
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.

name: MHB 514:3
verse:
. Adzesoa durdur da hɔ ma
Hɔn a wɔyɛ akwantufo;
Ha kakraabi, nhyira wɔ ekyir,
Ɔkɔ mfesantsen nyina.
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.

name: MHB 515:3
verse:
. Woara gye mo kuraba, 
Fa dɛw anaa yaw gum'
Dɛ mbrɛ ehwɛ a oye;
Yie o, bɔn o, fa ma m'.
Memmfa mara me pɛ
Woara yɛ m'kwangyafo
M'ahoɔdzen, m'adze nyina.	Amen.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 515:12
verse:
. Wo kwan a; nnyɛ medze, 
Sɛ no mu kadoo mpo a,
Wankasa gye m' taataa;
Kyerɛ m' kwan a mundua mu.
No mu ye o, no mu muo o,
Ɔnoara na oye;
Ɔkyeakyea o, ɔtsen o,
Wɔdze kɔ W'ahomgyem'.
 
. Mennkɛfa dza mepɛ; 
Wɔse m' mpo a mennkɛfa:
Mo Wura, Woara, fa ma m'
Na ɔayɛ kwan pa ama m'.
Ɔman a mohwehwɛ n'
Wodze a; na ma kwan a
Wɔdze kɔm' so nyɛ Wodze,
Ɔno m'bɔtɔ dɔnsuar.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 516:1
verse:
. Sɛ yɛnyé Ewuradze nam
N’asɛmpa kwan no mu a,
Enyimnyam a ͻhyérɛn hɛn kwan mu a!
Bér a yɛyɛ N’apɛdze,
Ͻnye hɛn tsena daa,
      Nye hͻn a wͻtwer No yɛ setsie.
      Twer N’, yɛ setsie, na kwan biara nnyi hͻ a
      Hɛn enyi bɛgye Jesus mu,
      Dɛ yɛtwer N’, yɛ setsie.
title: John Henry Sammis, d. 1919.

name: MHB 516:2
verse:
. Sunsuma bi nnkͻsoɛr,
Mununkum rinnsi wimu a
Ne serew nnkͻhwetse n’ ntsɛmara;
Ekyingye anaa suro,
Awérɛhow na nyinsuwa
Rinngyina ber a yɛyɛ setsie.
title: John Henry Sammis, d. 1919.

name: MHB 516:3
verse:
. Adzesoa a yɛsoa nyina,
Awérɛhow a yedzi.
Otua no mu biara ho kaw yie;
Yaw anaa adzehwer bi.
Muna anaa ͻhaw
Yɛ nhyira bér a yɛtwer, yɛ setsie.
title: John Henry Sammis, d. 1919.

name: MHB 516:4
verse:
. Naaso yerunntum nnkyérɛ
No dͻ ho enyigye,
Gyedɛ yɛdze n‘ nyina gu afͻr-pon n’ do;
Adom a ͻyɛ no.
Na dɛw a ͻma no,
Yɛ hͻn a wobetsie no hͻndze.
title: John Henry Sammis, d. 1919.

name: MHB 516:5
verse:
. ‘Nyɛnkoyɛ dɛɛdɛw mu.
Yɛbɛtsena N’ananadze,
Yɛnye N’ besian anan wͻ kwan no mu;
Dza ͻka n’ yɛbɛyɛ,
Yɛbͻkͻ No soma n’.
Mma nnsuro, twer N’, yɛ setsie ara.
title: John Henry Sammis, d. 1919.

name: MHB 517:1
verse:
. MOTWER No daa nyinara,
Ehum rutu a, motwer No;
Sɛ me gyedzi suar dɛn ara a,
Motwer Jesus, noara nye n'.
title: Edgar Page Stites, b. 1837.

name: MHB 517:2
verse:
. Mber rutwa m' kɔ a motwer No,
Nda resen yi, motwer No,
Dza obesi bia 'a motwer No,
Motwer Jesus, noara nye n'.
title: Edgar Page Stites, b. 1837.

name: MHB 517:3
verse:
. No Sunsum hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw
Kɔ m'akoma bɔbɔfo yi m';
Ogya m' yi moronnhwe ase,
Motwer Jesus, noara nye n'.
title: Edgar Page Stites, b. 1837.

name: MHB 517:4
title: Edgar Page Stites, b. 1837.

name: MHB 517:5
verse:
. Metse nkwa m' yi, motwer No,
M'bɔtwer No ekodu ewiei,
Kodu ahwehwɛbo dan no m';
Motwer Jesus, noara nye n'.
title: Edgar Page Stites, b. 1837.

name: MHB 518:1
verse:
. JESU, akoradze a wɔnntɔ,
'Nyigye mapa farbaa,
Me nyɛnko brɛbo;
Ao! Meper hwehwɛ Wo,
M'akoma atɔ bitsi,
Wo ho nsukɔm dze m'!
Eguambaa krɔnn, meyɛ W'dze,
Mennkɛma kwan ma wɔdze W' esie,
Mimmbisa hwee nnka W' ho.
title: Johann Franck, 1618-77;

name: MHB 518:2
title: Johann Franck, 1618-77;

name: MHB 518:3
verse:
. Suro nye awerɛhow nyina
Wɔdze ma Ewuradze,
Jesus bɛhɛn mu;
Hɔn a wɔdɔ Egya no,
Sɛ ehum tu mpo a
Wɔwɔ asomdwee;
Biribiara a mosoa wɔ ha n',
Enyigye mapa wɔ Wo mu,
Jesu, akoradze a wɔnntɔ.
title: Johann Franck, 1618-77;

name: MHB 519:1
verse:
. JESUS, nokwafo ɔdomfo,
Agyenkwa, yɛsɔr Wo,
Amandzehu m' yeyi W' ayɛw,
Na Wo tum yɛ kɛse.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 519:2
verse:
. Wo tum wɔ nyimpa mberɛwyɛ mu
Bɛyɛ hɛn nyina kor;
W'enyim a ɔkyerɛ hɛn kwan ntsi
Yɛnantsew gya mu sɔnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 519:3
verse:
. Nyimpa Ba, gyedzi mu yehu W',
Yetuw W'akwankyerɛ ho;
Abɔ hɛn ho aprɔw ehyia yi,
Yetum gyina ogya mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 519:4
verse:
. Adom bɛma ogya n' ayerɛw,
Na wɔayɛ hɛn fofor,
Ma yaasɛ ɔsor suban no,
Ɔdɔ mapa ahyɛnsew n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 520:1
verse:
. Medze mo bɔn brɛ Wo 
Dza munntum ano bu,
Ama aahor ne nyina
Wɔ bɔgya bura no mu.
M'Agyenkwa, medze ne nyina brɛ W';
No dur hyɛ me kra do dodow.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 520:2
verse:
. Medze m'akoma brɛ Wo, 
'Koma a minnyim mu nsɛm;
Kɔhwinyi, kobɔnyi n',
Akoma bɔn ampa.
M'Agyenkwa, medze hyɛ Wo nsa
Ma m'akoma nsi pi mma Wo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 520:3
verse:
. Medze m' dadwen brɛ Wo, 
Dadwen a munntum munnguan n'
Ama eesuo mo mu
Ama eeyi no hɔ.
M'Agyenkwa dɔfo, Wo nkyɛn na
Medze m'adzesoa yi meba.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 520:4
verse:
. Medze me yaw brɛ Wo, 
Yaw a munntum nnka n' a;
Ɔnngye dɛ meka mpo,
Ɔnngye dɛ meka mpo,
Woara nyim ne nyina.
M'Agyenkwa a Woara so nyim yaw,
Medze m'awerɛhow brɛ Wo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 520:56
verse:
. Medze me dɛw brɛ Wo, 
Dɛw a Wo dɔ dze ana m',
Dɛ memfa nyɛ atwer a 
Mofow mipinkyɛn Wo.
Gyefo, Woara tɔɔ ne nyina maa m';
Medze ne nyina gu W'enyim.
 
. Medze mo nkwa brɛ Wo, 
Mennda ho nndze moho;
Gyefo, ma menya Wodze,
Wo nko Wodze daa nyina.
M'akoma, mo nkwa, m'adze nyina,
Medze brɛ Wo, me Hen, Gyefo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 521:1
verse:
. MOTWER Wo, Ewuradze Jesus,
Motwer Wo nkotoo,
Motwer Wo ma meenya nkwagye 
Kɛse kwa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 521:2
verse:
. Motwer Wo kotow W'ananadze
Serɛ bɔnfakyɛ;
W'adom nye ehumbɔbɔr kɛse n'
Na motwer.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 521:3
verse:
. Motwer Wo ma aatsew mo ho
Wɔ bɔgya bura n' mu;
Motwer Wo ma aayɛ m' krɔnkrɔn,
Wo bɔgyaa m'.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 521:4
verse:
. Motwer W' ma aayɛ m' Kwankyerɛfo,
Woara kyerɛ me kwan;
Daa na dɔnhwer nyinara m' ma m'
M'ehiadze.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 521:5
verse:
. Motwer Wo ama meenya tum,
Irinngyaa me da;
Nsɛm a Woara dze bɛma me n'
Bedzi nyim.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 521:6
verse:
. Motwer Wo, Ewuradze Jesus,
Mma monnhwe ase da;
Motwer Wo daa daa nyinara,
Na afebɔɔ.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 522:1
verse:
. SƐ 'nnka m' ho a, munntum nnyɛ hwee,
Hɔn a wɔayew hɔn Gyefo,
Ɔwo a Wo bɔgyaa a ɔsom bo n' 
'Dze apon emi dɛm yi;
Wo tsenenee, Wo fakyɛ,
Wo bɔgyaa a ɔsom bo n' nyɛ 
M'enyidar, m'awerɛkyekyer,
M'enyimnyam, na m'asɛm.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 522:2
verse:
. Sɛ 'nnka m' ho a, munntum nnyɛ hwee,
Mo nko nnkotum egyina,
Minnyi ahom anaa ayamuyie,
Me nyansaa nnyɛ medze;
Na Ɔwo Agyenkwa Dɔfo dze
Eyɛ m'adze nyina,
Sɛ motwer Wo nkotoo a,
Mberɛwyɛ dan ahoɔdzen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 522:3
verse:
. Sɛ 'nnka m' ho a, munntum nnyɛ hwee,
Nyɛnko biara nnyi hɔ a
Otum hu adze a me kra
Hwehwɛ na ɔatse ase,
Ɔdasanyi bi nnyi hɔ a,
Obohu m'akoma m' nsɛm
Na ɔakyekye mo werɛ
Dɛ Ewuradze nko.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 522:4
verse:
. Sɛ 'nnka m' ho a, munntum nnyɛ hwee,
M-fe rutwa m' ntsɛntsɛm,
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na m' nko rutwa
Esutsen n' awerɛhow m';
Sɛ asorɛkye n' bu dɛn ara a,
Ɔwo innkegya m' da,
Minyim dɛ ebɛbɛn me
Na awasa dɛ, Mara a.  Amen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 523:1
verse:
. MINNKEGYAA W' ma aakɔ! Ɔwo a
eyɛ hia da m' boafo;
Mbusu dɔɔ so a,
Motwer W' ara,
Kaansa ɔyɛ dɛ epɛ abɔ me a,
Yɛ me dza Woara pɛ,
Mebɛtetar Wo ara;
'Dze W'enyim huntsa mpo a, hia da m' boafo,
Minnkegyaa Wo ma aakɔ!
title: Wolfgang Christoph Dessler, 1660-1722.

name: MHB 523:2
verse:
. Mennkɛgyaa W' ma aakɔ! Ana me
nhyira mbɔ ,e a?
Dabi, 'yɛ m'dze,
Meyɛ Wodze;
Ndzɛmba nyina hwer m' mpo a, m' 
bɛtetar W',
'Nafua yɛ sum dɛn mpo a,
Wo kan dze enyigye ba;
Ɔwo a eyɛ m'Ewia, me nhyira mbɔ me a?
Minnkegyaa Wo ma aakɔ!
title: Wolfgang Christoph Dessler, 1660-1722.

name: MHB 523:3
verse:
. Mennkɛma aakɔ! Me Nyame, mo
Nkwa, m'Ewuradze;
'Wu ruuntum nntsew m'
Ɔwo a emi ntsi ihuee Wo nkwa gui,
'Dɔ ntsi Ɔwo wui maa m';
Meka n' ɔdɔ m' kyerɛ Wo,
M'akoma tsew mpo a, me Nyame,
mo Nkwa, Wura,
Minnkɛgyaa Wo ma aakɔ!
title: Wolfgang Christoph Dessler, 1660-1722.

name: MHB 524:1
verse:
. ME Nyame, meda W' ase wɔ Wiadze fɛɛfɛw,
Ɔhyerɛn, no mu yɛ dɛw, yɛ kan,
Yɛ ahomka;
Ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ nwanwa pii wɔ ha,
Dza ɔkrɔn na oye.
title: Adelaide Anne Procter, 1825-64.

name: MHB 524:2
verse:
. Meda W' ase dɛ ama yenya
Dɛw pii wɔ ha,
Adwen pa nye ndzeyɛɛ pa so
Ehyia hɛn ho,
Na wiadze beebi a ɔyɛ sum 
Ɔdɔ wɔ hɔ.
title: Adelaide Anne Procter, 1825-64.

name: MHB 524:3
verse:
. Meda W' ase dɛ dɛw nyina mu
Yaw so fam ho,
Dɛ wimu bunkam kan no do,
Nsoɛ so wɔ hɔ,
Ama wiadze dɛw akyerɛ hɛn kwan,
Na annkyekyer hɛn.
title: Adelaide Anne Procter, 1825-64.

name: MHB 524:4
title: Adelaide Anne Procter, 1825-64.

name: MHB 524:5
verse:
. Meda W' ase dɛ ha hɛn akra
Nya nhyira pii,
Naaso wonntum nnya ahomgye pa a 
Odzi mu koraa n',
Kodu dɛ wɔbɛba abɔtwer
Jesus No bom' n'.
title: Adelaide Anne Procter, 1825-64.

name: MHB 525:1
title: Mary Peters, 1813-56.

name: MHB 525:2
title: Mary Peters, 1813-56.

name: MHB 525:3
verse:
. Hɛn enyi da adzekyee pa kwan,
Ɔbɛyɛ yie;
Gyedzi tow ndwom awerɛhow da mu,
Ne nyina ye;
Yɛdze hɛnho to Egya n' dɔ do,
Jesus ma hɛn dza yehia nyina,
Ntsi nkwa mu o, anaa owu mu o,
Ɔbɛyɛ yie.
title: Mary Peters, 1813-56.

name: MHB 526:1
verse:
. O JESUS , mahyɛ bɔ dɛ
M'bɔsom Wo akɔ ewiei;
Ntsi pinkyɛn me daa nyina,
Mo Wura nye me Nyɛnko;
Murunnsuro ɔko no,
Sɛ ewɔ me nkyɛn a,
Sɛ Ɔwo yɛ me Kwankyerɛfo a,
Morommfom mmfi kwan n' mu.
title: John Ernest Bode, 1816-74.

name: MHB 526:2
title: John Ernest Bode, 1816-74.

name: MHB 526:3
verse:
. O ma mentse wo ndze dɛ
Rekasa krɔnkrɔnkrɔn,
Wɔ akɔndɔbɔn ehum mu
Na pɛ n'ehwinhwin mu;
Kasa ma minnya awerɛhyɛm',
Tsea m' anaa hom mo do;
O kasa ma mintsie Wo,
Ɔwo m' kra Kwangyafo.
title: John Ernest Bode, 1816-74.

name: MHB 526:4
verse:
. Jesus, abɔ anohoba
Dɛ W'akadofo nyina
Mbrɛ etse enyimnyam mu n'
Na W'asomfo bɛba;
Na Jesus, mahyɛ bɔ dɛ
M'bɔsom Wo akɔ ewiei;
Mo Wura nye me Nyɛnko, ma m'
Adom mfa ndzi W'ekyir.
title: John Ernest Bode, 1816-74.

name: MHB 527:1
verse:
. KAN pue Christiannyi awora
Aber a ɔrotow ndwom;
Nyame na ɔdze 'yarsa tum
Botwa no ho hyia dɛm;
Ber a awerɛkyekyer repa n',
Ɔma awerɛhyɛm' bi
Bɛhɛn ɔkra no mu bio,
Na ɔma n' enyigye.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 527:2
verse:
. Yɛnam adwen krɔnkrɔn do
Yɛdze enyigye hwehwɛ
Nyame No nkwagye ho asɛm,
Na yenya no fofor,
Woyi hɛn awerɛhow 'i mu a,
Yetum dze dɛw ka dɛ
Ɔkyena mpo a yennyim mu asɛm
Mfa dza ɔdze nam mbra.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 527:3
verse:
. Ɔammfa hweeara mpo ammba a,
Obotwitwa hɛn hia m',
Nyia ofura 'sukooko tam n'
Bɛma hɛn efuradze;
Wi yantamm n'ase ha yi
Abɔdze biara mee;
Na Nyia ɔnyɛn wimu nnoma n'
Bɛyɛn No mbofra so.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 527:4
verse:
. Sɛ wenyindua na adɔmba
Annsow aba a ohia n',
Sɛ haban mu nyina tɔ pan
Mbowa nnya edzidzibea a,
Nyame ankasa wɔ hɔ 'i dze,
N'ayɛyi bɛhyɛ m' ma,
Aber a metse No mu yi,
Otwar dɛ midzi dɛw.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 528:123
verse:
. Metse sor man ho dɔ mu 'i, 
Munnsuro nsakyer biara;
M'awerɛhyɛmu yi dzi mu,
Biribiara nnsakyer ha;
Ehum botu abɔ m' ho aprɔw
M'akoma botu dze;
Na Nyame etwa moho ehyia 'i.
Ana m'bɛpa abaw?
 
. Beebiara a obegya me n'. 
Hia biara nnkɛsan me;
Mo Guanhwɛfo wɔ me nkyɛn,
Na minnkehia hweeara;
Ne nyansaa tse hɔ daa daa,
N'enyi nnyɛ kusuww da;
Onyim kwan a ɔfa do,
Na menye N' bɛnantsew.
 
. Mfunoma wɔ m'enyim a, 
Emidze minnyae nnhunii,
Wimu bɛtsew kann wɔ mo do,
Wɔ mbrɛ nkyɛ fua ahyɛ  n';
M'enyidar munntum nnsusu,
Mo kwan da hɔ kɔ nkwan',
M'Agyenkwa esie m'akoradze
Na ɔnye m' bɛnantsew.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 529:1
verse:
. O SIAR nkwa bi a!' Homgye wɔ hɔ
Ma akoma, ber a dwumadzi asa -
Nyia ɔtwer sor apɛdze na obu n'
Adze tsitsir kyɛn nyimpa n' pɛ.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 529:2
verse:
. O siar nkwa bi a! Adwen a ohu
Mbɔbɔrhu wɔ biribiara mu,
Na ohu esumasɛm nyina mu,
Kaansa afe n' dze nsakyer ba mpo a.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 529:3
verse:
. O siar nkwa bi a! 'Kra hu ndzɛmba m',
Ber a adasa enyiwa yɛ kusuww,
Ɔtra ntseasee du Nyame hɔ,
Nyia No dɔ buebue sor mbobow.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 529:4
verse:
. O siar nkwa bi a! Akoma, adwen, kra,
Nya nyimpa dwen na ɔpɛ m' 'hotɔ,
Wɔnye Nyame bɔ m' wɔ adze nyina m',
Na wɔhyɛ Ewuradze tum ase.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 529:5
verse:
. O mbrɛ Nyame m' nkwa dua yɛ siar a!
Sor nkwa mapa a enyi da kwan;
Agyenkwa, hyɛ me pɛ no ma,
Na ma siar nkwa yi nyɛ medze.   Amen.
title: William Tidd Matson, 1833-99.

name: MHB 530:1
verse:
. Mber pii na maka n' mo mu; 
Dɛ, Woana bɔfow sor,
Akɛfa Ewuradze Christ,
Dze No esian famu?
Adwendwen dze me botu,
Ma mekohu Noara
Mbrɛ abɔfo yi No ayɛw,
Wonya adzekyee nwoaraba n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 530:2
verse:
. Mber pii na maka n' mo mu: 
Woana besian bun n' mu,
Akɛfa Ewuradze Christ,
Efi ewufom' aba?
Medze nokwar mbrɛahoadze
Siesie m'akoma mu dze a,
Christ bɛhɛn mo mu hɔ ntsɛm,
Nye me abɛtsena daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 530:3
verse:
. Na gyedzi mu tsenenee n' 
Akyerɛ me ndzɛmba pa:
Ɔdze Christ rebrɛ me no;
Ɔse: Hwɛ N' w'akkomam',
Christ ayɛ krado dze nkwa
Rema nyia ɔhaahaw ho n';
W'anomu nye w'akoma mu
Asɛm no abɛn wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 531:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 531:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 531:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 531:4
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi, mobɔ mpaa daa nyina,
Mepra m'akoma m' tu me kra
Hyɛ Wo nsamu dabaa;
Minyim dɛ ɔbra yi m' 'bɛgye m' nkwa,
Na owu ekyir so akyerɛ me dɛ
Eyɛ m' Gyafo afebɔɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 532:1
verse:
. WƆMFA onnyiewiei enyimnyam nhyɛ Wo
Ahenkyɛw, m'Agyenkwa na m' Wura;
'Dze nkwagye fi sor esian famu,
Na akyerɛw nhyira n' wɔ W'asɛm mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 532:2
verse:
. Hɛn ahopopo tsibowa hwehwɛ
Tsintsimbea pa bi ahom hɔ;
Abagura ntsi hɛn sunsum gow,
Kodu dɛ yɛba Wo nko hɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 532:3
verse:
. Mbrɛ Wo siar nokwar dua saa a! 
W'ahyɛdze yɛ nyansa na krɔnn,
Mbrɛ W'anohoba nyina dua tsim a!
Hɛn enyidar na awerɛkyekyer tsim.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 532:4
verse:
. Sɛ nyimpa nhyehyɛɛ bɔn nyinara
Ko dzendzen tsia me gyedzi mpo a,
Ɔyɛ gyan na akohwi; medze
W'asɛmpa n' kyekyer m'akoma ho.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 533:1
verse:
. MPAABƆ nye ɔkra n'akɔndɔdze,
Wɔka anaa wɔnnka a,
Ɔyɛ nsumaa m'ogya a ɔdzɛw a
Ɔwosow akoma m'.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 533:2
verse:
. Mpaabɔ yɛ nkrumsi dzendzen bi a
Ɔyɛ nyinsuwakyi,
Enyi a otua sor, mbrɛ obi mmbɛn,
Gyedɛ Nyame nkotsee.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 533:3
verse:
. Mpaabɔ yɛ kasa mberɛw bo a 
Mbofra ano mpo tum ka;
Mbaabɔ yɛ ndwom dɛɛdɛw na odu
Sor Tumfo no enyim.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 533:4
verse:
. Mpaabɔ yɛ ɔbɔn a ɔasan efi
N'akwan bɔn ho ne ndze;
Abɔfo dze dɛw tow hɔn ndwom,
Tsea m' dɛ: Hwɛ, ɔrosɔr!
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 533:5
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 533:6
verse:
. Ɔwo a yedua W' do hu Nyame,
N-kwa Nokwar na Ɔkwan n'!
Woara edua mpaabɔ kwan no do;
Hɛn Wura, kyerɛ hɛn mpaabɔ.  Amen.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 534:1
verse:
. JESUS, adasa Wura tumfo,
Ɔwo a nnsakyer dabiarada,
Tsie Wo mba mberɛyɛfo hɛn frɛ,
Na kyerɛ hɛn mbrɛ yensi mbɔ mpaa!
Hue mpaabɔ adom no gu hɛn do,
Na kenyan hɛn ma yɛnhwehwɛ W'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 534:2
verse:
. Yennkotum adwen adwen pa bi,
Yennkenya ɔpɛ pa bi, gyedɛ
Ɔwo a efrɛɛ wiadze fii hun mu n'
Dze Wo tum n' kenyan hɛn akoma,
Ma anohoba Ntamugyinafo n' mbra,
Na ma yennya Woara sesei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 534:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 535:1
verse:
. EHUM kɛse biara a otu,
Na ɔhaw asorɛkye biara a obu n',
Ɔbrɛ adze; guandɔbea mapa,
Wɔ ehumbɔbɔr egua n' ase.
title: Hugh Stowell, 1799-1865.

name: MHB 535:2
verse:
. Bea bi wɔ hɔ a Jesus hue
Enyigye ngo gu hɛn tsir do,
Bea a hɔ yɛ dɛw sen mbea nyina;
Mbɔbɔrhu bɔgya egua n' ase.
title: Hugh Stowell, 1799-1865.

name: MHB 535:3
verse:
. Bea bi wɔ hɔ a esunsum saa,
Na anyɛnkofo hyia fɛkuwbɔ m';
Wɔmmbɛn, naaso wohyia gyedzi m'
Wɔ ehumbɔbɔr egua kor n' ho.
title: Hugh Stowell, 1799-1865.

name: MHB 535:4
verse:
. Hɔ, yɛdze ɔkɔr ntsaban tu,
Na mber nye adwen nnyi hɔ bio;
Na sor sian bɛyɛ hɛn akra etuu,
Enyimnyam ka mbɔbɔrhu egua n'.
title: Hugh Stowell, 1799-1865.

name: MHB 536:1
verse:
. ME Nyame , ber bi wɔ anapa
Kodu ewimbir a ɔyɛ dɛw sen
Ber a efrɛ m' ba W'ananadze,
M-paabɔ ber n'.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 536:2
verse:
. Nhyira aka anapa asomdwee ber,
Na ewimbir nhyira ber krɔnn no,
Ber a mudua mpaabɔ ntsaban do 
Gya wiadze hɔ.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 536:3
verse:
. Ber 'i na anapawi tow nserɛmɛn a
Ɔsen anapa ewia hyerɛn gu m' do,
Na ahomka bɔsu a ofi Wo hɔ
Kyɛn wiadze dze.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 536:4
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 536:5
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 536:6
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 536:7
verse:
. Kɛpem dɛ m'bodu enyigye n' mu n',
Eyiedzi bi nnyi hɔ a ɔkyɛn
Dɛ muhue me kra ntunadze nyina
Mpaabɔ m' ma Wo.
title: Charlotte Elliott, 1789-1871.

name: MHB 537:1
verse:
. ME Nyame , ber bi wɔ anapa
Kodu ewimbir a ɔyɛ dɛw sen
Ber a efrɛ m' ba W'ananadze,
M-paabɔ ber n'.
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 537:2
verse:
. Nhyira aka anapa asomdwee ber,
Na ewimbir nhyira ber krɔnn no,
Ber a mudua mpaabɔ ntsaban do 
Gya wiadze hɔ.
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 537:3
verse:
. Ber 'i na anapawi tow nserɛmɛn a
Ɔsen anapa ewia hyerɛn gu m' do,
Na ahomka bɔsu a ofi Wo hɔ
Kyɛn wiadze dze.
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 537:4
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 537:5
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 537:6
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 537:7
verse:
. Kɛpem dɛ m'bodu enyigye n' mu n',
Eyiedzi bi nnyi hɔ a ɔkyɛn
Dɛ muhue me kra ntunadze nyina
Mpaabɔ m' ma Wo.
title: Mary Russell Olivant, 1852-

name: MHB 538:1
verse:
. JESUS yɛ hɛn nyɛnko pa bi a
Hɛn yaw na bɔn da no do!
Yɛwɔ yiedzi bi dɛ yɛdze
Nsɛm nyina ma Ewuradze mpaabɔ m',
Mber pii yɛyew hɛn asomdwee,
Mber pii yehu amandze gyan,
Siantsire nyina nye dɛ yɛmmfa
Nsɛm nyina mma Ewuradze mpaabɔ m'!
title: Joseph Medlicott Scriven, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 538:2
verse:
. Yɛwɔ ahohiahia nye nsɔhwɛ?
Ana ɔhaw bi wɔ hɔ?
Mma yinom nnhyɛ hɛn abagura,
Yɛmfa mma Ewuradze mpaabɔ m',
Yebenya nyɛnko nokwafo a
Ɔnye hɛn dzi yaw dɛ Oyi?
Jesus nyim hɛn mberɛwyɛ biara;
Ka kyerɛ No wɔ mpaabɔ m'.
title: Joseph Medlicott Scriven, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 538:3
verse:
. Ana yɛahaw, hɛn kɔn ebu?
Yɛso dadwen durdur bi a?
Gyefo mapa n' yɛ guandɔbea;
Fa kɛma No wɔ mpaabɔ m',
Wo mfɛfo pow w', wommbu wo bi a?
Fa ma Ewuradze mpaabɔ m';
N'abasa bɔbɔ wo ho ban,
Ibenya akomatɔm'.
title: Joseph Medlicott Scriven, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 539:1
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, kyerɛ hɛn ma yɛnsɔr yie, 
Yɛmfia enyindzi na suro:
Kaansa yɛyɛ dɛtse na nso a,
Otwar dɛ yɛbɛn Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 539:2
verse:
. Yegyaa sɔr a na yeedzi emia: 
Dom hɛn tua ma yɛnsɔr!
Na yɛroboa hɛnho nye W' ehyia a,
Ewuradze, hyia hɛn kwan.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 539:3
verse:
. Ma hɛn ahobrɛadze ɔnye 
Bɔn ho nnuho krɔnkrɔn,
Awerɛhyɛmu dzendzen a ɔma
Yɛtse Wo ndze nya nkwa.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 539:4
verse:
. Dom hɛn gyedzi wɔ Afɔr a 
No nko tum pata bɔn n';
Ma yɛmfa enyidar enyi
Ntsim Christ n-ko ara do.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 539:5
verse:
. Abotar a 'kyɛr dɛn ara a 
Ɔweɔn, ɔtweɔn na osu;
Mbanyinndam a osie hɛn kra
Na 'ruku n' mpo a ɔtwer Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 539:6
verse:
. Ma hɛn yi, na Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ, 
Ma, yɛahyɛ dzen dɛm no,
Yeedua Wo Sunsum nye W' Ba do
Yɛasɔr dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 540:1
verse:
. ME kra, fa wo nsɛm nyina bra,
Jesus dɔ dɛ ɔma mbuae;
Ɔnoara na ɔse bɔ mpaa,
Dɛm ntsi ɔnnkɛse W' oho.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 540:2
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 540:3
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 540:4
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 540:5
verse:
. Meyɛ kwantunyi wɔ ha 'i,
Wo dɔ n' nhyɛ mo sunsum dzen;
Mo Kwankyerɛfo na Nyɛnko,
Gya m' kɔ m'akwantu ewiei.  Amen.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 541:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 541:2
verse:
. Dua fɛkuwbɔ mu nko,
Twe bɛn Nyame gyedzi m',
Fa tum a ɔwɔ mpaabɔ mu
Kɔ N'abangua enyim,
Kɔ N'asɔrdan no mu,
Mmfi N'afɔrmbukyia enyim;
Ma efiefi nyina nhu No som,
Na akoma nyina nhu No dɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 541:3
verse:
. Fa wo kra ma Nyame,
Fa w' kra kotow N'enyim,
Tserɛw w'akoma nye wo nsamu
Serɛ asomdwee ma Zion;
Kaa w'akwankyerɛfo
Nye wo nuanom nyina;
Tserɛw wo mpaabɔ abasa mu,
Ka adasamba nyina fua.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 541:4
verse:
. Kɔ kan ahoɔdzen mu,
Aperper mu bɔ mpaa,
Tsia sum mu etumfo hɔn do,
Na dzi konyim wɔ ko m';
Ma Sunsum n' nkeka mu
Mfrɛ nsordaafo no mbra, 
Kodu dɛ Christ fi sor besian
Abɛfa 'nyimdzifo n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 542:1
verse:
. JESUS, m'enyidado,
Me dadwen da Wo do,
Mbrɛhoadze mu na mohwɛ Wo,
Minyim dɛ etsie m' mpaabɔ,
Ma montweɔn Wo nkotoo,
Na meetum adze nyina yɛ
Wɔ Wo mu, Ɔwo ebɔɔ adze nyina,
Eyɛɛ adze nyina fofor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 542:2
verse:
. Mepɛ nyamesuro,
Enyiwa a ohu adze,
Ɔhwɛ Wo ber a bɔn abɛn,
Ɔma gyigyefo n' guan;
Sunsum ayɛ krado,
Ɔdze nhwɛyie bɔ ban,
Ogyina n'aweɔmber mu pi,
Mpaabɔ mu daa nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 542:3
verse:
. Mepɛ adwen pa bi a
Ogyina hɔ pintsinn,
Onnsuro hwee, ɔmmpɛ akatua,
Gyina ma Wo dzin kɛse n';
Ɔtwe W'ayɛyi a
Onnyi ewiei ho nyinkun,
Dze pɛ pa ahwehwɛ, esua dɛ
Wɔnkamfo W'adom no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 542:4
verse:
. Medan W'asɛm pa no,
Anohoba n' yɛ m' dze;
M'ekyigyina nkwagye, Ewuradze,
Fi Wo nkotoo hɔ ba;
Na mingyina dzen yie,
M'enyidar dɛmara,
Kodu dɛ edze mo sunsum
Bɛba Wo dɔ pa n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 543:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, tsie m' mpaabɔ 
Na tsie mo sufrɛ so,
Kaa W'asɛm a ɔyɛ nokwar no,
Minya mbuae adom mu ara.
title: Benjamin Hall Kennedy, 1804-89.

name: MHB 543:2
verse:
. Mma mmfa atsɛmbu mmba koraa,
Mma nnhwɛ W'akowaa abrabɔ m';
Wɔ W'enyiwa mu, tsenenee
Nnyi adasamba mu.
title: Benjamin Hall Kennedy, 1804-89.

name: MHB 543:3
verse:
. Metsen me nsa kyerɛ
Wo krɔnkrɔn-bea hɔ no,
Nsukɔm dze me kra dɛ asaase a
Etwee hwehwɛ W'adom.
title: Benjamin Hall Kennedy, 1804-89.

name: MHB 543:4
verse:
. O Ewuradze, bra ntsɛm
Bɛgye m'akoma fa,
Mma nnhunta na morohwe ase
Dɛ ɔkra a ɔahwe owumaa m'.
title: Benjamin Hall Kennedy, 1804-89.

name: MHB 543:5
verse:
. Me gyedzi per ahwɛ
W'ehumbɔbɔr kan no;
Ma mennantsew W'enyim kan mu!
Medze me kra ma Wo.
title: Benjamin Hall Kennedy, 1804-89.

name: MHB 543:6
verse:
. Ma Wo Sunsum nkyerɛ
M'anamɔn tsenenee akwan;
Na Ewuradze, Wo dzin ntsi ma
Me tsir do fi ngyigye m'.  Amen.
title: Benjamin Hall Kennedy, 1804-89.

name: MHB 544:1
verse:
. Bɛkyebo Kan! Bɛkyebo Kan! 
Mbrɛ kra ho wɔ dɛ ɔtsew
Wɔ W'enyim a, Ehuntahunii;
Ɔmmpem adze, mbom ɔdze dɛw
Tum gyina na ɔhwɛ Wo.
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: MHB 544:4
verse:
. Kwan bi wɔ hɔ ma nyimpa dɛ 
Ɔdze fow kɔ sor fie;
Afɔr bi a wɔabɔ ama hɛn,
Nyame enyim Twitwagyefo,
Sunsum krɔnkrɔn No tum.
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: MHB 544:5
verse:
. Yinom na wɔyɛ hɛn krado 
Ma sor krɔnkrɔnyɛ no;
Sum mu mba a yɛyɛ atɔbɔ
Nam domankoma Dɔ no do,
Bɛtsena bɛkyebo Kanm'.
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: MHB 544:23
verse:
. W'ahengua ho esunsum dze 
Tum sɔw siar hyɛnn no;
Na hɔn nko na hɔn su tse dɛm,
Osiandɛ wonnhum bɔn wiadze a
Ɔtse dɛ iyi pɛn.
 
. Ao, m'bɛyɛ dɛn na 'mi a wɔawo m' 
Sum mu, m'adwen kusuww,
Metum mepue, Nyame, Wenyim,
Na mo sunsum kwatserkwaa yi
Asɔw nserɛmɛn hyɛnn no?
title: Thomas Binney, 1798-1874.

name: MHB 545:1
verse:
. YI W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n' kyerɛ m'!
Kenyan m'ahoɔdzen a agow;
Dom me kra a ɔatɔ bitsi
Dɛ asaase wesee hia nsu n',
Sian bra, m'Ewuradze, mma nnkyɛr,
Bra, m'Agyenkwa, bra ntsɛntsɛm!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 545:2
verse:
. Woara nyim dɛ munntum nnhom,
Gyedɛ mohom wɔ Wo mu,
Gyedɛ wosow wɔ mo mu,
Gyedɛ migyaa bɔn yɛ koraa,
Gyedɛ 'hyɛ m'abrabɔ ma,
Minya sor dɔ dzi dɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 545:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 546:1
verse:
. Agyenkwa Jesus, fi sor bra! 
Fa W'adom krɔnkrɔn n' bɔboa me:
Pra wiadze dɔ fi m'akomam'
Na siesie mu fa ma Woho.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: MHB 546:2
verse:
. O, ma Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ nhyɛ n' ma  
Na mo sunsum no kɔn ndɔ Wo!
Ewia o, anago, o, me pɛ kor
Nye dɛ minya Wo midzi mee.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: MHB 546:5
verse:
. Ɔwo nko ara na mutum, 
Medze enyigye krɔnn dɔ Wo;
Egyigye kɛse bɛn nye yi
Dɛ muhu dɛ edze m' yɛ Wodze!
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: MHB 546:6
verse:
. Moronnhwehwɛ wiadze 'i mu hwee 
Dɛ Wo dɔ krɔnn n' wɔ m'akomam':
Iyiara nko na m'bɔhwehwɛ
Na megyaa ndzɛmba nkaa nyinam'.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: MHB 546:34
verse:
. Kwan a m'Agyenkwa, W'anamɔn 
Hyerɛn mu n', nna m'boduam' mbrɛhoadzem';
Minnketsie na mennkɛka dɔ
Fofor bi ho asɛm dɛ Wodze n'.
 
.	Me kra a metu mahyɛ Wo nsa 'i, 
Mma enyigye huhuw nnyam' kyɛpɛn:
Woara fa, na Ewɔ ho kwan
Dɛ akoma n' nyina No Wura.
title: Antoinette Bourignon, 1616-80;

name: MHB 547:1
verse:
. ADZE a me Nyame kyir
Biara mennkɛyɛ bio,
Ewuradze, bɔ W'abɔdze bio
Yɛ me kra yi fofor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 547:2
verse:
. Me kra tse dɛ Wodze n',
Okyir adze a ho nntsew,
Na ɔsor dɔ n' atsew no ho
Ma oegyaa bɔn yɛ koraa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 547:3
verse:
. Wo nhyira mbrasɛm no,
Jesus, ma me nsa nka,
Sunsum no sor nkwa mbrasɛm no,
Kyerɛw wɔ m'akoma m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 547:4
verse:
. Dua no mo mu ma ɔndɔ,
Mma onntutu nngu da,
Na bɔn nkoasom ndan fahodzi,
Ɔdɔ mapa mbrasɛm n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 547:5
verse:
. Wo su nyɛ me mbrasɛm,
W'ahotsew krɔnkrɔn no;
Fa dɛw twe me kra enyigye m'
Mber nyina bɛn Woho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 547:6
verse:
. Me kra ne kra tsim
Ɔwo a ehyɛ ne nyina ma,
Ewuradze, hyɛ Egya Ne pɛ
Nyina ma wɔ mo mu bio.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 548:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 548:4
verse:
. Adze nyina Nyame yɛ ma ɔyɛ, 
Christ so, nyimpam' Nyame tum no,
Mo so, wɔayɛ m'fofor koraa n',
Wɔayɛ m' fofor wɔ Christ mu no,
Midzi dase n', mefi bɔn nsa n',
Adze nyina ne yɛ nnyɛ dzen mma m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 548:23
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 549:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, ma musua Wo,
Ma menyɛ ahobrɛadze koraa,
Ma me kra mbrɛ noho adze,
Ma m'enyi ntsim Wo nko do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 549:2
verse:
. Ma mingyaa me pɛ nsi nkyɛn, 
Mingyaa m'ahantan nyina,
Mingyaa moho mma Nyame,
Mfa m'adwen nto W'ananadze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 549:3
verse:
. M'ahantan nyansa nyɛ kwa,
Menyɛ botoo dɛ abofra,
Munhu adze wɔ Wo kan mu,
Mennantsew W'ahoɔdzen mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 549:4
verse:
. Ma minnya W'adom nkyerɛkyerɛ,
Nokwar na tsenenee sunsum;
Minnya nyimdze nye sor dɔ,
Nye onnyiewiei nkwa m'akoma m'.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 550:1
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ meenya 'koma a bɔn nnyim  
Dze eyi Nyame ayɛw!
Dza ɔtse Wo bɔgyaa no tum,
Bɔgya a wɔkae gui maa m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 550:23
verse:
. Akoma a ɔdwe, bɔbɔfo, 
Mo Pomfo N'ahengua,
Mbrɛ Christ n-ko na ɔkasa,
Mbrɛ Jesus nko dzi hen.
 
. Akoma brɛfo a ɔtwer Wo, 
Nokwafo a no mu tsew;
'Koma a nkwa anaa wu nntum mmpaa
Mmfi nyia ɔtsem' no ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 550:45
verse:
. Akoma a ɔasakyer koraa, 
Na Nyame dɔ ahyɛm' ma;
Odzi mu, na no mu tsew koraa,
Nyame, ɔnye Wo sɛ!
 
. Ewuradze, fa Wo suban ma m'! 
Ma me nsa nka sesei!
Kyerɛw dzin fofor n' m'akoma do,
Wo dzin a ɔyɛ Dɔ n'.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 551:1
title: Joseph Anstice, 1808-36.

name: MHB 551:2
verse:
. Ɔbra a yɛbɔ daa yi ntamu twe,
Ɔsɛɛ asomdwee awerɛfir m' daa,
Nkekam' a ɔma abagura,
O nkyɛ yeetum apow ne nyina!
Dza yɛtwer no wiadze nyina,
Dze aahyɛ Wo tum nsamu.
title: Joseph Anstice, 1808-36.

name: MHB 551:3
verse:
. Sɛ yɛkotow dze hɛn adzesoa
Gu Nyame enyim mpaabɔ mu,
Na yɛdze enyigye soɛr.
Yenyim dɛ Egya no ɔbɛn,
Ɔma akonkoran gyaa su a,
Yesuro N' ntsi obetsie hɛn.
title: Joseph Anstice, 1808-36.

name: MHB 551:4
verse:
. Nyame, ma hɛn akoma kyingyefo 'i
Nsua mfi nnoma nye nhyiren hɔ;
Na wɔmpow hɔnho koraa,
Wongyaa ndzɛmba nyina mma Egya n' pɛ,
Na wɔwɔ N'enyim ɔhaw mu n',
Wɔnsɔ asomdwee nhwɛ.
title: Joseph Anstice, 1808-36.

name: MHB 552:1
verse:
. JESUS, bɔn mpata Guambaa,
Wodze a, Wo nko Wodze nye m';
Fa mo honam, sunsum, kra,
Ne nyina yɛ Wo nko dze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 552:2
verse:
. M'ehiadze kortsee nye Wo,
Ma mentetar Wo afebɔɔ;
Ma memfa no mu dza oye,
Memfa m'akoma mma Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 552:3
verse:
. Adasa mu dansewa,
Mma me nnsan m'ekyir nkɔ bio,
Mimmfi nhyira esutsen ho,
Monnkotow enyigye bɔn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 552:4
verse:
. Mowɔ woana wɔ ase ha?
Wo nkotsee ara na minyim,
Mowɔ woana sor dɛ Wo?
Eyɛ m'adze nyinara.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 552:5
verse:
. M'akoradze nyina wɔ sor,
M'ahodze nyina nye W' dɔ;
Woana tum twa dɔ no bo?
Onnyi ewiei nnyi nhwehwɛmu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 553:1
verse:
. SIAN, Sunsum Krͻnkrͻn gya a ema nkwa!
Sian bͻhom gu m’akoma mu,
Mpata bͻgya apetse do n' mu;
Yi Woho kyerɛ mo sunsum,
Mentse Wo tum adzeyɛ nka,
Munhu dɛ Nyankopͻn awo m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 553:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 553:3
verse:
. Mma wiadze nye W’ nnkyɛ m’akoma,
Wͻmbͻ emi nye Christ mbeamudua m’.
Me kra nyina per hwehwɛ Wo;
Munwu mma wiadze mu ndzɛmba,
Nkotompn nye enyigye hun,
Wo nkotoo nyɛ m’apɛdze pa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 553:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 554:1
verse:
. SUNSUM a ema tum,
O bra bɛtsena mo mu!
Fa enyimnyam fahodzi no bra,
Fi yaw, suro nye bɔn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 554:3
verse:
. Bɔn yarba no n'aba n',
Apɔwmudzen Sunsum, yi;
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ a odzi mu Sunsum, 
Ɔdɔ Sunsum mapa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 554:4
verse:
. Ma ehurusi da n' mbra ntsɛm
Mbɛhyew mo bɔn nyina,
Da a ndzɛmba dadaw botwa mu,
Na adze nyina ayɛ fofor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 554:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, dzi m' dase
Dɛ dza meyɛ no ye,
Dɛ mbrɛ Wo pɛ nye W'asɛm kyerɛ,
Ɔyɛ W' enyisɔ koraa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 554:6
verse:
. Mennserɛ dzibew a ɔkrɔn;
Pen ebisadze yi do,
Ntsɛm anaa ekyim, Woara kyerɛ ase
Kɔ me nhyira m' afebɔɔ. Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 555:1
verse:
. AGYENKWA, ber bɛn ara na
M'begyaa moho ama Wo nwionn?
Hianyi a mennsɛ hwee enyi do,
Na ' wo bu me onyansafo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 555:2
verse:
. Wo nko na mepɛ meehu,
Minnyim wiadze yi mu hwee
Wo kan nko na ɔkyerɛ me kwan,
Wo tum nko na ɔhyɛ me dzen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 555:3
verse:
. Nkyɛ meehu Wo Sunsum No,
Ɔmfa me nyɛ dza ɔpɛ;
Sɛ minnyim ɔkwan no mpo a,
Dɛm na menye W' bɛyɛ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 555:4
verse:
. Makyerɛ m'abrabɔ mu yie,
Krɔnkrɔn no krɔn nyinara,
Ma mo sunsum nkyerɛ mbrɛ
Ahobrɛadze dɔ n' bun tse.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 556:1
verse:
. BUR pirakùr a Wo nsa atow no
Wɔ kra bɔbɔfo yi m’;
Kodu dέ ehumbɔbɔr besian,
Bɔboa m’ ma meedzi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 556:2
verse:
. Wo nkrantseѐ anofaenu ne ndam
Ɔma mutum gyina;
Medze ‘kokὸdur bɛkà dɛ
Ewùradzѐ asa me yar.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 556:3
verse:
. Muhù ahyɛdzѐ a ɔsὸ mbordὸ a
 Wɔakà ne nyina abɔ m’;
Bue m’akoma mu ma mentse
Esùmaɛm n’ ase yie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 556:4
verse:
. Nkyɛ menye W’ahotsewfo no
Aasɔ Wo suahù ahwɛ!
Ne tsentsen, ne trɛ nye no krɔn,
Na dɔ mapa no bun.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 557:1
verse:
. HƐN frɛ enyidado no nye bɛn?
Dɛ hɛn mu bɛyɛ krɔnn;
'Yi ntsi mohwɛ Jesus Noara,
Medze abotar tweɔn yi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 557:2
verse:
. Motweɔn dɛ ɔbɛtsew mo ho,
Dze nkwa tum bɛma me,
'Bɛma m' gyedzi a ɔbɔ bɔn gu,
Na ɔtsew akoma mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 557:3
verse:
. Iyi nye adom a ɔgye hɛn nkwa,
Dze kyɛ abɔnfo kwa;
Ampaara ɔbɛyɛ dɛm ama m',
Ndzebɔnyɛfo hen nye m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 557:4
verse:
. Ɔbɔpon me efi emumuyɛ
Beberee nyina mu koraa;
Mowɔ gyedzi wɔ Jesus mu,
Medze moho ma No.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 557:5
verse:
. Jesus yɛ m'akoma ne fie a,
Mo bɔn nyina bɔkɔ;
Na tsie, ɔse; Mereba ntsɛm,
Ebedzi w'akoma m' hen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 557:6
verse:
. Yɛ no dɛ mbrɛ W'asɛm no tse!
Pon me fi bɔn nyina m',
Afei m'akoma bɛgye Wo;
Bra mu, Ewuradze, bra!    Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 558:1
verse:
. ABϽN Gyefo, morotweͻn akyérɛ
De Jesus dzin nye m’ayarsa;
’Dͻ ewie n‘edwuma yɛ n’, mepɛ ahwer
Dza mowͻ, tum yɛ, na meyɛ.
W’asɛm na ͻma metse nkwa mu,
Akowaa bɛyɛ dɛ no Wura.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 558:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 558:3
verse:
. Ana ennwu ma maatséna ase?
Menntse ase mma moho bio,
Nyimpadua, ͻkra, nye sunsum,
Medze ma Wo a ’dze woho maa me n’;
Fa adzeson a edze W’bͻgyaa tͻe n’,
Bra, mo Wura nye me Nyankopͻn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 558:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 559:1
verse:
. NYAME, bɔsɔw bɔhyɛ n' ano
Dwuruw bɔn kokwaa yi gu;
Ma kra a ɔatɔ bitsi yi
Nkyerɛ Wo dɔ ne ndam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 559:2
verse:
. Mepɛ Wo bra na W' krɔnkrɔnyɛ,
Wo tsenenee mbra mo mu;
Mibisa, hwehwɛ, atwer Wo,
Ma wɔaapon m' efi bɔn m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 559:3
verse:
. Bɔ ebufuw, 'nyihaw na ntsɛn ham,
Womfi hɔ dɛm ber yi m';
Wonkogu mo Pomfo bɔgyaa a
Orubu asorɛkye n' mu!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 559:4
verse:
. Agyenkwa, me kra tsim Wo do,
Me mprempren Gyefo nye W'!
Awerɛhyɛm' enyidar nyina m',
M'bisa nhyira sesei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 559:5
verse:
. Woewiei yɛ! Ber yi, gye hɛn nkwa,
Fa nkwagye hyira hɛn;
Menya Wo bɔgyaa mu nkwagye,
'Dɔ mapa nye asomdwee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 560:1
verse:
. JESUS wui na maatsena ase
Ama Nyame nkotoo,
No mu na minya onnyiewiei nkwa;
Yɛayɛ kor sunsum mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 560:2
verse:
. Agyenkwa, meda adom 'i ho ase,
Akyɛdze a onnyi kabea!
Metserɛw gyedzi abaw m' yɛ W' ettu,
Na metse Wo dɔ nka.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 560:3
verse:
. Me kra enya pɛ dzendzen a
Ɔtweɔn sɔ nhyira no hwɛ;
M'akoma a ɔhyew ekitsa n'
Hwɛ kwan dɛ ɔbɛnan dɔ m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 560:4
verse:
. Fa Woho ma m' ma mingyaa ntuw
Nye ɔpɛ huhuw mu;
Mbrɛ metse biara nyew Wo mu,
Na fa Woho ma me.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 560:5
verse:
. W'akyɛdze no nko mmee me koraa,
Gyedɛ Woara ka ho;
W'enyim yɛ me paradize sɔnn,
Bea a ewɔ n' yɛ heaven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 561:1
verse:
. M'EWURADZE Jesus Christ N'Egya,
M'Agyenkwa nye me Tsir,
Motwer Nyia Wo tum asɛm no
Onyaan No fii ewufo m' n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 561:2
verse:
. Ama adasamba onnyiewiei nkwa,
Ne nyina wɔ Jesus mu;
Na hɔn a wɔhwehwɛ No nyina
Nya enyigye wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 561:3
verse:
. Me gyedzi wohu wɔ W' tum mu,
Na gyedzi yi fir Wo;
Efrɛ ewufo fi adakamaa m',
Wiadzi fi W'asɛm m' ba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 561:4
verse:
. Enyidado hun m' enyidar,
Nyimpa - hun, megye dzi;
Wo nkenyan asɛm hyɛ me dzen,
Edze W' Sunsum bɛma m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 561:5
verse:
. Gyedzi na anohoba no hwɛ,
No nkotoo na ɔhwɛ;
Ɔserew ndzɛmba a ne yɛ yɛ dzen,
Na ɔka dɛ otum yɛ!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 562:1
verse:
. NYAME a Wo tum, nokwar na adom,
Betsim mbersantsen, mfesantsen,
Sor na ase twa mu kɔ mpo a,
N'asɛm betsim hɔ daa nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 562:2
verse:
. N-kyɛ maabɔ W'adom dawur
Ma adasa eehu Wo nokwar n'!
Tsew W'enyimnyam dzin kɛse n' ho,
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ ndzi mu wɔ mo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 562:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 562:4
verse:
. Ma m'akoma fofor a odzi mu,
Mimfi ekyingye, suro na yaw nsa;
Ma me adwen a nna Christ wɔ n' bi,
Na mo sunsum ntakyer Wo ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 562:5
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ afei meefi bɔn nsa,
W'asɛm no aaba mu pefee,
Maahɛn anohoba ahomgye m'!
Wo dɔ a odzi mu n' ne Caanan
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 563:1
verse:
. MO Wura, megye dzi dɛ ahomgye
Wɔ hɔ ma Wo nkorɔfo;
Ahomgye a dɛw mapa dzi m' hɛn
Na Wo ho dɔ wɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 563:2
verse:
. Ahomgye a ɔyɛ hɛn kra apɛdze
Gyina sor ndzɛmba do,
Mbrɛ suro, bɔn nye yaw nyina wu,
'Dɔ mapa tu go koraa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 563:3
verse:
. O nkyɛ meehu dɛm ahomgye n',
Me gyedzi aakɔ mu!
Afei m'Agyenkwa, fa tum ma m',
Na ma mingyaa bɔn yɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 563:4
verse:
. Dza ɔyɛ dzen mfi m'akoma m',
Na ekyingye yi mfi hɔ;
Gyedzi a aka no fa ma me
Wɔ dɔ ahomgye n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 563:5
verse:
. M'bɛyɛ Wodze, Woara nyim dɛm,
Medze W' ayɛ me dze;
O m'adze pa a ɔsom mo bo,
Wo nko na mohwehwɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 563:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 564:3
verse:
. Adom do na menam 
Mesan meba Wo hɔ:
Ewuradze, to m'akoma pan
Na krɔnkrɔnyɛ nhyɛ n' ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 564:4
verse:
. Mosɔr mberɛw mu serɛ tum, 
Hyɛ W'ahendzi no ma
Ndɛ a wɔfrɛ no n-dɛ yi,
Na mennkɛyɛ bɔn bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 564:12
verse:
. Egya, megye dzi pi 
Dɛ eyɛ mbɔbɔrhufo:
'Bɛsan me kra fɔdzifo n' ho,
Na ayɛ me fofor.
 
. Dɛm a, Jesus ntsi, bra, 
Ma m'akoma mu ntsew:
Botwa mo fona nyina do,
Na ma mingyaa bɔn yɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 564:56
verse:
. Munntum nnhor m'akoma, 
Gyedɛ megye Wo dzi,
Na motweɔn Wo bɔgyaa a ɔma 
Wansayɛ krɔnkrɔn no.
 
. Meda W'asɛndua ase 'i, 
Jesus, dom me W'adom.
Fa Wo bɔgyaa a ɔhor bɔn no
Hoa m' dɛ esukwankyɛba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 565:1
verse:
. Minyim dɛ mo Pomfo tse ase, 
Na ɔsɔr ma me daa nyina;
Ɔma No dɔ ho sɛnkyerɛdze,
Eyiedzi ahobadze a.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 565:2
verse:
. Muhu N' dɛ ɔrema me tsir do, 
Ɔdze nkwagye abɛn ha,
W'enyim yɛ me dehye ampaara,
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 565:5
verse:
. Minya Nyame, meyɛ Nedze a, 
Nna menya paradise,
Mosɔ nhyira a onnyi kabea 
Na ahomgye afebɔɔ hwɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 565:34
verse:
. Ɔpɛ dɛ meyɛ hotsewnyi; 
'Bɛnadze siw Ne pɛ kwan?
N'adom pamfo a ɔwɔ mo mu n'
Ɔbɛhyɛ m' ma ampaara
 
. Jesus W'asɛm na midzi do; 
Me gyedzi nyina nye dɛ
Mo Wura, ebɛsan na agye m',
Ama Woara Woho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 566:1
verse:
. NYAME, adom nyina Pomfo,
Wo fakyɛ dɔ no hyɛ hɛn
Ma yɛma hɛn kra do ma W',
Yɛdze hɛn nyimpadua ma W';
Gye hɛn afɔrbɔdze yi fa,
Yɛdze fa Wo Ba no do,
Yɛtse ase ma Wo nkotoo,
Sɛ yewu, a yewu ma Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 566:2
verse:
. Ɔfata na ɔtsen na oye,
Dɛ yɛbɛyɛ Wo nko dze,
Wo mu nko na hɛn enyi gye,
Yɛnka Wo nhyira som ho;
Nkyɛ edwuma nye asɛm biara
Aabɔ W' papayɛ dawur;
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ nka Ewuradze. 
Wɔnkyerɛw hɛn akoma pon do! Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 567:1
verse:
. ENYIGYE mapa mu na 
Medze moho ma Wo;
Wo nkotoo Wodze koraa,
M'bɛyɛ Wo nko dze daa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 567:2
verse:
. O Nyame Ba edɔ me,
M'bɛyɛ Wo nko Wodze;
Dza mowɔ nye dza meyɛ,
Ofi ndɛ m'bɛyɛ W'dze.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 567:3
verse:
. Ewuradze Jesus, yɛ m' hen,
Yɛ m'akoma W'ahengua;
M'Agyenkwa, ɔyɛ Wodze,
'Bɛyɛ Wo nko Wodze.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 567:4
verse:
. O Jesus, bra bedzi hen,
Dzi biribiara do hen;
Ma menyɛ setsie daa daa,
Me Hen, mindzi W' nokwar.  Amen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 568:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 568:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 568:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 568:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 569:1
verse:
. Wodze daa! Ɔdɔ Nyame, 
Fi sor W'ahenguam tsie hɛn;
Yɛnyɛ Wodze afebɔɔ,
Wɔ ha na mbersantsen nyinam'.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: MHB 569:2
verse:
. Wodze daa! n-kwa Wura, 
Kora hɛn wɔ bra aperdzim';
Wo nye Nkwa n', Nokwar n' na Kwan n',
Gya hɛn kɔ kan man no mu.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: MHB 569:3
verse:
. Wodze daa! Ao, esiarfo 
Bɛn nye hɔn a wɔhom Wo mu!
Gyefo, Weɔmfo, Sor Nyɛnko,
Ao, twitwa gye hɛn kɔ ewiei!
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: MHB 569:4
verse:
. Wodze daa! Oguanhwɛfo, 
Wo nguan a wɔyɛ mberɛw;
Woara kora hɔn yie,
Fa W'ayamuyie dom hɛn nyina.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: MHB 569:5
verse:
. Wodze daa! hɛn Kwangyefo, 
Ema hɛn dza yehia nyina,
Hɛn bɔn nyina edze kyɛ hɛn,
Ewuradze, gya hɛn kɔ sor.
title: Mary Fawler Maude, 1819-1913.

name: MHB 570:1
verse:
. KRƆNKRƆN nye tsenenee Wura,
Mobɔtweɔn masɔ Wo pɛ ahwɛ;
Kaa dza W'adom asɛm no se,
Fa Wo Sunsum no hyɛ me nsew.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 570:2
verse:
. W'adom nhyɛ m' fɛr, mfa me ndɔmmum,
M'bekyir mankasa mo suban;
Tum, akɛseyɛ, ayɛyi,
Enyimnyam nka m'Ewuradze Christ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 570:3
verse:
. Ma minnya emudzi a ɔkrɔn,
Afei mma monnhwe ase hwee ho;
Mma monntɔ sin wɔ W'enyim da,
Munhu dɛ Christ yɛ adze nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 571:1
verse:
. NHYIRA nye hɔn a hɔn akὸma m’ tsew,
Woesuà abɔfo hɔn ndzeyɛɛ,
Wɔ asaase do nye sor,
Wohu Nyamé a wonnhu no,
Wɔahor hɔn ho bɔn nkekãã,
Wonya No mu fɛkuwbɔ;
Aka kùmaa wɔato hɔn Wùrà a
Ɔyɛ hɔn mfaso kɛse n'.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 571:2
verse:
. Wɔsom wɔ sunsum mu ndɛ
Kotow No N'abangua do;
Nkataenyim hyɛnhyɛn n’ enyim,
Nyame N’enyim hyérɛn dua mu.
Wɔwɔ ’nyiber, ‘wɔdwe,
Nkyérɛkyérɛ mu mbadwembafo.
Wɔhwehwɛ Kyérɛwsɛm no mu
Kodu dɛ wɔtse Ne ndze.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 571:3
verse:
. Abɔdze m’ ɔyɛ hɔndze.
. Wohyia N’ wɔ N‘abangua do;
Tsitsir wɔ N‘ahomgye mu,
Adzekyee nye ewimbir.
Wɔtwer N’ abrabɔ nyina m’.
Yaw, dadwen nà akodzi mu;
’Yinom tse dέ ewiaber fua
Gyegye wo Ne hyerɛn mu.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 571:4
verse:
. Hɔn ahomgu nyina ho tsew:
Owu, worunnhu bi da,
Wɔnye Owùra wɔ paràdisé,
Kesi wunyan da no mu.
Na wɔbɛbɛn seraphfo,
Ahotsewfo bohu No,
Egya n’ wɔ Ne Ba no mu,
Nam Sunsum no mù ayɛ kor.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 572:1
verse:
. HWƐ, emi Ewuradze N'akowaa!
Motweɔn ehu W'akwankyerɛ,
Etsie, esie W'asɛm biara,
Asɔ Wo pɛ ahwɛ na mayɛ,
Dze dɛw egyaa mara mo ndwuma,
Dze enyigye ahyɛ tsenenee nyina ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 572:2
verse:
. Emi a memmfata W'abɔdze m',
Sɛ W'adom pɛ dɛ ɔdze m' yɛ edwuma a,
Woara kyerɛ dwuma n', ber n', na yɛbea n',
Ma m'aba nyina mfir Wo mu;
Ma mindzi mo dwuma nyina Wo mu,
Na fa m' du emudzi mapa m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 572:3
verse:
. Me mberɛwyɛ nhyehyɛɛ n', sɛ oye mpo a,
Bɔ gu, sesa n' dɛ mbrɛ ehwɛ a oye,
Jesus, ma mo ndwuma nyina nyɛ W'dze!
Ewuradze, Wo ndwuma nyina dzi mu,
Na ɔsɔ Ɔwo Egya W'enyi,
Wo nko na ayɛ adze nyina yie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 572:4
verse:
. Afei medan W'adze ma Wo,
Wen Wo dɛtse pɔtɔɔ 'i mbrɛ epɛ;
Mbom ma minya Wo nsewhyɛ no, 
Ma mindzi W'asɛm biara do,
Mfa akoma na enyi kor nsom,
Ntsena ase nwu nhyɛ W' enyimnyam.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 573:1
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:2
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:3
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:4
verse:
. Soma Wo su n' ma omfi sor mbra,
Na ma ɔnyɛ m'ahyehyɛdze;
Fa nyansa, abotar na ɔdɔ fura m',
Mbrɛhoadze na ahotsew a no bo
Kyɛn sika na mbota koraa,
Na ɔhyerɛn kyɛn anapa nworaba.
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 573:5
title: Joachim Lange, 1670-1744;

name: MHB 574:1
verse:
. EGYA, Ba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa, Ebiasa kor,
Wɔnyɛ Wo pɛ asaase do,
Dɛ mbrɛ sor dɔm yɛ n' ara;
Nkorɔfo nyina nyi W' ayɛw,
Sor nye asaase enyimnyam Wura.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 574:2
verse:
. Emi m' yɛ dzebɔnyɛnyi,
Hwɛ! Megye Wo frɛ no do,
W'adom kuraba a ɔmmfata m',
Nyame adom so obiara do;
Hwɛ! Meba bɛyɛ Wo pɛ,
Midzi W'afotu nyina do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 574:3
verse:
. Hianyi, sunsuma tse dɛ emi,
Metsena ma W'enyimnyam a,
Tsew me ndzeyɛɛ nyina ho,
Gye me nsɛm na m'adwen nyina;
Fa me, fa me yɛ W'edwuma,
Dza mowɔ, metse nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 574:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 574:5
verse:
. Afei, Nyame, meyɛ W'dze,
Medze W'adze san ma Wo,
Fahodzi, mfɛfo nye dzin,
Metsew ho ma Wo nkotoo,
Metse ase ma W', m'enyi gye;
Muwu ma Wo a, enyigye nko.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 574:6
verse:
. Egya, Ba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa, Ebiasa kor,
Wɔnyɛ Wo pɛ asaase do,
Dɛ mbrɛ sor dɔm yɛ n' ara;
Nkorɔfo nyina nyi W' ayɛw,
Sor nye asaase enyimnyam Wura.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 575:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, ammpow dɛ ebɛyɛ
Nyimpa nyina akowaa na afona;
Ammfɛr dɛ edze W'ahentum n'
Bɛba abɔsom hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 575:2
verse:
. Duadwimfo n' Ba, gye m'edwuma
Tootooba a ɔnnsɛ hwee 'i;
Twe mo ndwuma a ɔmmfata 'i bata
Wodze n' ho ma ɔnsom bo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 575:3
verse:
. Ɔwo nye dza m'yɛ nyina n'ewiei,
Muhu W'nko wɔ adze nyina m';
Afei gye mo ndwuma krɔnn yi,
Midzi ma Woara nko.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 575:4
verse:
. Meka W' fasusu papa n' do
Abɛn W' adze nyina m';
Dza modwen, meka, meyɛ nyina
Yɛ afɔr kɛse kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 575:5
verse:
. Mudua haw na atseetsee mu sɔnn,
Biribiara nntwe m' ekyir;
Ha 'i me nsa dzi dwuma ma Wo,
M'akoma da ho wɔ W' nkyɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 576:1
verse:
. MA m'adwen nyina wɔ ha nyɛ dɛ
Medze suro na ɔdɔ, ndaase
M'bɔsom Ewuradze dɛ ɔba;
Mobɔpow akwan bɔn nyina,
Akyerɛ dɛm adwen mu piw yi,
Maanantsew papa n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 576:2
verse:
. Ao! Ma mimfi bɔn ho mfi ara,
Jesus, nkyɛ ama me nyansa
Na ntseasee akoma;
Ma mundua Wo Sunsum mu nhu
Mbrɛ m'bɛhyɛ W' enyimnyam wɔ ha,
Na munhu ɔsor kwan. Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 577:1
verse:
. DƆYƐFO Ewuradze, Ɔwo a dabaa rohwehwɛ
Wo nkorɔfo a wɔper ayɛ wopɛ,
Hɔn ahoɔdzen fir W', wɔka W' tum na adom kyerɛ;
Papa mu o, bɔn mu o, wonntwa W' abrɔdɔ.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 577:2
verse:
. Yɛba Wo hɔ, na mberɛw mu yɛka hɛn bɔn,
Hɛn gyedzi suar wɔ adwen, kasa na nyɛe m',
Yɛserɛ Wo, ma yenhu ampaara dɛ yenya
W'adom fakyɛ wɔ ahokyer ber mu.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 577:3
verse:
. Dwumadzi nkakraba m', Woara kenyan hɛn,
Dwumadzi akɛse m' so fa W' tum hyɛ hɛn;
Yɛsom nokwar mu a, na yenya nkwagye,
Yɛnsom W' dɛm, yendzi dɛw dɛ yɛyɛ W' pɛ.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 577:4
verse:
. Mma yɛnnyɛ akɔmpew wɔ sor nyikyerɛ no ho,
Yendzi nokwwar daa, yemmbisa akatua,
Yedzi W'ekyir 'i, ma yɛnhyɛ hɛn somdwuma ma,
Yendzi nokwar mma hɛnho na Ewuradze.  Amen.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 578:1
verse:
. Asodzi da mo do
Dɛ miyi Nyame ayɛw,
Megye me kra a onnwu da nkwa,
Na mema ɔsɛ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 578:2
verse:
. Mosom mbersantsen yi, 
Midze dwuma a wɔahyɛ m',
Ao, nkyɛ medze m'ahom nyina 
Maayɛ mo Wura Ne pɛ!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 578:3
verse:
. Fa nhwɛyie bɔ me ban 
Ma mentsena dɛ ihu m';
Na, mo Wura, siesie Wo somfo
Na meebu nkontaa pa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 578:4
verse:
. Boa m' ma monweɔn, monsɔr, 
Na montwer Wo nkotoo
Minyim dɛ mogor m'edwuma ho a,
M'bowu wu a onnyi ewiei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 579:1
verse:
. Gyefo, Ɔwo, dɔ ntsi 
Iwui maa me,
Ɔmmfata dɛ medze,
Hweeara kam Wo;
Dɔm', me kra bɔkotow W',
M'akoma edzi ne nsew do,
Na ɔabɔ afɔr bi,
Ama W' sesei.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: MHB 579:2
verse:
. Mbɔbɔr egua n' enyim 
Idzi ma me,
Jesus, me gyedzi to
N'enyi hwɛ Wo:
Boa m' ma monsoa mbeamudua n',
Mombɔ Wo dɔ n' dawur,
Montow ndwom, mbɔ mpaa bi
Mma Wo sesei.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: MHB 579:3
verse:
. Ma m' nokwar 'koma a, 
Ɔsɛ Wodze N',
Na dabiara  a otwam'
Eehu me dɛ
Mahyɛ dɔ dwuma bi ase,
Mayɛ ayamuyie bi,
Matwe kobɔnyi bi,
Medze ama W'.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: MHB 579:4
verse:
. Dza mowɔ o, mbrɛ metse o, 
W' akyɛdze kwa,
Dɛw mu o, yaw mu o, mo Wura,
Wodze nye me.
Na muhu W'enyim a,
Me kra a wɔapɔn no yi,
Mbersantsen nyina mu,
Ɔnyɛ Wodze.
title: Sylvanus Dryden Phelps, 1816-95.

name: MHB 580:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, mma mmpam m'
W'edwuma ho,
Mbom kyerɛ me W' apɛdze;
Mo so dɛm yi maayɛ biribi
Wɔ Wo kwaa tɛtɛr 'i mu;
Na mbɔsom Wo daa nyinara,
Minnkebisa akatua.
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.

name: MHB 580:2
verse:
. Pii wɔsom Wo, dodowara so
Na otwar dɛ wɔbɔsom W',
Ema binom tsɛw wenyindua,
Binom tsetsew aba n',
Wo mberantsɛ gyina akono,
Wo mbɔtoaba wɔ fie.
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.

name: MHB 580:3
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.

name: MHB 580:4
title: Thomas Toke Lynch, 1818-71.

name: MHB 581:1
verse:
. HOM Ewuradze nkowaa,
Obiara mfua n'edwuma m',
Hom a hom dzi No sor asɛm do
Nweɔn Nyame N'abow no.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 581:2
verse:
. Hom mma hom nkandzea nhyerɛn
Hom nkeka n' framee n' yie,
Hom mbɔ hom ntoa ngyina N'enyim,
Ne dzin no yɛ nwanwa.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 581:3
verse:
. Weɔn: dɛm na hɛn Wura se,
Yɛkasaa a, ɔbɛn hɛn;
Hom nhyɛ Ne nsa nsɛnkyerɛdze n' nsew,
Hom nyina nyɛ ntsɛm mpue.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 581:4
verse:
. Ɔsomfo, homkanyi
Nye onyia ɔsom dɛm!
Ɔdze dɛw bohu n'Ewuradze,
Na ɔahyɛ N'enyimnyam.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 581:5
verse:
. Christ Noara N'ahensa
Na ɔdze bɔto pon no,
Ɔama akowaa nokwafo n' tsir do,
Wɔ abɔfo dɔm no mu.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 582:1
verse:
. HƐN Egya N'adom fi Ne kan
Fadum no m' hyerɛn hyɛnhyɛnn daa;
Na hɛndze ɔdze mpoano ha
Nkandzea no ahyɛ hɛn nsa.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: MHB 582:2
verse:
. Wɔmma ase nkandzea no ndzɛw,
Mma ne hyerɛn ntra asorɛkye;
Ma aagye brɛfo bɔbɔfo bi a
Oridzi aper po do no nkwa.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: MHB 582:3
verse:
. Bɔn anago kadoo no etwa m',
Po asorɛkye bɔ dzendzen;
Pii roweɔn, rotweɔn, rohwehwɛ
Eehu mpoano nkandzea no.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: MHB 582:4
verse:
. Mo nua, ma wo kandzea no nhyerɛn,
Farnyi fonafo a ehum rutu n',
Reper hwehwɛ edu berano,
Rehara wɔ sum no mu.
title: Philip Bliss, 1836-76.

name: MHB 583:1
verse:
. IFI bɔn wiadze mpokyerɛ mu a,
Mbrɛ odua yɛ dɛw a!
M'besi akoma na adwen tadua,
Ayɛ Ewuradze akowaa;
Edze enyigye bɛyɛ edwumason
Biara a ɔbɛhyɛ wo,
'Dze ahobrɛadze bɛyɛ edwumaba
Biara a edze bɛma m'.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 583:2
verse:
. Medze ɔpɛ na enyigye
Bɔweɔn W'aponkɛse,
Mayɛ krado dɛ m'besi empire n',
Masoa dza ɔyɛ dur n';
'Nnkɛtse apranaa biara mbɔm',
'Bɛka N' do bɔkɔɔ ara;
Ɔdɔ nko na obotum akyerɛ
Ɔdɔfo N'apɛdze.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 583:3
verse:
. Ma monsom dɛm, Domfo Ewuradze,
Wo nko ara Wodze daa,
Medze me kra na honam ma W',
Ɔwoara W'atɔdze a;
Atsenka pa anaa bɔn mu a,
Menye W' bɛnantsew ara;
Nyimpadua yi m' nkwa mu o, wu mu o,
Menhyɛ Christ enyimnyam.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 583:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ dwumadzi ber wɔ som yi mu
Ɔnnkyɛr na oetwa m' kɔ a!
Ɔpon ber no ba ntsɛmara,
Ahomgye ber bɛn ntsɛm,
Na anokwafo dzi ehyia wɔ fie,
Ahomkafo ehyiadzi,
Owura Ne nkyɛn na No nkowaa
Esiarfo bɛtsena daa.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 584:1
verse:
. O JESU, kenyan m'akoma,
Fa gya krɔnn ka m'anofamfa,
Siansian abɔtoaba gyirama;
Na siesie W'adom kuraba,
Fa ayɛyi egudo ntar n' hyehyɛ m',
Mo ndwom nyina bɛyɛ ehumbɔbɔr;
Obiara a onnyim Nyankopɔn,
Hɔn a Jesu bɔgyaa atɔ hɔn,
Ehumbɔbɔr a ɔtra sor na ase;
Dɔ a no war, trɛ, no bun, no krɔn,
Obunkam kan m' esiarfo do,
Nyame dɔ a ɔnnsa ara da.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 584:2
verse:
. Fa m' hyɛ beebi a epɛ, menyɛ
W'adom n' ho nokwar dasefo,
Mindzi dza ahyehyɛ nyina do,
'Nantsew edwuma a Woara ahyehyɛ n' mu;
Ma akatua pa n' aayɛ medze,
Ɔsor tsenenee ahenkyɛw no,
Matsena ase ama Wo nko ara n',
Nkuranhyɛsɛm dɛ: Mbo-na-yɛ!
Na mentsena Wo nkyɛn wɔ sor,
Menhɛn mo Wura N'enyigye mu,
Onnyiewiei nyina minyi W' ayɛw,
Ndzi dɛw mbordo, na mondɔ Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 585:1
verse:
. Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr! 
Hom n-tow nsɛmhun ngu!
Hom mfa 'koma, adwen, ndamyɛ
Mbɔsom ahemfo Hen!
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: MHB 585:2
verse:
. Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr! 
N'ahendzi ekyim dodow;
Hom mma enuadɔ nda edzi,
Na sum nye manso nkɔ.
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: MHB 585:3
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: MHB 585:4
verse:
. Hom mma Christ mbeam'dua n'do! 
Hom ntsia N'ananɔm m;
Onyimpa Ba, hom Nua n', dzi kan:
Nyame asomfo, hom nsoɛr!
title: William Pierson Merrill, 1867-

name: MHB 586:1
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 586:2
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 586:3
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 586:4
title: Samuel Greg, 1804-87.

name: MHB 587:1
verse:
. O NDZEPA nyina Ewuradze!
Hɔn nyinara Bɔfo,
Ɔwo a ɔpɛber kɛsɛɛ ekyir n'
Etɔ nsu ma nduadzewa fifir,
Yɛbɔ Wo dzin kɛse n'.
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.

name: MHB 587:2
verse:
. Idua mbɔnsa m' nhyiren do kyerɛ hɛn
Wo sor dɔ na nokwar;
Yɛnye nsu a ɔwor, nkokwaa na
Asorɛkye weɔɔ weɔɔ nyina bɔ m'
Kamfo dɛ yɛyɛ W'dze.
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.

name: MHB 587:3
verse:
. Nnyɛ dɛ yɛyɛ W'dze nko 'siandɛ
Hɛn nkwa na ahom fir Wo;
Yɛyɛ W'dze 'siandɛ adom a ɔyɛ
Hɛn esunsum adehye n' wɔ Christ mu,
Hyɛ hɛn dzen ma nokwar n'.
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.

name: MHB 587:4
verse:
. Kan hɛn for a esiarfo no a
Wɔbɔ W' dzin ho dawur n',
Fa sor nsanku kurakura hɛn nsamu,
Na fa ɔdɔ ndwom hyɛ akoma ma,
Nyame dɔ kɛse no a.
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.

name: MHB 587:5
verse:
. Kodu dɛ yɛnye hɔn a wɔberɛe
Tsim W'ahendzi wɔ ha,
Hɔn a wɔyɛ wiadze ntɔmpamu,
Na dɔm a apon hɔn nyina,
Bɔbɔ m' epue W' fie hɔ.
title: Robert Wilfred Collin, 1886-1951.

name: MHB 588:1
verse:
. Nyan, soɛr, yɛ dɔ na edwuma, 
Nnoma asoɛr rusu,
Bɔsu atɔ egu nhaban do,
Wiadze nyina asoɛr
Rihyira, Nkwa Wura Ne Mafo
Ɔhobrɛadzefo No.
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.

name: MHB 588:2
verse:
. Bra, ma wo ndze mfora hɔn dzem', 
Ka mu bi yi N' ayɛw;
Hwɛ mbrɛ ewia a ofir tsetse,
Asoɛr rehyerɛn dzendzen!
Dɛm na ma Jesus dɔ m'bɔsɔ
Gya wɔ w' akoma mu.
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.

name: MHB 588:3
verse:
. Fa ma, fa ma, fa ma ara, 
Dza Nyame dze ama wo n';
Hwer woho mma mmbu ho nkontaa,
Enyimnyamm' ara som
Onyame a ɔmaa wiadze yi
Na dza ɔbɛba nyina.
title: Geoffrey Anketell Studdert-Kennedy, 1883-1929.

name: MHB 589:1
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 589:2
verse:
. Yɛ ara, ɔnnkɛyɛ gyam bi, 
Dza 'yew n' ha n', fa n' mfaso wɔ sor:
Nɛndze nnkamfo w', mmpɛ w', wommbu w' bi;
Owura pen wo; nyimpa nye bɛn?
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 589:3
verse:
. Yɛ ara, ber a kan wɔ do yi, 
Wiadze edwumayɛ ber resa:
Mma nnyɛ akwadwerɛ, yɛ w'edwuma ntsɛm;
Wonnsi n' dɛm twe sunsum ekyir.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 589:4
verse:
.  Sum ruku nɛndze a wɔnye W' tse, 
Dɛ wonnyi enyidar wɔ wum';
Ma gya no do, na ka n' kɛse,
Gya a ɔma mbrɛ sum wɔ yɛ kan n'.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 589:5
verse:
. Yɛ ara, mma mberɛ, weɔn na sɔr, 
Wɔdze nyansa twe kra ekyir;
Sir wiadze bra ne tsempɔn yim'
Pon akobɔfo ma wɔmbra.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 589:6
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 590:3
verse:
. Ma memfa Wo ngyina me nyimfa, 
'Wo a W'enyi tua mo mu nyina,
Na mindzi dwuma a ebɛkyerɛ m',
Muntu mo ndwuma nyina nhyɛ Wo nsa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 590:4
verse:
. Ma monsoa Wo kɔndua harhar n' 
Na ber biara mohweɔn, monsɔr,
Na monhwɛ bɛkyebo ndzɛmba,
Nyɛ ntsɛm ndu W'enyimnyam da n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 590:5
verse:
. Biribiara a W'adom dze akyɛ m' 
Ma memfa nsom Wo enyigyem',
Na memfa dɛw nsi m'empire,
Memfam Wo ho nnantsew nkɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 590:12
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo dzinm' na misim', 
Mikedzi me daa daa dwuma,
Wo nko na mesua dɛ m'bɔhwɛ W'
Wɔ dza modwen, meka, meyɛm'.
 
. Edwuma a Wo nyansaa akyerɛ n' 
Ao, ma mempra mo mu nyina nyɛ,
Munhu Wo mo ndwuma nyinam',
Na menyɛ Wo pɛ a ɔsɛ n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 591:1
verse:
. MMA nngye hɔn a wɔse sor
Kwan no yɛ trontrom n' nndzi;
Annyɛ a efintsiw kwan no mu,
Na atɔ akɔtɔmborɔnsa.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 591:2
verse:
. Noara nye kwan kor a
Wɔdze kɔ ahomka bea n';
Nyia ɔpɛ siar bea n' akɔ no
Mfa n'ahom nyina mper.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 591:3
verse:
. Mia w'akodze hyia ko n',
Tow adzesoa gyangyan gu,
Weɔn adzesaa sum kadoo mu;
Na berɛ ewia ketee.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 591:4
verse:
. Yɛ edwuma na yɛ dɔ,
Fa kyɛ, sɔw adze nyina 
Ma w'akoma do ma sor Nyame,
Wo tsibowa so nyɛ krɔnn.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 591:5
verse:
. Ma 'yi nyɛ w' botae daa,
W'enyidar, wo dɛw kor;
Wɔwasa toa w', mmbu w' bi, hyɛ w' fɛr
Mpo a, ebɛnadze mbɔ a?
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 592:1
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 592:2
verse:
. Dɛm ɔfona ber yi nnkɛyew,
Awerɛhow nda 'i mmfi hɔ;
Anago sum, ehumtu ber m',
Wo nkyɛn na mebɛba.
Abotar mu mobɔsɔw 'bra
Mu ekuturku nyina;
M'benya akokodur wɔ yaw mu,
Na krɔnnyɛ wɔ mbusu m'.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 592:3
verse:
. Sɛ edze me san ba nkwa m' bio a,
Mebɛbrɛ moho adze;
Ɔko mu mibenya nyansa
Na ahoɔdzen atwer Wo,
Sɛ owu gyina abowano a,
M'bedzi mo bɔhyɛ do;
Dza ɔbɛba mo do biara,
Ma monsom Wo sesei.
title: Anne Bronte, 1820-49.

name: MHB 593:1
verse:
. NDƆBAA n' yɛ bafuu o, mpɛpɛw o,
Adze sa, na edwuma bɔ adze;
Yedu botae n' ho o, yenndu o,
Obi nntum nsɛɛ, na obi nnyɛ n' yie.
Mbɔbɔrhufo tseneneenyi,
Yɛdze dza 'dze maa hɛn n' brɛ W';
Da mu aba kakraba n',
Yɛdze gu W'ananandze.
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 593:2
verse:
. Nyew, 'Wo Ewuradze Tsɛmbuafo,
Nyew, 'Wo krɔnkrɔnyi hoɔdzenfo,
Edze esie Wo bo mu no,
Fa Wo nsa krɔnkrɔn no sakyer
Ndzeyɛɛ na adwembɔn; ɔnyɛ
Dza omuo nyina ma ɔndan sika;
Yɛdze hɛn dɔ a ɔyɛ mberɛw 'i
Ma W', ma ɔaatsena ase Wo mu.
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 593:3
verse:
. Afei, yɛatse frɛ dɛɛdɛw 'i
Hɛn akoma bɛyɛ adom edwuma n';
Fie mframa pa na nda pa n'
Bɛkyekyer hɛn abɔ mu bio;
Mbukyia a yefii ho bae no,
Ɔdɔ gya bɛfram mu bio
Ekenyan hɛn mbofra dɔ n',
Ma yeenya kan fofor bi.
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 593:4
verse:
. Enuanom, hom a abrabɔ
Nkodzen twe hom dzi dwuma no,
Ɔma yenya no mu nhyira;
Yɛyɛ anyɛnkofo daa daa;
Ha na ekyirkyir mbew kor no,
Hɛn nkwagye woraba kor na
Ofi ahengua n' ho hyerɛn
Beebi a Ewuradze ka hɛn bɔ m'.
title: John Huntley Skrine, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 594:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, W'adom tum n'
Na medze akoma pa
Mutu moho, me nda nkaa nyina,
Dze hyɛ Wo nsa koraa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 594:2
verse:
. W'akowaa a apon me yi,
Medze Woara W'dze ma W',
'Fitsi ndɛ metse ase o, muwu o,
M'bɔsom me Nyame nko.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 595:1
verse:
. ƆDƆ kɛse Nyame,
W'adom mbordo no ntsi,
Mema akoma do ma sor ndzɛmba
Na mohwehwɛ W'enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 595:2
verse:
. Jesus Christ tseneneenyi,
Tsie m'ebisadze yi,
Na ma montwer W'ayamuyie no,
Ntsena ase nhyɛ W' enyimnyam
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 595:3
verse:
. Monhwehwɛ W'enyimnyam
Wɔ dza meka, meyɛ m';
Mundua dabaa siar dzin no do
Mombɔ m'afɔr nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 595:4
verse:
. Ma memfa m'enyi ntsim
Jesu, Wo nko Wo do;
Wonhyira Wo dzin wɔ sor na ase,
Wɔnyɛ W' apɛdze so.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 595:5
verse:
. Gyedzi Sunsum, kenyan
M'akoma a medze ahyɛ W' nsa;
Sor gya, fa krɔnkrɔnyɛ na dza
Ewɔ nyina hyɛ me ma.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 596:1
verse:
. NYAME, yɛ m' daduanyi,
Afei m'benya ahotɔ;
Hyɛ m' ma mingyaa me nkrantsee mu,
Ama meedzi konyim,
Sɛ mo nko migyina 
Ɔbra n'ehum men me,
Sɛ meda W'abaw mu dze a,
Mo ho bɛyɛ me dzen.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 596:2
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 596:3
verse:
. Me pɛ nnyɛ medze bi,
Gyedɛ eyɛ n' Wodze;
Sɛ obohu W'adom ahengua enyim a,
Ɔsɛ dɛ ogyaa nedze m';
Ogyina hɔ pintsinn,
Wɔ ɔko dzendzen mu,
Ber a ɔatwer Wo koko mu sɔnn,
Na oenya Wo mu nkwa.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 596:3
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 597:1
verse:
. ME Nyame Hen, kyerɛ m'
Munhu W' wɔ biribiara m',
Na biribiara a mebɛyɛ no,
Ɔwo na meyɛ ma W'.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 597:2
verse:
. Nyimpa a ɔhwɛ ahwehwɛ m' n',
No do na n'enyi tsim;
Anaa sɛ ɔpɛ mpo a, ohwira m',
Ma ntsi ohu heaven.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 597:3
verse:
. Obiara tum dze W' yɛ a,
Biribiara nnkɛyɛ gyan,
Dza ɔnye W' bɔ awɛ n', Wo ntsi
Ɔbɛhyerɛn na n' ho atsew.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 597:4
verse:
. Akowaa a ɔtse dɛm no
Bɛyɛ edwumadzen;
Nyia ɔpra dan m' wɔ Wo mbra ntsi n',
No dwumadzi n' dzi mu.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 597:5
verse:
. Iyi nye ɔbo a agye dzin a
Ɔdan adze nyina mfutuw n';
Dza Nyame suo m' yɛ Nedze no,
No ho wɔ mfaso pa.
title: George Herbert, 1593-1632

name: MHB 598:1
verse:
. 'GUAMBAA krɔnkrɔn, W'esuafo
Dzi Wo ho dase pa ara,
Daa hɔn enyi da Wo do,
Wobisa dɛ: Yɛnyɛ dɛn?
Wo pɛ kor a ɔhwɛ hɛn do ntsi
Yebedzi Wo nsɛm nyina do,
Na yɛbɛfa W'akwan do,
Yɛbɛnantsew dɛ mbrɛ eyɛe.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 598:2
verse:
. Ber a ipuei wɔ asaase do n',
Eyɛɛ Somfo maa Wo nkowaa;
Edween Wo sor ahenman ho,
Wo bra yɛɛ mpaabɔ nye dɔ,
Dɛm na hɛn dwumadzi nyina tse,
Gyedzi na adzeyɛ ndwuma;
Ekyerɛɛ nyimpa ɔdɔ ndwuma
Na Nyame m' nkitahodzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 598:3
verse:
. Hom mma yenkyia hɛn Agyenkwa
'Napatutu wɔ asɔrfi m';
Yɛnkɔ bepɔw n' do anafua,
Nkɛka hɛn Wura ho wɔ hɔ.
Yɛmper nnya gyedzi mfa nyɛ
Nyame N'edwuma wɔ hɔ,
Nye tum a yɛdze nya No su,
Na Wo tum a yɛdze tsena ase.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 598:4
verse:
. Yɛdze adom ho ndzɛmba
Twa hɛn enyigye mber mu,
Wɔ nkokwaa na dɔm tutuw m;
Yɛyɛ papa, yɛgye bi;
Yɛdze dɛw bɔ mpaa, yɛ edwuma
Kɛpem dɛ hɛn bra bɔ adze,
Kɛpem dɛ dua krɔnkrɔn n' ho
Yebowu dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo wui n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 599:1
verse:
. DUA W'aba n' anapa,
Yɛ ntsɛm ewimbir no;
Mma mma suro na ekyingye kwan,
Bɔ n' dawur wɔ mbea nyina.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:2
verse:
. Dua n' wɔ esu nkyɛnkyɛn,
Kwantsempɔn ho nsaase m';
Gu no wɔ nsoɛ na ndzɛmbir mu,
Petse no botan do.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:4
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:5
verse:
. Ennkɛberɛ egu kwa da;
Awɔw, 'hyew, nsu na ewia
Bɔbɔ m' ma aba n' eedzi mu
Ama sor edwumayɛfo n'.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 599:6
verse:
. Ber a Nyame N'enyimnyam
Da no bodu hɔ no,
Abɔfo edwumafo n' besian,
Sor bɛtsea m': Buber fie.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 600:1
verse:
. Ao, mo Wura, ma menye W' nnantsew 
Som dwumadzi mbrɛadze kwan mu;
Kyerɛ m' W'esumasɛm, boa m' ma monsɔw,
Dwumadzi ne yaw, dadwen no dur;
Boa me ma memfa dɔ kasa
Mpuhim akoma nyaanyaa bi:
Kyerɛ me ma mingya akobɔfo,
Memfa hɔn nsi sor kwan no mu.
title: Washington Gladden, 1836-1918.

name: MHB 600:2
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' W'abotar; ma menda ho 
Ntsena Wo fɛkuwbɔ dɛɛdɛwm',
Dwumadzi a ɔhyɛ gyedzi dzen,
Awerɛhyɛm' a odzi bɔn do,
Enyidar a ɔtow nserɛmɛn
Dze hyerɛn nda a ɔreba kwan mu,
Asomdwee a Wo nko ara dze ma,
Mo Wura, ma menye Wo nnantsew mu. 
                                               Amen.
title: Washington Gladden, 1836-1918.

name: MHB 601:1
title: Henry van Dyke, 1852-1933.

name: MHB 601:2
verse:
. Bea a dɔm yɛ edwuma bɔ mu n'
Na mowɔ mo nkorɔfo mu;
Bea a odwumayɛfo aberɛ ada n',
Na menye no nko wɔ hɔ.
Emi Asomdwee a ɔtra nyimdzee n',
Meka hom ho wɔ nkodzen m',
Emi nye ɔsor Paanoo a
Wɔdze M' ma nkwa sakramɛnt.
title: Henry van Dyke, 1852-1933.

name: MHB 601:3
title: Henry van Dyke, 1852-1933.

name: MHB 602:1
verse:
. M'egya, minyim me bra nyina 
Akyekyɛm' ama me,
Na nsakyer a otwar dɛ ɔba n'
Munnsuro dɛ m'bohu;
Dza meserɛ nye adwendahɔ a
Ɔper sɔ W'enyi daa.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 602:2
verse:
. Meserɛ Wo adwendwen ɔdɔ a 
Ɔyɛ aweɔn ho nyansa,
Dze ma ahomkafo enyigye,
Pata nyinsuwakyifo;
Ɔnye 'koma a ɔpow noho
Na ɔtse ma binom so.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 602:3
verse:
. Monnhwehwɛ ɔpɛ ɔnnda hɔ komm, 
Odzi akɔnaaba,
Ɔhwehwɛ akɛsedze ɔayɛ
Na oehu esumasɛm;
Mepɛ dɛ meyɛ abɔtoaba a
Woara gye me taataa.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 602:4
verse:
. Wiadze mu mbrɛ m'bɛfa biara, 
No mu dzibew biara,
Menye nkorɔfo edzi nkitaho a
Meper ara ma oeenyin,
Na medze ahobrɛadze nye dɔ
Mayɛ Mo Wura edwuma.
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 602:5
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 602:6
title: Anna Laetitia Waring, 1820-1910

name: MHB 603:1
verse:
. JESUS, ma W'adɔfo nyina nhyerɛn 
Wɔnhyerɛn fɛɛfɛw dɛ ewia,
Wɔmfa Nyame ewia nserɛmɛn
Ntu hɔn enyimnyam kwan n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 603:2
verse:
. Beebiara mbrɛ nyimpa wɔ no
Wɔmma hɔ nyina nhyerɛn;
Na ɔsor ahoɔdzen nyina
Nkata ase ha nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 603:3
verse:
. Dɛm tsenenee ewia hyɛnhyɛn no,
Ntserɛw hɔn 'yarsa ntsaban m'
Na hɔn enyim hyerɛn ntahye
Nkodu emudzi da n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 604:1
verse:
. O EWURADZE, me Nyankopɔn,
Fa ayɛyi hyɛ m' bra ma,
Ama me nyimpa-mu aakyerɛ
Wo subea nye W'akwan.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 604:2
verse:
. Nnyɛ m'anofamfa ara nko bi,
Na nnyɛ m'akoma nko,
Na mbom, mibisa abrabɔ bi a
Ayɛyi ahyɛ mu ma.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 604:3
verse:
. Ntonton wɔ adze biara mu,
No kɔsu, ne basu,
Dwumadzi na ndzeyɛɛ suar dɛn mpo a,
'Twar dɛ yeyi W'ayɛw.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 604:4
verse:
. Fa ayɛyi hyɛ mo mu nyina,
Me nyimpadua nkasa
Mfa Wo dɔ na Wo ho, mo Wura,
Kaansa mennsɛ bi mpo a.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 604:5
verse:
. Mo Wura, ama mo so dɛm yi
Maahyɛ Wo enyimnyam;
Na dɛm na m'bɛhyɛ ase wɔ ha
Matow W'ayɛyi ndwom n'.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 604:6
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi adzekyee na adzesaa nyina
'Twar dɛ meyɛ krɔnkrɔn,
Ama manamɔntu biara m'
Menye W' abɔ fɛkuw.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 605:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 605:2
verse:
