. Ma monnom W’ mma nsukͻm nndze m’ bio,
Enyigyé a ͻkye ho nsu no a;
O nkwa nsu, pem bra wͻ sor ntum m’,
Wͻ esutsen a ͻyɛ daa asomdwee m,’
Wͻ dɛw a obiara nnkotum agye m’,
Wͻ ͻbra a obetsim afebͻͻ m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 605:3
verse:
. Egya hue adorn gu mo do
No ma mindzi bem wͻ W‘enyim,
Bea a 'humbͻbͻr ’sutsen fi pem,
Ehumbͻbͻr, W'apɛdze pa n’,
Jesus dzin mu ntsi fa ma me
Na dua Wo su wͻ m‘akoma m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 605:4
verse:
. Mo nkwa nda nyina m' munhu W’adwen.
Bér a metsé abͻbͻfo hͻn su,
Ekunafo, ngyanka, hͻn nkrumsi.
Mutu ehumbͻbͻfo ntsaban do
Kɛgye ehiafo na abͻbͻfo.
Dze mo nkwa, m’adze nyina ma hͻn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 605:5
verse:
. Dɛm na m‘bɛkyérɛ sunsum a ͻwͻ m’ mu.
Ͻtsew mo ho fi bͻn ho koraa.
Wonnhu no wͻ bͻn wiadze yi m’.
Otsim me gyedzi ne nyansaa;
Ͻma m' som no nokwar da edzi
Wͻ ahosan pa na ͻdͻ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 606:1
verse:
. Hom a hom enyi tsim 
Zion kwan do, hom mbra,
Wɔmma yɛnyɛ kor nyi
Hɛn Wura No ayɛw;
Wɔmma yentu ntsen Jesus mu
Nkɛpem dɛ yebopue N'enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 606:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 606:23
verse:
. Mber nyina yɛda ho 
Tow kɔ hɛn man no ho,
Kɔ sor kokwaa no ho
Kwantunyi fonafo fie;
Sor Jerusalem fofor no
Ɔdomankoma dɔ fie no.
 
. Ma daa nyina yennya 
Gyedzi ho asomdwee,
Dɛ woeyi hɛn efi
Bɔn, wiadze, wu, na hɛllm';
Hɛn yɛbɔkɔ hɛn Egya fie,
Hɔ yeekehyia hɛn Nua panyin n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 607:1
verse:
. Bethel Nyame, 'Wo a Wo nkorɔfo 
Dan Wo na wonya dzi;
Ɔwò a igyaa tsetse mpanyin
Hɔn akwantu nyinam'.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 607:5
verse:
. Dɛm n-hyira na yɛserɛ 
Fi W'adom n-samu;
Yɛdze Wo yɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn
Na kyɛpɛn afebɔɔ.  Amen.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 607:234
verse:
. Yɛdze nsewdzi na mpaabɔ ba 
W'adom ahengua enyim;
Hɛn egyaam Nyame, yɛserɛ Wo, yɛ
Hɔn mba so hɛn Nyame.
 
. Ɔbra n'akwan nyinara mu 
Gye hɛn anamɔn taataa;
Ma hɛn hɛn daadaa edziban
Na hɛn efuradze so.
 
. O trɛ W'atsaban wɔ hɛn do 
Kɔ hɛn akwantu ewiei,
Na hɛn akra eetum edu
Hɛn Egya fie asomdweem'.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 608:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 608:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 609:1
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.

name: MHB 609:2
verse:
. Yɛyɛ Wodze, fa hɛn nyɛnko,
Yɛ hɛn kwan mu Kwankyerɛfo;
Kora Wo nguankuw, gye hɛn fi bɔn m',
Sɛ yɛfom kwan a, hwehwɛ hɛn:
Jesus Siarfo,
Yɛkamfo W', sɔr Wo a, tsie hɛn.
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.

name: MHB 609:3
verse:
. Abɔ anohoba a 'bɛgye hɛn,
Yɛyɛ abɔn na abɔbɔfo a
'Wɔ ehumbɔbɔr a edze gye hɛn
Na adom a ɔtsew hɛn ho;
Jesus Siarfo,
Ma yɛnyɛ ntsɛm mbra Wo hɔ.
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.

name: MHB 609:4
title: Dorothy Ann Trupp : Hymns for the Young, 1836.

name: MHB 610:3
verse:
. Yennyi mantsimadze wɔ ha,
Yɛhwɛ kurow a wonnhu no kwan;
Yɛhom do nantsew kɔ noho,
Yereper yeedu kan mbew no do,k
Jerusalem kurow krɔnkrɔn a ɔ
Tsease Nyame ɔkyekyeree n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 610:4
verse:
. Yɛdze abotar tu empire n', 
Yegya fona wiadze 'i ekyir:
Fi ahoɔdzenm' kɔ ahoɔdzenm',
Hwehwɛ Jerusalem fofor n';
Hɛn mbɔdzembɔ nyina nye dɛ,
Yenya Jerusalem fofor n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 610:5
verse:
. 'Wo a asoa hɛn bɔn nyina kɔ, 
Na adom hɛn bɔnfakyɛ kwa,
Yɛnam Wo do kɔ hɛn sor fie,
Yɛdze adwontow yɛsan Zion;
Hɛn 'nyimnyam Hen N'ahenkurow no,
Yɛrotow ndwom nna ɔrebɛn hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 610:6
verse:
. Nyame dɔ ne mfar ma hɛn do
Nu hɛn ahoɔdzen mu kɔ kan
Yɛrokɔ Nyame bepɔw n' do
Yɛakɔdɔm mbakan Asɔr no,
Yɛdze dɛw bɛyɛ abɔtsir
Yeekehyia hɛn Sahen wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 610:12
verse:
. Agyedzifo hɔn Kwankyerɛfo a  
lgya sor akwantufo kwan,
Bra na enye hɛn so mbɛtsena,
Yɛpɛ yɛatwer Wo nkotonoo,
Dze hɛn sunsum adan Wo nko
Ber a yɛnam ɔbra kwan mu.
 
. Ahɔho nye amamforafo, 
Wiadze ha ɔnnyɛ hɛn tsenabew;
Na yetwa mbusu bɔnsa yim',
Yɛper dɛ yebohu W'enyim,
Yɛpɛ ntsɛm yeedu hɛn kurom',
Hɛn domakoma fie wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 611:1
verse:
. Gya hɛn, ɔsor Egya, gya hɛn 
Wɔ wiadze po pramee do,
Gya hɛn, weɔn hɛn, kora hɛn, nyɛn hɛn,
Yennyi boafo dɛ Wo nko,
Naaso yɛwɔ nhyira nyinak
Sɛ Nyame ne hɛn Egya a.
title: James Edmeston

name: MHB 611:2
title: James Edmeston

name: MHB 611:3
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame Sunsum a 'risian, 
Fa sor dɛw hyɛ 'koma ma,
Na yɛmfa ɔdɔ mbɔ dɔ mu,
Wɔ enyigye a ɔnnsɛɛ dam',
Edom, dze kyɛ, weɔn hɛn yi dze,
Hwere rennsɛɛ hɛn asomdwee.
title: James Edmeston

name: MHB 612:3
verse:
. Wo tum ehyira me dze, ɔbɛda ho 
Egya m' akɔ
Atra sar, abo na nsu, 'kɛpem dɛ
Sum yi bɛpa;
Na adze kye a, adɔfo a mayew hɔn n'
M'bohu hɔn bio dɛ wɔreserew kyerɛ m'.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 612:12
verse:
. Gya m', Kan dɔyɛfo wɔ sum a etwa ehyia yim' 
Gya m' ara kɔ!
'Nago n' yɛ sum, menye fie ntam' so war;
Gya m' ara kɔ!
Weɔn m'anamɔn, mimmbisa dɛ munhu
Mbrɛ kan hɔ tse, namɔn kor ara ma m'.
 
. Nkyɛ menntse dɛm, monnsɔɔr pɛn dɛ Woara 
Gya m' ara kɔ.
Nkyɛ mefa mo kwan, na muhum', afei
Woara gya m' ara kɔ!
Modɔɔ apɔmpɔmpɛ, na musuro mpo a,
Ntsɛn hyɛɛ me ma, mma nnkaa mfe a-etwam' kɔ.
title: John Henry Newman, 1801-90.

name: MHB 613:1
title: William Henry Burleigh

name: MHB 613:2
verse:
. O Egya, gya hɛn wɔ nokwar akwan m';
Ammboa hɛn a, yɛtotɔ mfom abaw m',
Akɔndɔ na nsɛmfun sɛɛ hɛn mbabun,
Mpanyinyɛ a gyedzi na enyidar nnyi m' ba.
title: William Henry Burleigh

name: MHB 613:3
title: William Henry Burleigh

name: MHB 613:4
verse:
. O Egya, gya hɛn kɔ sor ahomgye m',
Mbrɛ kwan n' bun na ne tantan tse biara,
Dɛw anaa yaw mu, dɛ mbrɛ ehwɛ a oye;
Kɛpem dɛ hɛn bra bedzi mu Wo mu.   Amen.
title: William Henry Burleigh

name: MHB 614:1
verse:
. SOR Egya, Ɔwo na edze hɛn
Aba ndɛ da yi mu sɔnn;
Ekyerɛ hɛn anamɔn kwan berɛww,
Ehwɛ hɛn do wɔ hɛn kwan m'.
Ɔbra m' Damfo na Kwankyerɛfo,
Yɛdze ndaase akoma brɛ W';
Sɛ nnyɛ Wo dɔ a ɔnnsakyer no a,
Nkyɛ yebesi dɛn akamfo W'?
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.

name: MHB 614:2
verse:
. Mbɔrbɔrhu bi a ɔnnkɛpa da
Hyerɛn yie wɔ dza etwa m' mu,
Nhwɛdo mapa na ayamuyie 'dɔ
Bɛn hɛn fi ahyɛse kɔ ewiei,
Ɔdɔ na ntwitwagye mapa 
Wɔ hɛn nkyɛn daa daa nyina;
Nhyira a ɔdɔɔ so a yenntum nnkan
Dze kan hyɛnn ba hɛn kwan mu.
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.

name: MHB 614:3
verse:
. Isum kebii aba hɛn kwan mu,
Hɛn ho apopo wɔ ehum n' mu;
Mununkum etwa hɛn ho ehyia sunkamm
Ma yennhu Wo su mbrɛ ɔtse:
Naaso Wo dɔ n' nngyaa hɛn hɔ dɛ 
Ankonam wɔ hɛn yaw m' da,
Na mboa a obiara dze maa n' nkyɛnko n'
Yɛ ahoɔdzen a ofir Egya W' nkyɛn
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.

name: MHB 614:4
verse:
. Nkorɔfo a yɛdɔɔ hɔn kɔ gya hɛn,
Edzi kan wɔ akwantu ewiei;
Wɔrotweɔn ama hɛn akɔaba,
'Nuanom, mba na ndamfo so.
Sɛ ewiei hɛn akwantu n' bɔ adze
Na yɛyew fi enyi do a,
Egya, fa hɛn dua sum kebii m'
Nye hɛn nkɔ onnyiewiei kan mu.  Amen.
title: Hester Periam Hawkins, 1885.

name: MHB 615:3
verse:
. Na mudu Jordan nkɔnkɔnoa a, 
Bɔ mo suro ham ma ɔnhera;
Wu no kumfo, hɛll ne sɛɛfo,
Fa me kodu Canaan sɔnn.
Ayɛyindwom
Na medze m'bɛma Wo daa.
title: William Williams, 1717-91.

name: MHB 615:12
title: William Williams, 1717-91.

name: MHB 616:1
verse:
. EKYINGYE na awerɛhow anafua m',
Kwantufo kuw no pem do,
Wɔtow enyidar ndwom ahorow
Dze kɔ bɔhyɛ asaase do.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:2
verse:
. Yehu kan a ɔkyerɛ hɛn kwan no
Wɔ hɛn enyim anafuasum m';
Onua suo no nua ne nsamu
'Kododur m' dua sum no mu.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:3
verse:
. Nyame N' kan wɔ hɛn ho yɛ kor,
Ɔhyerɛn wɔ No nkorɔfo do;
Ɔpam sum na suro kɔ ekyir,
Ɔhyerɛn wɔ hɛn kwan mu.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:4
verse:
. Hɛn akwantu botae yɛ kor,
Hɛn gyedzi a ɔmmbɔ adze yɛ kor,
Dza hɛn enyi da kwan yɛ kor,
'Nyidar kor a ofir Nyame.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:5
verse:
. M-pempem hɔn ntseamu n' yɛ kor
Dɛ mbrɛ ofi akoma kor mu;
Aperdzi kor na mbusu kor,
Nyame m' nserabɔ kor hyɛ ase.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:6
verse:
. Ekyirkyir onnyiewiei mpoano
No mu dɛw na osebɔ kor,
Hɔ na Egya tumfo kor no
Dzi hen wɔ dɔ m' afebɔɔ.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:7
verse:
. Hom nkɔ do, 'nuanom akwantufo,
Hom mfa mbeamudua no nduom!
Mma hom mmfɛr, hom nko ɔko no
Nkɛpem dɛ yɛbɔhom nwin m'.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 616:8
verse:
. Ɔnnkɛkyɛr, wɔsoɛr da n' bɛba
Na woebuebue ndakamaa;
Afei sunsum nyina bɔhwetse,
Ɔberɛ na sum bɔbɔ adze.
title: Bernhardt Severin Ingemann, 1789-1862.

name: MHB 617:1
verse:
. HƐN frankaa kan hyerɛn,
Na ɔkyerɛ sor,
'Nyam ma Christ nsordaafo
Dze kɔ hɔn sor fie.
Yɛdze enyigye bɔ mpaa
Bɔ nsera wɔ sar n' do.
Yɛdze akoma kor
Tow ndwom wɔ hɛn kwan m'.
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.

name: MHB 617:2
verse:
. HƐN frankaa kan hyerɛn,
Na ɔkyerɛ sor,
'Nyam ma Christ nsordaafo
Dze kɔ hɔn sor fie.
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.

name: MHB 617:3
verse:
. Jesus, Ewuradze,
W'ananadze ha
Wo mba a woridzi dɛw
Etwa ehyia ha.
Mpɛn pii na yeefi W' nkyɛn
Na yɛatɔ dɔnsuar;
Kora hɛn, Agyenkwa tumfo,
Wɔ kwan tseabaa n' mu.
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.

name: MHB 617:4
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.

name: MHB 617:5
verse:
. Yɛnye ahotsewfo na
Abɔfo mbɔ m' wɔ sor,
Mbɔ mpaa nyi Wo ayɛw
Wo dɔ ahengua n' ho;
Ber a nserabɔ n' abɔ adze,
'Homgye na asomdwee m',
Jesus wɔ N'ahoɔfɛw m';
Nyɛ ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze
title: Thomas Joseph Potter, 1827-73.

name: MHB 618:1
verse:
. ENYIGYE akwantufo kuw,
Sɛ hom bɔkɔ hom enyim a,
Hom mfa Jesus ndzi hom kan,
Mma Jesus nyɛ hom Tsir.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 618:2
verse:
. Sɛ hom fona ma nkorɔfo dɛ
Jesus a, hom dzi dɛw;
Sɛ kɔm dze hom dɛ Jesu a,
Ɔno hom so dzi dɛw.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 618:3
verse:
. Mbeamudua a Jesus soae no,
Hom ara ntsi na ɔsoae;
Ahenkyɛw a Jesus soae no,
Hom ara ntsi na ɔsoae.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 618:4
verse:
. Gyedzi a hom dze hu No n',
Enyidar a hom dze per n',
Ɔdɔ a ɔhaw dan hwɛ No nko n'
Bɛsan akɔ No nko hɔ.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 618:5
verse:
. Nkodzen a ɔhaw hom adwen,
Awerɛhow a hom dzi no,
Nsɔhwɛ beberee a hom kɔ mu n',
'Wu nko na otum twa do.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 618:6
verse:
. Ebɛnadze na ɔsom bo dɛ
N'egudze a ɔwɔ sor hɔ n'?
Ebɛnadze na ɔkyɛn
Atwer a wɔfow kɔ sor?
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 618:7
verse:
. Enyigye akwantufo kuw,
Hom mma hom enyi do sor,
Hɔ na hom haw kakra yi
Bɛma hom dza ɔsom bo.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 619:1
title: Henry Alford, 1810-71

name: MHB 619:2
verse:
. Enyimnyam mbordo koraa
Na Nyame esiesie,
Da kor ɔdze bɛma
Akra a wɔdɔɔ No n';
Enyi nnhun hɔn pɛn mpo,
Asowa nntsee da,
Wɔnnkaa hɔn ho asɛm,
Wɔnndween hɔn ho so,
Hom nduom, hom nkɔ hom enyim!
Hom nhyɛ akontar hyɛnn
Nkɛpem dɛ woyi enyim a
Yehu hɛn gyedzi.
title: Henry Alford, 1810-71

name: MHB 619:3
verse:
. Borɔ ekyirkyir noho
Kuropɔn abantsen pue
Mbrɛ hɛn Nyame tse no;
Fie fɛɛfɛw n' hɛndze a;
Nhwehwɛ mbobow ara nko,
Sika hyerɛn n'abrɔn m',
Ahomka esutsen pem
Dze dɛw a wɔnnka ba.
Hom nduom, hom nkɔ hom enyim!
Wɔ Sunsum No tum m';
Akwantufo, hom nkɔ
Hom kan man no mu.
title: Henry Alford, 1810-71

name: MHB 620:1
verse:
. NYIA ɔpɛ akokodur n',
Ɔmbra enyim mbɔhwɛ;
Onyia no begyina daa,
Ehum na aahow mbra;
Abagura bi nnyi hɔ a
Ɔbɛma oeegyaa sua,
No suakan dɛ ɔbɛyɛ
Ɔkwantunyi no.
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.

name: MHB 620:2
verse:
. Hɔn a wɔkeka nsɛmbɔn
Twa no ho aprɔw n',
Wogu hɔn enyim ase,
N'ahoɔdzen mu piw,;
Gyata bi nnkopuw no,
Ɔnye ɔkraban bɔko,
Na obenya ndzinoa dɛ
Ɔyɛ kwantunyi.
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.

name: MHB 620:3
verse:
. Sunsum bɔn bi nnyi hɔ a
Obogura n'abaw;
Onyim dɛ ewiei no
Obenya daa nkwa.
Nsusuhum nyina boguan;
Onnkosuro dza wɔka
Ɔbɛyɛ edwuma ber nyina
Ayɛ kwantunyi.
title: John Bunyan, 1628-88.

name: MHB 621:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 621:2
verse:
. Jesus dɔ nà ɔweɔn Nedze,
Ɔnyεn m’ ’dzidzflaea pa do,
Ɔma me da famu dzinn,
Ogya m’ kɔ abodwee nsu ho:
Menye No kɔ beebiara a,
M’akoma mu dεw bu do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 621:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 621:4
verse:
. Nyame dɔ bεda ho efua m’,
Ɔda bohwε m’ do akɔ ewiei;
M’enyigye nda nyinara
Mibedzi no W’asɔrfi m’,
Kεpem dε m’botù aba W’ fie,
Wo sor fie a ɔwɔ hɔ daa!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 622:1
title: Jane Euphemia Saxby, 1811-98.

name: MHB 622:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, munnhu adze,
Yɛ kan ma me;
Fua no tu m'akoma,
Munnhu adze:
Suo me nsamu na ma mindzi Wo nkyɛn,
Mma mo nko monnkɔ, yɛ me Kwangyafo.
title: Jane Euphemia Saxby, 1811-98.

name: MHB 622:3
title: Jane Euphemia Saxby, 1811-98.

name: MHB 623:1
verse:
. MENYE annda dɛ ebɛba abɛfa
M'akoma bɔbɔfo 'i ayɛ Wo fie,
Dɛ Ɔwo ahemfo Hen bɛba abɔsoɛ
Mo mu edzi bɛyɛ dɔnhwer kor mpo;
Naaso ewɔ ha daa dɛ ibehyira m',
Aboa m' na eyi mo bɛn adzesoa n'.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 623:2
verse:
. M'enyi annda dɛ m'benya W' Kwankyerɛfo,
Ma aagye m' taataa, atsentsen m'anamɔn;
Sɛ mohwe ase a, suo mo mu, motɔ gon a,
Gya m' nkakrankakra kɔ kwan pa no mu.
Naaso ewɔ me nkyɛn aber biara,
Eyɛ me Pamfo na Werɛkyekyefo.
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 623:3
title: Edwin Hatch, 1835-89.

name: MHB 624:1
verse:
. JESUS, dzi hɛn kan,
Ma yennya ahomgye,
Na kwan no nnyɛ enyigye mpo a,
Yɛbɛka W' do berɛww a yennsuro;
Fa Wo nsa gya hɛn
Kɔ hɛn Egya fie.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;

name: MHB 624:2
verse:
.  Sɛ kwan yɛ hu dɛn,
Sɛ atamfo bɛn a,
Mma suro gyangyan bi mmen hɛn,
Mma ɔdɔ na enyidar mmbɔ hɛn;
Yɛnam atamfo m'
Kɔ hɛn efiefi.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;

name: MHB 624:3
verse:
. Ber a yɛper ahotɔ
Fi yaw dzendzen mu,
Ber a nsɔhwɛ fofor hyɛ hɛn do n',
Owura, ma hɛn abotar ndzi mu,
Kyerɛ hɛn bea hyɛnhyɛnn a
Yennsu wɔ hɔn bio n'.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;

name: MHB 624:4
verse:
. Ber a 'saase na wimu
Yew hɛn enyi do n',
Ber a yɛnam 'wu m' hwɛ heaven kwan
Na wɔdze hɛn bɔn nyina akyɛ hɛn, 
Fi Wo kan man n' mu
Frɛ hɛn Nyame fie.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;

name: MHB 624:5
verse:
. Jesus, dzi hɛn kan,
Ma yennya ahotɔ;
Sor Kandzifo, kɔ do gya hɛn,
Wowaw, weɔn hɛn, kyekye hɛn werɛ, 
Kɛpem dɛ hɛn nyina
Bodu hɛn Egya fie.  Amen.
title: Nicolaus Ludwig von Zinzendorf, 1700-60;

name: MHB 625:1
verse:
. MEMA m'enyi do hwɛ mbepɔw n',
Hɔ na mo mboa fi ba;
Me bambɔ fi Ewuradze hɔ ba,
Ɔno a ɔbɔɔ sor na ase.
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.

name: MHB 625:2
verse:
. Ɔremma w'anan mm-patser,
Na ɔronntɔ nkom so:
Hwɛ, Nyia ɔhwɛ Israel do no,
Ɔnntɔ nkom, na ɔnnda.
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.

name: MHB 625:3
verse:
. Ewuradze nkora w' No nwin ase,
Ongyina w'abanyimfa;
Bosoom nnkɛsɛɛ wo anafua,
Ewia nnsɛɛ w' adzekyee.
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.

name: MHB 625:4
verse:
. Ewuradze bɔkora wo kra do,
Ɔbɔhwɛ wo yar ber m';
Ɔdzekɔ 'i w'edzifir na mbae
Nyame bɔhwɛ afebɔɔ.  Amen.
title: Scottish Psalter, 1750.

name: MHB 626:1
verse:
. MOROHWEHWƐ nyamesuro
Nhyehyɛɛ bi wɔ mo mu,
Ɔnye bɔn ho adwendahɔ a
Ɔma metse ne yaw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 626:2
verse:
. Mepɛ kwan a m'bɛfa do metu
N-tuw na akɔndɔbɔn,
Medze esiw 'kwankwambɔ pɛ kwan,
Medze bodum bɔn gya.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 626:3
verse:
. Dɛ monnkɔtɔ dɔnsuar mmfi W' hɔ n',
Mennka W'ayamuyie fi n',
Ma m' etsidaa wansawansa
Na enyidahɔ akoma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 626:4
verse:
. Nyame, ma m'adwendahɔ nyɛ
Dza obiara enyi gye ho;
Na nyan me kra, ber a bɔn abɛn,
N'enyi do ntsetsew no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 626:5
verse:
. O nkyɛ me kra a wɔatsetse n' yie 'i
Eehu dza ofura adwen,
Ɔaatwe m' akɔ bɔgya no ho,
Bɔgya a ɔma ahosan.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 627:1
verse:
. MBRƐ adom ba a enyi si gye
Wɔ no bɔnfakyɛ ho a!
Osu dɛ: Me fie nnyi ase ha,
Meper me fier wɔ sor!
Ɔman a nyimpa enyi nnhu,
O menam gyedzi m' hu;
'Homgye man, 'hotsewfo enyigye,
Heaven a woesiesie ama m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 627:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 627:3
verse:
. Jerusalem a ɔwɔ sor hɔ n',
Menam adwontow m' kɔ hɔ;
Metse ase yi, m'enyidar, dɔ,
M'akoma, kra, wɔ hɔ.
M'Agyenkwa a wɔakrɔn N' gyina hɔ,
Sɔfo mbɔbɔrhufo,
Ɔda ho tsen N'epir nsa n'
Twe me kɔ No bomu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 627:4
verse:
. O hɛn enyidar yɛ nhyira dɛ!
Ber a yɛwɔ asaase 'i do,
Ɔkyɛn dɛ yɛka sor tum hwɛ,
Na yɛtwe dɛm da n' bɛn;
Yɛtse dɛ wusoɛr na abɛn,
Hɛn bra hyɛ Christ No mu,
N'enyimnyam fɛɛfɛw a ɔwɔ ase ha n'
Hyɛ hɛn nyimpadua ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 628:1
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 628:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 629:1
verse:
. DZA Nyame nyansafo pɛ ayɛ,
Ɔbɛma, anaa ɔnnkɛma,
Na onyim m'ehiadze nyina yie
Sen dza me mpaabɔ ka.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 629:2
verse:
. Dem nhyira a memmfata yi
Ahyɛ mo mfom kwan n' nsew;
Na beebiara a matɔ dɔnsuar n',
Ne ntsea san me ekyir.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 629:3
verse:
. Dem ɔdɔ mu ndzepa piigyan n',
Ntseasee wɔ mu koraa;
Okenyan mber ɔnye adwen
Wɔ eyiedzi dɛɛdɛw m'.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 629:4
verse:
. Owu yɛ dɛ kwan bi a oesiw,
Na obue kɔ kan mu,
Na ɔba onyifurafo biara
Nntɔ gon mmfi Egya enyim.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 629:5
verse:
. Afei 'hwɛyie na nkodzen ba,
Nam witɔree m' nkaakaa
Dɛ mbrɛ wohu mbepɔw wɔ ekyir
Ber a wɔatra edu bea pa.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 629:6
verse:
. Abrabɔ mu dede nyina
Bɔ mu yie wɔ ndwom mu,
Na abrabɔ aperdzi bea nyina
Yɛ berɛww taa dzin koraa.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 629:7
verse:
. Afei sunsum hyɛ ase pa,
Ma anee mframa so bɔ;
Na mubue m'akoma nyina
Mu dze ma dɛm da no.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 630:1
verse:
. O MA hɛn kan, ama yeehu
Nyansa a Wo nko tum dze ma no;
Ama nokwar aakyerɛ hɛn kwan,
Na nhyira aaba beebi a yɛbɛtsena.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 630:2
verse:
. O ma hɛn kan, ama yeehu
Esintɔ a ɔwɔ nyimpa n' nyimdzee m',
Hɛn adwen a ohinhim n' yaadan ama W',
Yaadɔ W'asɛm pa no yie daa.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 630:3
verse:
. O ma hɛn kan, ama yeesua
Dɛ bra a 'Wo nnkaho n' yɛ owu;
Hɔn a wɔdze akoma a osi pi
Ba Wo hɔ n', yeehu hɔn dɛw pa.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 630:4
verse:
. O ma hɛn kan, 'werɛhow na yaw m',
Yɛmma hɛn akoma a ɔaberɛ n' do,
'Dze eehu dɛ mbeamudua n' yɛ mfaso,
Na yeehyira No dɔ a osuma n'.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 630:5
verse:
. O ma hɛn sesei; ndaamba
Wiadze abrabɔ nyina twa mu a,
Yeehu abow a woebue n' wɔ Wo mu
Dze kɔ fie a 'wu nnyi m' afebɔɔ.    Amen.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 631:1
verse:
. NANTSEW kan n' mu: na ibohu 
Ɔdɔ fɛkuwbɔ no a
No Sunsum nko tum dze ma no
Nyia odzi hen sor wɔ kan m'.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: MHB 631:2
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: na ibohu 
Dɛ w'akoma ayɛ N'dze koraa,
Nyia ɔtse kan a fua biara nnyi m' mu
Sum biara nnyi No mu.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: MHB 631:3
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: na ibohu 
Dɛ wo sum etwa m' kɔ,
'Siandɛ dɛm kan n' ahyerɛn wo ho,
No mu na da pa wɔ.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: MHB 631:4
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: na 'wumaa mpo
Nnkenya sum bi ama w';
Enyimnyam bɛpepa no sum,
Christ edzi nyim wɔ do.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: MHB 631:5
verse:
. Nantsew kan n' mu: wodze bɛyɛ
Kwan a nsoɛ wɔ m' mpo a, ɔhyerɛn;
Adom ntsi Nyame bɛtsena w' mu,
Nyame Noara nye Kan.
title: Bernard Barton, 1784-1849.

name: MHB 632:1
verse:
. M'AKOMA Wura, yɛ dza osi m'enyi do;
Minnyi biribiara bio, gyedɛ Wo nko
'Dzekyee anaa adzesaa, Ɔwo, nye m'adwen pa,
Minyan anaa meda a, Ɔwo yɛ m' kan.
title: Mary Byrne

name: MHB 632:2
title: Mary Byrne

name: MHB 632:3
verse:
. .Ɔko no mu, yɛ m'akokyɛm na peaa,
Yɛ m'enyimpa, Ɔwo yɛ dza mepɛ;
Eyɛ m' kra n' tsenabew, yɛ m'abantsentsen,
O mo Tumfo, pegya me kɔ heaven.
title: Mary Byrne

name: MHB 632:4
verse:
. Mennka ahonya anaa ayɛyi hun do,
Eyɛ m'egyapadze, sesei na daa;
Wo nko na idzi kan wɔ m'akoma m',
Heaven Ɔhempɔn, eyɛ m'akoradze.
title: Mary Byrne

name: MHB 632:5
verse:
. Heaven Ɔhempɔn, nsa aka konyimdzi n',
Ma minnya sor, heaven Ewia hyɛnhyɛn n'
M'akoma Wura, dza ɔbɛma biara,
Yɛ dza osi m'enyi do nyinara Wura.
title: Mary Byrne

name: MHB 633:1
verse:
. O adom Hen, fi sor ahengua n' do 
Fa dɔ hwɛ na tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr su.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: MHB 633:2
verse:
. Hwɛfo pà a edze bɔgya tɔɔ Wo nguan, 
Kora Wo nguankuw a wɔnnkyɛr kwan fom.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: MHB 633:5
verse:
. Apatasu, ndzebɔnyɛfo Dɔfo, 
Edɛw na siar nsunyiwa a ɔnnsa da.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: MHB 633:6
verse:
. Ao, fa sor adom kyekye hɛn werɛ; 
Yi W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n' enyimnyam kyerɛ.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: MHB 633:34
verse:
. O Pomfo pa, Wo wu mu na agye hɛn: 
Ma abɔn awerɛhofo daa nkwa.
 
. Sor Edziban, yɛdze Wo nyɛn hɛnho: 
Pin bɔboa hɛn akra hɛn hia ber mu.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: MHB 633:789
verse:
. Adzekyeem' mununkum, adzesaam' ogya, 
Bɛn hɛn na dan hɛn sum ma ɔnyɛ kan.
 
. Nye hɛn nnantsew, nye hɛn kwan daa daa, 
Hɛn nkwam' na wum' Werɛkyekyer, Tum, Gyafo.
 
. Fa Wo dɔ enyi n' gya hɛn kwan daa daa, 
Na fa hɛn du hɛn sor fi nom' sɔkyee. Amen.
title: Thomas Rawson Birks, 1810-83.

name: MHB 634:1
verse:
. WO kra sekyɛ botum ɔbra n'ehum,
Ber a nsuframa dzendzen robɔ yi?
Ma asorɛkye dzendzen retsetsew nhama m',
Wo sekyɛ betsim, anaa obegyina dzen?
   Sɛ ɔbra pram, ma asorɛkye bu a,
   Dɛm sekyɛ yi kora hɛn kra pintsinn;
   Ɔmontan ɔbotantsim a onnhim,
   Na otsim hɔ pintsinn wɔ Gyefo No dɔ m'.
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.

name: MHB 634:2
verse:
. Wo sekyɛ botum egyina suro ber mu
Ehumtu kɛse nye abotar enyim?
Ber a po nye mframa tu hɔn tsir gu do n',
Ana nsu bɛpram ebunkam wo hɛmba?
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.

name: MHB 634:3
verse:
. Wo sekyɛ botum wu n'esuyirii?
Ber a nsu nwinwin twa w'ahomtsia do?
Asorɛkye dzen mu mpo eronntɔ bahaw
'Siandɛ wo sekyɛ tsim enyidar man n' mu.
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.

name: MHB 634:4
verse:
. W'enyiwa bohu anapa kan fɛɛfɛw n'
Zion sika kurow na ahɛndwirii hyɛnhyɛn n'
Ber a ɔbra n'ehum bɔbɔ adze nwionwion n',
Ibodwir sɔkyee wɔ ɔsor mpoano hɔ?
title: Priscilla Jane Owens, 1820-99.

name: MHB 635:1
verse:
. JESU, mo N'okwar, Kwan,
Me kan a ennyew da,
Mo bͻn anamͻn tsim Wo do, .
’Wo begya m’ abamba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 635:2
verse:
. Me Nyansaa, Kwankyérɛfo
Ͻwo yɛ mo Pomfo,
O mma mimmfi Wo nkyɛn ara da
Anaa W’akwan so do!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 635:3
verse:
. Kyérɛkyerɛ m’ enyigyadze
Na mendan W’ adze nyina m;
O m'Ewuradze, mma nngyaa me da,
Mbom, dͻ me kͻ ewiei!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 635:4
verse:
. Fa me dua ogya na nsu m,’
Kodu ahonya bea hͻ;
Kyérɛ me ndowm fofor ma montow
Ber a mo ho astew adom m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 635:5
verse:
. O yɛ m’ dɛ Ͻwo ara,
’Saana meetu efi ha!
Gye me to m’ na ma mentséna ha
Na siesie me wͻ dͻ m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 635:6
verse:
. Ma mentséna ndzi W’ dase
Ber a bͻn nyina asé etu n;
Gye me kra a nkekaa nnyi ho no,
Na fa m’ kͻ Nyame fie.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 636:1
verse:
. WIADZE kan, hɛn anan a agogow n' hinhim
Wɔ ekyinkyin pii m',
Naaso 'bekyiaa hɛn akoma bɔbɔfo n',
'Napa Woraba;
Emaa yɛmaa hɛn enyi do tsim sor
Dze hwɛɛ ewia hyɛhyɛnn no n'enyimnyam.
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 636:2
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 636:3
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 636:4
verse:
. Owu hwirom na 'wumaa konyim wɔ hen?
Yaw nyina wɔ hen?
Ber a twamutam a ɔkata wo do n' wo Hen 
Atsew mu yi?
Wiadze kan, yɛtse dɛ Ɔwo refrɛ hɛn
Kɔ W'onnyiewie kan na dɔ fie no mu.
title: Laura Ormiston Dibdin Chant, 1848-1923.

name: MHB 637:1
verse:
. BER n'anhwea no remen ntsɛm
Heaven adzekyee n' yi enyim;
Wi puei ber a m'enyi daa kwan,
Da pa dɛɛdɛw n' aba,
Esuom yɛɛ sum dodoodow;
Adzekyee kan abɛn ,
Na enyimnyam mapa wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.

name: MHB 637:2
verse:
. Hen n' wɔ N'ahoɔfɛw m' wɔ hɔ n',
Yehun N'enyim petee;
'Kwantu a odzi mu na yetui,
Sɛ 'wu esuom wɔ mu mpo a;
Eguambaa n' nye N' nsordaafo
Gyina kokwaa Zion do,
Na enyimnyam mapa wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.

name: MHB 637:3
verse:
. O Christ, Ɔwo yɛ fapem
'Dɔ bura fɛɛfɛw a ɔdɔ;
Manom wiadze esu ahorow,
M'bɔnom papa wɔ Sor;
Na po yantamm bi w hɔ a
N'ehumbɔbɔr n' pem wɔ m',
Na enyimnyam mapa wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.

name: MHB 637:4
verse:
. Ehumbɔbɔr nye atsɛmbu m'
Ɔwo awen me mber
Na ampa, awerɛhow bɔsu n',
Wo dɔ n' pepaa no koraa;
M'benyira nsa a ogyaa me no,
M'behyira akoma a ɔhyehyɛe,
Ber a wɔahyɛ N' enyimnyam wɔ
Immanuel Ne man m'.
title: Anne Boss Cousin, 1824-1906.

name: MHB 638:1
verse:
. NYAME Nyansabuakwa,
Hɔn Hen nye Agyenkwa,
Abɔfo a wɔwɔ ase ha
Mfa hɔn ayɛyi mbrɛ Wo.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 638:2
verse:
. No dɔ kokroko na 
N'apam nye N' nhwedo pa
Kora hɛn sɔnn fi bɔn na owu mu,
Na efirsua yaayaw mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 638:3
verse:
. Ɔbɔkora hɛn akra
Na ɔatsew ho nwionnwionn,
Wɔ N'enyim enyimnyam no mu,
Wɔ sor enyigye pa m'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 638:4
verse:
. Aba a wɔasan mu eyi n'
Behyia wɔ ahengua n' ho;
Wobehyira N'adom nwanwa n',
Wɔaka N'anwanwadze.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 639:1
verse:
. CHRIST a onyim No nguan nyina
Bɔhwɛ hɛn nyina do sɔnn;
No bɔgyaa no anaa
N'amandzehu no
Rennyɛ kwa ara da,
Dɛ ɔtɔɔ hɛn ntsi n'.
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91.

name: MHB 639:2
verse:
. Minyim me Nyame tsen,
Ɔno na motwer No;
Dza mowɔ, meyɛ nyina
M'enyindado nyina
Dza mekeka hwɛ n' ha
Yɛ nokwar pefee.
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91.

name: MHB 639:3
title: Richard Baxter, 1615-91.

name: MHB 640:1
verse:
. WITƆREE, 'wimbir woraba,
Na frɛ kor a wɔdze afrɛ m'!
Na asorɛkye a orubu n' bɛda fɛmm,
Ber a migyina po enyim n;
Asorɛkye a orubu a ɔtse dɛ ɔada n',
Ɔnnkɛkyerɛ hwee koraa,
Ber a dza opuei fii bun yantamm no mu
San kɔ n'anan m'.
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 640:2
verse:
. Serɛmen na ewimbir dɔn n',
Na afei n'ekyir sum no!
Na mma wɔmmfa awerɛhow nngya me kwan
Ber a mesi m' no,
Kaansa yefi bea na ber yi mu mpo a,
Nsuyirii n' dze m'bɔkɔ ekyir,
Ber a mefi wiadze yi mu n', minyim dɛ
M'bohu Sutwafo n' enyim.
title: Alfred Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 641:1
verse:
. BER a ’werɛhow ahyɛ mo do ’I,
Me Nyame yɛ m’ kyɛfa
Kodu dͻnhwér a ͻdze
Mo sunsum bɛma Wo n’.
Ber a honam na nkwa agow,
Tsen Wo nsa mu na gye
Me kra to W’abaw mu
Kodu dɛ minyan Wo m’.
title: James Smethan, 1821-89.

name: MHB 641:2
verse:
. Anapa wi bɛhyérɛn
Ewimbir kan bͻtͻ m’,
Dɛm na ase ha kan n’ tse,
Sor dze n’ ͻnnsesa da;
Nyɛnko nnhwɛ nyɛnko enyim,
Kor dzi yaw wͻ mpoano;
Wo mba dze wommpue mmfi
Wo bea krͻnkrͻn no do.
title: James Smethan, 1821-89.

name: MHB 641:3
verse:
. Mununkum kata hɛn do;
Yennsuro asehwe biara,
Yɛpɛ edu koko n’ do,
Hͻ na mboa pii fi ba:
Ͻhyérɛn wͻ anafua ber m’,
Ewufo twa m’, ba W’ hͻ,
Ͻwo a ayɛ anapa kan;
O ewiei n’ mma mmpa hɛn!
title: James Smethan, 1821-89.

name: MHB 642:1
verse:
. BER a adzesaa rotɔ mo nkwa da do,
Na ehum tu bea a ewia mmbɔ wɔ hɔ n'
Metse ndze ekyirekyir sum mu refrɛ
M'anan kɔ bea a minnyim.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 642:2
verse:
. Sɛ biribiara rifi mo ho akɔ a, bɛn me,
Asaase, wi, fie ndzɛmba, sum na kan
Na enyimtsewee a ɔma me nkenyan,
Ɔdɔ a ɔgye mo do.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 642:3
verse:
. Dza mowɔ nye Ɔwo Egya; ma Wo Sunsum
Nka mo ho nkyekye mo werɛ, nsuo mo mu;
Memmfata ahodze pa abow, memmfata berɛw,
Anaa sika abrɔn.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 642:4
verse:
. Oye ma m', me papa na bɔn wɔnnkan;
Na ɔnam W'adom pii do ntsi edze kyɛ,
Na muhu Wo dɛ' roto nsa afrɛ me
Akɔ tsenabew a ɔsɛ m'.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 642:5
verse:
. Ndwom dɛɛdɛw a asaasaa do wɔ hɔ a metse n',
Me bɛpɛ esua ndwom fofor krɔnkrɔn n' tow,
Na ewiei n' W'ayarsa ndua no ase no
M'benya nkwa a mo kɔn dɔ n'.   Amen.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 643:1
verse:
. SƐ wiadze yi twa mu wie a ,
Sɛ ewia a ɔhyerɛn yi tɔ mu a,
Yɛnye Christ gyina enyimnyam m',
Mohwɛ ɔbra n'ewiei mu nsɛm a,
Dɛm ber n' ankasa na m'bohu
Kaw a medze W', Ewuradze.
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.

name: MHB 643:2
verse:
. Sɛ mibegyina ahengua enyim
Hyɛ atar fɛɛfɛw a ɔnnyɛ m'dze,
Sɛ muhu W' dɛ mbrɛ Ɔwo tse a,
Medze akoma a bɔn nnyi m' bɔbɔ W',
Dɛm ber n' ankasa na m'bohu
Kaw a medze W', Ewuradze.
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.

name: MHB 643:3
verse:
. Sɛ metse heaven ayɛyi
Ngyegyee dzendzen wɔ m'asomu,
Tse dɛ esu dzendzen n' dede,
Ne dɛw tse dɛ sanku ndze a,
Dɛm ber n' ankasa na m'bohu
Kaw a medze W', Ewuradze.
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.

name: MHB 643:4
verse:
. Wɔammpaw m' wɔ me papa ntsi,
Wonyaan m', munguan mfi ebufuw m',
Dɛ munsuma me Gyefo nkyɛn,
Fa Sunsum no tsew mo ho,
Nyame, kyerɛ m' asaase 'i do,
Ma mo dɔ nkyerɛ kaw a medze W'.
title: Robert Murray McCheyne, 1813-43.

name: MHB 644:1
verse:
. NKWA na 'wu Tsɛmbuafo,
W'atsɛmbu bea enyim
Enyigye krɔnn anaa afɔdzi mu,
Yebehyia m' ntsɛmara;
Woesiesie hɛn akra ama
Da kɛse a ɔtse dɛm n',
Fa ahwɛyie a ɔsɛ hyɛ ma,
Kenyan hɛn ma yɛnsɔr.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 644:2
verse:
. Yɛbɔ mpaa dze tweɔn da n',
Dɔnhwer huuhu a wonnyim,
Ber a ehyɛ ahentar na tumdzi n',
Bɛsan efi sor aba ha,
Bɛkyebo, Egya Ne Ba n',
Bobu nyimpa nyina atsɛn,
Enye Egya n' No sor dɔm nyina
'Dze W'enyimnyam adom nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 644:3
verse:
. O ma wonhu hɛn dɛ
W'asɛm ho setsiefo,
Yɛnyɛ aso pɛnn mma abɛn no,
Na yɛrohwehwɛ hɛn Wura;
O ma yɛmper yennya
Dodow mfora esiarfo n',
Na yɛnweɔn ara dɛ yebenya
Ahomgye a onnyi ewiei.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 645:1
verse:
. EBUFUW da no a ɔyɛ hu n',
Ber a sor na asaase botwa m' no,
Bɔn no tum benya egyinaanan a?
Yebesi dɛn ehyia da huuhu n'?
title: Walter Scott, 1771-1832.

name: MHB 645:2
verse:
. Ɔsor dze gyaramee wodow
Dɛ nwoma bi a wɔabobɔw,
Dede na nkekamu huuhu
Kenyan abɛn a onyan ewufo n'.
title: Walter Scott, 1771-1832.

name: MHB 645:3
verse:
. O dɛm da n', dɛm enyiber da n',
Ber a yefi dɛtse m' kɔ atsɛmbu m' n,
O Christ yɛ abɔn kyirtaafo
Kaansa sor na asaase twa m' mpo a.  Amen.
title: Walter Scott, 1771-1832.

name: MHB 646:1
verse:
. Ebufuw da! Ao, nyinsuwa da! 
Dza nkɔnhyɛfo kae n' abam',
Sor nye asaase rotɔ nso.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:2
verse:
. Akomatu a ogura nyimpa, 
Ber a Tsɛmbuafo n' fi sor besian,
Ɔno a ɔka a, obi nnka bi.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:3
verse:
. Totorobɛnto ndze huhu, 
Ɔgyegye ndakamaa nyinam'
Rotwe dɔm nyina kɔ asɛndzii.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:4
verse:
. Wɔatsea Wu, wiadze rowosow, 
Abɔdze nyina rinyanyan,
Eyi ano akyerɛ Tsɛmbuafo n'.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:5
verse:
. Hwɛ, bukuu no mu nsɛm si pi, 
Wɔ dza wɔakyerɛw n' mu nyina ho,
Ɔno na wɔdze bobu atsɛn.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:67
verse:
. Sɛ Tsɛmbuafo n' tsena N'eguam' 
Na esumasɛm biara da edzi a,
Obiara nnkɛfa noho gyan.
 
. Emidze m'beyi m'ano dɛn? 
Woana no obotwitwa agye m'
Ber a anokwafo mpo hia adom?
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:1112
verse:
. Ɔtsɛmbuafo tseneenyi, 
Dom hɛn brafi ho bɔnfakyɛ,
Ansaana werdzi da n' aso.
 
. Midzii fᴐ; medze nyinsuwa gye
M'enyimguasebra nyina tom';
Nyame, meserɛ W', fa mo ho kyɛ m'.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:8910
verse:
. Hen a W'ahentum krɔn mbordo, 
Ɔwo a ebɔ werdam ma hɛn, 
Tsema Wura, pinkyɛn hɛn ɛ.
 
. Hwɛ Jesus pa, mo nkwangye ntsi 
Na ebɛbraa adasa mu;
Mma nnto me seraha mma bɔn.
 
. Eku Woho ara ahwehwɛ m', 
Atɔ m' wɔ fona mbeamudua n' do;
Aso dɛm adom yi nyɛ gyan?
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 646:131415161718
verse:
. Egyee ɔbaa dzebɔnyɛnyi n', 
Edze wifo n' no bɔn kyɛɛ no,
Mo so ama menya enyidar.
 
. Me mpaabɔ na mo mbɔɔ nnsɛ  hwee,
Naaso, Nyame, kyerɛ W'adom
Na gye m' fi onnyiewiei gya n' mu.
 
. Ao, fa me ka Wo nguantsen n' ho, 
Mma mmpem m' adze nnka mberɛkyi n' ho,
Mbom ma m' do si W'abanyimfa.
 
. Mifi m'akoma mu bu ntwɛr, 
Hwɛ, mo nnuho ayɛ dɛ nso;
Sɛ m'ewiei to m' a, ɔno boa m'.
 
. Mewu o! Su na ewuotwa da n' a! 
Nyimpa fi huntumam' reba n' a,
Onsiesie noho mma atsɛmbu.
 
. Ao, Nyame, hu n' mbɔbɔr na gyaa n',
Tse ma hɔn a Jesus ehyira,
Dom hɛn W'ahomgye a onnyiewiei.
		Amen.
title: Thomas of Celano, 13th cent.;

name: MHB 647:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, ɔnnyɛ 'mi m'asɛm 
Muwu anaa metse ase o;
M'afamudze nye m'bɔdɔ W', masom W'
Yi gyedɛ W'adom ma.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 647:2
verse:
. Sɛ nkwa war a, m' enyi bɛgye 
Ama maasom Wo akyɛr,
Tsia so a, bɛn ntsi na m'bedzi mbɔɔ
Dɛ m'botu akɔ onnyiewieim'?
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 647:6
verse:
. Me nyimdzee wɔ hɔ bra n' ho suar, 
Gyedzi enyi yɛ kusuww;
Na ɔdɔɔ so dɛ Christ nyim Ne nyina,
Na menya N' bɛkɛtsena.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 647:345
verse:
. Christ ɔmmfa m' ndua mbrɛ hɔ yɛ sum 
Sen mbrɛ Noara koduae n';
Nyia ɔba Nyame ahenman mu n'
Gyedɛ ɔfa abow yim'.
 
. Bra, Mo Wura, sɛ adom ma mesɛ 
Dɛ muhu W'enyim a;
Na W'asaase edwuma yɛ dɛw a,
W'enyimnyam bɛyɛ dɛ dɛn?
 
. Na m'botwa mo suhuhun do, 
Na fona na bɔn ndafua,
Makɔdɔm esiarfo a wɔtow
Jehovah N'ayɛyi.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 648:1
verse:
. YI hɛn awerɛhow na hu akwa!
Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na yeenya hɛn fie n',
Ahotsewfo man no bɛba,
Onnyiewiei da no so bɛba;
Yebefi asaase yi do ntsɛm,
Na yeetu akɔ hɛn ndamfo do,
Hɛn Egya fie a ɔwɔ sor hɔ;
Abɔfo na Nyame ahemfie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 648:2
verse:
. Hɛn suhuhun nyina ano botwa,
Sɛ n-kwasɛm no kenyan hɛn a,
Yehu kurow fofor n' no mpuei dɛ
Ayefor a wɔahyehyɛ ama n' Wura;
Kuropɔn krɔnkrɔn a no mu tsew yie,
Awerɛhow biara nnyi hɔ koraa 
Na atseetse anaa bɔn nnyi hɔ,
Sunsum fi biara so nnyi hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 648:3
verse:
. Yɛnam hɛn gyedzi do ehu
Jerusalem enyigyebea;
N'afasu yɛ jasper na sika,
N'adan ne hyerɛn ma noho tsew;
Adom n' mma ne fapem nnhinhim,
Osi hɔ dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse a ahyɛse n',
Ne dansifo no da no edzi n',
Nyame N'enyimnyam hyerɛn hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 648:4
verse:
. Ewia ho nnkehia dɛm da no,
Osiandɛ 'nafuasum nnyi hɔ,
Bea a Jesus N'ahoɔfɛw hyerɛn n',
Kan mapa wɔ hɔ dabaa no,
Eguambaa n' nye hɔn kan na ewia,
Na hwɛ, kan mu na ɔma wɔnye
Jesus hyerɛn krɔnkrɔn mu,
Na wɔhyerɛn wɔ sor 'nyimnyam mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 649:6
verse:
. Nkyɛ yaafow mbrɛ Moses kegyinae n', 
Na yaankwɛ noho mbew n',
Jordan esu anaa owu nwin,
Runntu hɛn bo wɔ hɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 649:45
verse:
. Na adasa suro bɔ piriw dɛ 
Wobotwa po tseabaa n',
Wɔbɔ ngyangyan wɔ esukɔn do,
Wosuro dɛ wobepia.
 
. Ao, nkyɛ yeeyi ekyingye akwa, 
Na adwen kusukusu n',
Na yɛdze enyi a do tsew eehu
Canaan a yɛdɔ no.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 649:123
verse:
. Man bi wɔ hɔ a dɛw mapa wɔm', 
Ahotsewfo dzim' hen;
Adzekyee nko, adze nnsa da,
Hɔ enyigye tu yaw.
 
. Hɔ na nhaban wuna dabaa. 
Na hɔ nhiren nnyam da;
Wu tse dɛ po tseabaa a, otwa
Sorman na hɛndze yi ntamu.
 
. Nhaban huanhuam wɔ esuegya hɔ 
Woewuna dukuduku;
Dɛm na Jewfo hun Canaan ma n'
Dɛ Jordan pem twa ntamu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 650:1
verse:
. Jerusalem, m'ahomka fie, 
Dzin a ɔsom me bo,
M'edwuma bɔbɔ adze dabɛn
Wɔ wo siar asomdweem'?
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: MHB 650:2
verse:
. Dabɛn na m'enyiwa bohu 
W'afasu nye mbotsen?
N-kwagye ahyɛ w'aban dzen,
W'abrɔn mu hyerɛn sika.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: MHB 650:3
verse:
. Ehɔ nhyiren n' kyɛn Eden turem'; 
Na bɔn nye yaw nnyi hɔ:
Menam abo nye ehum do
Per kɔ siar bea yi do.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: MHB 650:6
verse:
. Jerusalem, mahomka fie, 
Me kra per hwehwɛ wo!
Da n' na m'dwuma bɔbɔ adze,
Da n' na m'bohu wo dɛw.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: MHB 650:45
verse:
. Ebɛn ntsi na m'bosuro mbusu, 
Anaa wu mbɔ me hu?
M'enyi da Canaan man pa n' do,
Mbew a adze nnsa do da.
 
. Asomafo, atɔfo, nkɔnhyɛfo, 
Abɔ Agyenkwa ho aprɔw;
Na ɔnnkɛkyɛr so na m'adɔfo
Akɔdɔm 'nyimnyam kuw n'.
title: Joseph Bromehead, 1748-1828.

name: MHB 651:1
verse:
. TSIE! Me kra, tsie! Sor abɔfo ndwom ruhur
Wɔ kwaamu ɔnye mpoano nyinara;
Nokwar bi a dɛm ndwom no rowasa a,
Wɔ nkwa fofor a bɔn biara nnyi mu bio!
   Jesus abɔfo, kan abɔfo,
   Rotow ndwom ama akwantufo akɔaba!
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 651:2
verse:
. Yɛkɔ hɛn enyim, yɛda ho tse hɔn ndwom no,
Akra a hom aberɛ, Jesus frɛ dɛ hom mbra!
Ndwom no gyegye dɛɛdɛw wɔ hɔ sum no mu,
Asɛmpa ndwom no dze hɛn rokɔ fie.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 651:3
verse:
. Jesus Ne ndze gyegye asaase na po do,
Dɛ ewimbir dɔn a wɔrobɔ n' ekyirekyir,
Akra mpempen a wɔso adzesoa aberɛ;
Oguanhwɛfo pa, frɛ hɔn bra Wo nkyɛn.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 651:4
verse:
. Ahomgye ba; sɛ ɔbra war, yɛ basaa mpo a,
Adzekyee n' twar dɛ ɔba ma sum pa;
Gyedzi akwantu bɔ adze wɔ akɔaba-ma mu,
Na ɔkra n' nsa ka heaven, ne fie mapa n'.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 651:5
verse:
. Abɔfo, hom ntow ndwom, ber a hom roweɔn yi,
Hom ntow sor ndwom dɛɛdɛw no nkyerɛ hɛn,
Kɛpem dɛ anapa dɛw bɛpam anafua su,
Na ɔbra mu sum no pa ɔdɔ mu.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 652:1
verse:
. Hɛn nkwaber yɛ tsia wɔ ha 
Yaw tsia, adwendwen tsia
Nkwa a ɔmmbɔ adze da,
Nyinsu nnyim' wɔ noho,
Ao, ndzinoa a ɔyɛ dɛw
Fona tsia, ahomgye daa;
Adasa ndzebɔnyɛ
Nye esiarfo bɛtsena.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:2
verse:
. Akobɔfo abɔbɔfo a, 
Yebenya fi wɔ sor!
Nsaamaa a yɛrohwehwɛ kobew
Wɔ nworaba n'ekyir!
Ndɛ dze yɛwɔ akono,
'Kyena na yɛso ahenkyɛw
A, odzi mu afebɔɔ
Na ne fɛw mmpa ara da.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:3
verse:
. Sesei dze yɛroweɔn, yɛreper, 
Yɛtse enyidadom',
Zion wɔ dɛ n'ahoguam'
Ɔnye Babylon si;
Na nyia sesei yɛtwer No n'
Ndaamba yebohu N' kann,
Hɔn a wonyim N' na Wohu N'
Benya N' ayɛ hɔndze.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:4
verse:
. Ao, enyigye na siar man, 
Nyame Ne mpamufo fie!
Ao, enyigye na siar man,
Akoma kɔn dɔ W', hwɛ W' kwan!
Jesu, mbɔbɔrhum' ara
Fa hɛn kɔ ahomgye bea n',
Ɔwo a 'nye Nyame Egya
Na Sunsum n' woehyira hom.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:5
verse:
. Jerusalem sika kurow, 
Numfonsu na wo ma
Wo ho adwendwen no ma
Akoma na ndze bɔm
Minnyim ara, ao, minyim
Dɛw a ɔrotweɔn hɛn hɔ,
Enyimnyam a ɔhyerɛn
Nhyira a ɔnntɔ ka.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:6
verse:
. Zion asa n' nyina mu 
'Nyigye ndwom ahyɛ n' ma,
Abɔfo hyirenn na atɔfo
Ahyɛ mpemdo wɔ hɔ,
Ɔhenba n' tse hɔn finimfin
Adzekyee kan n' tsew wann;
Na esiarfo edzidzibea n'
Ayɛ nomanoma fɛɛfɛw.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:7
verse:
. David n'ahenguan n' si hɔ; 
Hɔ na konyimdzifo a
Woefi dadwen nsa bɔ se,
Na apontofo tow ndwom
Hɔn a wɔnye hɔn Sahen
Ako edzi konyim n'
Mbersantsen mfesantsen nyina
Woewuna hɔn ntar fitaa.
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 652:8
title: Bernard of Cluny, 12th cent.; tr. by John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 653:1
verse:
. BEA a hɔ yɛ dɛw nko!
Nyame a ɔwɔ sor abangua,
Ɔsor mu sor ahengua,
W'ahentum no dzi mu.
    Enyigye bea! O dabɛn na
    M'bohu me Nyankopɔn enyim?
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.

name: MHB 653:2
verse:
. Mo Wura, me Hen tse hɔ,
Memmfata hɔ tsena,
Hɔ, abɔfo tow ndwom
Butuw famu, kotow No.
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.

name: MHB 653:3
verse:
. Tsetse mpanyimfo no
Kowiee hɔn akwantu n' hɔ;
Nkɔnhyɛfo no hun hɛn
Asomdwee Hen enyim.
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.

name: MHB 653:4
verse:
. Medze enyigye bohu
Eguambaa N'asomafo,
M'betsie nsankubɔfo n'
Wɔ sika nsanku do.
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.

name: MHB 653:5
verse:
. Atɔfo anokwafo n'
Wɔ abangua no do,
Wɔhyɛ n-tar fitaa
'Nyimnyam hyɛ hɔn etua ma.
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.

name: MHB 653:6
verse:
. Ɔsor Jerusalem
Nye mo ndwom na mo kurow;
Na mo wu ekyir no,
Mibenya me nhyira.
title: Samuel Crossman, c. 1624-83.

name: MHB 654:1
title: Hugh Reginald Haweis, 1838-1901.

name: MHB 654:2
title: Hugh Reginald Haweis, 1838-1901.

name: MHB 654:3
title: Hugh Reginald Haweis, 1838-1901.

name: MHB 655:1
verse:
. JERUSALEM, m'ahomka fie!
M'bɛba wo hɔ dabɛn?
M'awerɛhow bɔbɔ adze dabɛn?
Dabɛn na m'bohu
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:2
verse:
. Ahotsewfo ahomka mpoano!
O dɛw na ahotɔ bea!
Wo mu dze awerɛhow nnyi hɔ,
Yaw, dadwen na berɛ nnyi m'.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:3
verse:
. W'afasu yɛ sika abotan,
W'aban yɛ ndɛnkyɛmbo;
Wo mbotsen yɛ man pa m' ndzepa,
Ahodze a ho yɛ na.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:4
verse:
. W'adan no srɔnsrɔmbea biara
Kandzea hyɛnhyɛnn hyerɛn do;
W'abɔntsen yɛ sika mfutuw,
Ɔyɛ fɛw, odzi mu.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:5
verse:
. Wo w'enyinaba na nduaba kwa
Yɛ ahomka dodow;
Ndua na nduaba pa ahyɛ mu ma,
Ɔyɛ nwanwa dodow.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:6
verse:
. Wo turo ahorow na mfuwa
Yɛ ebunebun daa;
Nhyiren huanhuam fɛɛfɛw wɔ hɔ,
Hɔn saso nnyi beebi.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:7
verse:
. W'abrɔn a dwetɛ gyegye mu n',
N-kwa esutsen pem m' weɔɔ;
Ne nkyɛnkyɛn, afa na afa nyina,
N-kwa dua wuna wusuww.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:8
verse:
. W'ahotsewfo hyɛ 'nyam 'henkyɛw,
'Hu Nyame enyim na enyim;
Wodzi nyim ara, wodzi dɛw ara,
Wɔwɔ ahomka m' daa.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:9
verse:
. David dze ne sanku m' wɔ hɔ
Dɛ adwontow kuw panyin;
Nyia ɔbɛtse hɔn ndwom no bi n'
Woehyira n' mbɔho piigyan.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:10
verse:
. Magdalene egyaa n'apensi
Na ɔtow ndwom dɛw, m' wɔ hɔ,
Ɔnye ahotsewfo a hɔn ndwom
Yɛ dukuu wɔ abrɔn mu n'.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 655:11
verse:
. Jerusalem, Jerusalem,
Nyame mboa ma munhu
Wo dɛw a ɔmmbɔ adze n', na menyɛ
Ne fafafo so daa.    Amen.
title: F.B.P., 16th or 17th cent.

name: MHB 656:1
verse:
. MBOFRA mpempem etwa ehyia
Nyame N'ahengua enyim,
Mbofra a wɔahor hɔn ho bɔn nyina,
Ahotsewfo fɛkuw.
     Wɔtow : 'Nyimnyam
     'nyimnyam, 'nyimnyam!
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.

name: MHB 656:2
verse:
. Hwɛ wɔhyɛ ntar pa fitaa bi a
Nkekaa biara nnyi mu,
Wɔtse daa daa kan na dɛw a
Ɔmmpa ara da mu.
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.

name: MHB 656:3
verse:
. Mframa bɛn bɔɔ hɔn kɔr sor hɔ?
Sor a pɛrpɛr tsim hɔ daa,
Bea a asomdwee, dɛw na dɔ nsu pem;
Mbofra 'i sii dɛn kɔr hɔ.
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.

name: MHB 656:4
verse:
. Agyenkwa N' bɔgyaa a okyii no
Hohoor hɔn ho fi no:
Woguar adehye nsu krɔnn no mu;
Hwɛ, hɔn ho atsew fitaa!
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.

name: MHB 656:5
verse:
. Wɔtse ase n', wɔhwehwɛɛ Agyenkwa
N'adom, wɔdɔɔ Ne dzin,
Ntsi na ndɛ wohu N' siar enyim n',
Na wogyina Eguambaa enyim n'.
title: Anne Shepherd, 1809-57.

name: MHB 657:1
verse:
. Hɔn a wu ntwamutam suma hɔn n', 
Hɛn 'gyafo a nkyɛ wɔka hɛn ho n',
Woedu sor adzekyee mu ntsi
Yɛda W' ase.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: MHB 657:5
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: MHB 657:6
verse:
. Edwuma so a seesei wɔyɛ n', 
Dza ɔsɛ nyimdzee a oedzi mu a,
Na dza ema wɔyɛ ma hɛn
Yenntum yennhu.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: MHB 657:7
verse:
. Wonnkyi nyinsuwa hɔ ara bio, 
Dɔ nko na wɔdze edzi ehyia;
Sor hɔ dwuma, nkamfo, ahomgye
Nyina yɛ kor.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: MHB 657:234
verse:
. Hɔn nkwa no yɛ n-kwa ampa, 
Woedu empiresi n'ewiei,
Afei wohu W'enyim petee:
Hwee nnsiw hɔn kwan.
 
. Dɛ mbrɛ yehun hɔn wɔ fonam' 
Na ahohia mu n', wɔnntse dɛm bio:
Hɔn enyi hu adze kann: Wo dzin
Wɔ hɔn pɔw do.
 
. Kɔdaann-da efi hɔn do koraa, 
Na woehu W'apɛdze nyina;
Wɔdze dɛw a yennyim wɔ ha 
Som Wo daa daa.
title: William Charter Piggott, 1872-1943.

name: MHB 658:1
verse:
. EWURADZE Wo nkyɛn ara!
Amen; ma ɔnyɛ hɔ;
'Wu mu nkwa wɔ dɛm asɛm no m'
Yɛ bɛkyebo nkwa pa;
Metse honam mu yi,
Mikyima fi Ne nkyɛn,
Anago biara misi me
Ntamadan bɛn Ne fie.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 658:2
verse:
. M'Egya fie a ɔwɔ sor,
Me kra fie a ɔbɛn,
Ma gyedzi enyiwa pa nhu
Wo sika mbobow no!
Afei me kra reper
Dɛ obodu man a modɔ n',
'Hotsewfo egyapadze a ɔhyerɛn,
Ɔsor Jerusalem.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 658:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo nkyɛn ara!
Egya, ɔyɛ Wo pɛ a,
Ma me nsa nka anohoba n',
Asɛm no mu dze no.
Gyina me nsa nyimfa
Na monnkɔhwe ase;
Suo mo mu na mibegyina
Ko m' na m'bedzi konyim.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 658:4
verse:
. Sɛ m'ahomgu bɔ adze a,
Tsew nkataenyim no mu a,
Menam owu mu benya nkwa,
N-kwa a onnyi ewiei.
Dɛ mbrɛ metse 'i ara,
M'bɛyɛ dɛn adɔ asɛm n'
Na daa maka n' ahengua enyim?
Ewuradze, Wo nkyɛn ara!
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 659:1
verse:
. AHOMGYE na enyigye da,
O dɛw na ekan da,
Dadwen na awerɛhow edur,
Ɔyɛ fɛw na ɔhyerɛn;
Wo mu, akɛse na nkuma
Bɔ m' mfesantsen nyina
Tow: Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn
Ma Ɔkorsa Nyame.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 659:2
verse:
. Wo mu na abɔdze mu no,
Wodzii kan yɛɛ ekan;
Wo mu na hɛn nkeagye ntsi
Christ soɛree fii nda mu;
Wo mu, hɛn konyimdzi Wura
Somaa Sunsum n' fii sor,
N-tsi nyimnyamfo, Wo mu
Na emaa kan mprɛnsa.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 659:3
verse:
. N-dɛ sor manna tɔ wɔ
Aman a wɔaberɛ do;
Dwetɛ totorobɛnto no
Frɛ nhyiamu krɔnkrɔn n' wɔ 
Beebi a asɛmpa kan no 
Da kan ne nserɛmɛn edzi,
Na nkwa nsu pem wɔ hɔ dɛ
N-su a ɔdwedwe akra.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 659:4
verse:
. Yenya adom fofor daa
Fi ahomgye da yi mu,
Hɛn nsa ka ahomgye a ɔyɛ 
Akra a woehyira hɔn n' dze;
Ayɛyi nka Egya, Ɔba
Nye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Asɔr no ma ne ndze do
Ma Ɔwo, Baasa Kor.  Amen.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 660:1
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 660:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 660:5
verse:
. N-dɛ yɛ mpaabɔ da: 
Bɔ mfar a ɔma nkwa;
Na nyan akra a woewuwu ma
Wɔndɔ Wo, wɔnsom Wo
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 660:34
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 661:1
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛnye hɛn Wura nsoɛr,
Hɛn wura a ͻyɛɛ asaase na wimu;
Owui gyee wiadzé a ͻbͻe no
Na ͻsoɛɛr konyim mu fii wu m’,
N-kwa nyé asomdwee Hen scarce
Na ͻdze da no yɛɛ Nedze daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 661:2
verse:
. Iyi nye da a Ewuradzé ayɛ
Ma obiara eehu No dͻ no,
Atse No wusoɛr tum no nka
Na ͻaasoɛr a ͻnnhwé ase bio;
Wͻayɛ N' fofor wͻ tsenenee mu,
Na Nyame nkwa ahyɛ no ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 661:3
verse:
. Hom mma yɛmfa Nedze mma No,
Yɛmfa mpaabͻ mbɛn ahengua n’
Mfa ahobrɛadze ntsie asɛmpa n’,
Mfa ndaase mma ͻdͻ a ͻdze wui n’;
Yɛma hɛn akoma na ndze do
Dzé ayɛyi ndwom kͻ abangua n' do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 661:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 662:1
verse:
. EWIA ekyir nsutɔ yɛ dɛw,
Na yaw ekyir n-da yɛ dɛw;
Ahomgye da dze ahom dɛɛdɛw
Ba wiadze a ɔaberɛ do.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 662:2
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 662:3
verse:
. Nkyenan fofor wɔ asɛmpa 'i mu
Na ne kan m-pɛn esuon mu,
Nyame nhyira da! Yehua ne kan,
Ɔdze ndaase na ɔsom ba.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 662:4
verse:
. Kusuww nye ahantan biara
Nnkotum nye ber krɔnkrɔn atsena;
Yɛyɛ Nyame edwuma ɔdɔ mu,
Yɛyew edwuma no dɛw mu.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 662:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, hom gu hɛn do
Ma yengyina pintsinn wɔ dɔ mu,
Na ma hɛn hɛn ehiadze daa
Ma yɛntsena gyedzi mu nwu.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 663:1
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:2
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:3
verse:
. Sɔ W'afɔr no a ɔda
M'anomu no mu ogya no;
Yi m'enyi do sum fi hɔ
Ma meegyaa mfomdo biara yɛ,
Mma ogya fofor bi nndzɛw
Mo mu a W'afɔrmbukyia nnyim.
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:4
verse:
. Ma memfa m'akoma ntow
Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn, Krɔnkrɔn n-dɛ
Ntwe m'ho mfi wiadze kakra;
Na me kra ntow mbra Wo hɔ sor
M'bɔsɔ mbrɛ wosi som Wo
Wɔ sor tsenabea hɔ no nhwɛ
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:5
verse:
. Hom mo mu, mowɔ Wo mu,
Hyehyɛ paradise wɔ mo mu;
O yi Woho kyerɛ me,
Ɔdɔ siarfo a iwui gyee me,
Wo toa mu ngo a ɔnnsa da n'
Bɛma me kandzea adzɛw daa.
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 663:6
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 664:1
verse:
. O EWURADZE Jesus, ber a
Yɛtwe bɛn Wo n' yɛ nhyira,
Yɛtse anohoba dɛɛdɛw pii a
Ɔsom bo fi W'anomu.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:2
verse:
. Ka hɛn ho ndɛ na hyira hɛn,
Amma yaannyɛ gyan wɔ mu;
Ma yenhu nkwagye nokwar no,
Abrabɔ mu n-sɛm no.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:3
verse:
. Bue hɛn adwen na mu na gya hɛn.
Sɔkyee kɔ hɛn sor kwan do;
Nokwar kandzea no ndzi hɛn kan
Na amma yaanntɔ dɔnsuar.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:4
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:5
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 664:6
verse:
. Ma hɛn adom ma yɛngye dase
Wɔ nokwar a yeesuo m' no ho;
Na ma binom so n-sɔ nhwɛ,
Ne dɛw nye ne kan pa no.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 665:1
verse:
. ME NYAME, me Hen, W'ayɛyi
Ndaase, adwontow ho edwuma yɛ dɛw;
Wɔkyerɛ Wo dɔ anapa kan,
Wɔka Wo nokwar anafua.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 665:2
verse:
. Ahomgye da krɔnkrɔn yɛ dɛw,
Adwendwen biara nnhaw mo bo;
O ma m'akoma ntow ndwom dɛ
David sankutsen dɛɛdɛw no.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 665:3
verse:
. M'akoma dzi nyim Ewuradze m'
Na oehyira No ndwuma nye N'asɛm;
Mbrɛ W'adom ndwuma si hyerɛn a!
W'afotu mu dɔ, no ho tsew.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 665:4
verse:
. Na m'benya enyimnyam kyefa
Ber a adom atsew m'akoma ho,
Na menya enyigye fofor,
Dɛ ngo krɔnkrɔn asera me tsirmu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 665:5
verse:
. Afei mobohu na matse
Dza mohwehwɛ wɔ ha nyina,
Na abɔdze nyina benya enyigye
Wɔ dɛw bɛkyebo wiadze n' mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 666:1
verse:
. Yɛdze adwontow hyɛɛ ase ndɛ, 
Wɔ mbɔbɔr ahengua n' enyim;
Ansaana 'nafua sum bɛba n',
Yɛtow ewimbir ndaase ndwom.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 666:4
verse:
. Kyerɛ hɛn ma yɛngye akra nkwa, 
Na yɛnkata bɔn mpempem do,
Yensi Christ Ne penkyɛr kwan n' mu,
Na yensuasua N' yɛnye N' nsɛ daa. Amen.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 666:23
verse:
. Dza ofir nokwar akomam', 
Enyidzi suro a wɔdze hwɛ W',
Sua a yesua, n-tam a yɛka,
Hɛn Wura Jesus, pen do gye.
 
. Dza W'enyi ehwiram' ehu 
Dɛ ogu hɛn afɔr ho fi n',
Yɛakotow komm wɔ W'enyim yi,
Hɛn Wura Jesus, fa kyɛ hɛn.
title: William Morley Punshon, 1824-81.

name: MHB 667:1
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, da a 'dze kyɛɛ hɛn n' asa, 
Sum etsin W'asɛm do rehyɛ;
Yɛtoow hɛn anapa ndwom maa Wo
W'abɔdzin bɛtsew hen nda ho.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 667:2
verse:
. Ndaase nka W' dɛ W' Asɔr risi pi, 
Ber a wiadze rokɔ kan mu;
W' Asɔr roweɔn wɔ wiadze nyina,
Ɔnngye n' ahom dabiara pɛn.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 667:3
verse:
. Aber a 'napawi hyerɛn ka 
N-kurow a wɔda ham' na pom',
Asɔryɛ ndze ɔda ho ara,
Ayɛyindwom ɔmmbɔ adze da.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 667:4
verse:
. Ewia rinyan hɛn enuanom a 
Wɔtse anee ber a yɛadeda;
Dɔnhwer nyina ano fofor ma
Wɔtse Wo nyɛe nwanwa n' wɔ sor.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 667:5
verse:
. Ɔnyɛ dɛm daa, hɛn Wura; W'ahengua 
Nnkotwam' da dɛ amansuon tum;
W'ahenman betsim hɔ akɛpem dɛ
Ibedzi adze nyina do hen.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 668:1
verse:
. Sor abɔfo ndze nye nsanku 
Twa W'ahengua ho,
Wɔwosow n-dwom dɛɛdɛw a
Ɔmmbɔ adze ara da;
M-pempem na wohyira Wo
Dɛ tum nyina 
Ewuradze.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: MHB 668:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a ewɔ sorsor noho 
Mbrɛ nyimpa nntum nnhu n',
Aso abɔn yɛtow ndwom a,
Ɔwo 'bu no bi?
Na yetum hu dɛ ebɛn hɛn
Na itsie hɛn?
Nyew, yetum.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: MHB 668:5
verse:
. Tum nye enyidzi nye enyimnyam. 
Bɛyɛ Wodze daa,
Egya, Ba, na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa siarfo.
Dza edze ama no mu mapa n',
Na sor na ase
San dze ma W'.    Amen.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: MHB 668:34
verse:
. Nyew, yenyim dɛ idzi ehurusi 
Wɔ W'edwinsa ho;
Eyɛɛ asowa na nsa na kɔmɛr
Dze maa W'ayɛyi;
Dwimfo nyansa, sanku ne dɛw,
Ne nyina bɔm' ma W'
Enyigye.
 
. Tumfo Nyame, Woara Wodze 
Na yɛdze brɛ Wo,
Ɔmmfata dze, naaso yɛserɛ
Dɛ gye n' dɛmara:
'Koma, adwen, nsa, na kɔmɛr,
Yɛdze bɔm' wɔ
Hɛn ndwom pam'.
title: Francis Pott, 1832-1909.

name: MHB 669:1
verse:
. EWURADZE pa, adasa Egya,
Fa hɛn m-fom kyɛ hɛn;
Ma hɛn adwen a ɔfata
Wɔ abrabɔ krɔnkrɔn som mu,
Wɔ enyidzi ayɛyi mu.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 669:2
verse:
. Yɛntwer Wo tse dɛ hɔn a wɔtsee
Wɔ Syrian epo ho n',
Ewuradze N'adom frɛ no;
Mma hɛn so yɛnnka asɛm biara,
Na yɛnsoɛr ndzi W'ekyir.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 669:3
verse:
. O Galilee ahomgye da
O mbepɔw do kommyɛ,
Mbrɛ Jesus buu n-kotodwe!
Na ɔkaa onnyiewiei ho nsɛm,
Ɔdze ɔdɔ kyerɛɛ ase!
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 669:4
verse:
. Dɛ kommyɛ a no mu dɔ no
Bor hɛn nsɛm nye ndwuma do;
Wo frɛ a ɔwasa bɔkɔɔ no,
Dɛm na ma Wo nhyira no ngu
Dɛ Wo manna tɔe no.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 669:5
verse:
. Ma Wo bɔsu nkɔ do nsosɔ
Nkɛpem hɛn aperdzi ewiei!
Yi hɛn akra adzesoa no,
Na hɛn bra a ahyehyɛ ama hɛn nka
W'asomdwee ne fɛw no.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 669:6
verse:
. Gu ahom gu hɛn apɛdze do,
Wo kommyɛ eduyɛ mu,
Adwen ntaa dzinn, honam nyɛ komm;
'Saasewosow, ehum nye gya m'
Yɛntse Wo ndze tseaa no.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 670:1
verse:
. JESUS, hɛn enyigye nyina,
Ɔwo a yɛma hɛn ndze do ma W',
Yɛdze hɛn ahoɔdzen ma W',
Ma adom a yɛserɛ ahobrɛadze mu
N-dan nyɛ ndaase ara nko,
Na ɔnsesa Wo nkorɔfo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 670:2
verse:
. Yɛbɔ m' yɛ ɔsor edwuma yi,
W'enyimnyam no nyɛ hɛn botae;
W'enyimnyam, nnyɛ hɛndze,
Yɛnkɔ do n-hwɛ hɛn ewiei.
Yɛnkɔ do ndzi dwuma a ɔsɔ enyi,
Na aasɔ Nyame nko enyi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 670:3
verse:
. Mma ahantan, enyitsew bɔn
Nnwiawia hɔnho mmba mu mmbɛsɛɛ,
Mmbɛhyɛ Wo ebufuw;
Onngu hɛn adwontow ho fi,
Na wɔmma hɛn som no nnyɛ gyan,
Na wɔnnsɛɛ, hɛn afɔrbɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 670:4
verse:
. O ma hɛn nkwa nda nyinara
Yɛmfa kommyɛ dɛw a fɛr wɔ m'
Nda Wo dɔ no edzi;
Yɛmma hɛn konyim do wɔ wu m'!
Yɛnye ɔsor dɔm nyina ntow ndwom,
Ɔsor ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 671:1
verse:
. Hom ntow Alleluia nkyerɛ hom ndaase, 
Ao, ɔsor mba, hom mfa ndze dɛɛdɛw nhur
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 671:2
verse:
. Kuro krɔnkrɔn no bɛgye hom ndwom no do, 
Na wɔdze ehurusi ndwom enyan
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 671:3
verse:
. Hɔ na hom bɔbɔm' atow afebɔɔ, 
Ndwom a ɔkyerɛ hom Hen N'enyimnyam,
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 671:4
verse:
. Iyi nye afonafo hɔn ahomgye, 
Edziban na nsu a obi nnkehia,
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 671:56
verse:
. Bɔadze a eyɛ adze nyina Yɛfo, 
Yɛdze ndwom bɔ de yi W' ayɛ afebɔɔ
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
 
. Ɔdomankoma Ba, yɛma hɛn ndze do ma W'; 
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, hɛn nyina bɔm' tow Wo
Alleluia a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 672:1
verse:
. GYEFO, Agyenkwa siarfo;
Tsie hɛn adwontow;
Hɛn akoma na ndze da m'
Yi hɛn Hen ayɛw,
Dza yɛwɔ ma W' biara,
Yɛwɔ enyidar dɛ
Nyimpadua, kra, sunsum,
Yɛdze ne nyina ma W'.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 672:2
verse:
. Hɛn enyim ara na, Christ,
Yɛba dze bɛn Wo;
Yɛsɔr Wo enyidzi m',
Na yɛkotow Wo,
Osian hɛn nkwagye ntsi
Ɔwo 'bae bowui;
Edzi hɛn enyim kan
Wɔ sor dɛ yɛmfa W'.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 672:3
verse:
. Ɔsor kandzea no pue
Hɛn enyim hyɛnn ara,
Ɔdze fakyɛ ho nsɛm
Pam hɛn awerɛhow;
Abrabɔ sum ahera,
Kan hyerɛn hɛn mu;
Edze Wo kan ahyerɛn
Hɛn bɔ wiadze 'i do.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 672:4
verse:
. Yɛkɔ hɛn enyim ara
Wɔ hɛn akwantu n' mu,
Kwan a 'hotsewfo duaa m'
Dzii kan Nyame fie;
Yengyaa wiadze ekyir,
Yɛmpem nkɔ kan ara;
Yennkobu hɛn kɔn 'kyir,
Na yeenya ahenkyɛw n'.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 672:5
verse:
. Gyefo, gya akra a apon hɛn
Ma yɛnkɔ sor ara;
Hɛn werɛ mfir wiadze fona,
Yɛmbɛn hɛn ahenman n',
Bea a 'hotsewfo, abɔfo,
Bɔ m' tow ndwom dɛw mu;
Wɔmmberɛ, wɔmmfona ara wɔ
Hɛn Hen N'ayɛyi m'.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 673:1
verse:
. ESUSOW ewia robɔ 
Po nye asaase do;
Enyigye kan rehyerɛn
A wɔdze ma kwa.
Biribiara ridzi dɛw
Wɔ kan fɛɛfɛw mu;
Wiadze ndze mpempem nyina
Tow ayɛyi ndwom.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 673:2
verse:
. Nyame No mbɔbɔrhu
Wɔ wiadze nyina,
Na Ne frankaa rihim
Wɔ mbea nyinara,
Ɔtserɛw, ɔyɛ enyimnyam,
Ɔtse dɛ ɔsor
Ne bɛkyebo dɔ no,
Ɔhyerɛn konyimdzi m'.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 673:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, hue Wo kan
Gu hɛn enyifura do;
Osian W'ayamuyie ntsi
Ma yɛndɔ W' mbordo.
Na mununkum boa ano
Tumm wɔ sor mpo a,
Yi nkataenyim n' fi hɔ,
Egya, twe bɛn hɛn.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 673:4
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 674:1
verse:
. O NYAME Dɔ! Wo daa nserɛmɛn
Hyerɛn enyiwa a onnhu adze do,
Na ihyira hɛn wɔ adaaso m',
Yɛdan Wo gya a, Wo so gyaa hɛn.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 674:2
verse:
. Akra a wɔper hwehwɛ W' nyina
Ikenyan akoma a ɔbɔ mpaa;
Sum mu o, kan mu o, Wo gyirama gya n'
Sisi ebusua nye aman do.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 674:3
verse:
. Innyim ɔhe ɔnye gyedzi,
W'adom tsen du obiara do;
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n'atasaban no,
Gyina etsir nyinara do.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 674:4
verse:
. Nokwar a nkɔnhyɛfo hunii no,
Wɔhwehwɛe, wohum wɔ hɔn mu;
Ɔdɔ mbra a ɔbor mbra nyina do,
Abrabɔ bunkam wu, bɔn do.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 674:5
verse:
. Hyerɛn, Nyame Kan! Yi Woho edzi
Kyerɛ hɔn a wohu amandze nyina;
Ma ɔnkyɛn dza hɛn enyi da do n',
Fa Wo dɔ sɛɛ hɛn apɛdze.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 675:1
verse:
. JESUS, bea a Wo nkorɔfo hyia nyina,
Wohu W'ehumbɔbɔr egua hɔ;
Bea a wɔhwehwɛ Wo, wohu Wo,
Na beebiara yɛ krɔnkrɔn bea.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 675:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a wonntum nnsiw Wo kwan,
Etse ahobrɛadze akoma m';
Wɔdze Wo ba beebi a wɔba,
Wɔdze Wo kɔ hɔn efiefi.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 675:3
verse:
. Hɔn a woeyi hɔn hɔn Hwɛfo pa,
Yɛ Wo kan mbɔrbɔrhu fofor,
Wo nkwagye dzin a ɔyɛ dɛw n',
Hɛn akoma paa mu ka wɔ ha.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 675:4
verse:
. Yɛbɔsɔ mpaabɔ tum ahwɛ,
Ahyɛ gyedzi nye nhwɛdo dzen;
Akyerɛkyerɛ hɛn apɛdze a abotow
Ma yeehu dza ɔwɔ sor nyina.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 675:5
verse:
. Owura, yesuar naaso Ɔwo bɛn,
Wo nsa nnyɛ tsia, W'aso nnsiwii;
O fi ɔsor bra famu ntsɛm,
Bɛfa akoma mpem yɛ Wodze.
title: William Cowper, 1731 -1800.

name: MHB 676:1
verse:
. Hɛn Nyame yɛ Kɛse, 
N'ayɛyi nyɛ kɛse;
Ɔyɛ N'asɔrasɔr Ne fie,
N' egua a N'enyi gye mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 676:2
verse:
. N'adom Asɔrfi horow, 
Mbrɛ wodua yɛ fɛw a!
Hɛn asaase do enyidzi,
Hɛn man twitwagyefo.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 676:3
verse:
. Zion na wonyim dɛ 
Nyame yɛ guansumabew;
Mbrɛ No nkwagye esi ahyerɛn
Wɔ n'ahemfie nyina a.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 676:4
verse:
. Ɔhaw fofor biaram'! 
Yɛbɛkɛhyɛ Ne fie;
Yɛbɔdwen N'adom nwanwa n' ho,
Na hɔ yɛanhwehwɛ ɔgye.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 677:1
verse:
. Nyame, Yɛdɔ Wo Fie, 
Mbrɛ W'enyidzi wɔ no;
Wo tsenabea no mu dɛw
Kyɛn wiadze dɛw nyina.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: MHB 677:2
verse:
. Ɔyɛ m-paabɔ fie, 
Mbrɛ Wo nkowaa dzi ehyia;
Na 'Wo, Ewuradze,
Eba behyira Wo mba.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: MHB 677:3
verse:
. Yɛdɔ n-kwasɛm no; 
Ɔma hɛn asomdwee,
Nye dzenhyɛ wɔ ko mu,
Nye dɛw a ɔmmbɔ adze.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: MHB 677:4
verse:
. Yɛdɔ dɛ yɛtow ndwom 
Kamfo Wo mbɔbɔrhu;
Na mbom yɛpɛ yeesua
Ɔsor konyimdzi ndwom.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: MHB 677:5
verse:
. Hɛn Wura Jesus, dom hɛn 
Ma yɛndɔ Wo mbordo,
Na ndaamba yeebohu
Na yaasom Wo sor hɔ.    Amen.
title: William Bullock, 1798-1874

name: MHB 678:5
verse:
. Nyame dɔ No nkorɔfo, 
Hɔn a wɔsɔ N'enyi n'
Akra krɔnkrɔn botoo n',
Ɔnnkan hɔn Ne ndzepa:
Nyia ne kra twer
Dɔm Ewuradze 
Wo nkotoo n', yɛ 
Siarfo mprɛnsa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 678:1234
verse:
. Sor wiadze horow Nyame, 
Mbrɛ Wo dɔ tsenabea
Na ase ha asɔrfi
Dua yɛ fɛw yɛ ahomka a!
M'akoma per
Ba Wo tsebea
Ama oeehu
Me Nyankopɔn.
 
. Ao, akra esiarfo na  
Wɔsɔr bea a Nyame tsie,
Ao, esiarfo nye hɔn 
A wɔsom wɔ hɔ daa!
Wɔtonton Wo,
Wɔyɛ esiarfo
Hɔn a wɔfow
Zion kokwaa n'!
 
. Wofi ahomm' kɔ ahom mu, 
Wɔ nyinsu bɔnsa yim',
Kɛpem dɛ obiara dzi nyim,
Kɛpem dɛ obiara pue sor,
'Nyimnyam egua!
Hɛn Hen Nyame
Dze hɛn pɛ anan
Dze bodu hɔ.
 
. Nyame nye hɛn 'kokyɛm, 
Hɛn kan na akoban;
Ne nsamu akyɛdze ma,
Yenya hɛn nhyira fir mu
Ɔbɔdom hɛn
Nkorɔfo nyina
Nkwagye adom,
Nye enyimnyam so.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 679:4
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 679:123
verse:
. Wo sor abangua yɛ fɛw, 
Wɔ kan na dɔ man no mu;
Ha so W'abangua yɛ fɛw,
Wɔ bɔn na mbusu man yim'
Ao, mo sunsum no kɔn dɔ
W'asɔrmba hɔn fɛkuwbɔ,
W'enyim ne hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw n',
W'amayɛ n', Adom Nyame!
 
. Abɔso Nyame, nnoma a 
Wosu kyin Wo fie, woewie!
Na akra a wɔhom sor Egya
No bom' no, woewie dodow!
Wɔtse dɛ ebubur n' a
Oennya 'saase do sibea n',
Wɔsan kɔ hɔn hɛn no mu,
Hɔ na hɔn enyi gye daa.
 
. Woewie ampa! hɔn ayɛyi 
Pem mbusu bɔnsa 'i mu mpo;
N-su pue sar do ma hɔn,
Edziban fi sor nyɛn hɔn.
Wofi ahom mu kɔ ahom mu,
Dze kodu W'ahengua n' ho;
W'anan ho na wobom som,
'Wo a agye hɔn ne nyinam'.
title: Henry Frances Lyte, 1793-1847.

name: MHB 680:3
verse:
. Ebusua wɔtɔ dɛ 
Wɔbɔ punkum ba ha;
Ehumbɔbɔr egua n'enyim
Wɔdze dɛw kotow hɔ.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 680:6
verse:
. Hɛn afɛ nye enuanom 
Nnkɛpa hɛn mpaayim' da;
Wohyiam' asɔryɛm' ara pem a
Nyame mma N'asomdwee!  Amen.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 680:12
verse:
. M'akoma dzii ehurusi 
Dɛ me mfɛfo see dɛ,
Bra ma yɛnkɔ Nyame Ne fie;
Afahyɛ da nye ndɛ.
 
. Hɛn anan bɛyɛ ntsɛm 
Ahɛn asɔrdan nom'
Ber a mobra na mpanyin pii
Rehyɛ som-bea no ma.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 680:45
verse:
. Sɔr ma Jerusalem, 
Nyankopɔm ahenkurow n';
Nyame ntɔ Ne nhyira ngu hɔn a
Wɔdɔ Ne fie papa.
 
. Ha 'i dze wɔmma koryɛ 
Na asomdwee ntsintsim daa;
Zion, ahonya pii nhyehyɛ
W'ahemfi amaama.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 681:1
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHU nye adom Nyame,
Da W'enyim ne hyerɛn edzi;
Hyerɛn hɛn do, Gyefo, hyerɛn,
Ma Wo kan nhyerɛn W'asɔr mu,
Ma Wo nkwagye ahoɔdzen
Ondu wiadze beebiara.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 681:2
verse:
. Ma nkorɔfo no nyi W' ayɛw,
Hɔn a wɔtse ase ntonton Wo;
Ma aman no ntsea m' ntow ndwom,
Enyimnyam nka Hen Gyefo!
Mfa hɔn adwontow mbra W'enyim,
Wobetsie Wo pɛ krɔnkrɔn n'.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 681:3
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 682:1
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHU nye adom Nyame,
'Hobrɛadze m' yɛhwɛ W'enyim,
Fi ɔsor Wo tsenabea
    Tsie, fa kyɛ, gye nkwa.
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 682:2
verse:
. Yehyia W'asɔrdan no mu
Dze dza yehia ba W'enyim,
Serɛ wɔ W' mbɔbɔr egua enyim;
   Fi ɔsor gye hɛn.
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 682:3
verse:
. Wo dɔ hyɛ akoma ma,
Na yɛpɛ ayɛ Wo pɛ;
Wɔkɔ W' koko krɔnkrɔn n' do,
  Owura, suo m', gye nkwa.
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 682:4
verse:
. Yɛman fi Wo nguankuw ho
Na hɛn dɔ ma Wo yɛ nwin a,
Fa mbɔbɔr enyi hwɛ hɛn;
  Fa kyɛ na gye nkwa.
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 682:5
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 682:6
verse:
. Mbrɛ hɛn sufrɛ tse biara,
Yɛma hɛn akoma do ma W' a,
Yi hɛn adzesoa fi hɔ!
Tsie, fa kyɛ, gye nkwa.  Amen.
title: Eliza Fanny Goffe Morris, 1821-74.

name: MHB 683:1
verse:
. HWƐ, Nyame wɔ ha! Yɛntonton N'
Na yenhu dɛ bea yi yɛ hu!
Dza ɔwɔ hɛn mu nyina ntse No tum,
Wɔmbɔ hɔn mu adze komm N'enyim;
Hɔn a wonyim No tum, N'adom
Dze suro som No, dze enyidzi dɔ N'.
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 683:2
verse:
. Hwɛ, Nyame wɔ ha! Ɔno na
Abɔfo adwontofo tow N' ndwom,
Ɔno na wɔakrɔn N' ɔsorsor;
Ɔsor dɔm dze ayɛyi ma N',
Ewuradze, mma mmpow hɛn ndwom no,
Gyirama a ɔdodow yi W' ayɛw.
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 683:3
verse:
. Atseasefo mu Ɔtseasenyi,
Hɛn ayɛyi mfow ndu Wo nkyɛn, 
Ma yɛnda ho ngyina W'enyim,
Yɛnda ho ntse, yɛnyɛ Wo pɛ;
Hɛn adwen nyina mbra Wo do,
Mma nngyaa dɛ egye hɛn afɔr.
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 683:4
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ nhyiren paa na ɔgye
Ewia ne hyew enyigye mu n',
Ma hɛn nsa nka Wo kan biara,
Na ma Wo tum no nkenyan hɛn;
Eyɛ bɛkyebo kan mu Kan,
Ogya a ɔhyew na okenyan
title: Gerhard Tersteegen, 1697-1769

name: MHB 684:123
verse:
. Jesus, fa wusoɛr tum n' 
Gyina hɛn finimfin;
Ma hɛn asɔryɛ yi
Ɔnyɛ mber krɔnkrɔn.
 
. Hue Wo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn 
Gu akoma nyina do;
Tu suro na yaw fi
Akra nyina mu.
 
. Na yebemia mu dzen 
Yeetu hɛn kwan yi,
Dɛ hɛn enyiwa da
Bɛkyebo da n' kwan.   Amen.
title: William Pennefather, 1816-73.

name: MHB 685:1
verse:
. HOM nsoɛr nhyira Ewuradze,
Hom nyimpa a woeyi hom,
Hom nsoɛr mfa akoma, kra nye ndze
Nhyira Ewuradze, Nyakopͻn.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 685:2
verse:
. Ͻsén ayɛyi nyina dze,
Ͻbor nhyira nyina do dze;
Woana na onnkosuro Ne dzin,
Nnyi N’ aysw, nnkamfo No?
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 685:3
verse:
. Nkyɛ ogya a onndum da
Fi N’afͻrmbukyia do
Aaka hɛn ano, ekenyan hɛn,
Dze hɛn adwen eetsim sor!
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 685:4
verse:
. Hͻ ͻbrɛ N’aso adze
Dze tsie ndwom a yɛtow;
Onnyi Noho nnkyérɛ nyimpa dze,
Hɛn sunsum tse Ne nka.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 685:5
verse:
. Nyame nye hɛn ahoͻdzen,
No nkwagye yɛ hɛndze;
Yɛdze hɛn ahoͻdzen nyina
Bɛka No dͻ ho asɛm.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 685:6
verse:
. Hom nsoͻɛ nhyira Ewuradze,
Hom ntonton Ewuradze;
Hom nsoɛr nhyira N’enyimnyam dzin n’,
Ofi ndɛ nye daa nyina.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 686:1
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 686:2
verse:
. Yɛma do kɔ sor sen mfe a abɛsen n',
Bɔn a ogu hɛn ho fi, suro a ɔhyɛ hɛn do,
Ekyingye bɔw nye dɔ aprɔw mu,
Kan Wura, yɛma hɛn akoma do ndɛ.
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 686:3
verse:
. Akɔhwi nye enyiwa atɛkyɛ,
Ndzeyɛɛ nye nsusui a ɔnnhyɛ enyimnyam,
Tɛkyerɛma a ɔdodow asɛnka ho,
Nokwar Wura, yi Christianfo fi mu.
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 686:4
verse:
. Ma akyɛdze biara a edze ama no do;
Adze pa da famu a, gyedɛ wɔama do,
Akoma nye adwen a wɔakyekyer da famu,
Nyame dze mae, na ɔsan kɔ Ne nkyɛn.
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 686:5
title: Henry Montagu Butler, 1833-1918.

name: MHB 687:1
verse:
. MOBϽ mo mu adze komm W’enyim,
Bra na besiesie me kra na
Ͻmfata dɛ odzi sor edziban,
Mo Wura, nkwa, m’adze nyina.
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 687:2
verse:
. Ͻwo nyim mo mu adwembͻn,
Ͻmma munntum minndzi nyim koraa,
Wͻ nankasa ͻnye bͻn do;
Mo Wura, nkwa, m’adze nyina.
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 687:3
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 687:4
verse:
. Minnyi tum ka Wodze nko ho,
Boa ma memfa m’akoma mma Wo;
Dzi me bra do, fa yɛ ahengua,
Mo Wura, nkwa, m’adze nyina.
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 687:5
title: James Robert Batey, 1878-

name: MHB 688:1
verse:
. NYAME hɛn Egya, Ɔwo ayɛ hɛn kor,
Akoma fam akoma ho, wɔ Wo Dɔba n' mu;
Yeridzi mpaa m' na obiara akɔ no kwan,
Ma ano na ndze biara nyi W' ayɛw.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 688:2
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Wo hɛn fɛkuwbɔ ntsi,
Akoma, kra, nye adwen fɛkuwbɔ;
Ayɛyi nka Wo, ɔdɔ nuayɛ ntsi,
Koryɛ a ndzepa Wura edze ba n' ntsi.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 688:3
verse:
. Owura, hyɛ dzen na Wo nko na inyim,
Inyim mber a yeguan fi atamfo enyim;
Mpɛn dodow a yɛkɔ sum mu nsɔhwɛ mu n',
Yɛyew Wo tum nye W' nsa aɔda hɛn do.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 688:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, ofi ndɛ kɔ nye hɛn nkɔ,
Ka hɛn ho wɔ hɛn daa dwumadzi mu;
Ber a eka hɛn ho n' obira bohu
Dɛ ɔsor nhyira hyɛ ase wɔ ha.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 689:1
verse:
. 'EWimbir ansaana wi rotɔ n' 
Ewuradze, nna ayarfo gu W' nkyɛn;
Ao, yaw horow bɛn nna ɔannka hɔn!
Ao, dɛw bɛn nna wɔammfa annkɔ!
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:2
verse:
. Bio, edu 'wimbir, na hɛn so 
Yɛdze yarba horow twe pin;
Sɛ Yennhu wo mpo a, ɔyɛ dɛn?
Yenyim na yɛtse dɛ 'wɔ ha.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:3
verse:
. Agyenkwa Christ, pam hɛn mbusu, 
Na binom abɔm,
Na binom nndɔɔ W' nokwar mu pɛn,
Binom so ayew dɔ a wonyae.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:4
verse:
. Binom hu dɛ wiadze yɛ gyan, 
Naaso wonntum mmfi wiadze nsa;
Binom hɔn mfɛfo how hɔn werɛ,
Naaso wɔmmfaa Ɔwo nnyɛɛ nyɛnko.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:5
verse:
. Ewuradze hɔn nyina serɛ ahomgye, 
Na wobefi bɔn mu koraa;
Hɔn a wɔper asom Wo yie n'
Nna wohu bɔn a ɔwɔ hɔn mu.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:6
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 689:7
verse:
. Wo nsaano wɔ tum dɛ tsetse n', 
W'anomusɛm biara nnkefir gyan;
Ewimbir bɔw nwinwin yim' tsie,
Na W'ehumbɔbɔbɔrm' sa hɛn yar.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 690:1
verse:
. HԐN ayɛyi da asa,
Ewimbir sum aba,
Na sɛ ewia tͻ a, mum mmfi hɛn nkyɛm;
Adze nyina m’ nokwar kan.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 690:2
verse:
. Ͻsor ahengua no ho.
Mbrɛ adze nnsa da no,
Nsankubͻfo hyɛ ntar fitaa,
Tow Wo ndwom daa nyina.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 690:3
verse:
. Hɛn adwontow ya mberɛw,
Yɛbérɛ ayɛyi mu ntsɛm;
Na sor adwontofo no dze
Hͻn ndwom dzi mu, yɛ dɛw.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 690:4
verse:
. Naaso Ewuradze, Ͻwo pɛ
Dɛ edan hɛn Akoma a,
Hɛn so yɛbͻtow ndwom kakra
Aka abͻfo ndwom ho.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 690:5
verse:
. Ͻwo na edwedwé akra,
Na etwé etuatsewfo nyina,
Na ema ayɛyi hyɛ hɛn bra ma,
Dze hyɛ Wo dzin enyimnyam.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 690:6
verse:
. Aka kumaa bi ma
Enyimnyam ewiei no aba,
Ma abͻfo na nyimpa hͻn ndwom
Aabͻ m’ W’ayɛyi mu.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 691:1
verse:
. AGYENKWA, yɛma Wo dzin pa n’ do bio
Akoma kor m’ yɛtow hɛn mpaamudzi ayɛyi;
Yegyina hͻ hyira Wo ansaana yɛapon,
Na yɛkotow tweͻn W’asomdweesɛm no.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 691:2
verse:
. Ma hɛn W’asomdwee bér a yɛrokͻ fie,
Yɛdze Wo hyɛɛ ase, na yɛdze W’ bowie;
Hɛn ano nnka bͻn, hɛn enyim nngu ase,
Na ofie yi mu na yeabͻ Wo dzin.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 691:3
verse:
. Ma hɛn W’asomdwee, wͻ anafua yi mu,
Dan sum no ma ͻnye ekan mma hɛn,
Gye Wo mba fi ͻhaw nye mbusu mu,
Na sum nye kan nyina yɛ pɛr W’enyim.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 691:4
verse:
. Ma hɛn W’asomdwee hɛn asetsena mu,
Hɛn awerɛhow mu na hɛn aperdzi mu,
Afei, ber a Wo ndze ma akodzi bͻ adze,
Ewuradze, frɛ hɛn kͻ W’asomdwee mu.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 692:1
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 692:2
verse:
. Da no asa, ne mber etwa m',
Na Ɔwo nyim no mu nsɛm nyina;
Konyim kakra a adom dze bae n',
Oebu anohoba do, ahwe ase.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 692:3
verse:
. Owura, gye hɛn fi akwan bɔn do,
Fakyɛ turodoo nye ɔgye;
Fa ahotsew nye asomdwee
Hyira hɛn ma ɔnsen nda no a etwa m'.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 692:4
verse:
. Fa kyɛ mbordo, ma hɛn dɛw,
Suro mapa ɔnye fahodzi,
Na dɔ akoma a nkekae nnyi mu,
Dza ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye Wo sɛ.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 692:5
verse:
. Yɛfrɛ hɛn adɔfo nyina brɛ Wo
Ehiafo, 'werɛhofo, abɔn;
Ma W'ehumbɔbɔr n' mma hɛn dɛw,
'Wo nye hɛn Jesus, hɛn adze nyina.
title: Frederick William Faber, 1814-63.

name: MHB 693:1
title: John Fawcett, 1740-1817.

name: MHB 693:2
title: John Fawcett, 1740-1817.

name: MHB 694:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, ayɛ hɛn tsenebea
Wɔ mbasantsen nyina mu;
Wo nkorɔfo da ho hu W'adom,
Woehyira W'awerɛkyekyer;
Etsie hɛn sufrɛ ber biara,
Yehu dɛ ebɛn ber biara,
Hɛn ahoɔdzen nye hɛn nkwagye.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 694:2
verse:
. Yɛtɔ dɛ yesu hɛn bɔn ho,
Yɛyɛ dze akyerɛ W'abotar,
Naaso yɛda ho kura W' gyedzi m'
Yɛda ho dɔ Wo dzin no;
Na akora hɛn na adɔ hɛn yie,
'Ma hɛn kwan dɛ yɛntsena Wo mu,
Na yennhinhim, yenntutu.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 694:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, biribiara nnkotum
Agye W' nkorɔfo efi Wo nsamu,
Hɛn Boafo nnkefi hɔ ara da;
Nyame nnkedzi hɛn huambɔ,
Wo nkorɔfo atsena Wo mu;
'Bɛda ho ayɛ hɛn tsenabea
Daa, afebɔɔ, afebɔɔ.
title: Thomas Hornblower Gill, 1819-1906.

name: MHB 695:1
verse:
. AYƐYI rotweɔn Wo Zion,
Mpaabɔ bɛhyɛ W'asɔrdan ma;
Nyimpa nyina bɛba W'egua ho,
Enya Christ mu nkwagye wɔ hɔ.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 695:2
verse:
. Hɛn sunsum fɔn, hɛn bɔn dzi nyim,
Mma hɛn ahopopo akoma nnsuro;
Ɔwo a itsie mpaabɔ, sian bra
Bɛyɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo nyɛnko.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 695:3
verse:
. W'ahotsewfo n' woehyira hɔn,
Wɔakora hɔn do, wɔnyɛn hɔn daa;
Asaase nye po nyina Agyenkwa,
Hɔn a wɔdan Wo nya enyigye.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 695:4
verse:
. Wo nsa na edze yɛɛ mbepɔw,
Wo ndze taa po asorɛkye dzinn;
'Napa, 'wimbir, woyi W'ayɛw,
Emaa asaase yii no ndɔbaa.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 695:5
verse:
. W'ayamuyie ahyɛ afe n' mu ma,
Wo mununkum tɔ asaase do nsu,
Wo mu sar pradada tow ndwom,
Abɔdze serew, ohu ne Hen.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 695:6
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 696:1
verse:
. HOM a hom yɛ ɔsor Hen mba,
Hom ntow ndwom hom akwantu mu;
Hom ntow hom Agyenkwa ayɛyi,
Enyimnyam wɔ No ndwuma m'.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 696:2
verse:
. Yerutu kwan akɔ Nyame nkyɛn,
Ɔkwan a egyanom faa do n'.
Hɔn enyi agye sesei,
Ɔnnkɛkyɛr na yeehu yi.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 696:3
verse:
. Okuw ketseaba, hom ntsea m',
Hom mbɔhom Jesus Ne nkyɛn,
Woesiesie hom ngua wɔ hɔ,
Hom ahenman nye akatua.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 696:4
verse:
. Hom mma hom enyi do, kan mba;
Zion kurow da hom enyim,
Hɔ, ɔbɛyɛ hɛn fie daa,
Yebohu hɛn Wura ntsɛm.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 696:5
verse:
. Enuanom, hom nyina mfa
Dɛw ngyina hom ahe do;
Jesus Christ, hom Egya Ne Ba n'
Hyɛ hom dɛ hom nkɔ kan ndam m'.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 696:6
verse:
. Ewuradze, yetsie kɔ kan,
Dze dɛw gya ne nyina wɔ ha,
Wo nko ara dzi hɛn bano
Na yebedzi W'ekyir daa.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 697:1
verse:
. NHYIRA nye akra abrɛfo a
Wohu hͻn hia dɛ wͻnnsɛ hwee;
Wͻama hͻn adom akyɛdze,
Nye dɛw ahenkyɛw a ͻwͻ sor.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 697:2
verse:
. Nhyira nye hͻn a hͻn akoma ebubu,
Bͻn ntsi wodzi yaw wͻ hͻn mu;
Christ No bͻgyaa krͻnkrͻn pem dɛ
Ayarsa ma hͻn yaw nyinara.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 697:3
verse:
. Nhyira nyé akra a wͻhwehwɛ adorn;
’Kͻm nye nsukͻm wo tsénenee ntsi,
Wͻdze nkwa nsu nye edziban
Bɛmema hͻn ama wͻaamee.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 697:4
verse:
. Nhyira nye akomamutsewfo,
Woefi bͻn no tum no ase;
Wodze enyigyé a onnyi ewiei
Bohu Nyamé a ͻyɛ krͻnkrͻn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 697:5
verse:
. Nhyira nye amandzehufo,
Jesus ntsi wohu amandze;
Hͻn kra bedzi nyim Nyame mu.
'Nyimnyam, dɛw nye hͻn akatua.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 698:1
verse:
. OWURA Jesus, fa W‘adom no
Bɛtséna hɛn mu afebͻͻ,
Na mma yɛmma bͻn kwan koraa,
Na yɛnnhow Wo werɛ.
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;

name: MHB 698:2
verse:
. Fa W’asɛm bɛtsena hɛn mu.
Pomfo a yɛdͻ Wo;
Ma hɛn Wo mboa nye mbͻbͻrhu
Na tsenabew wͻ sor.
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;

name: MHB 698:3
verse:
. Fa Wo kan bɛtsena hɛn mu,
Kan a ͻhyérɛn hɛn do,
Na ma Wo nokwar nkyérɛ hɛn kwan,
Na amma yaannhwé ase.
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;

name: MHB 698:4
verse:
. ’Nye hɛn ntsena na hyira hɛn,
Asomdwee Ewuradze;
Adom na tum aahyɛ hɛn ma,
To hɛn gyedzi na dͻ m’.
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;

name: MHB 698:5
verse:
. Bɛtsena hɛn mu dɛ hɛn kyɛm,
Dzi Wo dͻm do Ͻsahen,
Na yeenngyaa hɛnho amma wiadze,
Na yemmfi hɛn gyinabew.
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;

name: MHB 698:6
verse:
. Bɛtséna hɛn mu wͻ dͻ mapa m’,
Yɛ hɛn Nyamé Agyenkwa;
Yɛnkyerɛ Wo mboa wͻ ahokyer mu,
Kora hɛn Wo mu nokwar m'.    Amen.
title: Josua Stegmann, 1588-1632;

name: MHB 699:1
verse:
. HƐN Pomfo, Wura yɛ kɛse,
Tum, nokwar nye adom mu;
Ɔsorsorfo tonton N' daa,
N'asɔrmba yi N' ayɛw.
Hɛn Nyankopɔn kurow no mu,
Bepɔw krɔnkrɔn a ɔwɔ ase n',
Hom mfa Ne dzin no ntahye,
Hom nda N' kɛseyɛ edzi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 699:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, W'adɔyɛ ntsi
Yɛtsena W'asɔrdan mu,
Ha Wo nokwar dɔ no da
Wo nkwagye tum edzi;
Wo dzin ma yeyi W'ayɛw,
Na W'emudzi no hyerɛn,
Wiadze nyina bɛgye ato m',
Wo ndwuma yɛ krɔnkrɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 699:3
verse:
. Hwɛ, Asɛmpa Asɔr n' tsim hɔ,
Na osi botan do;
N'anohoba yɛ nokwar,
Woana behim N'aban?
Kan no sombea a ɔsom bo;
Ka kyerɛ nkyirmba so bi.
Nyame tum abɔ ho ban,
Asɔr no ronnhwe ase.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 699:4
verse:
. Zion Nyame yɛ hɛndze,
Hɛndze, yɛtwer No dɔ;
Yeehu Ne fakyɛ dɔ no,
Yɛtse ase, wu ma Christ:
Ɔbɛyɛ hɛn Kwankyerɛfo
'Kɔ Jerusalem fofor m';
Yɛgye N', na yɛhom No mu,
Wɔ mfesantsen nyin m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 700:1
verse:
. NYIA no werɛ hyɛ Nyame m',
Na ɔtse bɔgya no tum n',
Gyina pintsinn wɔ ehumtu ber m'
Dɛ Nyame Ne bepɔw:
Onnhinhim, osi pi,
Ne Zion nnkodwuruw da;
N'agyedzifo gyina pintsinn
Wɔ Jesu No dɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 700:2
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ nkokwaa etwa
Jerusalem ho ehyia n',
Dɛm na Nyame bɔ hom ho ban
Fi atamfo nyina nsamu;
Ogyina akwan nyina m',
Twitwa gye N' Israel,
Na No tum nsamu na ɔdze
Hɔn akra sie afebɔɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 700:3
verse:
. Ewuradze Domfo, ma
Wɔnda ho ntsena Wo mu,
Nkɛpem dɛ akra nyina ho bɛsan,
Na woedzi mu koraa;
Akomamutseweefo nyina
Kɔ do bɔ hɔn ho ban;
Yɛ hɔn yie, gye hɔn nkwa wɔ ha,
Na dɔ hɔn kɔ ewiei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 701:1
verse:
. Asɔr ne fapem kortoo 
Nye Jesus Christ hɛn Wura;
Ɔnam nsu nye N'asɛm do
Yɛɛ n' N'abɔdze fofor.
Ofi sor bɔhwehɛɛ no.
Yɛɛ n' N'ayefor krɔnkrɔn.
Ɔdze No bɔgyaa tɔɔ no
No nkwa ntsi na owui.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 701:2
verse:
. Wɔpaam' yii n' aman nyinam', 
Naaso ɔyɛ Asɔr kor.
No nkwagye tum ɔnye yi-
Wura kor, gyedzi kor,
Dzin krɔnkrɔn kor na ohyira;
N'edziban krɔnkrɔn kor,
Enyidar kor na ɔper ho,
Adom nyina wɔ mu.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 701:3
verse:
. Sɛ mpo nyimpa si atwetwe 
Hwɛ N'ahokyer kɛse,
Dɛ mpaapaam' atsetsew mu
Nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔn tseetsee N' a,
Ahotsewfo n' weɔn, wosu
Dɛ, ondu da bɛn ara?
