Anago su n' nnkyɛkyɛr na
Ɔadan anapa ndwom.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 701:4
verse:
. Berɛ nye amandzehu mu, 
N'akodzi dede n' mu,
Ɔtweɔn daadaa asomdwee a
Ɔmmbɔ adze n' n'emudzi n',
Kɛpem dɛ n'enyi bohu
'Nyimnyam enyidado n',
Na Asɔr konyimdzifo no
Bɛhɛn n' ahomgye mu.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 701:5
verse:
. Na ɔwɔ wiadze yi, ɔnye 
Ɔkorsa Nyame bɔm',
Na ɔnye hɔn a wɔrohom
Dzi nkitaho dɛɛdɛw.
O ahotsewfo esiarfo!
Ewuradze, dom hɛn,
Dɛ abrɛfo yinom, ma
Yɛnye W' mbɛtsena sor hɔ.  Amen.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 702:1
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 702:2
verse:
. O dɛm ayɛyi ndwom 'i
Bɔwosow abangua 'i do;
Yɛbɛma hɛn ndze do
Atow Ɔkorsa ndwom,
Dɛm na yɛdze N'enyimnyam dzin n'.
Bɔtow ndwom a ohur daa nyina.
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 702:3
verse:
. Ɔdomfo Nyankopɔn,
Twe penkyɛn hɛn mber nyina
Gye nokwar nsew biara,
Na hyɛ nkrumsi so nsew;
Hue Wo nhyira gu mpaabɔ do
Wɔ da krɔnkrɔn biara no mu.
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 702:4
verse:
. Adom a yebisa n'
Wɔmfa mfi sor mbrɛ hɛn;
Sɛ hɛn nsa nya ka dze a,
Ɔnye hɛn ntsena afebɔɔ,
Nkodu da no a esiarfo nyina
Wɔbɛfrɛ hɔn akɔ ahomgye m'.  Amen.
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 703:1
verse:
. Nyame kurow mbrɛ odua so 
Na n' afasu war a!
'Nokwafo nye W' adehye dɔm,
Wɔ mbew na mber nyinam'.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 703:23
verse:
. Asɔr krɔnkrɔn kor, nkodɔm kor, 
Botae a ɔkrɔn kor,
Dwumadzi kuw kor, ndɔbaa ndwom kor,
Ɔhen Otumfo kor.
 
. Ofitsi nyimpa n' ahyɛse 
Mbrɛ W' asɛm esi edwir n'!
Mbrɛ W' aman esi atserɛw
Wɔ ahotɔ na dɔm' a!
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 703:45
verse:
. Mbrɛ Wo gya si dzɛw anago 
Dze weɔn na ɔnnhwer a!
W' akoban hyerɛn sunm' ara
Dze kɛpem adzekyee.
 
. Asorɛkye bu akɛse kwa, 
Anhwea dwurudwuruw gyan;
Onntum mmpuhim botantsim a
Bɛkyebo kurow si do n'.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 704:1
verse:
. AKOKO a ho tsew etwa ehyia,
Ne fapem no tsim hɔ pintinn daa,
Ewuradze ahenkurow no tsim hɔ;
Wonnkotum edwuruw n'afasu;
Mbanyin dze asuro na nwanwa hwɛ no,
Na wɔhyɛ nyia ɔweɔn no nsew.
Nyia ɔhwɛ Israel no,
Ɔnntɔ nnkom na ɔnnda,
Halleluja!
Enyigye dɔm\nNye hɔn a adom n'
Bɛba hɔn tsenabea mu daa daa!
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 704:2
verse:
. Jehova dɔ Zion n'apon!
Na ɔdze adom nwanwa gye to m';
Na ɔdze ndadze hin ekyir,
Ohyira hɔn a wɔtse no mu,
Ɔkyekye hɔn werɛ ber a wɔabɔm,
Na wɔdze yaw, dadwen gu N' do n',
Adom a ɔdze fua
No nkorɔfo nyinara n',
Ɔyɛ nwanwa!
Nyame ahenkurow,
Enyigye bea a,
Hɔ na dɛm nhyira nyina wɔ!
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 704:3
verse:
. N-kwagye a aman pii nnyim no,
Zion no nko mu na wɔkyerɛ:
Hɔ, wɔtse dza ɔso, yɛ krɔnkrɔn;
Ber a Wo nkorɔfo tse wo mu no,
Etsentsen hɔn, kyekye hɔn werɛ,
Ewɔ Sunsum na Asɛm no;
Asomdwee bɔ hɔ aprɔw,
Na wɔtse ndwom dɛɛdɛw,
Nya adom tsema,
Ɔyɛ dɛw ma!
Ɔma asomdwee
Na enyigye kɛse tsim hɔ daa.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59;

name: MHB 705:1
verse:
. NYAME yɛ sumabew ma Ne mba,
Sɛ ehum a ɔyɛ dzen tu mpo a;
Ansaana yɛka hɛn ayawdzi n',
Hwɛ ɔwɔ hɛn nkyɛn roboa hɛn!
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 705:2
verse:
. Ma mbepɔw ntutu mfi hɔn mbea
Mbra bun mu na wonsie hɔn hɔ;
Asaase dzendzen no nwosow,
Hɛn gyedzi nnkosuro hwee koraa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 705:3
verse:
. Po woree no bɛyɛ dede,
Hɛn akra tsena asomdwee krɔnn mu;
Ber a aman na mpoano nyimpa
Ho popo, suro asorɛkye kɛse n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 705:4
verse:
. Esu bi wɔ hɔ a ne mpemee
Ma hɛn Nyame man enyigye;
Nkwa, dɔ na enyigye gu do pem,
Fow kɔ hɛn man krɔnkrɔn no mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 705:5
verse:
. Dɛm esu krɔnkrɔn n', W'asɛnhia n',
Ɔhyɛ hɛn suro dzendzen do;
Asomdwee a Wo bɔyhɛ n' dze ma n'
Ma ɔkra a ɔagow ahoɔdzen bio.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 705:6
verse:
. Zion dzi ne Hen N' dɔ ho dɛw,
Ɔgye n' fi dɔnhwer huuhu n' mu;
Ne fapem dzendzen n' nnokobubu,
Woetsim n' wɔ No nokwardzi do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 706:1
verse:
. Wɔka wo ho enyimnyam nsɛm, 
Zion, hɛn Nyame Ne man;
Nyia ɔnnsan N' asɛm no kyekyeer
Wo dɛ No kurow a ɔtsenam'.
Tsetse Bo no nye wo fapem,
Ebɛn botum awosow w'?
N-kwagye yɛ wo ho afasu;
Ebɛserew w' atamfo.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 706:2
verse:
. Hwɛ, n-kwa nsu a ofi Nyame 
Ne daadaa dɔ mu pem no
Ma wo mba wɔmee, na oyi
Hia ho suro fi hɔn do.
Woana na ɔbɔtɔ bitsi
Wɔ dɛm esutsen yi ho?
Adom a ɔpem daa nyina
Wo Nyame dze dom wo daa.
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 706:3
verse:
. M' Agyenkwa, menam W' adom do 
Mofora Zion mamfom' a,
Ma wiadze nsi me atwetwe,
Ɔno mpo bɛyɛ mo ntuw,
Wiadze nye no mu enyigye
Nye ahokyerɛ resen.
Enyigye nye ahonya a otsim
Zion mba nko na wonya
title: John Newton, 1725 -1807

name: MHB 707:1
verse:
. ϽWO wͻammfa nsa annyɛ W’,
Eso wͻannkrͻn wo sor,
Wͻanntow w’aban hyɛnhyɛnn,
Wͻnndzé aboͻdzen bo yɛ w';
Ehyerɛn sen sika,
Nyame N’ Jerusalem.
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 707:2
verse:
. Ber a akoma brɛfo,
Benya sor ’kokodur n’,
Mbrɛ akoma apa n’,
Onya nkenyan fi ͻdͻ m’
Ber a gyedzi apam suro n’;
Eyɛ Nyame N’ kuropͻn.
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 707:3
verse:
. Ewͻ beea a ahopͻw
Dan yɛ ahobrɛadze,
Bea a suban yɛ botoo n’;
Bea a atͻfo nya ahenkyɛw,
Bea a agyedzifo nyina
Nya asomdwee mapa.
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 707:4
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 707:5
verse:
. ϽWo a wͻannkrͻn w’ wͻ sor.
Wͻanntow w’aban ekyirkyir,
Na bér a beenu, baasa
Ehyia mu wͻ Christ mu n’,
Tsena hͻn finimfim,
Nyame N’ Jerusalem.   Amen.
title: Francis Turner Palgrave, 1824-97.

name: MHB 708:1
verse:
. OWURA, yɛdͻ Wo man,
Ofie a etse mu no.
Asͻr a hɛn Pomfo n’ dze N’ bͻgyaa a
Ͻsom bo gyee sii hͻ n'.
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.

name: MHB 708:2
verse:
.  Owura, yɛdͻ W’asͻr
’Hotsewfo wͻ W’enyim;
Wͻsom W’ bo dɛ W’enyiwa kyirefuwa,
Woekrukye wͻ Wo nsamu.
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.

name: MHB 708:3
verse:
. Ͻno ntsi yebosu
Na hɛn mpaabͻ edu sor;
Yɛdze hɛn haw, hɛn bérɛ bɛma n’
’Kodu dɛ ͻbͻbͻ adze.
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.

name: MHB 708:4
verse:
. Hɛn dɛw mbordo ekyir n’,
Yebu no sor akwan,
Ne nkitahodzi anohoba,
No dͻ, ayɛyi ho ndwom n’.
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.

name: MHB 708:5
verse:
. Jesus, Nyɛnko krͻnkrͻn,
Hɛn Gyefo na hɛn Hen,
Wo nsa bɛgye hɛn yie efi
Atamfo nyé efir mu.
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.

name: MHB 708:6
verse:
. Dɛ Wo nokwar tsim hͻ n’,
Asaasé enyimnyam pa n’,
Wͻdze ne nyina bɛma Zion,
Na dɛw kɛse wͻ sor.
title: Timothy Dwight, 1752-1817.

name: MHB 709:1
verse:
. Yɛda ho yɛtse nkwam'? 
Yeehu hɛn enyim bio?
Christ N' adom a ɔapon hɛn ntsi
Hom mma yenyi N' ayɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 709:2
verse:
. Nyame tum akora hɛn 
Wɔ nkwagye a odzi mum';
Yɛbɔm' bio wɔ Christ N' ayɛyim',
Yedzi N' enyim ehyia.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 709:5
verse:
. Dɛm a hom mma yentuw 
No nkwagye tum no mu,
Tum a ɔgye hɛn nkwa koraa
Kɛpem dɛ yeetua bɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 709:6
verse:
. Hom mma yɛmfa mbeamudua n' 
Na yeenya ahenkyɛw n';
Sɛ yebenya Jesus Noara a
Dza aka n'- yemmbu no hwee
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 709:34
verse:
. Mbusu pii a yeehu a! 
Akodzi a yeeduam' a!
Guado ɔko', na hɛn mu hu' a!,
Fitsi dɛ yehyiaa nkan n'.
 
. Ewuradze No dɔ 
Agye hɛn ne nyinam',
Na ɔda ho dze No mboa ma hɛn
Na osie hɛn nkwa wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 710:1
verse:
. NUANOM na adɔfo wɔ Christ mu,
Hom ho hia Jesus na No dɔm;
Hom mbra mbɛda hom ho edzi,
M'bohu dɔ Ewuradze wɔ ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 710:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 710:3
verse:
. Jesus, yi Woho kyerɛ wɔ dɔ m';
Ana yennhyiaa W' dzin nwanwa n' mu?
Yɛtweɔn hɛn Wura wɔ hɛn finimfin,
Ogyaframee no na yɛtweɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 710:4
verse:
. Nyame a edze ogya kasa,
Ma ogya a ɔdzɛw Sunsum mfir edzi,
Ma ɔpɛ krɔnkrɔn gyaframee
Mfi hɛn akoma afɔrmbukyia n' do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 710:5
verse:
. Ampa, koryɛ a ofir Egya n'
Nam Wo do baa asaase do;
Onnyiewiei nkwa wɔ W' mu, na ma 
Hɛn sor ahotɔ a onnyi kasu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 711:1
verse:
. O EWURADZE, Wo sor tsenabea
Ne fɛw, ne dɛw na no nwanwa a!
Me kra dzi aper tɔ bitsi
Dze hyia W'ahotsewfo kuw no.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 711:2
verse:
. N-hyira nye ahotsewfo a 
Wotwa ahengua ho wɔ sorsor;
W'enyimnyam kɛse m' hyerɛn sor hɔ
Dze dɔ yi Wo ndwuma ayɛw.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 711:3
verse:
. N-hyira nye akra a wohu bea 'i
Wɔ W'adom asɔrfi yi mu;
Hɔ wohu Wo hyerɛn fɛɛfɛw no,
Hwehwɛ W'enyim, sua W'ayɛyi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 711:4
verse:
. N-hyira nye hɔn a hɔn akoma
Hwehwɛ Zion abowano kwan;
Nyame nye hɔn ahoɔdzen pa,
No kwan do na wɔtwer No mboa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 711:5
verse:
. Wɔnam enyigye na ahoɔdzen m'
Kodu dɛ yebehyia ahenman m',
Kɛpem dɛ yebɛba W'enyim
Abɔsom ɔsom pa m' wɔ hɔ
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 712:1
verse:
. NHYIRA nyé ͻdͻ a ͻka hɛn bͻ m’,
Dza ͻmma yɛmmpaa mu n’,
Hɛn honandua fi hɛn ho mpo a,
Yɛyɛ kor wͻ akoma m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 712:2
verse:
. Yɛnye Egya n’ yɛ sunsum kor
Yɛkͻ beebi a ͻkyérɛ,
Yetsiatsia Jesu N’anamͻn m’,
Kyerɛ N’enyimnyam wͻ ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 712:3
verse:
. O ma yenye N’ nnantséw afebͻͻ
Dɛ yennyim hweeàra bio,
Yɛnndwendwen hwee, mmbu hwee, gyedɛ
Jesus Ne mbeamudua n’ nko.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 712:4
verse:
. Hom mma yɛntwe mboa ano yie
Wͻ N’abasa n’ ase;
Hɛn enyi nda N'emudzi kwan,
Adom ngu adom do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 712:5
verse:
. Agyenkwa n’ N’adom m‘ kyɛfafo,
Adwen. akoma m’ koryɛ.
Edɛw na yaw, aber anaa bea.
Nkwa anaa ’wu nntum mmpaa m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 713:1
verse:
. NYAMƐ hyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛmbͻ m’
Yɛnkà akoma na nsa mbͻ m’;
Yennya hɛn frɛ ho enyidar,
Yɛmboaboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Hɛn werɛ mfir dza etwa mu,
Mfa akomà, adwen ndzi Christ ekyir
Mper nko botae no ho pɛɛ
Nkɛfa nokwàr ahenkyɛw no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 713:2
verse:
. Yɛnye Nyame nam kan mu a,
Nyame ka hɛn akoma bͻ mu a;
Yɛyɛ anyɛnkofo pa,
Jesus dͻ mu anyɛnkofa:
Dɛw mu na yɛkà bͻ mu,
Na yɛdze dzi hɛn dwuma,
Yɛtse bͻgyà à ͻtsew hɛn ho m’,
Daa yɛtse dɛ Christ ewu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 713:3
verse:
. Nyame, hyɛ hɛn gyedzi dzen,
Hor hɛn ho dza ͻnntsen nyina m’;
Ͻwo nntum nnhwɛ dza ͻnntsen;
O ma yɛmfata mma Wo!
Ku akͻndͻbͻn biara,
Tu aba bͻn biarà ase,
Gu bͻn nyinà ase koraa,
Kyérɛw Wo dͻ mbra wͻ hɛn mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 713:4
verse:
. ’Fi ndɛ ma hɛn ndzeyɛɛ nyina
Nkyerɛ dͻ dɛ yenyim Christ;
Ma dͻ no nyɛ asɛnkyérɛdze.
Dɛ yɛyɛ Wodzé, Ewuradze:
Fa Wo dͻ suban n’ ma hɛn.
Tsim n‘wͻ hɛn enyim nà akoma m’!
Ma hɛn Wo dͻ no nkotoo!
Nyame, yemmbisa hwee bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 714:1
verse:
. NYIA ɔwɔ Wo dɔ no nnhia ndamfo,
Ɔnye Wo nantsew dzi nkɔmbɔ;
Menye W'ahotsewfo nyina
Bɔbɔ awɛ sesei na daa.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 714:2
verse:
. Ahotsewfo nkitahodzi m'
Wɔ nyansa, 'tsidaa na enyigye;
M'akoma yɛ mberɛw, motɔ bahaw a,
Hɔn hyew na kan wɔma mo do.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 714:3
verse:
. M'ayɛnkofo dze, wɔnnyewee;
W'ahɛn a ɔdɔɔ so pii no,
Sɛ ehum bɔ hɔn petse mpo a,
Wobehyia m' sɔkyee berano.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 714:4
verse:
. Hɛn nyina da ho ara tse Wo mu,
Yɛapetse mpo a, yɛyɛ Wodze,
Yɛwɔ ebusua noara mu,
Gyedzi, Sunsum kor kyerɛ hɛn kwan.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 714:5
verse:
. W'ahengua enyim na daa yehia,
Na yɛbɔ m' totɔ serɛ Wo;
Yekyiakyia hɛnho sunsum mu,
Yebohu hɛnho nkorkor bio.
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 714:6
verse:
. Ɔsor dɔm no nyina bɛyɛ 
M'aanyɛnkofo daa daa nyina,
Na Ɔwo me Nyɛnko mapa;
Woana bɛtsew me efi W' dɔ ho?
title: Richard Baxter, 1616-91.

name: MHB 715:1
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 715:2
verse:
. Christ No dɔ a osiw kwan, ka akoma bɔ mu no ntsi,
Nokwar gyedzi na fahodzi a wɔdze yɛɛ hɔn edwuma ntsi,
Nyankopɔn Nsɛmpa n'asomdwee a wɔdze nantsewee ntsi,
W'abasa dzen ntsi yehyira Wo, hɛn egyanom Nyame.
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 715:3
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 715:4
title: Charles Silvester Horne, 1865-1914.

name: MHB 716:1
verse:
. NOKWAR na dͻ Nyame,
Yɛhwehwɛ W’akwan pa;
Yɛgye Wo pɛ to mu,
Yɛyɛ setsie ma Wo:
Bɛhɛn Wo nyansaa kwan no mu,
Yengyaa hɛn pɛ mma Wo dɛw mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 716:2
verse:
. ’Bɛn ntsi na edze hɛn
Aba ha ber yi mu?
’Bɛn ntsi na ’dze hɛn aba
Dɛ yenhu hɛn enyim?
Yɛdze dͻ na tsema ka bͻ m’
Ma yaabͻ mu kor wͻ Wo mu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 716:3
verse:
. Ana annyɛ hɛn kor,
Dɛ yɛmbͻ mu kor daa,
Yaabͻ mu anantsew,
Yaatsé obiara ne yaw;
Ama yeehu Wo papayɛ,
Na yaasoɛr ͻdͻ emudzi mu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 716:4
verse:
. Dɛm a horn mma hɛn enyi ‘
Ntsim siar ewiei no do,
Na yɛmbͻ mu yɛmper,
Yɛnko nkͻ hɛn enyim;
Yɛmfa ayamuyie mboa hɛnho,
Dɛ yebenyà ahenkyɛw hyɛnhyɛnn n’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 716:5
verse:
. O ma Wo Sunsum nsͻw
Hɛn akra ano da no,
Fa W’amayɛ dom hɛn,
Na fa hɛn fi ha kͻ
Hɛn onnyiewie ahomgye mu,
Fa hɛn kͻ hɛn Pomfo No bo m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 717:1
verse:
. O EWURADZE, boa hɛn ma
Yɛmboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Ma obiara mboa ne nyɛnko,
Yennya tsema mma hɛnho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 717:2
verse:
. Boa hɛn ma yɛmboa hɛn mfɛfo,
Kakra a yɛwɔ nyɛ yie;
Gyedzi na enyidar nsi pi,
Yendzi mu wɔ dɔ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 717:3
verse:
. Hɛn Wura tseasefo, ma yɛmbɛn W',
Adze nyina m' yennyin,
Nkɛpem dɛ asan hɛn ho koraa,
Ma nkekaa nnyi hɛn ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 717:4
verse:
. Na edwumason bɔ adze a,
Fa W'ayefor kɔ fie;
Ma yɛnye ahotsewfo nyina
Eedzi dɛw wɔ heaven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 718:1
verse:
. JESUS, yehwɛ Woara,
Yɛgye W’anohoba n’;
Ͻwo bɛba hɛn finimfin,
Sɛ yehyia Wo dzin mu a.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 718:2
verse:
. Yɛrébɛgyé ato m’ wͻ ha
Dɛ Wo dzin yɛ nkwagye;
Wo dzin yɛ nkwa na asomdwee,
Ͻyɛ onnyiewiei dͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 718:3
verse:
. Yehyia gye adom a 
Ͻwo dzé ama hɛn kwa n’;
Wo ntsi na yehyia mu ase ha,
Ama yeehyia heaven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 718:4
verse:
. Yenyim dɛ ewͻ ha,
O yi Woho edzi kyérɛ!
Afei, Ewuradze, ma akoma
Biara nnya awérɛkyekyer.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 718:5
verse:
. Ma Wo ndzé a okenyan n’
Nyi owu n’ bͻn mfi hͻ nkͻ;
Na ma hɛn akra enyi ngye
Enyidar dͻ mapa m’. Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 719:1
verse:
. HWԐ Jesu, hwɛ W’esuafo no,
Pon W’anohoba no;
Yeehyia Wo dzin m’ rohwɛ Wo kwan,
Ma Wo nhyira no mbra.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 719:2
verse:
. Yɛtweͻn W’, Ewuradze nokwafo,
Yɛbͻ m’ kor wͻ Wo dzin m';
Yɛtweͻ, dɛ mbrɛ W’asɛm no tse n’,
Dɛ yebohu W’ hɛn ntamu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 719:3
verse:
. Enye hɛn ehyia mu wͻ ha;
Ewuradze, yi W’ho kyérɛ!
Tseasefo Nyame Ba, pue ha!
Ma yɛntse W’ nka wͻ ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 719:4
verse:
. Ma yenhu Nyia yehwehwɛ no!
Jesus a wokum Wo,
Fa Wo nsa, W’anan m’ bͻgya n’ kyérɛ,
Ͻwo a hɛn ntsi iwui.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 719:5
verse:
. Ma hɛn nsa nka kyerɛwsɛm no,
Kasa na kyérɛ biribi;
Mma nnye okyingyefo, gye Me dzi,
Emi a muwui maa wo!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 720:1
verse:
. Christ a nhyira nyina fir Wo, 
Ema ahosewfo dzi mu,
Tsie hɛn a Wo su sɛ hɛn,
Yɛyɛ Wo honam nwanwa n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 720:2
verse:
. Ka hɛn ho wɔ sunsum korm', 
Ma yɛnda ho nya Wodze n';
Yɛba bebisa mbordo,
Ɔwo a ehyɛ adze nyina ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 720:3
verse:
. Kenyan, nunu na gya hɛn  
Kyɛn ankorankor akyɛdze,
Wɔahyehyɛ n' dɛ mbrɛ epɛ,
Ma hɛn ndwuma nyina nhyɛ ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 720:45
verse:
. Dɛw mu ara yɛnyɛ kor 
Yennya tsema mma hɛnto:
Na yɛmboa hɛnho nkorkor;
Obiara nyɛ n'afamudze.
 
. Ɔdɔ tse dɛ wu, ɔasɛɛ 
Mpaapaamu na adehyesɛm nyina
Edzin, ekuw nyina gu
Christ yɛ adze nyinam' adze nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:1
verse:
. JESUS, W'adom no ka hɛn bɔ m'
Na yɛdodɔ hɛnho a,
Yɛdze awerɛhyɛm' hwehwɛ W'enyim,
Yenyim dɛ itsie hɛn asɔr.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:2
verse:
. Ma yɛnda ho nnya hɛn Nyame,
Yɛnsoa W' kɔndua haahar n',
Ɔdɔ ahoma mbɔho ebisa a 
Wonnkotum atsew mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:4
verse:
. Wo dɔ a ɔtwetwe hɛn bɛn Wo n'
Ma yenya akoma kor;
Ma daa yɛntwetwe mbɛn hɛnho,
Na yɛntwe mbɛn Wo daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:5
verse:
. Ka hɛn sunsum nyina fam Wo ho,
Mma mpaapaamu mmba da;
O ma hɛn nyina nnya Wo mu
Ɔdɔ ho adwen no daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 721:6
verse:
. Iyi nye nkabɔm' pa a ho tsew,
W'adɔyɛ a fi nnyi ho;
Ma yennya adwen a ɔwɔ Wo mu n',
O ma yɛnsɔr dɛm daa.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:1
verse:
. HOM mfa akoma ngyina sor ndzɛmba do,
’Guambaa N’akadofo,
Hom nsuo m’ ma yɛntonton No dͻ,
Yɛnhyɛ Ne dzin enyimnyam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:2
verse:
. Hom ntow ndwom, ndaase m’ mma Ne dzin,
Ͻno a N’adom mmbͻ adze:
Dzi dɛw! Dzi dɛw! ‘Wuradze yɛ ͻhen;
Ͻhen n’ yɛ hɛn Nyɛnko!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:3
verse:
. ’No ntsi biribiara yɛ ahwerdze;
Yemmbu wiadze ’i mu hwee.
Yɛsoa mbeamudua no wͻ enyigye m’ ,
Gyedɛ yeenya ahenkyɛw n’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:4
verse:
. Ma yenkenyan hɛnho nkorkor,
Hɛn ndwuma nkyérɛ hɛn gyedzi,
Yendua krͻnkrͻn enyidado m’,
Nà ͻdͻ dɛɛdɛw ndwuma do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:5
verse:
. Yɛkͻ do dwen wo ho daa daa,
Ͻwo a ekotow Jesus;
Tsérɛw wo gyedzi na mpaabͻ abaw m’,
Na hwɛ, yɛabɛn w’ sesei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:6
verse:
. Wodze nyɛ ehumbͻbͻr, asomdwee,
Ondu adwen nyina mu,
Mannà a wͻdzé esuma na nkwa dua n’,
Ͻnyé ͻbo fitaa no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:7
verse:
. Wͻmfa nhyira nyina mma wo,
Dza Nyame na Christ ma;
Yɛsérɛ dɛ hen Hen No Sunsum
Mbra akoma nokwafo m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 722:8
verse:
. Tweͻn dɛ Ewuradze bɛbà enyimnyam m’.
Tweͻn nya heaven m’ kyɛfa;
Hɛn Pomfo n’ risiesie hɛn fie:
Kͻ do; yebehyia m’ hͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 723:1
verse:
. HƐN tsetse egyanom Nyame, tsie,
Ma yenhu W' nokwar ehumbɔbɔr n',
Yɛnam Jesus No mu bɛn Wo,
Wo Dɔba a oruhu amandze n',
No m' na yehu W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n',
No mu na menam sɔ W'enyi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 723:2
verse:
. Yɛdze awɔse gyedzi bɔ afɔr,
Yɛma do kyerɛ W'enyimnyam n',
Hɛn enyidar nyina n' kutuwdo - bo n',
Bɔgyahue afɔrbɔ a ɔsom bo n',
Ɔdze W'adom brɛ abɔn wɔ ase,
Ɔma hɛn akra nyina bɔ m' dzi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 723:3
verse:
. Wɔnam Ne dzin m' nko gye hɛn to m',
No bɔgyaa m' yenya bɔnfakyɛ,
Yɛnam No do bisa nkwa pa,
Ɔno a owui dze gyee hɛn akra,
Ɔdze No bɔgyaa tseew hɛn ho,
Na ɔdze Nyame bra hyɛ hɛn ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 723:4
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 724:1
verse:
. JESUS, nkwa nà enyimnyam Wura,
Brɛ W’adom aso n’ edze daa,
Bér a hɛn akra rotweͻn asͻr Wo ’i,
Abͻnfo adamfo, tsie hɛn:
      Ewuradze pa,
      Fa W’ehumbͻbor gye hɛn!
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.

name: MHB 724:2
verse:
. Fi wiadze enyifura bͻn n’ mu,
Fi bͻn a epirim no tum mu,
Fi ewurkadze na etsiͻdzen mu,
Fi akoma m’ ahokyérɛ mu:
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.

name: MHB 724:3
verse:
. Bér a nsͻhwɛ mu ayɛ dzen no,
Ma Abͻnsam kyérɛ no tum no,
Wͻ hɛn ahohia ber no mu,
Dͻnhwér a ͻyɛ sum, yɛ dzen mu:
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.

name: MHB 724:4
verse:
. Bér a wiadze nyina resérew no,
Ahonya na asetséna pa m’,
Hɛn akoma twe bɛn wiadze dɛw n’,
Wͻ ahoͻdzen na asomdwee da m’:
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.

name: MHB 724:5
verse:
. Yarba dͻnhwér a ͻyɛ bérɛ mu,
Ͻhaw na ͻyaw ber mu,
Ber a yɛtse honam mberɛwyɛ,
Ber a abͻdze mboa yɛ kwa n’:
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.

name: MHB 724:6
verse:
. Owu dͻnhwer mu kommyɛ mu n’,
Atsɛmbu da huuhu mu n’.
Ma hɛn akra, bér a wͻtwer Wo no,
Mfa W’ nyɛ enyidar na tsénabea.
title: John James Cummins, 1795-1867.

name: MHB 725:1
verse:
. HԐN Wura, W'ehumbͻbͻr da  ‘i,
Ansaanà obotwa m’ akͻ n’,
Yɛhwe W’anànadze sͻr Wo.
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.

name: MHB 725:2
verse:
. Jesus krͻnn, pa hɛn nyinsu,
Fa akoma m' suro hyɛ hɛn mà:
Ansaana da huuhu n’ aba.
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.

name: MHB 725:3
verse:
. Yɛkotow W'abow ekyir yi,
Hue Wo Sunsum gu hɛn do,
Ansaana atow m’ afehͻͻ.
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.

name: MHB 725:4
verse:
. W’ahoyera anago n'.
Wo nkotͻserɛ su no ntsi.
Dɛ epɛ dɛ ’bowu n’ ntsi.
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.

name: MHB 725:5
verse:
. Wo nyinsu wenwen a ikyii
Maa Jerusalem ha n’ ntsi,
Mma mma Wo dͻ no mmbͻ hɛn.
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.

name: MHB 725:6
verse:
. Hɛn Tsɛmbuafo na Gyefo,
Yehu W' enyim na enyim a,
Dom hɛn W'atsaban ase tséna.
title: Isaac Williams, 1802-65.

name: MHB 726:1
verse:
. GYEFO, wɔ huntuma mu na
Yɛdze nkotoserɛ sɔr Wo;
Ber a nnuhofo yenntum mma
Hɛn nyinsuwa enyi nnhwɛ sor;
O yaw na mbusu a edze
Hun amandze maa nyimpa ntsi,
Bɔ W' mu adze fi ahengua enyim,
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 726:2
verse:
. Wo mbofraber m' botooyɛ,
Wo hia na nyinsu bra ntsi,
W'ahokyer yaayaw nda no,
Wo mbusu sar no do ntsi,
Osian dɔnhwer huuhu no a
Satan sɔɔ W' hwɛ wɔ mu n' ntsi,
Dan, O dan W'adɔe enyi n',
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 726:3
verse:
. Yaw krɔnkrɔn a 'dze kyii nyinsu
Wɔ Lazarus ne nda do ntsi,
Nkuranhyɛ nyinsu a ɔpemee
Guu Salem do tsenabea n',
Adwembɔn a osii W' nkorɔfo ntamu
Ma hɔn enyim towee ntsi,
Fi Wo sor tsenabea hɔ 
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 726:4
verse:
. W'abawpa dɔnhwer no ntsi,
Na W'ahoguan mpaabɔ ntsi,
Mbeamudua, mprɛgow na nsoɛ n' ntsi,
Peaa ne yaw na enyimtsiabu,
Sum kebii a ɔhyɛɛ no ntsi,
W'afɔrbɔ huuhu no ntsi
Tsie hɛn mbrɛhoadze sufrɛ,
Tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotserɛ.
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 726:5
verse:
. Pen dzendzen a ɔdze W' kɔr wu m',
Ɔbo adakamaa no ntsi,
Samanadze sunkamm a oenntum
Enndzi Nyame a ɔsoɛree do n';
O Nyame Tumfo a wɔdze W'
Fi asaase do asan kɔ sor,
Ewuradze, tsie, tsie hɛn su
Wɔ hɛn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ m'
title: Robert Grant, 1783-1838.

name: MHB 727:3
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:4
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:5
verse:
. Ongya ehiafo na efurafo, 
Nda ho nhwehwɛ dza ayew n',
Ɔnkyekyer 'koma bobɔe,
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:6
verse:
. No nokwar kanea n' nhyerɛn; 
Ɔmma ne kan n' do wɔ sor
Wɔ abosom-man sum mu.
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:7
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 727:12
verse:
. Jesus, 'nye W' Asɔr ntsena, 
Yɛ n' Agyenkwa, Wura, Gyafo;
Wɔrosɔ ne gyedzi ahwɛ n',
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
 
. Tsew ne bra na nkyerɛkyerɛ ho; 
Dom n' abotar ma ɔnsɔw
Na ɔntwer W' anohoba n',
Yɛserɛ Wo, tsie hɛn.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 728:1
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHUFO, Nyame Tumfo!
Wo dɔ na tsema nnyi ewiei!
Kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn wɔ W'enyim daa ma
Yɛmbɔ hɛn bra mma Wo.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 728:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a 'bowuu wɔ asaase 'i do
Ma nyimpa aafa do enya nkwa,
O tsie hɛn, 'Wo na yesu frɛ W'
Enyidado m', Nyame.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 728:3
verse:
. Kyerɛkyerɛ hɛn Wo nkyerɛkyerɛsɛm no,
Yɛntse mma hɔn a W' bɔgyaa atɔ hɔn,
Ma asɛm, ndzeyɛɛ, adwen biara
Aayɛ edwuma ama Wo.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 728:4
verse:
. Hɛn nyina yɛ enuanom wɔ wiadze,
Dɛ Ɔwo iwuu maa hɛn ntsi;
Kyerɛ hɛn, mbrɛ ɔtse biara,
Ma yɛndɔ hɔn Wo mu.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 728:5
verse:
. Yarba m', yaw mu, ohia m', dadwen m',
Mbrɛ ɔtse biara, ɔyɛ hɛndze;
Ma yɛmboa bea a wohia mboa no,
Dɛ yɛdze rema Wo.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 728:6
verse:
. Na ma Wo Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no
Nka hɔn a wɔtsena dɔ mu nyina,
Kodu dɛ hɔn a wɔtse Wo mu
Behyia m' wɔ sor ahenman m'.  Amen
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 729:1
verse:
. HƐN Wura, nye hɛn nkwagyefo Nyankopɔn,
Hɛn anago woraba nye aman enyidar,
Tsie na gye W'asɔr hɔn mbɔbɔr nkotɔserɛ,
Ewuradze Tumfo.
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;

name: MHB 729:2
verse:
. Hwɛ ehum dzendzen a otwa
W'Ahyɛm'-daka n' ho,
Hwɛ mbrɛ W'atamfo si tserɛw hɔn frankaa mu;
Ewuradze, ber a wɔtow hɔn bɔwema n',
'Botum akora hɛn.
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;

name: MHB 729:3
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;

name: MHB 729:4
verse:
. Dom hɛn Wo mboa ma atamfo nsan hɔn ekyir,
Dom hɔn Wo nokwar ama wɔdze aakyɛ hɔn;
Ma asaase asomdwee, na hɛn aperdzi ekyir no,
Wo heaven asomdee. Amen.
title: Matthaus Apelles von Lowenstern, 1594-1648;

name: MHB 730:1
verse:
. ADOM a onnsa da Egya,
Yɛkamfo W‘adͻe na nokwar.
Yɛkyérɛ: W’adͻyɛ nye nokwar,
Wo Ba n' N'enyidzi ntsi ama
Akyɛdzé a onnyi kabeà esian.
N-kwa Sunsum, tum nye ͻdͻ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 730:2
verse:
. Fa Wo Ba n' No Sunsum brɛ hɛn
Ma woeehu Nyametsir n' no bun.
Na yeenya Wo nkwa n‘ mu kyefa;
Soma N' ma ͻmbɛpɛtse bͻgya n',
Soma N' mà ͻmbɛtsew hɛn akra ho,
Ma ͻnkyérɛ, nsͻw hɛn ano dɛ W‘dze daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 730:3
verse:
. Dɛm na yɛbͻ mpaa, yenngyaa da.
Na yɛdze ndaase kà hɛn bͻn.
Wo nymsaa, nokwar, tum na dͻ n';
Yɛdze dɛw a onnyi kabeà aasͻr,
Na yeehyira W', yoeyi W' ayɛ daa,
Yaasom W’ dɛ mbrɛ Wo sor dͻm som W'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 730:4
verse:
. Yɛbͻfora sor adwontofo kuw n’,
Yɛama bɛn konyimdzi ndwom n' do
Kɛse na yeeyi Wo ayɛw,
Yeetu akͻ sor akyɛn nkan seraph,
Na yenye kan m’ 'nyɛnkofo nyina
Aatow Wo dͻ à onnyi ewiei ho ndwom.
		Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 731:1
verse:
. O CHRIST, hɛn Nyamé a nye Wo nkobrͻfo tse,
Hɛn sunsum twe bɛn Wo, Dͻfo a wonnhu W’.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 731:2
verse:
. Dom ma hͻn a wonya dzi fi Wo dͻ m’
Ntsie Wo dͻ na wombu W’akyɛdze bi.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 731:3
verse:
. Yɛ akoma biara a ͻyɛ Wo tsénabea n’
Turo a adom nduadzewa ayɛ mu ma.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 731:4
verse:
. Boa hɛn ma yɛnyɛ hɛn botae krͻnkrͻn,
To hɛn gyedzi mu na bɛnyɛn hɛn daa.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 731:5
verse:
. Hyérɛn hɛn adwen m’ ma yenhu W’ nsɛnkyérɛdze
Krͻnkrͻn a wͻabͻ hɛn ho aprͻw nyina.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 731:6
verse:
. Na ma dem dasedzi yi mpue hɛn bra m’,
Ma obiara eehu dɛ Ͻwo nye hɛn atséna.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 731:7
verse:
.  Dɛm na Dͻfo Nyame bɛyɛ hɛn kyɛm
Na akatua a onnyi mbanano afebͻͻ.
title: George Hugh Bourne, 1840-1928.

name: MHB 732:1
verse:
. YƐTSE ndwom krɔnkrɔn no
Wɔ anapa bɔw yi mu;
Ansaana bɔn hyɛ wiadze sum n',
Yehyira na yɛbɔ mpaa.
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.

name: MHB 732:2
verse:
. Ber a 'bɔw wɔ nhyirɛn do yi,
Hɛn akra no bɔw, sian famu;
Ansaana ewia befir bio no
Hɛn Wura, ma W' Sunsum mbra!
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.

name: MHB 732:3
verse:
. Sɛ yɛwɔ akono a,
Ansaana ko n' hyɛ ase n',
Hɛn Wura, yebisa W'akokyɛm n',
Dɛ ɔnkora hɛn mfi hɛn bɔn m'.
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.

name: MHB 732:4
verse:
. Ber a hɛn hɛmba nnyaa mmfow
Da yi ne baka yi,
Ewuradze, yɛserɛ W' sor aahow
Ma ɔdze hɛn aakɔ ntsɛm.
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.

name: MHB 732:5
verse:
. Bepɔw n' nkyɛn-famu komm,
Ansaana wi bopue n',
Yaw Nyimpa sui na ɔkaa mmɔn,
Dze tum soɛɛr ahoɔdzen mu.
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.

name: MHB 732:6
verse:
. Sɛ dɛm a, na tsie hɛn a
Yɛyɛ mberɛw, nnyi ahoɔdzen;
Hɛn ebisadze nye Gyefo N' dzin,
Na obedzi dwuma ampaara.
title: Charles Haddon Spurgeon, 1834-87.

name: MHB 733:1
verse:
. JESUS, Ewia Tsenenee,
Ͻdɔ nsérɛmɛn a ehyérɛn sor,
Enyé anapawi hyerɛn,
Hyerɛn hɛn sum kebii do,
Na ma hɛn kan a mu tsew
’Nafua nyina.
title: Christian Knorr von Rosenroth, 1636-89;

name: MHB 733:4
verse:
. Hɛn Enyidar na Kwankyérɛfo,
Mma mmpa hɛn na nngyaa hɛn da
Kora hɛn wͻ Wo nkyɛn daa daa
Kodu adzekyeé a onnyi ewiei.
Yɛako Zion koko n’ do.
Fié afebͻͻ. 	Amen.
title: Christian Knorr von Rosenroth, 1636-89;

name: MHB 733:23
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ daa bͻsu tͻ gu
’Hataw na nhyirén a oeguan do n’,
Ma W’ Sunsum N’adom na tum n’
Nkenyan hɛn akrà a wͻabotow n’;
Nhyira mpetséma ntͻ hɛn mu
Biara do.
. Ma Wo do bɛtɛɛ no nyɛ,
Dɛ ewia ne kan nkenyan,
Nyi hɛn awͻw nyinara nkͻ,
Mbͻ hɛn hyew, nkyekye hɛn werɛ,
Yɛmfa enyigye nsom W’, ntsie Wo
Daa nyina.
title: Christian Knorr von Rosenroth, 1636-89;

name: MHB 734:1
verse:
. JESUS, botooyɛnyi,
Ɔsor Nyame Ba,
Ehumbɔbɔr Agyenkwa,
Tsie Wo mba hɔn su.
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.

name: MHB 734:2
verse:
. Fa hɛn mfom 'horow kyɛ hɛn,
Yi hɛn fi mpokyerɛ m',
Bubu ehonyi biara a 
Hɛn akra da ho dze m'.
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.

name: MHB 734:3
verse:
. Ma hɛn fahodzi krɔnn,
Hyɛ hɛn akoma dɔ ma
Jesus krɔnkrɔn, twe hɛn
Bɛn sor ahenman mu.
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.

name: MHB 734:4
verse:
. Dzi hɛn kan hɛn akwantu m',
Yɛ Woho ɔkwan n'
Wɔ wiadze sum kapee m'
Kodu sor afebɔɔ.
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.

name: MHB 734:5
verse:
. JESUS, botooyɛnyi,
Ɔsor Nyame Ba,
Ehumbɔbɔr Agyenkwa,
Tsie Wo mba hɛn su.  Amen.
title: George Rundle Prynne, 1818-1903.

name: MHB 735:1
verse:
. BER a bérɛfo hwehwɛ ahomgye n’,
Oguan kͻ W’ yiedzi m’,
Bér a ’dzesoafo tow adzesoa
Nyina gu W’enyim;
Bér a hͻn a wͻahaw pɛ asomdwee n’
Wͻbͻbͻ Wo dzin;
Bér a abͻnfo hwehwɛ nkwa,
Twa hwe W’anànadze n’:
    O Ewuradze, ͻdͻ m ’ ara,
    Fi Wo sor tsénabea do tsie hͻn.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 735:2
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 735:3
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 736:1
verse:
. Guanhwɛfo pa, dom hɛn Wo mboa 
Wɔ hɛn mbusu nda yim',
Tum a wɔdze weɔn, wɔdze sɔr,
Fa ma Wo mba nyina.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 736:2
verse:
. Ber a yɛda ho da nsɔhwɛm', 
Ber a yɛso mbeamudua 'i,
Ma yɛmfa hɛn kra nto Wo do
Wɔ mpaabɔ a ɔmmbɔ adzem'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 736:3
verse:
. Ma yendua gyedzim' hɛn nsa nka 
M-paabɔ sunsum no;
Yemmia ndzi ako gyedɛ yehu
W' enyim nye Wo dzin pa n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 736:4
verse:
. Ma 'koma biara nsu nka dɛ: 
Minnkegyaa Wo ma akɔ,
Gyedɛ ama m' dɔ a odzi mu,
Na edze Woho akyɛ m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 736:5
verse:
. Minnkegyaa Wo ma akɔ gyedɛ 
Ebɔ Wo dzin kyerɛ m',
Na egye me kra nkwa nwionn nwionn,
Ma meyɛ dɛ Ɔwo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 736:6
verse:
. Ekyir no ma munhu W' enyim 
Wɔ kokwaa n' etsifi,
Mbrɛ wɔmen gyedzi nye mpaabɔ
Wɔ adzehu nye ayɛyim'.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 737:1
verse:
. JESU, yɛma hɛn akoma do ma W';
Ma ɔdɔ mbu hɛn akoma nyina do,
Yɛda W' ase, daa akyɛdze n' ntsi 
Yɛda ho nyim W' dzin a ɔsom bo n',
Yenyim dɛ edze hɛn bɔn kyɛ hɛn 
Na yɛtweɔn heaven a ɔwɔ hɛn mu n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 737:2
verse:
. Ɔhaw kɛse bi a edze akyerɛ
W'ekyirdzifo a wɔasɔ hɛn ahwɛ a!
Yeedua ogya na nsu nyina mu,
Yehun dɛ epue nsuyirii mu,
Yɛtsee nka dɛ 'gyina gyaframee m',
Na yɛkaa m' bɔɔ hɛn Pomfo N' dzin.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 737:3
verse:
. Hɛn nyina nnyewee, yɛnnsaan hɛn ekyir,
Yɛnndan W'asɔr na Ɔwo nngyae;
Binom wohu 'nyimguase n' bi,
Hɔn enyi gye W'enyimnyam ho,
Wobu mbeamudua 'nyimguase n' bi,
Wɔhwehwɛ nkamfo a ofir Egya n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 737:4
verse:
. Ɔwo a ahwɛ hɛn do ebodu ndɛ,
Ma yɛnyɛ 'nokwafo nkɔ ewiei;
Wɔdze ahentum ntar hyɛ hɛn a,
Hɛn Jesus besian abɛfa
N'anyɛnkofo na adasefo,
Akɛtsena 'nyimnyam ahengua n' do.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 738:3
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Krɔn W' enyimnyam dzin no;
Wo sunsum mma hɛn dɔ m-fram
Mma W' nye Wo mba nyina.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 738:4
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ma W' asɛm no nnya tum;
Ma wɔmfa enyikan gyedzi ntsie
W' asɛmpa a nhyira wɔm' n'.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 738:5
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Tɔ Pentecost bɔw no;
Na enyimnyam no bɛyɛ Wodze,
Na nhyira n' aka hɛn.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 738:12
verse:
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ewuradze, kyerɛ Wo tum;
Bɔ Wo ndze a onyan ewufom',
Na ma Wo nkorɔfo ntse.
    Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
    Ber a yɛkotow Wo yi, 
    Sian, ao Ewuradze domfo, sian! 
    Bra behyira hɛn sesei. 
 
. Kenyan W' edwuma yi, 
Ma akra nhwehwɛ nkwa-su n':
O ma hɛn esunsum kɔn ndɔ
N-kwa edziban no!
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 739:1
verse:
. HƐN Egya, tsie hɛn mpaabɔ yi,
Boa ma mpaabɔ yi mpem,
Na ma adwen brɛfo a ofir Wo n',
Mbɛtsena hɛn mu na onyin.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 739:2
verse:
. Akoma brɛfo no bɛtse
'Somdwee na dɛw n' ase,
Dza ɔwɔ Wo sor asetsena mu
'Homka wɔ W'enyi do.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 739:3
verse:
. Ma hɛn ahobrɛadze ama
W'ahendzi aaba hɛn mu,
Na sɛ Wo mba no rokɔ fie a,
Hɛn so yaakɔ hɔ bi.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 739:4
verse:
. Gyefo tsie hɛn! Yɛyɛ Wodze,
Sɛ yɛnntse dɛ Ɔwo mpo a;
Fa Wo Sunsum n' hyɛ akoma
Brɛfo a ɔtwer Wo mu.  Amen.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 740:1
verse:
. NYIMPA nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Dͻ akoma bͻ Wo mpaa,
’Nam Nyià ama N’ mbͻbͻrhu,
Nkwa, nokwar ͻkwan do;
Fi sor ahengua do hue W’adom
Na Wo nhyira N’ gu hɛn etsir do.
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.

name: MHB 740:2
verse:
. Nyimpa nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Akomà a yaw ahyɛ n’ mà,
Bͻn na yaw biara nnyi m’,
Tow Wo ayɛyi ndwom;
Hom Wo mfar no gu hɛn mu daa,
Ma yɛmfa ntow ndwom pa mma Wo.
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.

name: MHB 740:3
verse:
. Nyimpa nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Suro a ommpue gu ahom
Fi hɛn akoma bun mu,
Ͻnnkasa, nyinsu nko;
Suo hɛn nsamu twa mbusu bea mu,
Egya, gyà ͻba biara a ͻtwer Wo.
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.

name: MHB 740:4
verse:
. Nyimpa nyinà Egya, yɛdze
Hɛn ngyirama yi W’ ayɛw,
Bér a dɛw hyɛ hɛn akra mà
Nà enyigyé a no mu dͻ;
Ehum nà aahow mu ma yenhu
Asomdwee kwàn a ͻdze ba W' nkyɛn.
		Amen.
title: John Julian, 1839-1913.

name: MHB 741:1
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 741:2
verse:
. Yensuroo Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata,
Yɛmmbɔɔ hɛn mu adze wɔ W'enyim,
Yɛnnkoraa ndzeyɛɛ, kasa na adwen,
Ber a yɛkaa dɛ Nyame bɛn hɛn;
Ewuradze, ma yenhu dɛ ebɛn,
Na ma hɛn suro mapa ho adom.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 741:3
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 741:4
verse:
. Yɛnnsoom Wo dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata,
Ebei! Yɛannyɛ hɛn asɛdze no,
Edwuma n' so yɛayɛ n' bi-na-bi,
Yeedzi 'kogu; hɛn konyim nnye!
Ewuradze, ma hɛn mbanyinndam,
Yɛmfona mma W', yɛnko mma Wo.
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 741:5
verse:
. Ber bɛn na yebohu Wo yie,
Yeesuro Wo, yɛasom Wo yie?
Wobeyi hɛn nsɔhwɛ m' ber bɛn
Ma yeedzi mu kan asaase n' do?
Hɛn Wura, ma daa yɛnyɛ ahoboa,
Nhu W'enyim na yɛnsom W' wɔ hɔ.  Amen
title: Thomas Benson Pollock, 1836-96.

name: MHB 742:1
verse:
. YԐBϽϽ mpaa dɛ W’ahendzi mbra,
Mfe a etwa m’ yebuu ntwɛr;
Akrà anokwafo pɛ ehu
Ahendzi n’ saase do.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 742:2
verse:
. Naaso anafua weͻn nyaa no,
Onnye mma Nyame koraa,
Na komm nworaba no yɛ dzen
Ma kyɛfa afebͻͻ.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 742:3
verse:
. Hwɛ, wͻwͻ akoko n’ do dada,
Adzekyee mfrankaa pue,
Nkͻnhyɛfo, hom mbͻ hom asen do,
Hom nkà dɛ da n’ abɛn:
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 742:4
verse:
. Da no a ne kan bɛhyerɛn petee n’,
Bͻn nyina bɛdà edzi,
Ber a pɛrpɛr betsim hͻ pintsinn,
Na yaw biarà efi hͻ.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 742:5
verse:
. Nyimdzee nye asomdwee bͻ mu a,
Nà okyin wiadze do hyia;
Tsenenee a odzi mu da no,
Nyame anohoba da n’.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 743:1
verse:
. ƆNNYƐ hɛn bɔn nko ntsi
Na yɛserɛ W' mbɔbɔrhu;
Fa W' mbɔbɔrhu enyi
Hwɛ hɛn adzeserɛ yi
Wɔ dza yɛayɛ ama Wo
Na dza yɛdwen ho yɛ.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 743:2
verse:
. Yɛdze mber krɔnkrɔn no
Bu nkotodwe bɔ mpaa,
Mber a yesusu dɛ
Hɛn ndwom bɔsɔ W'enyi
Ɔwo a 'hwehwɛ akoma m',
Dom hɔn W'ehumbɔbɔr.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 743:3
verse:
. Na akyɛdze a yɛdze brɛ W',
Anohoba a yɛbɔ
Ɔdɔ ndwuma nyina a
Ɔwo ntsi yɛhyehyɛ n',
Ehumbɔbɔr Nyame,
Fa kɔ adwendwen mu.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 743:4
verse:
. Nkanka hɛn Wo nguan kuw
Ba W'afɔrmbukyia enyim a,
Na adwenbɔn a ɔyɛ hu 
Nye mber dɛɛdɛw dzi afora a,
Nyia a owui ntsi yɛserɛ W',
Dɛ Owura pa, boa hɛn.
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 743:5
title: Henry Twells, 1823-1900.

name: MHB 744:1
verse:
. Ahomka da ɔnye da n' a 
Medze moho maa m' Agyenkwa!
Ɔsɛ dɛ mo 'koma dzi dɛw
Na ɔka ne dɛw kyerɛ aman.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 744:5
verse:
.  Sor man nyina a hom tsee me nsew n, 
M' besi do daa ma hom aatse,
Akɛpem da a owu bɛba a
M' behyira me kra wɔ nsew yi ho.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 744:234
verse:
Ahomka da! ahomka da! 
  Da a Jesus hoor mo ho bɔn nyina 
  Ɔkyerɛɛ m' dɛ monweɔn na monsɔr 
  Na mindzi dɛw aber nyina 
  Ahomka da! ahomka da! 
  Da a Jesus hoor mo ho bɔn nyina! 
 
. Siar n-hyehyɛɛ! ɔsɔw nsew a 
Midzii kyerɛɛ mo Dɔfo n' ano!
Ber a meba N' asɔrfim' yi,
Wɔmma ayɛyindwom nhyɛ hɔ ma.
 
. Ahyɛmu kɛse no yeewie dzi! 
Mo Wura dze nye m', No so yɛ medze;
Ɔtwetwee m' ma mekaa No do,
Ne Nyame ndze n' ɔyɛ me dɛw.
 
. M' akoma a ekyima akyɛr 
Bɔhom wɔ ahomka bea ha:
Mma mmfi w' Ewuradze nkyɛn da
Afa N' a, afa siar nyina.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 745:1
verse:
. WϽNKAMFO hɛn pomfo Ewuradze,
N’adom kà hɛn bͻ mu,
Ͻhyɛ hɛn nyina dɛ yɛnyɛ kor;
Yɛbͻ m’ hwehwɛ N’enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 745:2
verse:
. Ͻhyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛmboa hɛnho;
Na yɛbͻ mu yɛ kor,
Hɛn enyidar frɛ a ͻkrͻn,
Yetu anamͻn kͻ enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 745:3
verse:
. Akyɛdzé a ͻdze ma nkorkor n’,
Yɛdze dͻ bͻsͻ ahwɛ;
Adom pem fa kuraba biara m’,
Wͻ dͻ esu a odzi mu m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 745:4
verse:
. M-po yɛdwen, ka asɛm kor,
Na nokwar mu yɛpen;
Nam Jesus dzin mu ba fakor.
Wͻ koryɛ a odzi mu m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 745:5
verse:
. Yɛbͻ m’ yenya enyigye kor,
Tse asomdwee kor nkà,
Asomdweé a wͻnntse n’ adwen mu.
Dɛw a onnyi kabea.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 745:6
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn anyɛnkoyɛ wͻ famu ha
Wͻ Jesus mu yɛ dɛw a,
Yehyia mu ahengua no ho a,
Enyi bɛgye mbordo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 746:1
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: MHB 746:2
verse:
. Owura, tsew mo ho ma Wo som sesei.
Fa W’adom tum krͻnkrͻn no:
Ma me kra mfà enyidado a otsim hͻ.
Na me pɛ bɛhyɛ Wodze m’.
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: MHB 746:3
verse:
. O mber kakraabi no mu enyigyé a
Midzi wͻ W’ahengua enyim,
Menye W’ me Nyame, bu ntwɛr we mpaabͻ m’,
Dɛ nyɛnko nye nyɛnko hyia.
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: MHB 746:4
verse:
. Ͻdͻ ebun wͻ hͻ a munnkontum ehu,
Gyedɛ mutwa po tseàa no;
Dɛw nkokwaa wͻ hͻ a munnkotum edu
Kɛpem dɛ m’bͻhom Wo mu.
title: Frances Jan van Alstyne, 1820-1915.

name: MHB 747:1
verse:
. NDAASE nkà Eguambaà a
Ͻma yehyia mu:
Yɛka N’ dͻ ho asɛm,
Yɛtow N’ayɛyi;
Jesus yɛ hɛndze daa,
Ͻbɛn hɛn dabaa,
Dze mfom kyɛ na ohyira hɛn,
Na ͻma yedzi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 747:2
verse:
. No mu wͻ asomdwee,
No mu yɛwͻ tum,
N’adom no kora hɛn
Wͻ anago sum no m’;
Hɛn nsͻhwɛ nyina mu no,
Ͻkora hɛn ma
Yehu No nkwagye na
No dͻ a odzi mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 747:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 747:4
verse:
. O yɛbɛyɛ dɛn
Yeedua hɛn Agyenkwa n’?
Nyame, fi sor bra
Bɛyɛ hɛn fofor:
Ma hɛn W’ayamuhyehye
Na krͻnkrͻnyɛ aba,
Ma hɛn nkwagye no a
Obiara gye dzi n’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 747:5
verse:
. Ka enyigyesɛm n’ kyerɛ,
Na yɛ hɛn adehye;
Sɛ nnyɛ Ͻwo Ewuradze a,
Me nhyira fi hen?
Asomdweé a edzé ama n’,
Ma me bi sesei,
Na bue Wo dͻ ahenman n’
Wͻ m’akoma mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 747:6
verse:
. Christ, bra na besian
Dodopo gyirama,
Na kyerɛ hɛn so
Sunsum mu ndwom no;
Mma yenngyaa ara da dɛ
Yɛda W’adom ase,
Nye enyimnyam, na nhyira,
’Nyidzi na ayɛyi.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:1
verse:
. HOM mbra na yɛmbͻ m’ yenyi
Christ ayɛw wͻ adwontow mu;
Hɛn nyina mbͻ mu nyɛ kor,
Mfà enyimnyam mma Ewuradze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:2
verse:
. Yɛmma nsa, akoma nye ndze do
Yɛntow ndwom dɛ tsetseber n’,
Yɛmfà adwen ntsim sor dɛw do,
Ndzi ͻdͻ afahyɛ no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:3
verse:
. Yedzi aper wͻ dͻ mu;
Ma ogyaframee no nkenyan
Dɛ mbrɛ ͻyɛɛ wͻ atͻfo n’ mu,
Wowui maa hͻn Nyankopͻn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:4
verse:
. Yɛbɛtséna, adͻ dɛ hͻn,
Dɛ yɛnda hͻn dɛw edzi;
Wͻagye hɛn nyina wͻ ebufuw m’,
Yɛnye hͻn bͻ m’, gyedzi kor m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:7
verse:
. Yedzi dase, Christ ewu,
Wͻabͻ hɛn nye N’ mbeamudua m’;
Christ atsew wu hu no mu,
Yɛhom Ne nkenyan Sunsum m’.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:8
verse:
. Afei Christ afow kͻ sor,
Hɛn apɛdze nyina kͻ hͻ;
Ͻtse Nyankopͻn nyimfa,
Yɛnye N’ dzi hen wͻ dͻ mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 748:56
verse:
. Yɛntow ndwom Jesus dzin mu,
Dɛ mbrɛ ͻtse wͻ ndeda;
Yɛyɛ kor wͻ beebiara,
Nokwar nyé adom ahyɛ hɛn mà.
. Yegyina ma Christ, hɛn wura,
Kan ma wiadze a ntseasee nnyi m':
Yedzi hɛn Wura ho dase;
Yedzi dase ma Jesus.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 749:1
verse:
. HOM mbra ma yɛmfa Nyamé adom,
Hɛn nyina nyɛ ano kor,
Yɛmbͻ m’ yɛnye hɛn Christ nyɛ kor
Yendzi ahyɛmu afebͻͻ:
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 749:2
verse:
. Jesu tum m’ , yɛdze hɛnho ma W’,
Hyɛ Ne dzin enyimnyam;
Yɛhyɛ bͻ dͻnhwer krͻnkrͻn yi m’,
Yɛatséna, yeewu Nyame m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 749:3
verse:
. Ahyɛmu a yeridzi dem ber yi,
Yemfa nsie hɛn adwen m’ daa:
Yɛnnkapa hɛn Nyamé ara bio,
Yennkegya N'asɛm ekyir.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 749:4
verse:
. Yennkegyaa Nyià a otsie hɛn nsewdzi n’
No ho suro n’ ekyir,
Na sɛ epɛ dɛ itsie hɛn a,
Sian, behyia hɛn sesei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 749:5
verse:
. Fa ahyɛm' bͻgya n’ ka obiara ho,
Ma onyi hɛn bͻn nyina nkͻ;
Na kyerɛw hɛn edzin Wͻ sor,
Kora hɛn kodu da no.              Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 750:1
verse:
. O NYAME, mpɛn pii na atse m’ su,
Na enam ehumbͻbͻr m’ etsie m’!
Bér a morosͻr W’afͻrmbukyia ho n’,
Musuu bͻkͻͻ, mehyɛɛ bͻ bi,
Na aa! Onyimpa ne mbérɛwyɛ a!
Mennhyɛɛ bͻ na munnsuu gyan bi?
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 750:2
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 750:3
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 750:4
verse:
. Ndɛ da ’i, megyé ahyɛmudzi n’ moto m’.
Bͻhyɛ nà asomdwee nkyekyeree n’;
M’adwen nnkɛyɛ m’ nàà, No tum ho,
Wͻdze Jesu bͻgyaa asͻw ano ’i.
Bͻgyà a motwer, dɛm bͻgya n’ nko,
Me nsa nkà ahyɛmudzi n’asomdwee n '
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 750:5
verse:
. Dɛ me gyedzi nnkohu nsakyer,
Mber ntamu, anaa ewiei bio n’,
Boa m’ ma mennantsew W’akwan mu,
Na tsie me ndze sesei, dɛ daa n’,
Na fa mbuae pa hyɛ m’akoma m' dɛw,
Nà Egya, ’nye W’ Ba ndzi nkitaho.
		Amen.
title: William Maclardie Bunting, 1805-66.

name: MHB 751:1
verse:
. Hwɛ mbrɛ Israel Guanhwɛfo 
Esi dze dɔ gyina hɔ;
Tsie! ɔrefrɛ m- bɔtoaba,
Ɔreyɛ hɔn etuu.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 751:2
verse:
. Ɔse, Hom ngyaa hɔn ma wɔmbra, 
Mma hom mmbu hɔn 'nyimtsia!
Osian akra yinom n-tsi
Na Ewuradze bae.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 751:3
verse:
. O, Ewuradze, ndaasem' ara 
Na yɛdze hɔn brɛ Wo,
Yedzi dɛw dɛ yɛyɛ Wodze,
Hɛn mba so nyɛ Wodze.   Amen.
title: Philip Doddridge, 1702-51.

name: MHB 752:1
verse:
. SIARFO Jesus, yegyina ha, 
Yeehyia m’ dɛ mbrɛ Ͻwo kae no;
Yɛdze dɛm abofra yi brɛ W’,
Dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛ hɛn dɛ yɛnyɛ n’,
Christ, yɛdze no ma W’ wͻ ha dɛm,
Yinom dɛm na wͻsɛ W’ heaven.
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 752:2
verse:
. Ntsi yɛyɛ ntsɛm ba Wo hͻ:
O gye bͻhyɛ a yɛdze ba yi; 
Yenhu W’enyimnyam wͻ ha,
Na mbeberhu mapa mu ya n'
Wo ba sesei na mma nngyaa n’ da,
Yɛ n’ Wodze wͻ ha, na afebͻͻ.
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 752:3
title: Benjamin Schmolck, 1672-1737;

name: MHB 753:1
verse:
. FIE Nyɛnko, dɛ mbrɛ osii Galilee ma
Abaatan dze hɔn mbɔtoaba brɛɛ Wo n',
Dɔ Ewuradze, hɛn so yɛdze mbofra 'i ba,
Na yɛpɛ dze hɔn ahyɛ W'astaban ase.
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-

name: MHB 753:2
verse:
. Wɔyɛ Wodze wɔ Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei m',
Yenuma hɔn wɔ Nyame Ɔkorsa dzin mu:
Yɛnntwer nsɛmkyerɛdze, mbom Nyame N'adom n',
Ama eesiesie bea ama Wo nguambaa.
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-

name: MHB 753:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, W'asɔr nyɛ dɛ ɔbaatan n' dɔ,
Ontur nguambaa yi wɔ no bom' mma Wo;
Na dom hɔn sɛ anapa twa m' ma ewia pue a,
Wɔnkɔ do ntsena dɔ na som krɔnkrɔn mu.
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-

name: MHB 753:4
verse:
. Fa abofra yi do twe awofo n' bɛn Wo,
Ma hɔn fie nkɔ do wɔ ahotsew mu;
Aka wiadze efi abɔ m 'i, boa hɔn ano
Wɔ sor, o Christ, ber a wiadze nda asa n'.  Amen.
title: Howell Elvet Lewis, 1860-

name: MHB 754:1
verse:
. Ɔkofo, soɛr gyina, 
Suo Christ mbeamudua n' mu;
Fa wo Pomfo dzin ka ntam dɛ
Apow wiadze ndzɛmba
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 754:2
verse:
. Soɛr ma wonnuma wo- 
Wɔnhor wo ho bɔn nyina;
'Nye wo Nyankopɔn ndzi ahyɛmu,
Ndɛ to wo gyedzi dzin.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 754:3
verse:
. Ndɛ Christ akowaa nye wo 
Wɔkan wo fora esiarfo n',
Ndɛ edɔm tsetse nkɔnhyɛfo n',
Na asomafo n' na atɔfo n'.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 754:4
verse:
. Ma Nyame akodze nyina 
Nhyɛ w' dzen; 'nye abɔnsam nko:
Ɔsa n' bɛyɛ dzen, ɔbɛkyɛr,
Na otwar dɛ yedzi nyim.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 754:5
verse:
. Konyim abɔtsir n' a! 
Sor ndwom dɛɛdɛw bi n' a!
Yi na Sahen n' dze ma hɔn a
Hɔn gyedzi bedzi nyim!
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 755:1
verse:
. HƐN Ewuradze pa Jesus Christ,
Ɔwo yɛɛ obofra pɛn wɔ ha,
Yɛserɛ Wo, ma W'abofra yi
Wo nhyira na W'adom dabiara.
       O Jesus krɔnkrɔn, Sor Ewuradze,
       Yɛserɛ Wo, weɔn W'abofra yi.
title: Heinrich von Laufenburg, 15th cent.;

name: MHB 755:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo sor Ahenman mu n',
Ndzɛmba nyina tsie W'asɛm krɔnkrɔn n',
Osian dɛm ntsi ma hɛn Wo mboa,
Na kora abofra yi mber nyina.
title: Heinrich von Laufenburg, 15th cent.;

name: MHB 755:3
verse:
. Ma abɔfo nweɔn n' ntwa no ho nhyia
Beebiara, oenyan o, ɔada o;
Ma ɔnsoa Wo mbeamudua krɔnkrɔn n',
Ɔnye ahotsewfo aasoa ahenkyɛw n'. Amen.
title: Heinrich von Laufenburg, 15th cent.;

name: MHB 756:
verse:
WIADZE paanoo a wobubuu n' adom m',
Ɔkra wenyin a wokyii n' mbɔbɔrm';
Ɔwo na ekaa nkwa asɛm no,
Ɔwo ewu ma hɛn bɔn ewu;
Hwɛ akoma a yaw epira no,
Hwɛ nyinsu a ndzenbɔnyɛfo kyi,
Ma, W'edziban nyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze
Dɛ W'adom nyɛn hɛn akra ampa.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 757:1
verse:
. WƆNTSERƐW Ewuradze pon no m',
Bubu paanoo na hue nsa n',
Yeehyia pon krɔnkrɔn no ho,
Yebedzi sor edziban no.
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-

name: MHB 757:2
verse:
. Gyedzi m', 'hotsewfo atɔfo,
Adan hɔn enyi ahwɛ mbeamudua n',
Wɔwɔ afɔrbɔ yi m' kyɛfa,
Hɔn nkwa na hɔn wu mu nyina.
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-

name: MHB 757:3
verse:
. 'Hobrɛadze m' yɛper kyɛfa
Wɔ enyimnyam kuw no mu,
Dze dzin no hoahoa hɛnho;
O Christ, yɛnye W' bu paanoo n'.
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-

name: MHB 757:4
verse:
. Wo dɔ ho nkaakaa no ntsi,
Yɛma mbeamudua n' do wɔ sor,
Dze hyɛ Ɔwo Nyame enyimnyam;
Fa W' Sunsum afowa twa hɛn ho.
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-

name: MHB 757:5
verse:
. Wo tum nsa n' gya hɛn abamba ''i,
Yɛbɛhyɛ W'adwen nyin ama;
Yebedzi W' mbra biara do,
Yɛdze ɔpɛ pa bɔsom Wo.
title: George Osborn Gregory, 1881-

name: MHB 758:1234
verse:
. Ewuradze Krɔnkrɔn, memmfata 
Dɛ 'Wo 'bɛba mo hɔ,
Kasa ara: ka adomsɛm kor, 
Na me kra ho bɛsan.
 
. Memmfata: me kra mu tsenabew 
Yɛ nwinwin, yɛ nkɔnkɔw;
Ebɛyɛ dɛn ahɛn mu hɔ?
Kasa, na m'bɛtse apɔw.
 
. Memmfata dze; na m'bɛyɛ dɛn 
Mesiw me Nyame kwan?
Ɔwo a Wo honam nye bɔgyaa
Edze tɔɔ nkwa maa me.
 
. Obra! Anapa *bɔw yi mu 
Fa Woho bɛnyɛn me;
Fa Wo dɔ nye Wo tum nyina
Bɛyhɛ m'akoma ma. Amen.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 759:1
verse:
. Afei hɛn Egya yɛrekaa Wo dɔ n', 
Dɔ a ɔtɔɔ hɛn prɛko wɔ mbeamudua n' do n';
Na hɛn sor Dzimafo n' so wɔ ha yi,
Yɛtrɛ hɛn afɔrbɔdze mu ma Wo,
Afɔrbɔdze a no nko fata W'enyim,
Jesus, nokwar afɔrbɔdze a otsim.
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 759:2
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 759:3
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 759:4
verse:
. N-tsi yɛaba; twe hɛn pin W'anan ho, 
Agyenkwa pa a yɛafom mpo a edɔ hɛn;
Edziban dɛɛdɛw mu yɛ hu yi,
Dua do yi hɛn fi mbusu nyina ho:
Ma hɛn dɛw na fahodzi Wo som mu,
Na mma nngya hɛn mma yemmfi Wo 
nkyɛn da.   Amen.
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 760:1
verse:
. GYEFO, na ɔbɛyɛ dɛ
Ebɛtsena emi mo mu?
Ifi W'ahengua pa do,
'Hengua a nhyira wɔ ho afebɔɔ 'i,
Obirɛpɔn ''bɔto W'ho famu
Abɛhɛn dɛm fie yi mu?
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 760:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, memmfata,
Mo ho yɛ nkɔw yie!
Dɛ me Nyame, megye Wo
Wɔ akoma a aprɔw yi mu:
'Mi bɔnyɛnyi kohwinyi;
M'abrabɔ ka mu dɛ: Gya m' hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 760:3
verse:
. Na bra, Ɔwo a fi sor,
Na bɛtsew mo bo ho;
Bra, Ɔwo ''nyimnyam Hen pa,
Ber a mokotow Wo mbeamudua ''i,
Woara fa Wo nkwagye n' bra,
Bɛhɛn fie yi mu tsew ho.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 761:1
verse:
. JESUS, yetsie W'asɛm,
W'ewiei na adɔyɛ asɛm;
Wɔ Wo mber pa mu wɔ ha no,
Hɛn Wura, yɛba bheyia W'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 761:2
verse:
. Yebua hɛn akoma m',
Ma Agyenkwa n' aaba m',
Na hwɛ! Eguambaa a wokum No n',
Abɔn adamfo n' aba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 761:3
verse:
. Wo mbae ma hɛn enyigye:
Ndɛ ma hɛn sunsum ntse
Enyimnyam a onnyi kabea,
Enyigye a wɔnnka mpo:
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 761:4
verse:
. Edze ahenman mu dɛw
Kyekye hɛn akra werɛ.
Fie yi yɛ W'apontu fie pa,
Na edze hɛn aba ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 761:5
verse:
. O fa sor edziban
Nyɛn hɛn akra dabaa,
Na tserɛw Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei
Frankaa no wɔ hɛn do.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 762:1
verse:
. Agyenkwa no dɔ ho nkaa ntsi 
Na yɛaba pon yi ho:
Ha na Jesus to nsa dze frɛ
Hɔn a woenu hɔnho.
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.

name: MHB 762:2
verse:
. Yɛnam gyedzim' fa nkwa paano 
Yɛdze nyɛn hɛn akra;
Yɛnom wenyin dze kaa bɔgya a
Ogui maa abɔn no.
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.

name: MHB 762:3
verse:
. Ha na yɛtow ndwom yɛkamfo 
Jesus N'anwanwa dɔ;
Da bi sor aponto edziban
Na yɛsɔ hwɛ wɔ ha.
title: Thomas Cotterill, 1779-1823.

name: MHB 763:1
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ W'adom Asɛm no tse, 
Ahobrɛadzem' ara
Yi na m'bɛyɛ, m'Ewuradze a
'Ruwu, mebɛkaa Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 763:2
verse:
. Wo honam a 'mi ntsi wobui n' 
Bɛyɛ mo sor paanoo;
W'ahyɛmudze kuraba n' na megye,
Ma medze makaa Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 763:3
verse:
. Sɛ medan m'enyi hwɛ mbeamudua n' 
Na mohom Calvary hɔ a
Nyame Egumba e, m'afɔrdze e,
Otwar dɛ mekaa Wo.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 763:4
verse:
. M'bɛkaa W' ɔnnye Wo fona nyina, 
Nye Wo dɔ a adɔ m' nyina 
Nyew ber a ahom kakra wɔ hɔ 'i
M'bɛda ho ara makaa W'.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 763:5
verse:
. Na aber a mobɔtɔ mmum 
Na adwen na nkaa bɛhera n'
Ber a 'nam W'ahendzim' bɛba n'
Jesus, ɔyɛ a kaa me.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 764:1
verse:
. ƆSOR n-kwa Mafo,
Ɔwo a ''dze sunsum m' nsa
Na onnyiewiei paanoo,
Ato hɛn pon nwanwa,
Kora nkwa a edze ama hɛn no,
Nyɛn hɛn, tsetse hɛn ma heaven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 764:2
verse:
. Hyɛ hɛn akra ehiafo dzen
Wɔ ɔdɔ fofor koraa mu;
Ber a yenya Wo nkwa no,
Na yehu W'emudzi n',
Na W'adom mapa ahyɛ hɛn dzen n',
Dɛm na yehu W'enyim petee. Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 765:1
verse:
. BRA, Ɔwo Sunsum bɛkyebo,
Ma Agyenkwa N' wu ho siar
Na N'adasa ho amandzehu n',
Mbra adwen a ɔwɔ nkaa biara m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 765:2
verse:
. No dɔ ho Kyerɛwfo nokwafo,
Petse gyedzi a otsim hɔ daa n';
Da No nkwagye kɛse n' edzi,
Bɔ N' nsɛmpa n' dawur kyerɛ hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 765:3
verse:
. Bra, o No wu ho Dasefo;
Bra, Ɔwo sor Kaakaafo,
Ma yɛntse Wo tum ne nka, na
Ma emi na ɔkra bia 'a nya Christ.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 766:12
verse:
. Ma yenhu W' ber a yeridzidzi, 
Na mma nn-dan hɛn nngya;
Agyenkwa, nye hɛn ntsena, na to
Wo pon hɛn 'koma mu.
 
. Enye hɛn ndzidzi Nyame dɔm'; 
Wo honam na bɔgyaa,
N-kwa paanoo, sor wenyin no,
Nyɛ hɛn edziban daa.   Amen.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 767:1
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, bɛhyɛ hɛn do,
Na yenhu nsɛnkyerɛdze;
Ma Wo nkwa mbra paanoo no mu,
Wo tum nhyɛ nsa no mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 767:2
verse:
. Ma nsɛnkyerɛdze 'i nda edzi petee,
Na ma ɔmfa sor kwan do;
Siesie akwan ma wɔmfa W' dɔ n'
Nhɛn nokwar akoma biara m'. Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 768:1
verse:
. O AKWANTUFO paanoo,
Edziban a abɔfo dzi,
O Manna a ofi sor ba
Ma hɔn a hɔn awoo fo sor, 
Fa ma hɛn, hɛn enyi da kwan
Dɛ yebedzi amee,
'Kodu wiadze enyigye ewiei,
Hɛn pɛ nyina bɔbɔ adze.
title: Thomas Aquinas, c. 1227-74; Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: MHB 768:2
verse:
. O Nsu, ɔwo a ema nkwa,
Fi Agyenkwa n' N'akoma m',
N-subura krɔnn a ɔpem,
Eyɛ ɔdɔ nsubura,
O ma hɛn so nsɔ Wo nhwɛ,
Na dwedwe hɛn nsukɔm;
Wo dɛw no nnsa ara da,
Ɔwɔ hɔ afebɔɔ.
title: Thomas Aquinas, c. 1227-74; Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: MHB 768:3
verse:
. Jesus, yɛgye edziban yi,
'Wo a yennhu W; yehuhor W';
Yɛgye Wo nokwasɛm dzi,
Yɛgye, yɛnngye kyim bio:
Nokwafo dɔyɛfo, dom hɛn,
Yɛntsena Wo mu wiadze;
Sɛ owu twamu tam rifi hɔ a,
Yeehu W'enyim ne hyerɛn n'. Amen.
title: Thomas Aquinas, c. 1227-74; Ray Palmer, 1808-87.

name: MHB 769:1
verse:
. Sor paano a enyɛn me, 
'Wo 'yɛ edziban ampa:
Ma nokwar nkwa paano yi
Nyɛn me kra daa daa nyina;
Ɔwo a iwui na etse ase,
Minnya Wo mu ahoɔdzen daa.
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.

name: MHB 769:2
verse:
. Sor Wenyin, fa Wo bɔgyaa 
Hyɛ afɔr kuraba yi ma:
W'epirakur ma n-kwa ,
Mohwɛ W'asɛndua n' nya nkwa;
Ɔwo a eyɛ mo nkwa,
Ma mintsim wo mu pintsinn. Amen.
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.

name: MHB 770:1
verse:
. JESUS, yɛaba Wo pon ho,
Fa nkwa paanoo mapa no
Nyɛn akoma biara sesei.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 770:2
verse:
. Yɛdze nnuho kotow ha 'i,
Ma yenhu W'enyim fɛɛfɛw n',
Yi Wo dɔ nwanwa n' kyerɛ hɛn.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 770:3
verse:
. Ber a yɛhwɛ W'asɛndua yi,
'Ridzi mbɔɔ wɔ hɛn bɔn ho 'i,
Ma hɛn awerɛhow ndan ayɛyi.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 770:4
verse:
. Sɛ yɛnom wenyin nwanwa a
Ɔkyerɛ Wo bɔgyaa a ihuee a,
Fa sor dɔ n' hyɛ hɛn akoma m'.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 770:5
verse:
. Ma Wo pira nsa n' nkyerɛ hɛn kwan
Nkodu W'ahengua no ho,
Wɔ kan na man pa no mu.    Amen.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 770:5
verse:
. Twe hɛn bɛn W'epirakur ho,
Mbrɛ 'yarsa nsu fi pem no,
Hɔ hɛn bɔn na yaw suma.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 770:6
verse:
. Gye hɛn fi bɔn no mpokyerɛ m',
Hɛn gyedzi nwinwin ndzi mu,
'Guambaa, ma hɛn W'asomdwee.
title: Robert Hall Baynes, 1831-95.

name: MHB 771:1
verse:
. 'MANDZEHUNYI, yɛgye W'adom,
Ber a yɛkyerɛ Wo wu a ɔsom bo n',
'Guambaa krɔnn a wɔdze W' mae prɛko,
Eyɛɛ mpata maa adasa nyina
Wɔ W'asɔrfi m' wɔ asaase ha,
Na igyina ahengua n' enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 771:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 771:3
verse:
. Onnhia dɛ yɛbɔkɔ heaven
Akɛfa Agyekwan n' aba ha;
'Dze Woho ama obiara dada,
W'aponto ase na wɔakrɔn Wo:
Yi Woho kyerɛ akra nokwafo,
Na yenhu W'ankasa wɔ ha.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 772:1
verse:
. O Ewuradze, ha na muhu W'enyim, 
Ha na mepɛ mesuo dza wonnhu mu;
Morohwehwɛ menya Nyame N'adom,
Na medze me berɛ mato Wo do.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 772:2
verse:
. Ha na m'bedzi Onyame edziban, 
Na menye Wo anom ɔsor wenyin;
Na medze m'adzesoa mato n-kyɛn
Na makaa Wo fakyɛ ne dɛw no bio.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 772:3
verse:
. Edzidzi na adwontow aber nye yi, 
Ɔsor pon na wɔato ama me yi.
Ma menye Wo mbɔ mu yendzidzi ha,
Na enye me ndzi nkitaho dɛɛdɛw.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 772:4
verse:
. Ɔnnkyɛr na wɔakata nsɛnkyerɛdze n' do: 
Aponto n' etwam'; dɔ no dze nntwam' da.
Woyi paano na wenyin no kɔ mpo a
'Wo, hɛn Kyɛm na Ewia, ebɛn hɛn daa.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 772:56
verse:
. Minnyi mboa bi dɛ Wo nko Wodze no, 
Na onnhia mpo dɛ motwer obi so.
M'Ewuradze, Woara dɔɔ so ma me,
Wo tum n-ko ara nye m'ahoɔdzen.
 
. Mber pii na yɛaba W'edzidziase: 
Ne nyina kyerɛ hɛn sor dze kɛse no,
Sor edziban a da bi yebedzi 
Na yɛsɔ ne dɛw hwɛ ase ha yi.
title: Horatius Bonar, 1808-89.

name: MHB 773:1
verse:
. Christ abɔ werdam apon hɛn, 
No ho nkaabɔdze na yɛyɛ yi;
Yɛkyerɛ hɛn Wura No wu kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 773:2
verse:
. No honam a wobui maa hɛn 
Wɔ nkaabɔ paano yi mu ha,
Ɔno na ɔnyɛn hɛn dɔ kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 773:3
verse:
. Bɔgya a oruwu a okyii no 
Wenyin yi yɛ ho sɛnkyerɛdze.
Yɛbɔnom ara akɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 773:4
verse:
. Anago bɔn a wonyii N' mae n' 
Na Ne mbae a odzi ekyir no
Yɛdze dɔ nyɛbea bɔm' kɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 773:5
verse:
. O, asɛm pa a ɔhyɛ hɛn dzeen!  
Ɔma hɛn akomatɔmu.
Hom mma yengyina dzen nkɛpem
Da a ɔbɛba.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 774:1
verse:
. O ƆDƆ Nyame, yɛkotow W',
Na bɔ mpaa ma hɔn a wɔaba ha 'i,
Wɔaka abɔ m' wɔ nsewdzi krɔnkrɔn m',
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 774:2
verse:
. Ber a enyigye pa ahyɛ nda mu n',
Ber a akwan m' da hɔ na wimu yɛ kann,
Wɔnam gyedzi m', nnyɛ dza wonnhu m',
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 774:3
verse:
. Sɛ ehum hyɛ hɔn pɛ ma a,
Na hɔn ndzepa nyinara sɛɛ a,
Na wɔgye Wo dzi koraa ntsi,
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 774:4
verse:
. Dza ɔwɔ ɔbra m' bɛyɛ hɔndze,
Enyigye anaa dadwen mu o,
Tum a wɔdze yɛ, adom a wɔdze sɔw o.
Ma wɔnye Wo nyɛ kor.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 774:5
verse:
. Onnyiewiei Dɔ, enye hɔn ntsena;
Fa hɔn sie Wo mu afebɔɔ,
Na owu mpo nnkotum atsew hɔn mu,
Hɔn a Ɔwo yɛ hɔn kor n'.
title: William Vaughan Jenkins, 1868-1920.

name: MHB 775:1
verse:
. N-dze a wɔtsee wɔ Eden 
Ayerhyia kan n-dze n',
Asɔpɔn awar nhyira n'
Ɔda ho ara wɔ hɔ.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 775:2
verse:
. Christian ɔbaa na barimba 
So rokɔ awar a,
Nyame Ɔkorsa wɔm' bi,
Na yɛserɛ Ne nhyira:
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 775:5
verse:
. Agyenkwa domfo, bra na 
Bɛka hɔn bɔm' ɔdɔm',
Dɛ mbrɛ edze su ebien
Bɔɔm' wɔ Woara Wo mu n'
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 775:34
verse:
. Dɛ ɔndom hɔn m-ba pa, 
Nye dɔ na nokwardzi,
Na ɔndom hɔn koryɛ bi a
Biribiara nntum mmpa mu.
 
. Sor Egya, Woara bɛfa, 
Ayefor yi ma awar,
Dɛ mbrɛ 'dze Eve maa Adam,
Fii noara ne mfem' no.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 775:678
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, behyira hɔn, 
Ber a wɔrobɔ mpaa yi,
Dɛ mbrɛ ehyira Christ N'Asɔr
Ma ɔyɛ N'Ayefor n'.
 
. Tserɛw W'atsaban wɔ hɔn do, 
Pa hɔn mbusu nyina,-
Ber a worutu anamɔn
Ba W'afɔrmbukyia ho,
 
. Dze hɔn 'nyimnyam abɔtsir 
Abɔbɔ Wo afɔr,-
Kɛpem dɛ wɔnye Agyenkwa
N' Ayefor no bɔsoɛr.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 776:1
verse:
. Egya, adze nyina Yɛfo, 
Wo nyansaa, tum na dɔ
Dzii kan dze akra ebien bɔɔm'
Wɔ Eden ture mu;
N-dɛ fa nkan n' akyɛdze n'
Ma Wo mbofra yi so,
Ofi a W'asomdwee wɔ mu,
Ɔdɔ a nokwardzi wɔm'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 776:2
verse:
. Gyefo a ekɔr Galilee 
Ayeforase hɔ,
N-dɛ so fa enyimpa ma
Hɔn a wɔfrɛ Wo yi:
Ma hɔn wiadze enyigye
Ɔndan sor enyingye
Na wɔsɔ hwɛ a, ma wonhu
Dɛ Woara W'akyɛdze a.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 776:3
verse:
. O Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, 
Ɔwo a Wo dɔ yɛ dzen,
W'ahotsewee so dzi mu,
Fi sor gu hɔn do ahom,
Ama Woara wowaw hɔn
Fi ntokwaa ho n-tsi,
Hɔn bra aakyerɛ dɛ 'Wo na 
Ehyɛ hɔn 'koma do.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 776:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 777:1
verse:
. O ƆDƆ mapa, ebor nyimpa adwen do,
Yɛkotow W'ahengua enyim na yɛserɛ
Dɛ hɔn a eka hɔn bɔ m' afebɔɔ yi
Nnya ɔdɔ a no do nntwa da biara da.
title: Dorothy Frances Gurney, 1858-1932.

name: MHB 777:2
verse:
. O N-kwa mapa, yɛ hɔn awerɛhyɛm' koraa,
Ayamuyie mapa na gyedzi a otsim,
Abotar enyidar, 'kokodur a ɔsɔw berɛ,
Awerɛhyɛmu a onnsuro yaw na owu.
title: Dorothy Frances Gurney, 1858-1932.

name: MHB 777:3
verse:
. Dom hɔn dɛw a ɔsesa wiadze awerɛhow,
Dom hɔn asomdwee a ɔdwedwe 
wiadze haw;
Ma hɔn nkwa nda mu enyimnyam adzekyee,
Dza ɔdze onnyiewiei dɔ na nkwa ba.  Amen.
title: Dorothy Frances Gurney, 1858-1932.

name: MHB 778:1
verse:
. HƆN a wogyina Zion ho n',
Mbrɛ hɔn anan ho yɛ fɛw a!
Wɔka nkwagye nsɛmpa no daa,
Na wɔda asomdwee edzi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 778:2
verse:
. Hɔn ndze ma awerɛkyekyer,
Hɔn nsɛm so ne dɛw a!
Zion, hwɛ W'Agyenkwa Ɔhen no;
Odzi Hen, dzi nyim ha.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 778:3
verse:
. Mbrɛ woesi ehyira hɛn aso a!
Ɔtse dɛ ndze dɛɛdɛw a
Nkɔnhyɛfo na ahemfo tweɔnee,
Na wɔhwehwɛe a woennhu n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 778:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ woehyira hɛn enyiwa a
Ohu dɛm sor kan yi a!
Nkɔnhyɛfo na ahemfo peer ho,
Na wowui a woennhu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 778:5
verse:
. Aweɔmfo n' dze ndze kor,
Maa ndwom dɛdɛɛdɛw do;
Jerusalem so ma ndwom do,
Sardofo tse ne dɛw n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 778:6
verse:
. Ewuradze tserɛw N'abaw m'
Wɔ wiadze nyina do;
Wɔmma wiadze nyinara nhu
Hɛn Gyefo na Nyame
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 779:1
verse:
. SUNSUM Krɔnkrɔn, tsena hɛn kra mu,
Na ma Wo gya mfi sor nhyerɛn;
Edze sunsum ngo sera hɛn,
Na ema akyɛdze horow.
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: MHB 779:2
verse:
. W'adom ngohuam a ofi sor
Yɛ awerɛkyekyer, nkwa na dɔ;
Na Wo kan a onndum da no
Nhyerɛn hɛn do, ɔmpa hɛn sum.
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: MHB 779:3
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: MHB 779:4
title: Anonymous, 9th or 10th cent;

name: MHB 780:1
verse:
. MO Wura Kasa! W'akowaa ritsie,
Morotweɔn W'adom asɛm no,
Mo kɔn dɔ W'akomatɔm' ndze,
Mo Wura, Ma mentse n' sesei,
Mo Wura, mayɛ aso ritsie W',
Ewɔ bɛn ka kyerɛ me?
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 780:2
verse:
. Mo Wura, bɔ me dzin na kasa,
Ama meehu dɛ enye m';
Frɛ m' na medze anan haahar
Bɛka W' do ahotɔ m' akɔ
Bea a 'Guanhwɛfo n' dzi nguan enyim,
Wɔ Botan no nwin ase.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 780:3
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 780:4
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:1
verse:
. Ewuradze, kasa kyerɛ me, 
Ma munsusu Wo do nkasa;
Ahwehwɛ me yi ma mo so
Monhwehwɛ Wo mba a wɔayew no.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:2
verse:
. Mo Wura, gya me kwan ma mo so 
Mingya W'akobɔfo taataa;
O nyɛn me ma mo so memfa
Manna mma hɔn a kɔm dze hɔn.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:3
verse:
. O hyɛ me dzen ama ber a 
Migyina pintsinn wɔ Wo mu n',
Maatsen me nsa ama hɔn a
Woridzi aper wɔ bra po do.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:4
verse:
. Kyerɛkyerɛ m' na meetum makyerɛ 
N-dzɛmba pa a ada n' edzi;
Ma m'anosɛm n-hwira ndu
Akoma pii ase noho.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:7
verse:
. Fa me yɛ dɛ Woara 'pɛ, 
Aber nyina na bea biara,
Kodu dɛ mubohu W'enyim
Wɔ ahomgye, dɛw, na enyimnyam ma.
                                   Amen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 781:56
verse:
. Fa W'asomdwee dɛɛdɛw n' ma me, 
Ma minnya nyansa memfa nka
Asomdwee nsɛm nkyerɛ Wo mba
Asonafo wɔ mbusu mber mu.
 
. Mo Wura, fa Wo mayɛ no ma m', 
Kodu dɛ m'akoma bu do,
Ma memfa ndam mombɔ dawur,
Menka Wo dɔ, minyi W' ayɛw.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 782:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, hyerɛn hɛn do,
Ɔwo, adasamba Kan;
Dua Wo kyerɛwsɛm do
Yi Woho kyerɛ hɛn ndɛ;
Na yɛhwɛ W'enyim a
Hɛn akoma dzɛw ntsi
Nkɔkowaba nam hɛn do
Eesua W'adom nwanwa n'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 782:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, hue Sunsum
Gyaframee n' gu hɛn do,
Ma yɛdze ano kor
Yaabɔ Wo dzin dawur.
Ma Wo mba aso pa,
Ma hɔn adwen ontsim,
Na hɔn nyina eehu
Ndzɛmba akɛse a ayɛ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 782:3
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, kasa ma hɛn,
Dza yɛka nyina mu,
Ma dza yɛkyerɛ nyɛ dɛ
Mbrɛ W'asɛm tse ara;
Ama nguambaa aatse
Hɔn Guanhwɛfo n' Ne ndze,
Na wɔaaka No do daa,
Na woeedzi No mu dɛw.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 782:4
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 783:1
verse:
. NA nyimpa a ɔyɛ mberɛw ho suro
Besiw sunsum a ɔwɔ mo mu n' kwan?
Ana me ndzeyɛɛ na kasa
Kyerɛ dɛ meyɛ m' Wura dasefo?
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;

name: MHB 783:2
verse:
. Adasa Agyenkwa, Enyiasombea,
Ihu mo mu adwen nyinara;
'Bɛn na mohwehwɛ wɔ wiadze,
No mu enyigye anaa ayɛyi a?
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;

name: MHB 783:3
verse:
. Christ dɔ n' hyɛ me ma mohwehwɛ
Nyimpa akra a wɔatɔ dɔnsuar;
Metsea m', dze su na ntotɔserɛ
Hwim hɔn fi adakamaa mu.
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;

name: MHB 783:4
verse:
. Sɛ W' nokwar ntsi mo bɔgyaa na
Nkwa ho wɔ mfaso a, medze ma W';
Ewuradze, ma Wo tsirmpɔw mbra m',
Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ, ayɛyi nka W' dzin.
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;

name: MHB 783:5
title: Johann Joseph Winckler, 1670-1722;

name: MHB 784:1
verse:
. AFƆR bɛn na hɛn atɔbɔ
Dze ma hɛn Wura, wɔ N'adom ntsi?
Yɛbɔbɔ Ne dzin kɛse no,
Na yeeyi N'ayɛw dɛ mbrɛ ɔsɛ.
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 784:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a yɛdɔ W' mbordo daa daa,
Ɔwo a esen hɛn adze nyina,
Bue sor nsunyiwa gu hɛn do,
Ma ɔnhyɛ hɛn akra amaama, mbu do.
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 784:3
verse:
. Dɛm na hɛn bra bɔbɔ W' tum na
W'adom a 'dze kyɛ abɔn kwa n' dawur,
Kodu dɛ adasa bohu W'dzin,
Na wɔatsen hɔn nsa nyina ama W'.
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 784:4
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 784:5
verse:
. O ma ogufo n'aba n' ndɔr!
Na yɛbɔsow aba mber nyina;
Ma W'asɛmpa n' mpetse wiadze,
Yɛmbɔ Wo daa nokwar n' dawur.
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 784:6
verse:
. Wo dɔ mapa ayɛ hɛn fofor n',
Yebohu W' kɛseyɛ no tum n'
Yegyina hɛn Nyame N'asɔrfi m'
Dɛ edum, na yennkefi hɔ bio.
title: Augustus Gottlieb Spangenberg, 1704-92.

name: MHB 785:1
verse:
. JESUS, sɛ yɛka hɛn akoma m'
Ehiasɛm kyerɛ Wo a,
Yehu dɛ yehia adom a
Ɔyɛ akyɛdze a ofir Wo;
Hɛn a yenyim hɛn mberɛwyɛ no,
Yebenya akyɛdze pii,
Yebenya adom nye nhyira mbordo,
Ne nyina Nyame dze ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 785:2
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 786:1
verse:
. OWURA, ma yɛnweɔn dɛ beenum n',
Yɛntweɔn Wo mbaa, na obiara
Mper nkeka ne kandzea;
Na osiandɛ ngo a ofi Wo hɔ no
Wora adom daa gu akoma biara m' ntsi,
Kandzea biara mmonsom.
title: Thomas Bowman Stephenson, 1839-1912.

name: MHB 786:2
verse:
. Mma yɛnntsena pɛsɛankonya m',
Mbom yɛmfa asɔryɛ mfora edwumayɛ,
Ama kandzea n' aadzɛw;
Na pii efi hɔn bɔn sum kadoo m' n',
Wɔnye hɛn aabɔ mu epue
W'enyim aponto ase.
title: Thomas Bowman Stephenson, 1839-1912.

name: MHB 786:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, nnyɛ hɛn nko bɛba
W'aponto kɛse no ase,
Abɛtsena dɛw m' ahwɛ W',
Yɛdze akobɛɔfo, ayarfo,
Ankonam na mbofra brɛ Wo,
Ama yaahwɛ W'enyim.
title: Thomas Bowman Stephenson, 1839-1912.

name: MHB 787:1
verse:
. N-dɔbaa Ewuradze, tsie 
Wo nkowaa ehiafo hɛn su;
Tsie hɛn gyedzi mu mpaabɔ yi
Na dom hɛn dza yehia.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 787:2
verse:
. Yɛtweɔn Wo mbɔbɔr mu; 
Inyim hɛn hia nyina:
Ampa dɛ n-dɔbaa no so,
Na edwumafo no suar.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 787:3
verse:
. Sakyer wobinom so 
Na soma hɔm W'asɔr mu
Ma wɔnka Wo tum kasa no
Dɛ 'Wo nye hɔn wɔ hɔ
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 787:4
verse:
. Ma wɔnka W'asɛmpa a 
Adom ahyɛ no ma n',
Wɔnkyerɛ dɛ 'Wo nye Ewuradze,
Adasamba Gyefo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 787:5
verse:
. Ma wɔntrɛ Wo dzin mu, 
Ma wɔmfata hɔn frɛ,
Wɔmbɔ W'adom kɛse no mu,
Wo dɔ a onnyi ewiei n'!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 788:1
verse:
. DOMFO Abɔso, wiadze Tsɛmbuafo,
Ɔwo a efa mberɛwyɛ nye ehiafo yɛ W'dze;
Efa dɛtse nkuraba hun na ebubudze
Na ehyehyɛ hɔn Wo ndzepa a ɔmmpa ara da.
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.

name: MHB 788:2
verse:
. Kaansa Wo kan hyɛ m' mpo a, nkuraba n' nnkyɛr pa,
Wotsin Wo mom do bubu, na woetwa m';
Afei Wo nokwar kan no pue n'ahoɔdzen m'
Dɛ mbrɛ enyinam nyinam mununkum mu no.
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.

name: MHB 788:3
verse:
. Dɛ mbrɛ mununkum kyin yɛ Wo pɛ kɛse n'
Na mframa dzendzen bɔ wiadze ho aprɔw n',
Asɛm n' dze Ne nyansaa hyɛ hɔn sunsum ma,
Wɔbobɔ mu, wɔhyerɛn, na wobu do.
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.

name: MHB 788:4
verse:
. Wɔbɔ hɔn ndze m' Jesus Christ nye Ewuradze!
Ntsi Satan bɔ hwea, n'aban dwuruw gu famu,
Dɛ mbrɛ ekasae ma totorobɛnto hɛnee
Ara a Canaan afasu dwuruwii no.
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.

name: MHB 788:5
verse:
. Afei ma totorobɛnto n' nhɛn dzendzen,
Ewuradze, ma onnyan hɛn mfi bɔn nda m';
Nkandzea a Ɔwo asosɔ wɔ hɛn sum mu n',
O ma ɔnhyerɛn wɔ hɛn esunsum mu!
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.

name: MHB 788:6
verse:
. 'Nyimnyam, ayɛyi, tumdzi na ahoɔdzen nyina
Nka Nyame Ebiasa kor afebɔɔ;
Ɔama Ne kan nwanwa n' ahyerɛn hɛn ho,
Ɔafrɛ hɛn sum mu ma yeehu N'enyimnyam!
title: Jean Baptiste de Santeuil, 1630-97.

name: MHB 789:1
verse:
. CHRIST, mma W' werɛ mmfir
W'adɔntsen dɔm a
Woridzi ako wɔ amanadze.
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.

name: MHB 789:2
verse:
. Yɛserɛ W', kora na ma hɔn tsir do,
Wɔ nsuyirii, gya, sum na suro m'.
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.

name: MHB 789:3
verse:
. Hyɛ hɔn dzen wɔ suro biara m',
Na Woara bɛn hɔn wɔ mbusu m'.
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.

name: MHB 789:4
verse:
. W'edwuma na wɔper ayɛ,
Wosuar, na atamfo no dɔɔ so.
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.

name: MHB 789:5
verse:
. Christ, 'nye W'akofo adɔfo a
Wɔwɔ ehum asaase do ntsena.
title: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster, 1838-1912.

name: MHB 790:1
verse:
. NYAME mbɔbɔrhufo tumfo,
Fi Wo sor bea a adze nnsa hɔ n'
Na fa tsimberɛw frɛ hɔn a wɔayew,
Wɔnam sum mu no, bra kan mu.
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.

name: MHB 790:2
verse:
. Beebi a dɔm wo anaa ho atɔ pan,
Dɔmtutuw a wɔwɔ nsuano, nkurow m',
Nyimpa dodow pii na wɔnntsee
Asɛmpa no a edze ma hɛn n'.
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.

name: MHB 790:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma W'asomfo mfrɛ
Mberantsɛ atam, nkɔdaa akomapirimfo,
Nguankuw a wɔapetse, ma hɔn nyina 
Mbɛka W'asomdwee nguankuw n' ho.
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.

name: MHB 790:4
verse:
. Soma ma wɔnkɛka W'asɛm n'
Ma gyedzi aaba ma ekyingye aakɔ,
Bɔn eetu ma mberɛwyɛnyi eetsim,
Na akoma bobɔe aahyɛ dzen.
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.

name: MHB 790:5
verse:
. Afei nsaase a woetwie nyina
Dza yɛhwɛ a ɔgye hɛn awerɛhow n',
Nkwa nsu bɛma efuw ahaebun,
Ma ndze aafow sor aakyerɛ W'ayɛyi
title: William Cullen Bryant, 1794-1878.

name: MHB 791:1
verse:
. Wɔabɔ akwankwan kɔ ekyirkyir,
Wɔdze yaw, ɔberɛ nye ɔkɔm kɔ;
Wonnyi guanhwɛfo pa a ɔkyerɛ
Ayarfo a wɔayɛ mberɛw no kwan.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 791:2
verse:
. Ɔwo na ayɛ Guanhwɛfo no,
Guanhwɛfo pa a apon Wo nguan;
Boa hɔn ano na ma hɔn edziban,
Na asɔfo a asan mu eyi hɔn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 791:3
verse:
. Ma W'asɛnkafo n' adom nsɛm,
Ma woeenya etsiefo piinara;
Asɛnkafo a wɔkyerɛ abɔnfo
Kwan ba nkwagye bɔgya no ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 791:4
verse:
. Bue hɔn ano, ma hɔn anotsewee
Ma hɔn totorobɛnto ndze,
Wɔmfa mfrɛ adasa mbra nkwagye m',
Wɔ Nyia owui maa hɔn n' ho gyedzi m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 791:5
verse:
. W'enyimnyam nko na wɔnhwehwɛ;
O ma ɔdɔ mbu do hɔn akoma m',
Ma wɔngye ndzi na wɔmpaa m' nka,
Na wonyi W'ehumbɔbɔr ayɛw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 792:12
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, sɛ W'asɛm ntsi 
Yedua n-kwasɛm n' a,
Wo tum nsa no gugu do yi
Aba no befifir.
 
. W'adom ne ndam ara 
Na ɔbɛma ndɔbaa pii,
Na ɔadɔr agyedzifo a 
Wɔtse ma W'enyimnyam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 792:34
verse:
. Nsɛmpa n' ne nhyira nsu n', 
Ma ɔntɔ mma hɛn daa,
Ma tum a ɔsakyer akra n'
Ɔmbra W'asɔfoe do.
 
. Ma ɔdodowara 
Nnya dɔ a ɔdan 'koma n',
Ma W'adom ne dɛw nsiesie hɔn
Mma ɔsor dɛw kɛse n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 793:1
verse:
. OWURA a Wo ndɔbaa 'nyikan
Kata asaase do,
Bea a abɔfo boaboa hɔn 
Ndɔbaa a wɔaber ano,
Gye nsa yi yɛ W'edwuma,
Ma hɛn akoma ntwer W', ndɔ W',
Dua hɔn do ma W'ahendzi
Mfi sor noho mbra ntsɛm.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 793:2
verse:
. Soma hɔn Wo wenyin turo m',
Dɛ wɔyɛ W'apaafo n',
Wɔpɛ dɛ wɔsoa ndzesoa
Wɔ ɔberɛ nda mu ma Wo,
Owura, sɛ frɛ hɔn ba fie a,
Wɔnnkɛgye akatua koraa,
Ma wɔaakyɛ 'fona no a
Ɔma W'ahendzi ba n'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 793:3
verse:
. Nyame Egya, nye hɔn ntsena,
Nyame Ɔba, nye hɔn ntsena,
Nyame Sunsum, nye hɔn ntsena;
Onnyiewiei Ɔkorsa!
Yɛ hɔn asɔfo adehye,
Ma wɔmfa nsom Wo yie,
Fa W'amayɛ hyɛ hɔn ma,
Sesei nye daa nyina.   Amen.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 794:1
verse:
. ƆDOMANKOMA Ɔba, Ɔdɔ a ɔkye,
Woara fa Wo tum kɛse no;
Ma adasa nhu W'ehumbɔbɔr,
Ma wonhu Wo nkwagye adom.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 794:2
verse:
. Kyerɛ Wo dɔ no konyimdzi no,
Wo nko dzi hen akoma biara m'.
Kodu dɛ atamfo bɛtse W' tum,
Ma enyimnyam eewie adom edwuma n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 794:3
verse:
. Adom Sunsum na ahoɔdzen tum,
Kan nsunyiwa nye dɔ wɔ asaase,
Fa W'ayarsa tum no petse
Ma ɔmpem aman nyina do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 794:4
verse:
. Sɔ ɔdɔ mapa gya wɔ hɛn akoma m',
Gyedzi ndwuma nda edzi hɛn mu;
Amma sor dɔm aannyɛ W'edwuma
Ntsɛntsɛm annsen hɛndze wɔ ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 794:5
verse:
. Tease, Ɔkorsa 'Tsipɛmfo
Sor na asaase, wo ndwuma nyina
Mfa nhyira nyidzi, ntonton na ɔdɔ
Nsom Wo aber nyinara daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 794:6
verse:
. W'ahendzi yɛ Krɔnn mprɛnsa,
Tum nyinara so yɛ Wodze;
Sɛ abɔdze nyina twa m' kɔ a,
W'enyimnyam a ɔmmpa da bɛhyerɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 795:1
verse:
. O NYAME N'asɔr, soɛr;
Fa Wo dɔ kandzea no,
Kandzea a onndum ara da
Wɔ asaase do nye sor.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 795:2
verse:
. Fa nyansa na nokwar
Huw gya n' ma ɔndzɛw hoo,
Ɔdɔ na mbabun kan
Mpam wiadze m' fɛr mfi hɔ.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 795:3
verse:
. Twuw abɔnsam enyim,
Yi akra fi efiadze,
Kyekyer akoma bobɔe
Ma dɛw na asomdwee.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 795:4
verse:
. Adze biarà à ɔyɛ fɛw,
Adze biara a ɔtsen,
Ma ɔnyɛ fow dɛ mframa,
Ɔndɔɔso dɛ huntuma!
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 795:5
verse:
. Beebiara a sum wɔ no,
Tow kan nserɛmɛn gu hɔ,
Kɛpem dɛ enyim a esuam
Bohu Nyame enyigye.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 795:6
verse:
. Se dasanyi biara,
'Birɛmpɔn nye kɔhweaban,
Dɛ ɔdɔ frɛɛ no awoo m'
Dɛ ɔhen na sɔfo.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 796:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, W'asɔr a apon no
Rinyan fi nda m' mbea nyina a 
Wonyim dɛ adzekyee reba a
Okumfor n' beyi N'enyim;
Worinyan agye akoradze a
'Dze W' bɔgyaa a ɔsom bo tɔe n',
Na wɔatwer wo dwumason a
W'anwanwa wu no edzi.
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 796:2
verse:
. Gye W'ayɛyi nka wɔ Wo nsu ntsi,
Ekyir nsutɔ a ɔsom bo;
Yeyi Wo ayɛw dɛ Wo Sunsum
Tum no ekenyan hɛn bio;
Dɛ W'asɛmpa akoradze mapa n'
Wɔso dze rokɔ mbeambea,
Dɛ Egya n' N'apɛdze dzi mu.
Wɔ Wo nsamu epiratwa no mu.
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 796:3
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Wo wɔ esiarfo a
Wɔper hwehwɛ hɔn a wɔayew,
Yɛtonton Wo dɛ ndze bi sua
W'ayɛyi ndwom no fofor;
Ntonton nka W'ayarfo a wɔper
Suo W'atar ano ndwow m' ntsi,
Yɛtonton Wo, hɔn a wɔagye edzi,
Ehu Wo dɔ enyadze n' ntsi.
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 796:4
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 797:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, yɛbɔ mpaa bio
Ma mbofra a wɔwɔ ekyirkyir,
Hɔn a wɔnntsee Wo dzin mpo da,
Jesus dzin dɛɛdɛw n' pɛn koraa.
title: Mary Willcox

name: MHB 797:2
verse:
. Nkɔkoaba a ama hɔn ano
Gyina ekyirkyir asɔrdan mu,
Nwin ase, dze W'ayɛyi n'
Ma ndua, abosom nye abotan.
title: Mary Willcox

name: MHB 797:3
verse:
. Nsa nkakraba a edze ama
Hɔn dɛ wɔmfa nyɛ Wo pɛ n',
Wɔdze suro som, bɔ afɔr
Ma abosom a wonnhu, wɔnntse.
title: Mary Willcox

name: MHB 797:4
verse:
. O sor Hen, kyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ma
Wɔmfa akyɛdze nye ayɛyi
Mbrɛ Wo Ba a obowui dze
Kyerɛɛ Wo fakyɛ nkwagye dɔ n'.
title: Mary Willcox

name: MHB 798:1
verse:
. WO mba tow hɔn ndwom wɔ wiadze nyina:
Hɔn ndze bɔ m' dɛɛdɛw fi anee na boka;
Wohuhor Ewuradze a ɔma mbofra ahoɔdzen,
Jesus, hɛn Kwankyerɛfo, Sahen, Nyɛnko.
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.

name: MHB 798:2
verse:
. Beebiara a Wo po asorɛkye bu
Gu nsupɔw mpoano mfesantsen nyina n';
Wohuhor hɔn Wura a nkwagye wɔ N' nko asɛm m',
Ɔno a No dɔ po etwa hɔn ho ehyia.
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.

name: MHB 798:3
verse:
. Wo mba a ewia hyerɛn hɔn do wiadze mu,
Mbrɛ Asia esutsen fɔw asaase nyina do,
Wohuw ndwom ber a hɔn haban eyi ndɔbaa;
Ayɛyi nka Ewuradze a ɔnyɛn hɔn.
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.

name: MHB 798:4
verse:
. Aman pii wɔ hɔ a bi nnhun W'enyim pɛn,
Mbofra akoma nnsɔɔ Wo dɛw nnhwɛɛ pɛn,
Naaso bohue W'adom egu hɔn nyina do;
Ma nkataasia na mberantsɛ W'ahoɔdzen.
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.

name: MHB 798:5
verse:
. Ma mbofra ntow Wo ndwom wɔ wiadze nyina,
Hɔn ndze bɔ m' dɛɛdɛw, fi anee na boka;
Wohuhor Ewuradze a ɔma mbofra ahoɔdzen,
Jesus, hɛn Kwankyerɛfo, Sahen, Nyɛnko.
title: Basil Joseph Mathews, 1879.

name: MHB 799:1
verse:
. BUBER no edu
Na edwumayɛfo no suar;
Hɛn mbofra dze yɛpɛ, 
Na yebesi dɛn\nAyɛ hɛn Wura No twadwuma yi bi?
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.

name: MHB 799:2
verse:
. Hɛn nsa susuar koraa,
Hɛn asɛnka yɛ mberɛw,
Yenntum nnkyerɛ binom;
Yɛyɛ dɛn hwehwɛ,
Yɛyɛ hɛn Wura No twadwuma yi bi.
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.

name: MHB 799:3
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.

name: MHB 799:4
verse:
. Ɔbɛyɛ bɛyɛ n'
Na mfe rutwa m' kɔ no,
Hɛn so bɛyɛ etwafo,
Yɛakɔ enyim ahoɔdzen m'
Yɛayɛ hɛn Wura No twadwuma yi bi.
title: The Book Of Praise For Children, 1881.

name: MHB 800:1
verse:
. AGYENKWA, kenyan amanaman,
Ma W'awerԑhow nsow aba,
Ma Wo yaw nye awerԑkyekyer
Ntwe amanamamfo mbrԑ Wo,
Wɔnka Wo mbeamudua ho nsԑm 
Nwanwa n' nkyerԑ aman nyina;
Na wonhu Wo W'enyimnyam mu 
Nye Wo mbɔbɔrhu beberee n'.
title: Arthur Cleveland Coxe, 1818-96.

name: MHB 800:2
verse:
. Nkorɔfo a wonnyim Wo wɔ
Ekyirkyir nyina kɔn dɔ Wo;
Adasa kyi nyinsuwa wɔ W' ho,
Adasa pԑ W' mu ahomgye;
Wo ho nsukɔm dze hɔn mbordo
Dԑ sar a woetwa n' 'mon hia nsu n',
Wɔhwehwԑ Wo dԑ sor Nyame
Dԑ Nyia wokum N' maa abɔn.
title: Arthur Cleveland Coxe, 1818-96.

name: MHB 800:3
verse:
. Agyenkwa, hwԑ! Nsupruw rotweɔn,
Atsen hɔn nsa, agyen hɔn enyi,
Rohwԑ Wo Sunsum ndwumafor n';
Rema ɔdɔ gya dzԑw, nyansa hyerԑn;
Ka asԑm n', ma ɔsԑnkafo n',
Ahoɔhar, ka ne gyirama
Kodu dԑ abɔdze nyina bɔtow
Eguambaa, W'enyimnyam ndwom.  Amen.
