title: Arthur Cleveland Coxe, 1818-96.

name: MHB 801:1
verse:
. GREENLAND nkokwaa nwinwim n' do,
India adantse abo ho,
Ebibiman, mbea a nsu pem
Fefa anhwea pii do so;
Fi tsetse esutsen pii mu,
Fi mbԑ asaase do,
Wɔfrԑ hԑn dԑ yenkeyi
Hɔn aman mfi mfom mpokyerԑ m'.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 801:2
verse:
. Ana hԑn a sor nyansa
Eguar hԑn akra yi
Botum dze nkwa kan n' akam
Nyimpa a wɔtse sum mu?
N-kwagye o, nkwagye nye yi;
Hom mpaa m' nka enyigyesԑm n'
Nkodu dԑ aman nyina
Bohu Messiah N' dzin.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 801:3
verse:
. Mframa, hom mbɔ N'asԑm n' nkɔ,
Na hom nsu, hom mpem daa,
Nkɔ nkodu wiadze n'ano
Dԑ enyimnyam po bun;
Kԑpem dԑ Eguambaa a wokum
No maa abɔn nyina n'
Pomfo, Ɔhen Bɔfo no,
Bԑsan ebedzi hen, dԑw m'.  Amen.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 802:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, sor kyerԑ W'enyimnyam,
Wo nyansa hyerԑn woraba biara m';
Sԑ hԑn enyi bɔ W'asԑm n' do a
Yԑkenkan Wo dzin n'enyigye m'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 802:2
verse:
. Ewia a ɔhyerԑn, kan a odzi ndan,
'Nago na adzekyee ka W' tum kyerԑ,
Mbom Wo nhyira Nwoma a akyerԑw no
Kyerԑ Wo tsenenee na W'adom.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 802:3
verse:
. Ewia, bosoom, na nworaba nngyaa
W'ayԑyi wɔ wiadze mu da;
Ntsi Wo nokwar hyԑԑ ase kyinii n'
Okodur aman nyina mu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 802:4
verse:
. W'asԑmpa no bԑtserԑw araa
Ma wiadze nyina eehu Wo nokwar n',
Kԑpem dԑ Christ behyira aman nyina a 
Kan anaa wi pue wɔ hɔ no.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 802:5
verse:
. Tsenenee Ewia kԑse, pue,
Fa sor kan hyira sum wiadze yi,
W'asԑmpa n' bue ntsetsekwaa enyi,
Wo mbra yԑ krɔnn W'atsembu tsen!
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 802:6
verse:
. Eyԑ akra afofor dze bɔn kyԑ
Ma yehu Wo tum kԑse no,
Mo Wura, pepa m' bɔn, yԑ m' fofor,
Ma W'asԑm ngye m' taataa nkɔ sor.  Amen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 803:1
verse:
. BEGYABEGYA na sum
Tsee Wo tum asԑm no,
Na woguanee;
Yԑserԑ Wo, tsie hԑn,
Na beebiara a asԑmpa
Ne nserԑmԑn nnhyerԑn hɔ n',
Ma hɔ nyԑ kann.
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.

name: MHB 803:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a edze ayarsa
Na adzehu gyee hԑn
W'atsaban do,
'Maa adamfo adwen m' tseew hɔn,
Efurafo hun adze,
Afei ma Wo kan nhyerԑn Adasa do.
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.

name: MHB 803:3
verse:
. Nokwar na dɔ Sunsum,
Nkwa Mafo, Ebubur Krɔnn,
Tu faa bra ntsԑm;
Butuw nsu no enyi
Tow adom nserԑmԑn no,
Wiadze sum kebii n' mu
Ma hɔ nyԑ kann.
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.

name: MHB 803:4
verse:
. Siarfo, Ɔkorsa Krɔnkrɔn,
Enyimnyam Ɔkorsa!
W'adom, dɔ tum n',
Tse dԑ popramee a 
Obubu n'asorԑkye,
Wɔ wiadze afanan nyina
Ma hɔ nyԑ kann.
title: John Marriott, 1780-1825.

name: MHB 804:1
verse:
. TSERƐW O asԑm tumfo tserԑw,
Tserԑw Ewuradze ahenman n' mu;
Beebiara a N'adom esiesie
N-kwa ama ɔsorfo.
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;

name: MHB 804:2
verse:
. Nkwasԑm krɔnn a ɔyԑ dzen
Aman nyina kɔn dɔ Wo;
Tserԑw, ma sum kebii no mpa,
Na ma kan nhyerԑn wiadze.
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;

name: MHB 804:3
verse:
. Soԑr hwԑ! Haban no reber
Ndɔbaa no bԑyԑ kԑse,
Etwafo no suar dodow,
Edwuma a wɔbԑyԑ no so.
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;

name: MHB 804:4
verse:
. Otwa edwuma no Wura, ma hԑn
Dԑw na ahoɔdzen nyԑ W'edwuma,
Kԑpem dԑ aman nyina bohu
Wo kan n' hyerԑn na woesuro Wo.  Amen.
title: Jonathan Friedrich Bahnmaier, 1774-1841;

name: MHB 805:1
verse:
. YƐDZE Christ kyerԑ wiadze;
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ,
Wɔ dɔ nsiyԑ m';
'Hiafo na mbɔɔdzifo
Mberԑwyԑfo, nkrumsifo,
Ayarfo, 'werԑhofo a,
Christ sa hɔn yar.
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.

name: MHB 805:2
verse:
. Yɛdze Christ kyerԑ wiadze;
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ
Wɔ mpaabɔ mu;
Akobɔfo a wɔyewee,
Hɔn a nna wonnyi etsidaa n',
Wɔpoon hɔn aboɔdzen
Fii enyidɔ mu.
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.

name: MHB 805:3
verse:
. Yɛdze Christ kyerԑ wiadze;
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ
Wɔ ɔnosԑԑ kor m';
Wɔnye hԑn yԑ edwuma n',
Wɔnye hԑn ka asԑm no,
Nye hԑn soa mbeamudua n'
Ma hԑn Wura Christ.
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.

name: MHB 805:4
verse:
. Yԑdze Christ kyerԑ wiadze,
Yԑdze wiadze brԑ Christ,
Wɔ enyigye ndwom m';
Hɔn a wɔawo hɔn fofor n,
Wɔtwee hɔn fii bɔn mu,
Enyidar na ayԑyi m'
Dze hɔn maa Christ.
title: Samuel Wolcott, 1813-86.

name: MHB 806:1
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:2
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:3
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:4
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 806:5
verse:
. Ma ndwom no ndu wiadze nyina,
Jesus Christ yԑ Hen,
Wiadze nyina mfa no ho nsԑm 
Mbɔ Ne dzin dawur;
Abɔdze nyina nsɔr No,
Mbersantsen na mfesantsen.   Amen.
title: Sarah Geraldina Stock, 1838-98.

name: MHB 807:1
verse:
. Ma hɛn honam ndzi mpaa 
Nkɔ mbew horow do mpo;
Jesus N'adɔfo dze, dabaa
Hɔn akoma yɛ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 807:2
verse:
. Jesus na odzii kan 
Dze hɛn akoma bɔɔm';
Hɛn a yɛnye N' nantsew fufuwn'
Ɔma yɛka koryɛm'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 807:3
verse:
. O wɔmma yɛnkɔ do 
Wɔ Jesus N'edwumam';
Asɔr ne Tsir konyimdzifo n',
Yɛnka No do ndzi nyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 807:4
verse:
. Christ no wenyin ture n' 
Saw n'edwumafo enyim;
Na hwɛ! akatua kɛse no 
Da sor hɔ rotweɔn hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 807:5
verse:
. O hɛn 'koma nye adwen 
N-da ho ara mfow sor,
Nkɔhwɛ hɛn ahomgye bea no,
Mbrɛ hɛn fona bɔ adze.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 807:6
verse:
. Hɔ dwumadzen nyina, 
Nye amandzehu nye yaw
Wotwa do wɔ siar mpoano hɔ;
Hɔ yehyia a yɛmmpaam' bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 807:78
verse:
. Ahomka bea dɛɛdɛw, 
Hɔ na abɔfo hyia hɛn,
Hɔ yebohu hɛn enyim bio,
Na yeekyiakyia hɛnho.
 
. Abakamfo Asɔr, 
Hɔn nhyira n' yebenya,
Na yɛdze dɛw ayɛ abɔtsir
Yɛakɔ sor ahomgyem'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 808:1
verse:
. AGYENKWA pa, bɔ Wo nkowaa hyew
'Wo nye ehum na asorԑkye Wura:
Wɔdaa mpokyerԑ m', Ɔwo siaan hɔn,
Wɔrokɔpon nkowaa binom so;
Ka hɔn ho daa,
W'abasa nko na ɔgye nkwa.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 808:2
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 808:3
verse:
. Wodu anana asaase do,
Ma enyidar yԑ bisiww,
Wonnhu hwee dԑ berԑ na mbusu,
Wɔnntse hwee dԑ ekyingye suro a,
Ka hɔn ho daa,
Tsie hɔn nkrumsi, kaa hɔn su.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 808:4
verse:
. Sԑ wɔnnsow aba biara,
Na hɔn fona reyԑ ayԑ gyan a,
Ewuradze, twe bԑn hɔn mbɔbɔr m',
Na ma hɔn enyidar ngyina;
Na ahyԑ hɔn dzen n',
Kenyan hɔn nsiyԑ no bio.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 808:5
verse:
. Sԑ wɔwɔ atamfo finimfin a,
Ewuradze, ma wɔntwer Wo,
Sԑ konyim ba hɔn dwumadzi mu a,
Ma Wo nkowaa mbrԑ hɔnho adze,
Mma nngya hɔn ekyir,
Kԑpem dԑ wohu W', wɔ sor.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 808:6
verse:
. Hɔ na wobohu dza woduaa n'
Wɔ asaase do n' afebɔɔ,
Hɔ na wɔnye Wo bԑtsena daa,
Ɔwo a ekora Wo nkowaa sɔnn;
Na wɔdze dԑw
Beyi Wo nkotoo ayԑw.   Amen.
title: Thomas Kelly, 1769-1854.

name: MHB 809:1
verse:
. MURUNNTUM nnkyerԑ siantsir a Nyia abɔfo sɔr N',
Dze No dɔ bɔto hɔ ama nyimpa mba,
Anaa ɔyԑ 'Guanhwԑfo n' ɔhwehwԑ hɔn a wɔayew,
Mber na mbrԑ wɔdze hɔn bԑsan wonnyim,
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ Ɔbaabun Mary woo No,
Bethlehem nguambuw mu ara nye Ne fie,
Na dԑ ɔtsenaa Nazareth yԑԑ edwuma,
Dԑm ntsi na Agyenkwa n', wiadze
Agyenkwa no aba.
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.

name: MHB 809:2
verse:
. Murunntum nnkyerԑ mbrԑ osii hun amandze komm,
Dze n'asomdwee bԑhyԑԑ nyinsuwa bea 'i 'nyam,
Anaa mbrԑ wobubuu n'akoma mbeamudua n' do
Ɔsoaa yaw ahenkyԑw n' mfe eduasa ebiasa.
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ ɔsa akoma pirafo yar,
Ɔpepa hԑn bɔn na otu hԑn suro;
Oyi afonafo hɔn adzesoa durdur kyen;
'Yi ntsi na Agyenkwa n', wiadze Agyenkwa no wɔ ha.
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.

name: MHB 809:3
verse:
. Murunntum nnkyerԑ mbrԑ obesi atwe wiadze,
Mbrԑ obesi enya wiadze egyapadze,
Mbrԑ ɔbԑyԑ apapa na abɔn hɔn ehiadze,
Boka na anee hɔn ahwehwԑdze,
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ akra nyina bohu N'enyimnyam,
Na obohu dza Ɔnoara oduae no,
Na da bi N'ewia bԑhyerԑn 'nyimnyam mu,
Ber a ɔno Agyenkwa n', wiadze Agyenkwa no wobohu N'.
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.

name: MHB 809:4
verse:
. Murunntum nnkyerԑ mbrԑ wiadze nyina bɔsom N',
Ber a ɔkasa a, ehum biara taa dzinn,
Anaa nyia obotum akyerԑ dԑw kԑse no,
Ber a dɔ ahyԑ nyimpa nyina akoma mu ma.
Minyim 'yi mbom dԑ dԑw bԑhyԑ wimu nyina ma
Na nyimpa ahorow ndze a atow ndwom bi;
Asaase na sor beyi hɔn ano nkorkor;
Afei dze Agyenkwa, wiadze Agyenkwa no yԑ Hen!
title: William Young Fullerton, 1857-1932.

name: MHB 810:1
verse:
. EGYA, ma W'ahendzi mbra,
Ma ɔmfa n-kwa tum mbra;
Kasa, ka ewiei asԑm n',
Na ma konyim ber no mbra.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 810:2
verse:
. Mbrԑ tsetseber do ɔbae n'
Wɔ nyimpa akoma mu pԑԑ n',
Ber a ahotsewfo wui maa Wo,
O Ewuradze, ma ɔmbra bio.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 810:3
verse:
. Abosomfie ahengua do
Na ma wɔntow hɔn mfi daa;
Bra mu wɔ W'ahendzi pa m'
Soa Wo wiadze ahenkyԑw n'.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 810:4
verse:
. O awerԑhow mber bԑn 'i!
Wɔkyerԑ W' asɔr dԑm mpaabɔ 'i,
Enyi a aweɔn ''bԑn a!
Dԑ obodwir beebiara.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 810:5
verse:
. Pue, Nyame N' konyimdzi da,
Pue ma hԑn akoma ndzi dԑw;
Ndwom krɔnkrɔn na aberԑfo dze
Rotweɔn Wo mbae wɔ ha nyina.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 810:6
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 811:1
verse:
. O Twearammpon Nyame, 
Ma W'ahendzi no mbra,
O Christ, ma W'abaw do
Bubu ɔbɔn no tum.
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 811:2
verse:
. W'ahendzi a asomdwee 
Nye dɔ wɔ mu n' wɔ hen?
Dabɛn na enyitan
Bɔbɔ adze wɔ ha?
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 811:3
verse:
. W'anohoba n' wɔ hen 
Dɛ mber bi rebɛba a
Akodzi nye brafun
Boguan efi W'enyim?
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 811:4
verse:
. Ewuradze yɛserɛ Wo, 
Ma Woho do na bra
Wo tum kɛse no mu,
Na ma hɛn enyi ngye.
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 811:56
verse:
. Nyimpa mmbu Wo dzin bi, 
Mbataku kyer Wo nguan;
Pii wɔyew Wo ho dɔ,
Wɔbɔ 'nyimguasebra.
 
. Abosonsɔr dze sum 
Agye aman pii do;
O Anapa Nworaba,
Pue, na mma nntɔ ara da. 	Amen.
title: Lewis Hensley, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 812:1
verse:
. NYAME reda Ne tsirmpɔw edzi,
fi mber to mber nyina,
Nyame reda tsirmpɔw edzi
na mber bi rebԑn daa;
Nkakra nkakra mber no rebԑn 
Ɔkyԑr dԑn ara a ɔbԑba,
Aber a Nyame N'enyimnyam bԑhyԑ
asaase ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu ahyԑ po ma no.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 812:2
verse:
. Ofi boka kɔ anee noho beebi a
nyimpa etsia n',
Asomafo pii hɔn ano na wɔtse Nyame Ne ndze:
Asaasetam na nsupruw, hom nyina nyԑ aso mma me,
Ama Nyame N'enyimnyam aahyԑ asaase ma, 
dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 812:3
verse:
. Yԑbԑyԑ dԑn ayԑ Nyame N'edwuma ma
aayԑ yie eetu mpon,
Nyimpa nyina bԑyԑ kor-Asomdwee Hen
bedzi Hen?
Ebԑn na yԑbԑyԑ ma mber n' epua?
kwan biara m' ɔbԑba mu,
Aber a Nyame N'enyimnyam bԑhyԑ
asaase ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 812:4
verse:
. Yԑbɔbɔ nsera akɔ kan atserԑw Christ Ne
frankaa m' wɔ N'ahoɔdzen m',
Ama asԑmpa n'enyimnyam kan no
aahyerԑn wɔ wiadze nyina:
Yԑnye bɔn na awerԑhow bɔko
dze agye adaduafo,
Ama Nyame N'enyimnyam aahyԑ asaase 
ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 812:5
verse:
. Dza yebotum ayԑ nnsԑ hwee, gyedԑ
Nyame hyira do.
Kwa ara na yԑtweɔn buber, kԑpem
dԑ Nyame ma aba n' nkwa;
Naaso mber no rupua ho-mber a
Ɔkyԑr dԑn ara a ɔbԑba mu n',
Aber a Nyame N'enyimnyam ahyԑ asaase 
ma, dԑ mbrԑ nsu hyԑ po ma no.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 813:1
verse:
. EWURADZE bԑba, ɔnnkԑkyԑr,
N'anamɔn nnkɔfom da;
Tsenenee bedzi N'enyim ara
Dԑ adehye kwambɔfo.
title: John Milton, 1605-74.

name: MHB 813:2
verse:
. Asaase nokwar tse dԑ nhyiren,
Ɔbɔbɔ na ɔapaa;
Na pԑrpԑr fi ahenman n' nwin mu,
Ahwԑ nyimpa wɔ ase.
title: John Milton, 1605-74.

name: MHB 813:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, soԑr wɔ Wo tum mu
Bu wiadze atsԑn pa,
Ɔwo na ewɔ ho kwan dԑ
Efa wiadze aman nyina.
title: John Milton, 1605-74.

name: MHB 813:4
verse:
. Aman a Ɔwo yԑe nyina bԑba
Abɔbɔ hɔn mu adze
Ama Ɔwo Ewuradze,
A ahyԑ Wo dzin enyimnyam.
title: John Milton, 1605-74.

name: MHB 813:5
verse:
. Kԑse nye Wo, wɔ anwanwadze m',
Wo nsa dzendzen no yԑ;
'Wo etse W'ahengua m' afebɔɔ,
Na Wo nko yԑ Nyame.
title: John Milton, 1605-74.

name: MHB 814:1
verse:
. W'ASƆR ne tsir a Sunsum n' hyԑ n' ma,
Na ɔpem agyedzifo akra mu,
Ɔka hɔn bɔ m' wɔ anwanwa dɔ;
Nsɔwano kor mu, tsew hɔn ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 814:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo Sunsum frԑ Wo,
Na akra a wogu afɔr pon ase pen;
W'ayefor n' so se Ewuradze bra,
Na hԑn akra eedzi mu, ayԑ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 814:3
verse:
. Hue bɔhyԑ akyԑdze n' ma obiara,
Yi amanaman frԑ n' ano. Bra!
Amanamanfo hɔn frԑ n' gye do;
Na fa Wo tsetse dɔm kɔ fie.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 814:4
verse:
. Ma aman nyina mpem mbra Wo hɔ,
Ma obiara ndzi asԑmpa n' do;
Agyenkwa hu hɔn berԑ nyina,
Nyame N'enyimnyam ahyԑ W' ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 814:5
verse:
. Wo nokwar na ehumbɔbɔr ntsi
Gye hɔn a iwui maa hɔn no!
Fa aman nyina yԑ W'egyapadze;
Na ma wiadze nyina nhu Wo dzin.  Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 815:1
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 815:2
verse:
. Pomu afamu esupruw,
Hom abotu nyina mu,
Mframadzen nyina ntaa dzinn;
Hom asorԑkye dzen n' ntaa dzinn:
Ɔdze tum kԑse bedzi hen,
Na asaase hun ayԑ N'atsempɔn.
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 815:3
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 815:4
verse:
. Anee mpoano ahorow,
Hom a hom atweɔn akyԑr,
Nsera na nhyira abɔ hom,
Hom mbɔ m' ntow ndwom kԑse;
Hom mpaa mu ntow dԑ Jesus wui,
Nyia wokum No n' tse ase dzi hen.
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 815:5
title: Charles Edward Oakley, 1832-65.

name: MHB 816:1
verse:
. NYAME Ba no kɔ akono,
Dԑ obenya ahenkyԑw;
No bɔgyaa frankaa nyam fi ekyir.
Woana fa No kwan do?
Nyia ɔnom mbusu kɔɔpow no,
Dzi konyim wɔ yaw do,
Ɔdze abotar soa ne mbeamudua n'
Bԑfa No kwan no do.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 816:2
verse:
. Sԑmpa tɔfo a odzi kan no 
Hunii traa adakamaa n',
Ohun no Wura wɔ sorsor,
Na ɔfrԑԑ N' dԑ ɔngye n' nkwa;
Ɔno na akyԑpa wɔ n'ano
Wɔ n'amandzehu mu n',
Ɔsɔree maa abɔnfo no;
Woana bԑfa N' kwan n' do?
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 816:3
verse:
. Enyimnyam kuw a wɔasan mu eyi a
Sunsum no dwiir hɔn do n'
Hun 'hotsewfo duebien n' 'nyidar,
Wɔtwee esԑndua na gya n';
Wohyiaa etsiɔdzenfo afowa,
Gyinaa ngyata enyim,
Wɔbrԑԑ hɔn kɔn adze maa owu;
Woana fa hɔn kwan do?
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 816:4
verse:
. 'Kofo kuw, mpanyin, na mbofra,
Mbaapɔn na mbaawa so,
Wodzi Gyefo ahengua n' ho dԑw,
Wɔhyehyԑ ntar fitaa;
Wɔfoow ahenman bepɔw srɔnsrɔm n',
Wɔ mbusu, fona na yaw mu,
O Nyame, ma hԑn adom ma
Yԑmfa mfa hɔn kwan do.  Amen.
title: Reginald Heber, 1783-1826.

name: MHB 817:1
verse:
. WONYAM frankaa no! Wͻntsérɛw mu,
Wimu na pomu na tɛtɛr m;,
Ewia bɛhyérɛn n’ mbobͻwee do.
Mbeamuduà a Agyenkwa tͻr do n’.
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.

name: MHB 817:2
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no ! Abͻfo
Kotow ahyɛnsew n’ kommyɛ mu:
Wͻper kwa atse Nyame Dͻ
No nwanwa kɛse no ase.
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.

name: MHB 817:3
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no! Wiadzefo
Bohu N’enyimnyam no wͻ ekyir;
Aman pii a wͻper hͻn awoe ho n‘,
Bonuma hͻn akra wͻ n’ kan mu.
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.

name: MHB 817:4
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no! Wͻntsérɛw mu.
Wimu na pomu ne tɛtɛr m’:
Hɛn enyimnyam nye mbeamudua n’ nko;
Hɛn enyidar nko nye Nyia wͻsɛɛn N’.
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.

name: MHB 817:5
verse:
. Wonyam frankaa no! Ma ͻnkrͻn ntsérɛw,
Wͻmma ͻnhyérɛn, nkͻ sor na pomu:
Yennyi nyimdzee, ahom na tum;
Yedzi nyim wͻ nsewhyɛ no nko mu.
title: George Washington Doane, 1799-1859.

name: MHB 818:1
verse:
. AKRA a adom dze hɔn aba
Jesus mu n' wɔ enyigye!
Wɔnam N'akwan mu a, wonya hɔn
Heaven wɔ asaase.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 818:2
verse:
. Yenyim konyim asɔr n' hɔn dԑw
Wɔ Wo dɔ kԑse n' mu;
Wɔtow Eguambaa N' ndwom wɔ sor,
Yԑyԑ dԑm wɔ ase ha.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 818:3
verse:
. Wɔntonton Wo enyimnyam mu,
Twa hwe W'ehengua enyim;
Yԑkamfo W' wɔ W'adom ahenman m',
Ahenman no yԑ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 818:4
verse:
. Igya hԑn kɔ krɔnkrɔn bea n' do,
Hɔ na hԑn sunsum fi;
Nyia otsiatsia W'anamɔn mu n'
Behyia Wo wɔ wimu hɔ
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 819:1
verse:
. AKOFO n' dze akodze
Hyԑnhyԑnn kɔr akono,
Wo akokodur na ndzeyԑԑ pa m',
Kɔkoe maa Nyankopɔn.
Wɔbrԑԑ otsiɔdzennyi adze,
Dze poon adaduafo,
Dze tutuu mbɔnsandɔm guu koraa,
Wɔ ahotsew tum mu.
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-

name: MHB 819:2
verse:
. 'Nyido adzehu hyerԑnee,
Ndze bi kasae hɔn mu,
Christ No dɔ kԑse n'ahyԑnsew n'
Hyerԑԑn fԑԑfԑw wɔ hɔn enyim.
Afei pԑpa dzendzen,
Ndamyԑ na dɔ kitsaa,
Tsetse akofo dɔm yi ma
Wɔhoom do kɔr kan.
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-

name: MHB 819:3
verse:
. Ɔtse dԑm ber biara,
Fi pata na ahemfie,
'Kwantufo a Ne dzin da hɔn do n'
Edzi Ne frԑ ekyir.
Enyimnyam aka hɔn,
Na wɔrotweɔn Ne pԑ m';
Woetwa N'ahengua ho ehyia,
Wɔda ho ara som yie.
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-

name: MHB 819:4
verse:
. 'Nyido adzehu n' hyerԑn daa,
Nyame ndze n' da ho frԑ,
'Tamfo n'da ho hyԑ abɔbɔfo,
'Daduafo da ho pen;
Wɔdze nsi na abotar,
Gyina ma hɔn Wura,
Nyame akofo dze gyedzi kyԑm
Na afowa tu hɔn sa.
title: Vera Evaline Walker, 1887-

name: MHB 820:1
verse:
. WOANA wɔ Ewuradze afa?
Woana bɔsom Ɔhen n'?
Woana bԑyԑ No mboa,
Atwetwe akra ama N'?
Woana bɔpow wiadze,
Ako etsia tamfo n'?
Woana wɔ Ewuradze afa?
Woana bɔkɔ ama N'?
W'ehumbɔbɔr frԑ n' ntsi,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yewɔ W'afa, Gyefo,
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 820:2
verse:
. Jesus enndze sika
Na dwetԑ tɔɔ hԑn;
Mbom W'adehye bɔgya n'
Ayԑ hԑn ahenkyԑw,
Ewora nhyira nsu gu
Nyia ɔba Wo hɔ n' do,
Ama yeenya pԑ bi,
Ayԑ hԑn adehye.
Wo dɔ a ɔapon hԑn ntsi,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yewɔ W'afa Gyefo,
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 820:3
verse:
. Sԑ ɔko n' y hu mpo a,
'Tamfo n' yԑ dzen mpo a,
Ɔhen N'akofo n' dze,
'Biara runntum hԑn.
Yedzi N'ekyir yi dze,
Konyimdzi wɔ hԑn;
No nokwar a ɔnnsakyer n'
Ma hen awerԑhyԑm'.
Yԑdɔm W'akafo no,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yewɔ W'afa Gyefo,
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 820:4
verse:
. Wɔayԑ hԑn nsordaafo
Wɔ ananabea ha;
Yԑyԑ agyedzifo ma
Hԑn Sahen No kuw.
Adehyesom no mu,
Mma yԑnnyԑ nwin da;
Hom mma yengyina pintsinn,
Nokwar m', 'kokodur m'.
Hԑn Wura, ebɔkora, hԑn,
W'adom nwanwa n' ntsi,
Yԑwɔ W'afa, Gyefo;
Yԑyԑ Wodze daa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 821:1
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Mbeamudua ho nsordaafo;
Hom mma N'ahen-frankaa n' do;
Onnyi dɛ ofi nsa
Obedzi No dɔm kan fi
Konyimm' akɔ konyimm'
Kyerɛ wɔka atamfo nyina hyɛ
Ma Christ dzi hen ampa.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: MHB 821:2
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Hom ntsie abɛn ne frɛ;
Hom nduom ɔko kɛse n' mu
Wɔ N'enyimnyam da yim'!
Mbarimba, afei hom nsom no
Mfa ntsia atamfo dɔm n'
Hom mfa ndam ngyina mbusu ano,
Hom ntutu dɔm nka dɔm.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: MHB 821:3
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Hom ngyina N'ahoɔdzen nkom'
Honam abaw bɛpa hom;
Mma hom nntwer hombo da.
Hom nhyɛ Christian akontar,
Na hom nweɔn asɔryɛm',
Edwumayɛ mu o, mbusu mu o
Mma hom nntwa abrɔdɔ.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: MHB 821:4
verse:
. Hom ngyina, hom ngyina mma Jesus! 
Aperdzi no rennkyɛr 
Ndɛ dze ɔko mu dede
'Kyena konyimdzifo ndwom a 
Nyia obedzi konyim no
Wɔbɛma n' nkwa ahenkyɛw
Ɔnye enyimnyam Hen no
Bedzi hen afebɔɔ.
title: George Duffield, 1818-88.

name: MHB 822:5
verse:
. Mo nkorɔfo e, hom mbɔdɔm 
Egyigye kuw yi;
Hom mfa hom ndze mbɔto
Hɛn konyim ndwom yim':
Enyimnyam na nkamfo
N-ka hɛn Hen Christ!
Yi nyimpa na abɔfo
Bɔtow afebɔɔ.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 822:12
verse:
. Christian n-sordaafo, 
Hom nduom akono!
Jesus Ne mbeamudua n'
Dzi hɛn enyim kan.
Hɛn Hen Christ etu sa 
Roko tsia tamfo n',
Hom nduom n-seraban do,
Hom nhwɛ ne mfrankaa n'.
  
    Christian n-sordaafo, 
    Hom nduom akono! 
    Jesus Ne mbeamudua n' 
    Dzi hɛn envim kan. 
 
. Yɛma Ne frankaa n' do a, 
Abɔnsam dɔm gu;
Dɛm a Christ akofo,
Hom nkedzi konyim!
Yɛbɔ se yi ayɛw a,
Hɛll fapem wosow;
Enuanom, hom ntow ndwom,
Hom mma hom ndze do.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 822:34
verse:
. Nyame N'asɔr tse dɛ 
Dɔm a wɔyɛ dzen:
Yɛnam ahotsewfo
Hɔn anamɔn mu.
Hɛn mu nnyi mpaapaamu,
Yɛyɛ adze kor.
Hɛn botae, hɛn nkyerɛkyerɛ
Hɛn dɔ nyina kor. 
 
. Ahengua botutu, 
Ahenman etwam',
Na Jesus N'asɔr dze
Betsim afebɔɔ;
Samanadze akoban
Runntum ahyɛ do:
Christ Noara na ɔkae,
N'asɛm so yɛ hɔ.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 823:1
verse:
. HƐN nkwa suma Christ mu wɔ Nyame m',
Hԑn nkwa bopue ntsԑntsԑm,
Eeyi N'enyimnyam akyerԑ mbeambea,
Wɔ no nkorɔfo nyina m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 823:2
verse:
. Hԑn akra kitsa No tum nsamu,
Ɔbɔkora hɔn daa;
Emi na ɔwo begyina Ne nkyԑn
Wɔ Zion bepɔw do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 823:3
verse:
. O enyigye nhyiamu bԑn a!
Yebowuna ntar fitaa,
Ekitsa mberԑnkɔnson daa,
Na yԑasoa ahenkyԑw.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 823:4
verse:
. Afei yԑmfa no dԑm wɔ mbra m'
Na yԑnko nkɔ hԑn enyim;
Yԑnkaa ewiei no hԑn adwen nu
Ndwen mpirenyimadze no ho.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 824:1
verse:
. HOM mma yɛnye sor adͻfo a
Woenya akyɛdze n’ mbͻ m',
Yɛmfa ͻkͻr dͻ atsaban do
Yentu nkͻ sor dɛw mu:
Wͻmma ahotsewfo nye hͻn a,
Wͻkͻ ’nyimnyam m' ntow ndwom,
Na hɛn Hen N’asomfo a wͻwͻ
Sor na ase nyina yɛ kor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 824:2
verse:
. Ebusua kor a yɛtse No mu.
Sor nyé ase Asͻr kor,
Mbom sesei, esutsen twa hɛn ntamu,
Owu esutsen tséabea n’;
Nyame tseasefo nsordaafo a
Yɛhyɛ No tum ase;
No dͻm no bi etwa esupramee,
Bi so gu do rutwa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 824:3
verse:
. Mpem du rokͻ onnyiewie fie’,
Dɛm awͻse ber yi;
Na hɛn so yɛaba berano,
Na hɛn enyi da owu kwan;
Sesei mpo yɛnyé edzikamfo n'
To nsa wͻ gyedzi mu,
Kyià ekuw a bͻgye atsew hͻn ho
Wͻ onnyiewiei mpoano.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 824:4
verse:
. Hɛn so hɛn akra bͻkͻ ekɛka
'Nyimnyamfo akra no ho,
Yɛatsea mu Sahen N’ahyɛnsew n’ ho,
Ber a yɛatse N’abɛn ndze n’;
O nkyɛ yeesuo Kwangyafo n’ mu!
Nkyɛ wͻama hɛn asɛm no!
Dͻm Ewuradze, paa asorɛkye n' mu bra,
Bɛfa hɛn kͻ heaven.    Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 825:1
title: William MacLagan

name: MHB 825:2
verse:
. Nyame ahotsewfo ewie kyin,
Wonntu fona mbirika bio,
Wɔnntɔ bitsi, wɔnnhwe ase bio,
'Tamfo nnhyɛ hɔn do, suro nnyi hɔ;
O 'hotsewfo a woehyira hɔn,
Wɔhom yie wɔ dɛm fie pa n' mu.
title: William MacLagan

name: MHB 825:3
verse:
. Nyame ahotsewfo bra abɔ adze,
Wodwir berɛww wɔ 'nyigye mpoano,
Wonnsuro ehum dzendzen no bio,
'Sorɛkye dzendzen biara nnyi hɔ;
O 'hotsewfo a woehyira hɔn,
Wɔhom yie wɔ asomdwee bea n' do.
title: William MacLagan

name: MHB 825:4
title: William MacLagan

name: MHB 826:1
verse:
. NYAME, agyedzifo a woewu
Da ho ara nye hɔn Tsir tse ase,
Yɛnye hɔn wɔ Wura kor;
Yehyira Wo dzin krɔnkrɔn no
Wɔ W'ahotsewfo a woefi mu,
Wɔ Wo gyedzi na suro m' ntsi.
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.

name: MHB 826:2
verse:
. Adom kor a okura hɛn no mu
Yentsiw hɔn a wodzii W'ekyir no,
Na yɛnye hɔn aakyɛ
Ɔsor dɛw akatua kɛse n';
Mbɔbɔrhu Egya, dom hɛn yi
Wɔ hɛn Pomfo no ntsi.   Amen.
title: Josiah Conder, 1789-1855.

name: MHB 827:1
verse:
. HƆN edzin yɛ ahemfo edzin,
'Sor adehye a;
Wiadze ndzepa mu dɛw n',
Wɔpoow ne nyina.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:2
verse:
. 'Hemfo a wɔdze nkrantsee
Na akokyɛm koe;
Nyame N' nkonyimdzifo
Wɔ akono.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:3
verse:
. Hɔn wiadze nda yɛɛ yaw
Wɔ ɔtan yerɛyerɛw m',
Ɔbra a enyigye nnyi m',
Na owu ara nko.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:4
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:5
verse:
. Wɔakyekyer kuropɔn bi
Dze ama hɔn;
Ɔwɔ enyimnaymm kɛse,
Jerusalem!
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:6
verse:
. Adehye bɔgya gyee n'
Fii 'wu na bɔn m',
Ɔkorsa Nyame mba,
Hɛn mu kɔ fie.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 827:7
verse:
. Dɛm na abrabɔ yaayaw n'
Wowie n' 'nyimnyam m';
Hɛn Wura, ma hɛn nsa nka
Hɔn ahomgye n' bi.  Amen.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 828:1
verse:
. 'HOTSEWFO nsordaafo ɔpedu,
Ɔpedu wɔapon hɔn
Hyehyɛ hɔn ntar hyirenn rofow
Kan bepɔw tsentsen no;
Owu na bɔn ho akodzi no
Woewie ko ampaara;
Hom mbuebue sika mbotsen no,
Ma nkonyimdzifo n' mbra m'.
title: Henry Alford

name: MHB 828:2
verse:
. Ɔhyew do hallelujah ahyɛ 
Asaase na ɔsor ma!
N-sankutsen apem robɔ 
Dze kyerɛ konyim a abɛn n'!
O dɛm da yi ntsi na wɔbɔɔ
Wiadze na nyimpa nyina!
O dɛw a oetua fona dadaw
Nyina kaw pem mbɔho!
title: Henry Alford

name: MHB 828:3
verse:
. Dɛw nkyiakyia bi a obesi
Canaan enyika mpoano a!
'Nyɛnkoyɛ a no mu atsetsew,
Bɔfrɔm bio a onnkogu!
Na enyiwa a nyinsu hyɛ n' ma n'
Dze dɛw bɛhyerɛn da no;
Ngyanka benya hɔn egyanom,
'Kunafo werɛ nnkɔhow.
title: Henry Alford

name: MHB 828:4
title: Henry Alford

name: MHB 829:1
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 829:2
verse:
. Hallelujah! Tsie! Ndze no a
Ofi bun mu kɔ wimu no,
Nyan abɔdze nyinara,
Wɔ sor, ase beebiara 
Wɔabobɔw Gyefo frankaa n';
Ɔnntwe nkrantsee; ɔka a ɔba m';
Na wiadze yi mu ahenman
Nyina yɛ Ne Ba N'ahenman.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 829:3
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 830:1
verse:
. TSIE! Ahotsewfo hɔn ndze da m',
Gyegye po hyɛnhyɛn no ho:
Alleluja! Alleluja!
Alleluja nka Ewuradze.
Dɔntutum a wonntum nnkan hɔn
Dɛ nworaba gyina 'nyimnyam mu;
Woewuna fitaa na wokitsa
Konyimdzi ho mberɛnkɔnson.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 830:2
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 830:3
verse:
. Wɔdze Wo mbeamudua bɔɔ nsera;
Woedzi W'ekyir edzi konyim,
Ɔwo a eyɛ nkwagye Sahen,
Hɔn Agyenkwa na hɔn Hen.
Ao, Ewuradze, enyigye m' na
Wɔnye W' berɛɛ na wɔnye W' wui!
Wɔnam owu do enya daa nkwa,
Wɔawo hɔn enyimnyam mu!.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 830:4
verse:
. Nyame mu Nyame, Ba kortoo,
Kan mu Kan, Immanuel,
Wo nyimpadua mu na dabaa
Ahotsewfo bɔ mu tsenae.
Hue W'amayɛ no gu hɛn do,
Ama daa nyina yaasɔr
Nyame Egya, Nyame Ɔba 
Na Nyame Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn.  Amen.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 831:1
verse:
. Ma m' gyedzi ntsaban na muntu 
Nkɔ fua n' mu hɔ nkɔhwɛ
Sor esiarfo hɔn dɛw kɛse n',
Mbrɛ hɔn 'nyimnyam hyerɛn pa.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 831:2
verse:
. Ber bi nna wogyam wɔ ase ha, 
Na wɔkaa m' kyii nyinsu;
Wɔnye bɔn, ekyingye na suro
Dzii aper dzen dɛ hɛn so.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 831:3
verse:
. M'bisa dɛ hɔn konyim n' fir hen? 
Hɔn nyina bɔ mu ka dɛ
Hɔn konyimdzi fir Eguambaa n',
Hɔn konyim fir No wu.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 831:4
verse:
. Wɔhyɛɛ mbrɛ otsiatsiae no nsew; 
No ndwuma hyɛɛ hɔn nkuran,
Na wɔkaa Nyame- nyimpa N' do
Nyaa anohoba ahomgye n'.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 831:5
verse:
. Hɛn kandzifo hia hɛn nkamfo 
Wɔ Ne fasusu ntsi;
Na adasefo mununkum no
Kyerɛ dɛm sor kwan n' ara
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 832:1
verse:
. Ahotsewfo a apon hɔn edwuma a 
Wiadze enyim wɔbɔɔ Wo dzin no ntsi,
O Jesus, nhyira nka Wo dzin daa daa.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 832:4
verse:
. Siar nkitaho bit! fɛkuwbɔ krɔnkrɔn! 
Yɛper mberɛwm', wɔhyerɛn enyimnyam mu;
Naaso wɔnye hɛn bɔm' yɛ kor Wo mu.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 832:5
verse:
. Sɛ aperdzi n' yɛ dzen, ko n' war m-po a, 
Konyim ndwom no fi 'kyirekyir du asomu,
Ma akoko yɛ dur, abaw hyɛ dzen.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 832:6
verse:
. Witɔree dze sika hyerɛn wim' guann, 
Ɔnnkyɛr na akofo enya ahomgye.
Wohu siar Paradise no mu dɛw no.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 832:7
verse:
. Hwɛ! enyimnyam da bi so ɔreba a, 
Ahotsewfo n' bɔsoɛr konyimdzi mu,
Enyimnyam Hen no bopue No kwan do.
                             Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 832:8
verse:
. Dɔm kukuankoma fi wiadze nyina 
Dze ndwom bɛpem bota mbotsen no mu,
Woeyi Egya, Ba, nye Sunsum ayɛw;
                            Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 832:23
verse:
. Hɔn Bontan, Aban, Ahoɔdzen, nye 'Wo, 
Eyɛɛ hɔn Sahen wɔ nkodzen no mu;
Sum kadoo no mu hɔn nokwar kan kor.
                             Alleluia!
 
. O ma Wo nkowaa anokwafo wɔnko 
M-barimbam' dɛ tsetse ahotsewfo n',
Ama wɔnye hɔn eenya ahenkyɛw no!
                            Alleluia!
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 833:1
verse:
. Woanam' wɔhyɛ futuw yi, 
Wɔhyerɛn sen wigyinae mpo 'i?
Kan no mu mba a wodzi kan,
Wɔbɛn Nyame N'ahengua 'i?
Yinom na wɔsoaa mbeamudua n',
Wodzii Christ ho dase pa,
Hɔn Wura N'asɛ ntsi wowui,.
Wɔkaa Nyame a owu n' do n'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 833:2
verse:
. Wofir fona kɛsem' bae, 
Wɔdze gyedzi hoor hɔn ntar
Wɔ Eguambaa n' bɔgyaa mu,
Bɔgya a ɔma ahosan krɔnn:
N-tsi wɔbɛn ahengua n',
Na wɔsom hɔn Wura daa daa,
Nyame ko No nkorɔfo mu.
Nyame pɛ N'apapafo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 833:3
verse:
. Wɔkyɛn ekonyimdzifo, 
Ha na hɔn nsɔhwɛ asa;
Hɔn berɛ nyina etwam',
Kɔm na nsukɔm nnyi hɔ bio;
Wɔnntse ɔhyew a ɔyɛ dzen a
Ofir ewia ne mfirii no mu,
Wɔtse ahomka mbew no mu,
Domankoma bea no do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 833:4
verse:
. Nyia ɔtse ahengua n' do n', 
Bɛnyɛn hɔn aber nyina,
Dze nkwadua no bɛnyɛn hɔn,
Dze hɔn bɔkɔ nkwa nsu n' ho;
Bɛpa hɔn mbusu nyina,
Nye hɔn ehiadze biara,
Ɔbɛpepa hɔn nyinsuwa.
Ɔdze dɔ bɛhyɛ hɔn ma.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 834:1
verse:
. WIMU kan no ekyir
Ahenman ne kan n' mu,
Sor abɔfo dɔm no
Tow Nyame N'ayɛyi,
Hallelujah!
Wɔdɔ Ɔhen,
Nyame adwontow,
Hallelujah!
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 834:2
verse:
. Nyame gye ase ha
Mbofraba hɔn ayɛyi;
Afei yɛbɔbɔ mu
Atow hɛn enyigye ndwom,
Hallelujah!
Yɛbɔtow ndwom
Ama Nyame,
Hallelujah!
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 834:3
verse:
. Ewuradze Siarfo,
Fa w' nokwar n' ma hɛn dɔ m',
Kyerɛ hɛn wɔ hɛn mbabun m',
Yenhu Wo dɛ mbrɛ etse,
Hallelujah!
Yɛbɔtow ndwom
Ama Nyame,
Hallelujah!
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 834:4
verse:
. O nkyɛ W'asɛm krɔnkrɔn n'
Aatahye wiadze nyina,
Hɔn nyina aayɛ ano kor
Aama dɛw ndze no do:
Hallelujah!
Yɛbɔtow ndwom
Ama Nyame,
Hallelujah!
title: John Chandler, 1806-76.

name: MHB 835:1
verse:
. JESUS dze nkwagye reba n'
Zion hɔ na ɔbae,
Mbofraba nyina soɛree
Wɔtoow Hosanna maa N'.
Hɔn ho annyɛ No ebufuw
Na ɔtse abowa do n',
Ɔmaa wɔkaa No do ara:
Hɔn ndwom yɛɛ N' enyigye.
title: John King, 1789-1858.

name: MHB 835:2
verse:
. Na osiandɛ Ewuradze
Da ho dɔ mbofra ntsi,
Kaansa n-dɛ odzi hen
Wɔ sor Zion m-po a,
Yɛbɔfɔr Ne frankaa ho,
Ɔhen Jesus frankaa n',
Na yɛatsea n' dɛ, Hosanna 
N-ka David ne Ba.
title: John King, 1789-1858.

name: MHB 835:3
verse:
. Osiandɛ sɛ hɛn yeenntum 
Yɛannkamfo hɛn Pomfo a,
Abo bɔtow Hosanna
Ahyɛ hɛn enyito.
Na aso hɛn ano nko
Na yɛdze bɔsom No?
Dabi? Yɛdze hɛn akoma
So bɛma Ewuradze.
title: John King, 1789-1858.

name: MHB 836:1
verse:
. MBOFRA nkumaa tseaa mu toow
Hosanna enyigye mu;
Ahemfie na asɔrfi mu,
Ndwom dɛɛdɛw no gyegyee;
Jesus a ohyiraa hɔn,
Fuaa hɔn No bomu no,
Mbofra n' toow ayɛyi ndwom maa N',
Ndwom bɔkɔɔ a odzi mu.
title: Jeanette Threlfall, 1821-80.

name: MHB 836:2
verse:
. Wofi Olivet kaa No do,
Wɔ enyigye dɔm no mu,
Wohiim konyim mberɛnkɔnson,
Wɔyɛɛ dede kɛse.
Abɔfo hyirenn toow bi,
Wɔ wimu kann n' ekyir,
Hosanna ɔwɔ sorsor!
'Nyimnyam nka sor Nyame.
title: Jeanette Threlfall, 1821-80.

name: MHB 836:3
verse:
. Wɔtotow Olive ndubaa
Fɛɛfɛw pii guu famu,
Na hɔn ndwom dɛɛdɛw gyeyee
Salem mbepɔw no do.
Nyimpa na abɔfo Wura
Tse abowa do kɔr bɔkɔɔ,
Na ɔammpow dɛ mbofraba
Bɛpem edzi N'ekyir.
title: Jeanette Threlfall, 1821-80.

name: MHB 836:4
verse:
. Hosanna wɔ ɔsorsor!
Yɛtow tsetse ndwom no;
Na Christ nye hɛn Pomfo no,
'Sor Wura nye hɛn Hen:
O wɔmma yɛmfa akoma,
Nkwa na ndze nyi N' ayɛw,
Na yendzi dɛw daa nyina,
Wɔ N'enyim 'nyigye n' mu.  Amen.
title: Jeanette Threlfall, 1821-80.

name: MHB 837:3
verse:
. Abaatan na akyerɛkyerɛfo, 
Mpanyin na mbofra nhur ndwom n';
Wɔmma do kɛsenara
Ma Hosanna ngyigye wim'.
title: John Henley, 1800-1842.

name: MHB 837:12
verse:
. Jerusalem mbofraba 
Toow Jesus N'ayɛyindwom;
Ndɛ mber yi mbofraba so
Bɔm' tow Gyefo N'ayɛyi:
Tsie! mbofra kekam' dzendzen 
Dɛ, Hosanna nka hɛn Hen.
 
. Wɔkyerɛ hɛn Ewuradze dɔ, 
Wɔkyerɛ hɛn N'asɛm kenkan,
Wɔkyerɛ hɛn ɔsor do kwan:
Yi ntsi yeyi Nyame ayɛw.
title: John Henley, 1800-1842.

name: MHB 838:1
verse:
. JESUS, fi enyimnyam m'
Yɛ aso ma hɛn:
Yebu ntwɛr wɔ W'enyim a,
Tsie mbofra ayɛyi.
title: Harriet Burn McKeever, 1807-86.

name: MHB 838:2
verse:
. Kaansa eyɛ krɔnn mpo a,
Heaven Hen tumfo,
Yɛtow W'ayɛyi ndwom a,
Ebɔkotow etsie.
title: Harriet Burn McKeever, 1807-86.

name: MHB 838:3
verse:
. Mbofraba nkumaa a
Yɛyɛ mberɛw, yɛfom;
Gyefo, wowaw kora hɛn,
Wɔ heaven kwan mu.
title: Harriet Burn McKeever, 1807-86.

name: MHB 838:4
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, gye hɛn fi bɔn m',
Hwɛ hɛn do daa daa;
Boa hɛn ma yɛndɔ Wo,
Yi hɛn bɔn fi hɔ.
title: Harriet Burn McKeever, 1807-86.

name: MHB 838:5
verse:
. Afei, sɛ efrɛ hɛn
Kɔ hɛn ɔsor fie a,
Yɛbɛgye do dɛw mu;
Agyenkwa, yɛaba!
title: Harriet Burn McKeever, 1807-86.

name: MHB 839:1
verse:
. NYƐNKO bi wɔ hɔ ma mbofra
Wɔ sor fua kan n' ekyir,
Nyɛnko a ɛnnsakyer da,
No dɔ so mmbɔ adze da,
Ɔnntse dɛ nyimpa m' ndamfo a
Wɔnye mber sesa no,
Nyɛnko 'i som bo aber biara,
Ɔwɔ dzin mapa bi.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 839:2
verse:
. Fie bi wɔ hɔ ma mbofraba
Wɔ sor fua kan n' ekyir,
Hɔ, Jesus dzi hen 'nyimnyam m',
Asomdwee na dɛw fie.
Fie bi nntse dɛm wɔ ase ha,
Anaadɛ ɔnye n' bɛsɛ;
'Siandɛ obiara wɔ enyigye a
Onnkehia enyigye bio.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 839:3
verse:
. Ndwom bi wɔ hɔ ma mbofraba
Wɔ sor fua kan n' ekyir,
Ndwom a wɔtow no dodow mpo a 
Ɔnnkɔfon obiara,
Ndwom a ɔsor abɔfo mpo
Nnkotum atow ara da;
Wonnyim Christ dɛ Agyenkwa,
Mbom wɔsom No dɛ Ɔhen.
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 839:4
verse:
. Atar bi wɔ hɔ ma mbofra
Wɔ sor fua kan n' ekyir
Na sanku a ɔbɔ ndwom dɛɛdɛw
Na konyim mberɛnkɔnson,
Ne nyina som bo wɔ sor,
Na wohu n' Christ mu nko;
O hom mbra, mbofraba pa,
Ma ne nyina nyɛ homdze
title: Albert Midlane, 1825-1909.

name: MHB 840:1
verse:
. M'EGYA Nyame dɔɔ me no,
Ɔmaa Ne Ba yɛɛ m' nyɛnko;
'Maa Ne Ba faa mo frɔdɔɔ,
Soaa adze nyina wɔ me ntsi.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 840:2
verse:
. Jesus da ho tse dɛm daa
Dɛ mbrɛ ɔbae tsetseber do n';
Dɛ mo nua a ɔbɛn me daa,
Da ho per weɔn m'anamɔn.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 840:3
verse:
. M'besi dɛn etua Wo dɔ kaw,
Ɔsor dɔm nyina Wura?
Emi abofra, mowɔ 'bɛn
Brɛ Ɔwo hɛven Ɔhen?
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 840:4
verse:
. Medze moho nyina ma Wo:
Ma me ntsena mma W'enyimnyam,
Ma menka Wo do daa nyina,
Monkɔ mbrɛ Woara bɛkyerɛ.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 841:1
verse:
. JESUS mbofraba hɔn nyɛnko,
Yɛ mo so m' nyɛnko
Suo me nsamu na daa twe me
Pin Wo nkyɛn.
title: Walter John Mathams, 1853-1931.

name: MHB 841:2
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' ma minyin papayɛ m'
Ber a mirinyin yi;
Wo so ayɛ abofra pɛn ntsi
Inyim ampa.
title: Walter John Mathams, 1853-1931.

name: MHB 841:3
verse:
. Nkakrankakra, gya me kɔ kan
Wɔ ɔbabunyɛ mu;
Ma munhu nyansa, nnya ahoɔdzen
Wo nokwar m'.
title: Walter John Mathams, 1853-1931.

name: MHB 841:4
verse:
. Mma nngyaa m' eso mma mmpa me da,
Yɛ me Nyɛnko daa,
'Siandɛ mihia W' fi bra ahyɛse
Kesi ewiei.    Amen.
title: Walter John Mathams, 1853-1931.

name: MHB 842:1
verse:
. JESUS brɛfo a edwe,
Kyea W'enyi hwɛ W'abofra;
Hu mo botooyɛ mbɔbɔr,
Ma me kwan membra Wo hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:2
verse:
. Mepɛ dɛ wɔdze m' brɛ Wo;
Adom Wura, mma nnsiw kwan,
Ma W'abɔtoaba yi kwan,
Wɔ W'adom ahenman n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:4
verse:
. Ne nyina ekyir ma menyɛ
M'Egya a ɔwɔ sor Ne pɛ,
Ma No Sunsum pa eenndzi yaw
Mentsena ase mma N'enyimnyam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:5
verse:
. Nyame Eguambaa, mohwɛ Wo;
Ɔwo bɛyɛ m' fasusu,
Ɔwo yɛ brɛfo a edwe,
Ɔwo so ayɛ abofra pɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:6
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:7
verse:
. Dɔfo Jesus, 'Guambaa pa,
Mehyɛ W'adom nsamu ara;
Agyenkwa, yɛ m' dɛ mbrɛ etse,
Bra bɛtsena m'akoma mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 842:8
verse:
. Dɛm na m'bɛkyerɛ W'ayɛyi,
Masom Wo m'enyigye nda m';
Na ber nyina wiadze bohu
Christ, Krɔnkrɔn Ba n', wɔ mo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 843:1
verse:
. HƐN Wura dɔfo turo mu,
Wɔ asaase ha,
Nhyiren nkumaa pii nyin
Wɔ ahoɔfɛw mu.
title: Ella Sophia Armitage, 1841-1931.

name: MHB 843:2
verse:
. Christ, dɔfo turo Hwɛfo
Hwɛ nhyiren nkumaa no;
'Dɔ nsukookoo nkumaa
Na ndua akɛse so.
title: Ella Sophia Armitage, 1841-1931.

name: MHB 843:3
verse:
. Biribiara nnsuar pii a
Ɔremma N' nsa nnka;
Biribi nnyɛ tokyen
Ma ɔnndɔ no bi !
title: Ella Sophia Armitage, 1841-1931.

name: MHB 843:4
verse:
. Jesus dɔ mbofra no,
Mbofra tse dɛ hɛn;
Ohyiraa hɔn ber a nanom
Dze hɔn kɛmaa No n'.
title: Ella Sophia Armitage, 1841-1931.

name: MHB 843:5
verse:
. Jesus frɛ mbofraba n'
Dɛ wɔmbra N'enyim,
Wɔ No turo fɛɛfɛw n' mu,
Noara gugu do.
title: Ella Sophia Armitage, 1841-1931.

name: MHB 843:6
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, yɛgye W' frɛ do,
Gye hɛn hwɛ hɛn do,
Tsetse hɛn Wo turo n' mu,
Yɛnyɛ W'edwuma bi.
title: Ella Sophia Armitage, 1841-1931.

name: MHB 844:1
title: Mary Duncan, 1814-40.

name: MHB 844:2
verse:
. Adzekyee yi, Wo nsa akyerɛ m' kwan,
Meda W' ase dɛ ahwɛ m',
Ɔwo efura m' tam, anyɛn me,
Tsie m'ewimbir mpaabɔ yi.
title: Mary Duncan, 1814-40.

name: MHB 844:3
title: Mary Duncan, 1814-40.

name: MHB 845:1
verse:
. NYAME nyɛ m' bra kan kakraba a
Ɔdzɛw wɔ wiadze ha;
Gya kakraba a ɔdzɛw hyɛnhyɛnn, 
Beebiara a mobɔkɔ.
title: Matilda Barbara Betham Edwards, 1836-1919.

name: MHB 845:2
verse:
. Nyame nyɛ m' bra nhyiren kakraba a
Ɔbɛma obiara dɛw;
N'enyi sɔ dɛ ɔhyerɛn wɔ fie,
Kaansa bea no suar mpo a.
title: Matilda Barbara Betham Edwards, 1836-1919.

name: MHB 845:3
verse:
. Nyame nyɛ m' bra ndwom kakraba a
Ɔkyekye ayarfo werɛ,
Na ɔboa nkorɔfo ma wɔyɛ dzen,
Na ɔma nyia ɔtow enyigye.
title: Matilda Barbara Betham Edwards, 1836-1919.

name: MHB 845:4
verse:
. Nyame nyɛ m' bra poma kakraba a
Mberɛwyɛfo bɔtwer,
Ama mo mpɔw na m'ahom nyina
Aaboa me mfɛfo yie.
title: Matilda Barbara Betham Edwards, 1836-1919.

name: MHB 845:5
verse:
. Nyame nyɛ m' bra ndwom kakraba a
'Yɛyi na ɔdwe ahyɛ m' ma,
Dza ɔma gyedzi a onnhinhim,
Nyame akwan nwanwa do.
title: Matilda Barbara Betham Edwards, 1836-1919.

name: MHB 846:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, sɛ adze sa ara
Na hɛn nanom deda a,
Anafua sum kommyɛ no mu,
Hwɛ Wo mbɔtoaba do.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 846:2
verse:
. Ber a sum ahyɛ dan komm no mu no,
Boa hɛn ma yenhu dɛ
Enye hɛn wɔ hɔ sum no mu,
Na ibosuo hɛn nsamu.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 846:3
verse:
. Kaansa nnyɛ aber biara na
Yehu Abɔfo n' mpo a,
O ma yɛmfa hɛnho nhyɛ W' nsa,
Na mma yennsuro hwee.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 846:4
verse:
. Dɛm na yɛbɔsoɛr anapa,
Ber a 'napawi rupue,
Dɛ yɛwɔ dɔ mema hɛnho
Wɔ hɛn Egya no ntsi.
title: Annie Matheson, 1853-1924.

name: MHB 847:1
verse:
. JESUS, yɛtse apɔw wɔ ahoɔdzen,
Na yetum tu mbirika dzi agor;
Yarba rehaw mbofra binom
Ma da biara wɔda mpa mu.
title: Edith Florence Boyle Macalister, 1873-

name: MHB 847:2
verse:
. Hɛn apɔwmudzen ntsi yɛda W' ase,
Yɛserɛ W', Egya dɔfo, hyira
Mbofra a wɔayɛ mberɛw na wɔyar,
Na wɔtse yaw, hu amandze.
title: Edith Florence Boyle Macalister, 1873-

name: MHB 847:3
verse:
. Fa dɔ akoma a ɔdwen ma hɛn,
Kyerɛ hɛn dza yɛnyɛ nkyerɛ dɔ,
Jesus dzin mu dɛ yɛdze roboa
Mbofra a hɔn werɛ ahow, rofona.   Amen.
title: Edith Florence Boyle Macalister, 1873-

name: MHB 848:1
verse:
. EWIMBER som ekyir,
Asɔrfi sunkamm no m'
Krɔnkrɔn 'daka n'enyim
Kanea n' ayɛ munsumm,
Awerɛfir mu ara na
Nyame Ne ndze ɔgyegyee hɔ.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 848:2
verse:
. Nna akɔdaa brɛfo,
Israel sɔfo n' ada;
Levinyi kakraba n'
Roweɔn asɔrfi m' hɔ:
Na dza ohuntaa Eli no,
Ewuradze yii kyerɛ Hannah ba n'.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 848:3
verse:
. O Ewuradze, ma me
Samuel asomkyɛn a
No mu yɛ har, ɔtse
W'ano wasa biara;
Emi so m'bɛgye Wo frɛ do,
Na m'bedzi kan metse Ɔwo.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 848:4
verse:
. O ma m' Samuel akoma,
Akoma brɛfo a ɔtweɔn 
W'asɔrfi mbrɛ ewɔ mu
Anaa ɔweɔn W'abow;
Adzekyee na adzesaa akoma a
Otsin Wo pɛ do dzi dwuma.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 848:5
verse:
. O ma m' Samuel adwen;
Gyedzi pa a onnhwinhwin,
Ɔyɛ setsie ma Wo,
Wɔ nkwa na owu mu,
Na medze abofra enyiwa eehu
Nokwar a wɔdze esie enyansafo n'.
title: James Drummond Burns, 1823-64.

name: MHB 849:1
verse:
. EGYA, dzi m'enyim dabaa,
Memfa Wo kwan pa no do;
Kyerɛ m' ma mindzi nokwar daa,
Menyɛ dza ɔwɔ dɛ meyɛ.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 849:2
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 849:3
verse:
. Sɛ mokɔ bɔn nsɔhwɛ mu a,
Ma mingyina pintsinn nyansa m';
Na sɛ ɔka mo nko a,
Fa Wo tum n' bɔ mo ho ban.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 849:4
verse:
. Sɛ dɛw hyɛ m'akoma ma a,
O boa me ma menkaa Wo,
Ma mindzi dɛw kɛse bi,
Dɛ Ɔwo m'Egya, dɔ me.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 849:5
verse:
. Sɛ m'edwuma yɛ dzen a,
Ma monkɔ do dɛw mu ara,
Boa ma memfa abotar nsoa
Amandze, 'haw na dadwen.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 849:6
verse:
. Gyinabew nyinara mu,
Ma munhu dza oye nyina,
Ma mentse ɔsor n-dze
Ber a ahotsewfo dzi dɛw.
title: John Page Hopps, 1834-1912.

name: MHB 850:1
verse:
. HƐN enyi da sor daa nyina,
Ewia hyerɛn hɛn enyim;
Yɛwɔw do daa nyinara
Dze hɛn enyim tsim heaven.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 850:2
verse:
. Yenyim daa nyina wɔ suro m'
Wo dzin krɔnkrɔn no ntsi;
Yesua daa dɛ yɛbɔdɔ
Wɔ ɔdɔ bɔkɔɔyɛ mu.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 850:3
verse:
. Daa nyina yɛbɔ m' nantsew
Wɔ hɛn Nua panyin N' nkyɛn;
Yenyin daa wɔ nokwardzi m',
Dze ma hɛnho nkorkor.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 850:4
verse:
. Daa nyina ndaase mu ara,
Yɛgye W'ayamuyie pii,
Daa nyinara yɛpen do
Dze mfom kyekyɛ hɛnho.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 850:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, daa yɛsɔr dɛ,
Tsie hɛn Wo mbɔbɔrhu m',
Ama ewiei no yaaba
Kuropɔn krɔnkrɔn n' mu.  Amen.
title: James Montgomery, 1771-1854.

name: MHB 851:1
verse:
. Dza ɔyɛ fɛw na ɔhyerɛn, 
Abɔdze nyinara,
'Nyansadze na anwanwadze,
Nyame yɛɛ ne nyina.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 851:2
verse:
. N-hyiren biara a ɔpae, 
Nyame maa n' ahoɔfɛw;
Anomaba a ɔtow ndwom,
Nyame yɛɛ ne ntɛkyerɛ.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 851:3
verse:
. Bepɔw a osi habanm', 
'Sutsen a ɔda ho,
N-woraba na bosoom,
Adzekyee na adzesaa.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 851:4
verse:
. N-su a ɔtɔ esusow, 
Ewia a ɔpae pɛber,
N-duaba a ɔsow ndua do,
Na hamu edziban.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 851:5
verse:
. Enyiwa wɔ hɔ ma yeehu, 
Ano so ma yaaka,
Dɛ saa Nyame yɛ tumfo,
Ɔayɛ adze nyina yie.
Dza ɔyɛ fɛw—
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 852:1
verse:
. ABƆDZE a wɔwɔ wi n'ase
Anaa wɔnenam pomu,
Wɔyɛ ɔsor Hen N'abɔdze
Na mo so mo nuanom.
title: Edward John Brailsford, 1841-1921.

name: MHB 852:2
verse:
. Modɔ dɛ metse anoma a
Osi dua do no su;
Dɛ daa muhu nnoma fɛɛfɛw 
Tu faa kyin wɔ wimu.
title: Edward John Brailsford, 1841-1921.

name: MHB 852:3
verse:
. Modɔ dɛ mohwɛ esunoma
Ber a otu kyin nsu enyi;
Modɔ dɛ muhu tutugya,
Ne kandzea adzesaaber.
title: Edward John Brailsford, 1841-1921.

name: MHB 852:4
verse:
. Nsuborɔkɔ a ɔhoa sakoo,
Nam a okyinkin nsuadze;
Anantwi a worusu ba fie,
Mpɔnkye a wogu efuw mu.
title: Edward John Brailsford, 1841-1921.

name: MHB 852:5
verse:
. Hɛn nyina wɔ kyɛfa Ne wiadze m';
Ɔnyɛn obiara daa,
Ohu ɔsorɔm tantan a ɔatɔ
Kwan mu a obiara nnhu n'.
title: Edward John Brailsford, 1841-1921.

name: MHB 852:6
verse:
. Egya Tumfo, ahenfo Hen,
Botooyɛfo hɔn Dɔfo,
Yɛ m' ndzɛmba a wɛnnsɛ bi nyɛnko,
Mberɛwyɛfo bambɔfo.  Amen.
title: Edward John Brailsford, 1841-1921.

name: MHB 853:1
verse:
. ABOFRA botum ehu
Hɛn Egya No dɔ dzin no;
Wɔakyerɛw n' famu asaase ha,
Na wimu so wɔ sor.
title: Jane Eliza Leeson, 1807-82.

name: MHB 853:2
verse:
. Sɛ mohwɛ moho hyia a,
Muhu Ne nsaano edwuma;
Wiadze tse dɛ mfonyin buukuu,
Ɔkyerɛ me Ne dzin no.
title: Jane Eliza Leeson, 1807-82.

name: MHB 853:3
verse:
. Yehu nhyiren nkumaa
Apem wɔ hɛn turo mu 
Nyankontɔn na esusom nsu,
Yɛtse ngyegyee dɛɛdɛw.
title: Jane Eliza Leeson, 1807-82.

name: MHB 853:4
verse:
. Nnoma a wosu dɛɛdɛw 
Bosoom a ɔhyerɛn anafua,
Ɔma abɔdze nkakraba
Mpo dzi dɛw wɔ kan n' mu.
title: Jane Eliza Leeson, 1807-82.

name: MHB 853:5
verse:
. Na woraba biara a,
Ɔwɔ wimu wɔ sorsor,
Ne nyina kyerɛ m' dɛ Nyame yɛ dɔ,
Ne nyina kyerɛ m' dɛ ɔbɛn.
title: Jane Eliza Leeson, 1807-82.

name: MHB 854:1
verse:
. ƆYƐ anwanwadze mapa,
Na ɔyɛ nwanwa mbordo mpo,
Dɛ Nyame Ba befi sor aba,
Ebowu agye abofra dɛ emi.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 854:2
verse:
. Naaso minyim dɛ ɔyɛ ampa,
Ɔfaa abrɛfo na ehiafo,
Osui, berɛe, kaa mmɔn na owui
Maa hɔn a wɔanndɔ No ara da.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 854:3
verse:
. Ɔyɛ a modwen mbeamudua n' ho,
Mumua m'enyi, per dɛ m'bohu
'Tsirmuɔdzen mprɛgow na nsoɛ kyɛw n',
Jesu a wɔbɔɔ N' mbeamudua m' maa me n'.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 854:4
verse:
. Sɛ mpo m'bohu mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ wui a,
Ɔdɔ kɛse a ɔdzɛw dɛ ogya,
Wɔ N'akoma mu dabaa no,
Ne fa kumaabi na m'bohu.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 854:5
verse:
. Murunntum nnka mbrɛ osii dɔɔ 
Afra a ɔyɛ mberɛw na bɔn fa n';
Sɛ owui dze tɔɔ mo dɔ ampa a,
Na No dɔ no yɛ nwanwa ampa.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 854:6
verse:
. Ɔyɛ nwanwa dɛ No dɔ a ɔwɔ,
Ma me n' wɔnntɔ na odzi mu;
Na ɔyɛ nwanwa pii dɛ mo dɔ a
Mowɔ ma No suar, yɛ mberɛw.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 854:7
verse:
. Naaso me pɛ dɛ modɔ Wo Owura;
O sɔ gya no wɔ m'akoma m'
Na m'bɔdɔ Wo mbordo, mbordo,
Kɛpem dɛ m'bohu W' dɛ mbrɛ etse.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 855:1
verse:
. MUSUAR 'so modɔ dɛ modwen,
Nna m'Agyenkwa yɛ afra;
Dɛ Jesus dze krɔnkrɔnyɛ pa
Nantseew 'saase yi do.
title: Edwin Paxton Hood, 1820-1930.

name: MHB 855:2
verse:
. Osiee N'Egya No nokwar nsɛm,
Wɔkyerɛ m' dɛ menyɛ dɛm;
Kaansa ɔbɔɔ mbabun bra mpo a,
Ɔnantseew nyansa m' so.
title: Edwin Paxton Hood, 1820-1930.

name: MHB 855:3
verse:
. Modɔ dɛ modwen, Nyia ɔkasaa
Buee enyifurafo enyi,
Na onyaan hɔn a wɔdaa ewufu nda n',
Yɛɛ abofra dɛ emi.
title: Edwin Paxton Hood, 1820-1930.

name: MHB 855:4
verse:
. Dɛ Nyia ɔsoaa nsoɛ ahenkyɛw,
Na ɔsɔɔ owu hwɛe no,
Nyaa ena pa bi tse dɛ medze 'i,
Ohun no hwɛ na n' dɔ.
title: Edwin Paxton Hood, 1820-1930.

name: MHB 855:5
verse:
. Minyim dɛ dɔ a ɔdɔ me ntsi
Na ɔbɛyɛɛ abofra,
Na ogyaa heaven bea fɛɛfɛw n',
Bɛfaa wiadze akwan do.
title: Edwin Paxton Hood, 1820-1930.

name: MHB 855:6
verse:
. Afei Gyefo a eyɛɛ abofra pɛn,
Afra tum ba Wo nkyɛn;
Na m'Agyenkwa Dɔfo, mbɔbɔr m'
Ara, o bra me nkyɛn.   Amen.
title: Edwin Paxton Hood, 1820-1930.

name: MHB 856:1
verse:
. Modɔ dɛ metse nsɛm a 
Abɔfo ndze ka no,
Dɛ enyimnyam Hen n' mber bi
Ɔbɛtsenaa asaase do.
Bɔnyɛnyi a meyɛ mberɛw so,
Na 'yi minyim petee
Dɛ, Ewuradze bae bɛgyee m' nkwa.
Osiandɛ ɔdɔ m' kɛse.
title: Emily Huntington Miller, 1833-1913.

name: MHB 856:2
verse:
. M' Agyenkwa siarfo bɛyɛɛ 
Abɔdomaba dɛ emi,
Ma ɔaakyerɛ No nkɔkowaba
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu akwan;
Na sɛ mobɔ ho mbɔdzen
Tsiatsia N' anamɔnm' a,
Ɔnnkɔtow m' akyen ara da
Osiandɛ ɔdɔ m'kɛse.
title: Emily Huntington Miller, 1833-1913.

name: MHB 856:3
verse:
. No mbɔbɔrhu nye No dɔ n', 
M' bɔtow ho ndwom dɛɛdɛw;
Muhu N' a ɔnnyɛ mpo a, minyim
Dɛ ɔtse m' ayɛyi.
Na ɔabɔ m' anohoba
Ayamuyiem' dɛ monkɔ
Menkɛnye abɔfo ntow ndwom,
Osiandɛ ɔdɔ m' kɛse.
title: Emily Huntington Miller, 1833-1913.

name: MHB 857:1
verse:
. Nyame ama hɛn Buukuu a nsɛm ahyɛ mu ma,
Wɔyɛɛ maa tsetseber do nyimpa,
Ɔdze turo bi mu nsɛm hyɛ ase kyerɛw,
Na ɔdze sika kuropɔn wie.
title: Maria Penstone

name: MHB 857:2
verse:
. Dza odzi mu yie nye Jesus ho nsɛm,
Abɔdoma a ɔnye nantwi hyɛ buw m',
Na ndwom a abɔfo towee wɔ No ho,
Nye nsɛm a ɔyɛ dɛw kyɛn ne nyina.
title: Maria Penstone

name: MHB 857:3
verse:
. Nsɛm wɔ hɔ ma awofo na mbofra,
Mpanyin a wɔayɛ krado dɛ wɔhom,
Na hɔn a wotum kenkan na hɔn a wotsie n',
Jesus ho asɛm na odzi mu yie.
title: Maria Penstone

name: MHB 857:4
verse:
. Ɔka mbrɛ osii fii Egya n' hɔ bae,
Bɛfrɛɛ Ne mba a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir,
Ɔdze nguan a wɔayew bɛbrɛ hɔn Wura n',
Asɛm a ɔyɛ dɛw kyɛn ne nyina.
title: Maria Penstone

name: MHB 858:1
verse:
. Ka Jesus ho n-sɛm kyerɛ m', 
Mepɛ metsie;
Ndzɛmba a nkyɛ mibebisa No,
Sɛ ɔwɔ ha a:
Ɔkwan nkyɛn ndzɛmba,
Epo do nsɛm,
Jesus No ho nsɛm,
Ka kyerɛ me.
title: William Henry Baker, 1845-1929.

name: MHB 858:2
verse:
. Ma mindzi kan ntse mbrɛ mbofra 
Kɔbɔɔ N' aprɔw;
Na emi so me nsa bɛka
Ne nhyira n' bi.
Ayamuyie kasa,
Adom ndzeyɛɛ,
Dze ɔdɔ hyerɛɛn
Jesus N' enyim.
title: William Henry Baker, 1845-1929.

name: MHB 858:3
verse:
. Kyerɛ m' enyinyandze a osii 
Ture no mu n';
Na mbeamudua n' a wɔdze kum
M' Agyenkwa no:
Ne yaw na Ne dɛw,
Dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛ
Jesus No ho nsɛm n',
Ka kyerɛ me.
title: William Henry Baker, 1845-1929.

name: MHB 859:1
verse:
. David ahenkurowm' prɛko bi, 
Nantwibuw tantan bi mu,
Ɔbaatan dedaa ne ba bi
Wɔ mbowa dzidzidaka mu.
Mary nye ɔbaatan pa n',
Jesus Christ ɔnye ne Ba n'.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 859:2
verse:
. Nyame, adze nyina Wura, 
Fi sor siaan asaase do;
M-bowadan ɔnye No dɔbea,
Ne dabew nye mpɔnkɔbuw,
Hɛn Agyenkwa Krɔnkrɔnnyi
Ɔnye abɔbɔfo tsenaa ase.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 859:3
verse:
. No mbofraber nwanwa nyina 
Ɔyɛɛ enyidzi na setsie;
Ɔdɔe, ɔweɔn ne na brɛfo a
Ɔdaa n' abaw mu foo n' yie.
Christian mbofra nyɛ setsie,
Wɔndwe, nyɛ pa dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛe.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 859:4
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 859:5
verse:
. Ɔnam No nkwagye dɔ no do 
Da bi hɛn enyi bohu N'
Osiandɛ abofra fɛɛfɛw n'
Nye Ewuradze a ɔwɔ sor;
Na ogya No mbofra kwan
Kɔ mbrɛ Ɔnoara oedu n'.
title: Cecil Frances Alexander, 1823-95.

name: MHB 860:1
verse:
. Akɔkowaba Jesus ennya adasoe; 
Wɔdedaa N' wɔ mbowa edzidzidaka mu.
N-woraba fi sorsor hyerɛɛn mbrɛ ɔda no,
Nna Jesus ada komm wɔ efuw no do.
title: Anonymous

name: MHB 860:23
verse:
. Anantwi no sui na Ɔba no nyanee, 
Naaso, hwɛ, oennsu, na mbom ɔdaa hɔ komm.
O Jesus, modɔ Wo; fi sor hwɛ mo do,
Tsena me nkyɛn araa kodu adzekyee.
 
. Ewuradze Jesus, meserɛ Wo dɛ 
Bɛn me nkyɛn na dɔ me aber nyinara,
Hyira mbofra nyina wɔ W' abaatan dɔ mu,
Na tsew hɛn ho ama yaafata Wo nkyɛn.
title: Anonymous

name: MHB 861:1
verse:
. O MBOFRABA, meserɛ hom dɛ hom nyina mbra,
Hom mbɛka Bethlehem nguanhwɛfo no ho;
Hom nhwɛ dza hɛn Egya pɛ dɛ hɛn enyi gye ntsi
Ɔdze aba asaase do 'nyimnyam anafua 'i.
title: Kindergarten Magazine,  1907-8.

name: MHB 861:2
verse:
. O hom mbɔ hom mu adze nkotow na hom nsɔr,
Hom nka hom nsa mfua, nda Nyame ase dɛ hɔn;
Mbofra, hom mfa sanku ndze ntow ndwom dɛw mu,
O hom nye abɔfo ntow ndwom, nye hɔn ndzi dɛw.
title: Kindergarten Magazine,  1907-8.

name: MHB 862:1
verse:
. 'NYANSAFO n' paar Jesus,
Wotuu kwan fi ekyir,
Woraba fɛfɛɛfɛw bi
Gyaa hɔn akwantu n' mu.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 862:2
verse:
. Na sɛ yɛhwehwɛ No a,
Ɔbɛn hɛn koraa;
Hɛnara hɛn man yi yɛ
Hɛn Asaase Krɔnkrɔn.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 862:3
verse:
. Akra a wɔsɔr bohu N'
Hɛn esutaae ho,
Wobehyia N' nkokwaa do,
Ber a adze rekye.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 862:4
verse:
. Hɛn mburokwa mu, ber a
Yɛaboaboa eburow no;
Hɛn eguadzibea hɔɔ do,
Wotum hu Jesus.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 862:5
verse:
. Afarfo nye N' kasa
Wɔ Etsifo Po do,
Dɛ mbrɛ nkan esuafo n'
Yɛe wɔ Galilee n'.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 862:6
verse:
. Jesus ba hān asomdwee
Kuroba biara mu a,
Ne mbae no dan no ma
Ɔyɛ Bethany.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 862:7
verse:
. Sɛ yɛdɔ No yie ampa a,
Ɔbɛn hɛn koraa;
'Siandɛ ɔhwehwɛ daa dɛ
Ɔtsena hɛn akoma m'.
title: James Thomas East, 1860-1337.

name: MHB 863:1
verse:
. NGUANHWƐFO n' nyaa ɔbɔfo,
'Nyansafo n' nyaa woraba:
Ebɛn na emi abofra mowɔ?
Obegya m' efi ekyir akɔ fie?
Bea a dɛw nworaba tow ndwom bɔ m',
Na abɔfo so tow ndwom?
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 863:2
verse:
. Mo Wura Jesus nye m' hwɛfo,
Dɛm ntsi mirinnhia hwee:
Ɔbra basaa yi nyina mu,
Nguambaa no gu No bomu;
Nguambaa asokyewfo a wɔfom yew n',
Okyi bɔgya twe hɔn.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 863:3
verse:
. Dɛm nguanhwɛfo no tsenaa
Ase esuom weɔɔn hɔn nguan,
Kesii dɛ wohum sor dɔm no a
Wɔmmberɛ annda na mbom
Wɔtoow Enyimnyam, Enyimnyam,
Dze dzii afahyɛ no.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 863:4
verse:
. Christ hwɛ N'eguambaa kumaa mo do,
Ɔhwɛ m' do aber biara,
Ma maayɛ Nedze wɔ heaven:
'Bɔfo a woenwuna fitaa
Bɔtow hɔn ndwom, Enyimnyam, 'nyimnyam,
Wɔ me ntsi wɔ sorsor.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 863:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, fa m' bɛn Wo ho daa,
Kɛpem dɛ me ndze bɔfora
'Bɔfo a wɔayɛ fitaa ndze
Na yɛatow enyimnyam,
Enyimnyam nyina yɛdze ama Wo,
Wɔ sorsor noho nyina.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 864:1
verse:
. KAA nyimpa nyina a wɔtse
Ekyirekyir nsaase do,
Wɔ nkuropɔn nwanwa fɛɛfɛw m',
Anaa wokyin anhwea m',
Wɔyɛ kua wɔ nkokwaa do,
Nye nsaase a ɔda famu do,
Bea a mbofra nenam emo fuw m',
Hwɛ efupɔnkɔ a wɔsen.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 864:2
verse:
. Binom yɛ edwuma kwaa tuntu m',
Bea a ndow dzi afow sian,
Binom nu nam nsu akɛse m,
Yɛ ha 'sukwankyɛba m';
Kaa Nyame Ne mba nyina a
Wonnyaa mpo nntsee nokwar a 
Ofi Jesus hɔ ba no,
N'asɛm n'enyimnyam no.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 864:3
verse:
. Nyame nhyira mbanyin na mbaa a
Wɔsom No wɔ po ekyir;
Nyame mfrɛ pii nka hɔn ho
Ma amanaman eenya fahodzi,
Kɛpem dɛ ekyirekyirfo a
Wɔwɔ ananabea n'
Bɛtse N'ahenman n' ase,
Na wɔaba N'adom mu.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 865:1
verse:
. MEKENKAN asɛm dadaw dɛɛdɛw bi no a,
Ɔfa mbrɛ Jesus wɔ wiadze n'
Osii frɛɛ mbofraba kaa No nguaakuw ho no a,
Me yamu ara a nkyɛ mekaa hɔn ho;
Me yamu a nkyɛ ɔdze Ne nsa too me tsir do,
Na ɔtserɛɛw Ne nsa mu baam me,
Na nkyɛ meehu N'enyim serew ber a ɔsee dɛ,
Hom mma mbofra no mbra Me nkyɛn no!.
title: Jemima Luke, 1813-1906.

name: MHB 865:2
verse:
. Naaso sesei mpaabɔ m' m'bɔkɔ n'ananadze,
Na makɛserɛ N' No dɔ no bi;
Na sɛ nokwar m' mohwehwɛ N' yie ase ha a,
M'bohu No atse Ne ndze wɔ sor,
Bea fɛɛfɛw no a ɔakɔ rikesiesie dze ama
Hɔn a woeguar hɔn dze hɔn bɔn akyɛ hɔn n';
Na mbofra papa pii rihyia mu wɔ hɔ,
Yinom na ahenman n' yɛ hɔndze.
title: Jemima Luke, 1813-1906.

name: MHB 865:3
verse:
. Naaso mpempem a wokyin hwehwe ase,
Nntsee dɛm ɔsor fie no nka;
Mepɛ dɛ wohu dɛ kwan wɔ hɔ ma hɔn nyina,
Na dɛ Jesus ato nsa afrɛ hɔn.
Mokɔn dɔ 'nyimnyam ber no mu dɛw no,
Dza ɔyɛ dɛw, ɔhyerɛn, dzi mu,
Ber a mbofra pa a wofi wiadze nyina 
Bokogu N' bomu na oehyira hɔn n'.
title: Jemima Luke, 1813-1906.

name: MHB 866:1
verse:
. BER a Salem abaatan
Dze hɔn mba kɔr Jesus hɔ n',
N'esuafo n' dze ebufuw see hɔn dɛ 
Wonfi hɔ wɔnkɔ.
Na Jesus hun hɔn ntsɛmara,
Na ɔyerɛɛw N'ano na ɔsee hɔn dɛ,
Wɔmma mbofraba no kwan ma wɔmbra
Me nkyɛn.
title: William Medlen Hutchings, 1827-76.

name: MHB 866:2
verse:
. Hɛn Agyenkwa n' kyerɛɛ ɔdɔ
Dɛ ɔyɛɛ mbofra n' eetuu;
Na mpempem bi so wɔ hɔ a
Hɔndze wɔnntsee Ne dzin no;
Agyenkwa pa, yɛsɔr a tsie hɛn,
Ama ese hɔn dɛ, Wɔmma 
Mbofraba no mbra Me nkyɛn a, wɔaatse.
title: William Medlen Hutchings, 1827-76.

name: MHB 866:3
title: William Medlen Hutchings, 1827-76.

name: MHB 867:1
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Ber a adze akye bio,
Yebu ntwɛr wɔ fie hyira Wo,
Wɔ adzekyeem' adom ho.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 867:23
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Ber a yeetu hɛn ndwom wɔ skuul,
Dabaa yɛdze W' ayɛyi hyɛ
Dwumadzi ase, yɛdze wie.
 
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Wɔ hɛn ndwomm' ana yɛada;
Abɔfo tsie, wɔweɔn hɛn,
Christ no nguambaa anago nyina.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 867:456
verse:
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Nnyɛ ayɛyi nsɛm mu nko;
Nokwardzi na setsie mu so
Yɛkyerɛ Woara W' enyimnyam.
 
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Dɛ ɔnam Jesus ara ntsi
Yɛdze abotar sɔw mfom nyina,
Na yeku ɔbɔn biara.
 
. Daa daa nyina yɛtonton Wo, 
Gyedɛ hɛn nda bɔ adze,
Gyedɛ yɛhom fi hɛn berɛm',
Yɛrotweɔn Wo da n' asomdweem'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 868:1
verse:
. AGYENKWA pa nokwafo,
Gye m'adwen na dzi do tum;
Nyansa na pɛ a mowɔ no,
Hyira do, yɛ do kwangyafo.
title: Handley Carr Glyn Moule, 1841-1920.

name: MHB 868:2
verse:
. Ber a murusua nwonma yi
Jesus Christ, meserɛ W', bɛn me,
Kaakaa me, bue m'adwen mu,
Monhwehwɛ nyimdzee mminya.
title: Handley Carr Glyn Moule, 1841-1920.

name: MHB 868:3
title: Handley Carr Glyn Moule, 1841-1920.

name: MHB 868:4
title: Handley Carr Glyn Moule, 1841-1920.

name: MHB 868:5
verse:
. Meper, m'adwendwen, mo sua m',
Ma mindzi Wo pɛ no do,
Kɛpem dɛ mibedzi mu
Ama W'edwuma na Woara. Amen.
title: Handley Carr Glyn Moule, 1841-1920.

name: MHB 869:1
verse:
. AYƐYI nka Nyame a ɔdze dɔ a ɔnnkyea
Dzi hɛn enyim wɔ hɛn dwumadzi m' fi ɔsɛɛ mu;
Ohue asomdwee na ahonya a yɛmmfata,
Dua N'ayamuyie nsa mu ma hɛn daa.
title: Herbert Branston Gray, 1851-1929.

name: MHB 869:2
title: Herbert Branston Gray, 1851-1929.

name: MHB 869:3
verse:
. Akra Guanhwɛfo, O nkwagye abotsen,
Fa Wo nhwɛdo a ɔnnsakyer no hwɛ Wo nguan,
Ka hɔn hɔ m' dɛ mbrɛ wɔyɛɛ dze sɔɔr Wo no,
Ansaana hɔn ntamu atsetsew ndaamba.
title: Herbert Branston Gray, 1851-1929.

name: MHB 869:4
verse:
. Kaansa hɛn nyina nnkehyia mu wɔ fakor bio,
Kaansa ɔbra akodzi m' tsetsew mpo a,
Hɛn Gyefo yɛ kor, na, hɛn Egya yɛ kor,
Ka hɛn bɔ m' wɔ gyedzi na akoma mu.  Amen.
title: Herbert Branston Gray, 1851-1929.

name: MHB 870:1
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: MHB 870:4
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: MHB 870:23
verse:
. W' ehumbɔbɔr ho yɛsɔr Wo, 
Edze dom hɛn kwan nyinam',
Nyame yetwa hwe W' enyim bio
Ma hɛn edwuma nkɔ do daa
Ma hɛn sunsum
Na adwen nnya W' akyɛdze pa.
 
. Ma fidua mu enuadɔ ntsim 
Akoma biara mu daa,
No tum nkyerɛkyerɛ hɛn ma
Yenyi pɛsɛankonya akwa
Ndu dɛ Wo mba
Bohu dɛ hɔn Egya nye W'.
    
       Mpaamudzi
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: MHB 870:56
verse:
. Ma Wo Sunsum pa no nkenyan 
Ndzepa biara a yeenya n' ha,
Na dza ndzebɔn dze na nyina nsɛɛ,
Fa Wo tum kɛse n' siw ano,
Na yɛmper daa
Nnya nyimdzee na dɔ mapa.
 
. Egya baatan, kora hɔn a 
Worinnhyia mu bio wɔ ha;
Ma dza woedua n' nsow aba pa
Bafuu ofi ber to ber;
Hɔn a wɔresan n'
Nnyɛ anokwafo nsen nkan' n'.  Amen.
title: Henry James Buckoll, 1803-71.

name: MHB 871:1
verse:
. HƐN dwumadzi na hɛn agodzi m',
Jesus, 'nye hɛn ntsena daa;
Aber nyina yɛmbɔ mbɔdzen
Ndzi nokwar, ngyina mma Wo.
     Dɛm n' na yebotum atow dɛ
     Yɛyɛ ɔhen no Ne mba.
title: Whitefield Glanville Wills, 1841-91.

name: MHB 871:2
verse:
. Ma yendua Wo tum do nhyɛ
Ebufuw na atorsɛm do,
Adwembɔn na ndzeyɛɛ bɔn,
Nye dza Ɔwo kyir nyina so.
title: Whitefield Glanville Wills, 1841-91.

name: MHB 871:3
verse:
. Jesus, fi W'ahengua do
Fa Wo dɔ no hyɛ hɛn ma,
Ama obiara eehu dɛ 
Nyame pa, yɛyɛ Wodze.
title: Whitefield Glanville Wills, 1841-91.

name: MHB 871:4
verse:
. Yɛyɛ Ɔhen no Ne mba,
Hom mma yendzi nokwar mma N',
Na yɛnsɔ N'enyi daa daa,
Hɛn dwumadzi na hɛn agodzi m'.
title: Whitefield Glanville Wills, 1841-91.

name: MHB 872:1
verse:
. YEHYIRA Wo, Nyame, dɛ dɛm bra yi ara
Tum ma ahomgye na dɛw wɔ no kō mu;
Asaase, ndua, po, fua na nsunyiwa ntsi
Edwuma na adzesua biara a ɔdze ba ntsi.
title: Frederick M. White, 1872.

name: MHB 872:2
verse:
. Dɛ hɛn Pisgah ma hɛn nokwar fofor a,
Mber rokɔ n' ɔma mbahun foforyɛ;
Dɛ yɛnye nyimdzefo na enyansafo a
Wɔtse sor ndwom ngyegyee yɛ fɛkuwbɔ.
title: Frederick M. White, 1872.

name: MHB 872:3
verse:
. Nyimpa berɛ mu enyadze biara ntsi;
Dza amandɔfo yɛ na akyerɛwfo ka ntsi,
Wɔ dadaw kan a ɔda tsetsesɛm edzi ntsi,
'Nyidar fofor a mber danee dze ba ntsi.
title: Frederick M. White, 1872.

name: MHB 872:4
verse:
. Yendzi nokwar mma hɛn nkandzea yinom,
Nnya 'nyidar, 'hoɔdzen na dɛw fofor daa,
Nyɛ 'setsie mma ɔsor ndzɛmba nko daa,
Onntwa m' da, Mbra a Otumfo Dɔ ahyɛ no.   Amen.
title: Frederick M. White, 1872.

name: MHB 873:1
verse:
. Nyame dɔyɛfo a W'ehumbɔbɔr 
Dom hɛn fie kan na enuadɔ,
Fa hɛn nguankuw gu W' abaw mu,
Dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ n' tsetsebaado n'.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: MHB 873:2
verse:
. N-dze a yɛdze tow ndwom yɛserew, 
Ma hɛn fie yɛ enyigye yi,
Yɛdze tow ndwom yi Wo ayɛw a,
Aso, Ewuradze, innketsie hɛn?
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: MHB 873:3
verse:
. Ɔbram' nhyira na awerɛhow ntsi, 
Enyigye a wɔtse ase n-tsi,
Nye hɔn a woewu nyina ntsi,
Yɛda W' ase, hɛn Egya pa.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: MHB 873:4
verse:
. Hɛn mber pam' dɛw a etwam' ntsi, 
Enyigye a yɛwɔm' sesei ntsi,
Hɛn bra n' ewimbir mu kan ntsi,
Yɛda W' ase hɛn Egya pa.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: MHB 873:5
verse:
. Ma W' adom mbɔ hɛn ho aprɔw, 
Ma W' ehumbɔbɔr mbra hɛn do,
Ma W' asomdwee ntsena hɛn nkyɛn
M-berantsen nyinara mu.    Amen.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1809-94.

name: MHB 874:1
verse:
. YI hɛn suro kɔ!
'Nyigye da no a wɔwoo
Nkwagye dzifo bi n' aba ampa!
Mifi Jehovah mu,
Na mehyɛ N' enyimnyam,
Na medze adwontow san so kɔ N' hɔ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 874:2
verse:
. Mekamfo W'adom
Dɛ ofi m'ahyɛse n'
Ɔabɛn, atwe me, abɔ m' ho ban;
Ɔwo agye m' bɔn mu
Ara dze ebodu ndɛ 
Na minyim dɛ edze m' bodu ewiei.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 874:3
verse:
. O daa daa dadwen,
Nsɔhwɛ, na mfir horow
Wo nsa egya me abamba afa mu!
O nhyira beberee na 
Domfo Nyame dze ama,
Ɔnye mbɔbɔrhu a ɔyɛ fofor daa.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 874:4
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrhu bɛn nye 'i?
Na dɛw tsebea so bɛn a!
M'enyigye dɔɔ so a onnyi kabea;
Dɛ modɔm Wo kuw no,
Na wɔakan me afora hɔn 
Dɛ menye hɔn ntsena nkesi wu m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 874:5
verse:
. Medze enyidzi na
'Yɛyi ma adom Egya,
Ɔba no na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no;
Edwuma a ohia no,
Ɔahyɛ me ma mayɛ,
Na midzi dɛw pii dɛ wɔwoo me.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 874:6
verse:
. Medze dɛw kɛse
Tu me bra nyina dze
Bɔ me Nyankopɔn No ho dawur;
Ɔsɛ dɛ meyɛ 'yi,
Dɛ medze ma Jesus
Ne dɛw na No nkwagye no tahye.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 874:7
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 875:1
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye mbrɛ wɔdɔ wo kɛse, 
'Wo, Nyɛnko pa, adasa Agyenkwa,
Na wɔdze Wo tsena mpanyin tsenabea
Wɔ ahɔho a wɔba hɔ nyina mu.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 875:2
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye mbrɛ beenu abɔ mu 
Ayɛ kor gyedzi na enyidar mu,
Ma owu nkotoo na otum paa hɔn mu,
Na ɔno mpo nntum nnsɛɛ koryɛ n' koraa.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 875:3
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye bea a wɔdze no mu mba 
Hyɛ Wo nsa wɔ gyedzi nye mpaabɔ mu,
Na Ɔwo, hɔn Damfo, ifi sor weɔn hɔn,
Na ehwɛ hɔn do kyɛn mbrɛ na bɔhwɛ.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 875:456
verse:
. Ahomka fi nye mbrɛ obiara som Wo 
Ahobrɛadze mu wɔ no dwumadzim',
Dze kodu dɛ fam' dwuma nyina ho tsew,
Dɛ wɔdze rema Wo, Ewuradze.
 
. Ahomka fi nye beebi a werɛ mmfir Wo 
Ber a enyigye na dɛw abor do;
Ahomka fim' na wɔdze sunsum pirafo
Brɛ Wo, Duyɛfo, Werɛkyekyefo.
 
. Dze kɛpem dɛ sɛ wiadze dwumadzi sa a, 
Hɔn nyina behyia Wo wɔ sor fi n' mu,
Mbrɛ ifir bae, na efowee kɔree no,
Ɔdɔ na asomdwee domankoma fi n'.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 876:1
verse:
. NYAME a ewɔ mbea nyina
Na eboa hɔn a wɔdan Wo,
Anafua 'i bra me mpa ho
Besi adwembɔn nyina mpa;
Fa Wo nsa to me kra do,
Ɔwo m' mbusu ber Nyame,
Dzi m'atamfo, hɛll, wiadze
Na abɔdze mu tum nyina do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 876:2
verse:
. Yi me fi wiadze akɔndɔ m',
Ma m' honam mu fahodzi,
Fa tum pa kɛse twe me
Kra fam Woara Wo ho daa;
Mo Wura, yi Woho kyerɛ me.
Fa dɛw ahobow hyɛ m' ma,
Sɛ minyan a, ma mentse W' nka,
Ma monsoɛr Wo su no mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 876:3
verse:
. Ma minnya Wo nkwa m' kyɛfa,
Wo krɔnkrɔnyɛ n', ma me bi,
Kɛtseankyɛ meehu n' yie dɛ
M'Agyenkwa aba m'akoma m'!
Na meehu Wo dɛ medze,
Kɛtseankyɛ maayɛ W' etuu!
Maabɔ sunsum mu bra nko
Dze ahyɛ Wo nko enyimnyam.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 876:4
verse:
. Eso sɛ ihia me kra
Ansaana adze akye a,
Mo Wura, ma m' kra n'apɛdze,
Dɛ m'bedzi mu dɔ m' 'nafua 'i;
Wie Wo dɔ dwuma kɛse n',
Twa no tsia wɔ tsenenee mu,
Ma memfata sor noho,
Sakyer m' na munwu
Asomdwee m'.    Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:1
verse:
. MBRƐ Wo mbɔbɔrhu si fua m' a!
Wɔntonton Wo dzin afebɔɔ!
Mefɛr dɛ m'bɔkrɔn wɔ bra mu,
Akowaa bi a ɔkyɛn no Wura!
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:2
verse:
. Ohia na yaw tsɛɛ mo Wura,
Na amandzehu bra nko na ɔbɔe;
Nyankopɔn Ba, Nyimpa Ba no,
Ennya Ne tsir mpo tobew da.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:3
verse:
. Naaso hwɛ, oesiesie beebi
Ama me, na abɔfo weɔn me;
Ampa, Noara gya m' abamba,
Siesie me mpa na ɔma meda.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:4
verse:
. Jesus weɔn me; mo suro, kɔ!
Ebɛn puhim Tsetse Botan n'?
Wo domankoma dɔ abaw no mu
Medze moho to hɔ da sɔnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:5
verse:
. Ber a ewɔ me nkyɛn dɛm yi,
Woana botum asɛɛ me nda?
Muhoro bɔn, wiadze na hɛll mpo;
Motwer m'Agyenkwa No bo mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:6
verse:
. Mohom Tumfo n' No nwin ase,
Mo nkrumsi pa, me haw so twa;
Ɔwo mo Wura a me kra twer Wo n'
Bɔkora m' asomdwee mapa m'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 877:7
verse:
. Edɔ dɛ efa m' yɛ Wodze,
Sesei na daapem nyina so;
Ɔwo nnkɛpa 'kra bɔbɔnyi a
Ɔtwer Wo turodoo daa no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 878:1
verse:
. Nyame hɛn mboa mber a ɔasen, 
Hɛn ndaamba enyidar,
Hɛn sumabew wɔ ehumtu ber,
Hɛn domankoma fi.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 878:2
verse:
. W' ahengua no no nwim ase 
Na yɛbɛda ho ahyɛ;
W' abaw no nko mpo ɔdɔɔ so,
Obotwitwa agye hɛn.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 878:3
verse:
. Ansaana wɔreyɛ nkokwaa, 
Mbrɛ Wonnyae mmbɔɔ wiadze
Ofi tsetse eyɛ Nyame,
Eyɛ so afebɔɔ.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 878:4
verse:
. M-fe apem yɛ W' enyi do 
Dɛ da kor a ɔasen,
Ɔyɛ tsia dɛ anago sum
Na anapa kan ehyiae.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 878:5
verse:
. Adasamba a wɔtse wiadze 
Na hɔn dadwen nyina,
Ɔnnkyɛr biara na wɔapem kɔ,
Wɔayew hɛn enyi do.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 878:6
verse:
. M-ber soa ne mba nyina kɔ 
Dɛ esu a ɔrepem;
Wɔhera dɛ mbrɛ adaaso hera
Ber a adze rekye.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 878:7
verse:
. Nyame hɛn mboa mber a ɔasen, 
Hɛn ndaamba enyidar,
Yɛtse nkwa mu yi wowaw hɛn,
Yɛ hɛn fi a onnyi ewiei.   Amen.
title: Isaac Watts, 1674 -1748

name: MHB 879:1
verse:
. Nyame ngye hɛn Hen pa, 
Hɛn Hen kunyin nnyin nkyɛr,
Nyame ngye Ɔhen!
Ɔmma n' konyimdzi daa,
Ahomka nye enyimnyam,
Ma ɔnhwɛ ɔman do nkyɛr;
Nyame ngye Ɔhen!
title: Attri, to Henry Carey, d. 1743.

name: MHB 879:2
verse:
. Wo nsam' nhyira papa n', 
Kyɛw nye yi, wora gu no do
Ondzi hen nkyɛr,
Nkyɛ ɔaawowaw hɛn mbra,
Ma daa hɛn so yɛdze
'Koma na dɛw yaatow
Nyame ngye Ɔhen!
title: Attri, to Henry Carey, d. 1743.

name: MHB 880:1
verse:
. NYAME nhyira hɛn man,
No sor bambɔ nsa no
Nhyira hɛn mpoano;
Asomdwee mu ntserɛw.
Ɔtamfo ndan nyɛnko,
Na Ghanaman yiedzi
Eenntsim ɔko do.
title: William Edward Hickson, 1803-70.

name: MHB 880:2
verse:
. Nyame, fa ahoɔdzen na
Pɛrpɛr ma Ɔmampanyin;
Ma n' tum n'aber m';
Fa nyansa kɛse fi
Sor nunu n'adwen daa,
Na ɔman no ndɔ no
Wɔ n'aber do.
title: William Edward Hickson, 1803-70.

name: MHB 880:3
verse:
. Ma pɛrpɛr na mbra pa
Ntsim n'amambu ber mu,
Hyira hɛn man;
Adehye, konyim man,
Fahodzi asaase,
Yɛsɔr dɛ sor Nyame
Nserew nkyerɛ wo.
title: William Edward Hickson, 1803-70.

name: MHB 880:4
verse:
. Nnyɛ hɛn man yi nko bi;
Nyame mbɔbɔrhu no,
Nka mbea nyina;
Nyame mma aman n' nhu dɛ
Wɔyɛ enuanom, ampa,
Na wɔbɔ ebusua kor,
Wɔ wiadze ha.
title: William Edward Hickson, 1803-70.

name: MHB 881:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, ber a yɛrosɔr ma
Wiadze nyimpa nyina yi,
Tsie hɛn wɔ hɛn awobea ntsi,
Bea a yɛdɔ n' mbordo no.
title: John Reynell Wreford, 1800-81.

name: MHB 881:2
verse:
. Hɛn egyaam ndakamaa wɔ ha,
Ha na hɛn nkorɔfo tse;
Hɛn mba so: na yebesi dɛn
Adɔ beebi kyɛn ha?
title: John Reynell Wreford, 1800-81.

name: MHB 881:3
verse:
. Bɔ hɛn ahe ho ban ma hɛn,
Na dom hɛn asomdwee;
Ma hɛn nkurow nya prɔmprɔmyɛ,
Hɛn mfudze nyɛ bafuu.
title: John Reynell Wreford, 1800-81.

name: MHB 881:4
verse:
. Dua nyimdzee nye nokwar ho dɔ m'
Ka hɛn na Ɔwo bɔ mu;
Na ma hɛn mbepɔw na mbɔnsa
Mbɔ m' nhuhor fahodzi.
title: John Reynell Wreford, 1800-81.

name: MHB 881:5
title: John Reynell Wreford, 1800-81.

name: MHB 882:1
verse:
. 'SAASE, dzi dɛw wo tum Nyame m',
Yɛ setsie ma No, som no yie,
'Wo na ahotsewfo bɔ ndze ma W';
'Saase nnsuro, dzi dɛw Nyame m'.
title: Robert Seymour Bridges, 1844-1930, Y.H.

name: MHB 882:2
verse:
. W'enyi bɛgye na nhyira aka w';
Wo dɛw na asomdwee bobu do,
Nyew, ɔdɔ nye wo bɛtsena
Kesi sor Ahenman ne mbae.
title: Robert Seymour Bridges, 1844-1930, Y.H.

name: MHB 882:3
verse:
. Ɔdze wo bɔn pii no bɛkyɛ w',
Kaa No dɔ a ofi tsetse no,
Fa N'akwan do, kamfo N'asɛm,
Na sie No nokwar no daa daa.   Amen.
title: Robert Seymour Bridges, 1844-1930, Y.H.

name: MHB 883:1
verse:
. ƆHEN domankoma tsɛmbuafo,
Ewuraam Wura 'hemfo Hen,
Fa W'atsɛmbu gya nyikamfo n',
Hyew man yi mu dza omuo no;
Fa W'atsaban mu yarsa no
Numa n'amantam nyina.
title: Henry Scott Holland, 1847-1918.

name: MHB 883:2
title: Henry Scott Holland, 1847-1918.

name: MHB 883:3
verse:
. Nyame, sɔw W'edwuma n' ano,
Fa nkrantsee paa hɛn sum mu:
Fa W'asɛm ne mayɛ no mee
Wiadzefo a kɔm dze hɔn no;
Fa Ewuradze enyimnyam n'
Tsew ahenman mba no ho. Amen.
title: Henry Scott Holland, 1847-1918.

name: MHB 884:1
verse:
. YEBU ntwɛr wɔ W'ahenguan' enyim,
Ma hɛn tsibowa ma yɛmfa nhu,
Na adwen-har ma yɛmfa ntse
W'asotwe nsa no ase yie;
Sɛ yaw na fɛr no tse dɛn mpo a,
Hɛn Egya, twe hɛn bɛn Wo nkyɛn.
title: William Boyd Carpenter, 1841-1918.

name: MHB 884:2
title: William Boyd Carpenter, 1841-1918.

name: MHB 884:3
title: William Boyd Carpenter, 1841-1918.

name: MHB 884:4
title: William Boyd Carpenter, 1841-1918.

name: MHB 885:1
verse:
. HOM mfa akoma kor ndzi dɛw ndɛ,
Hom mfa dɛw kɛse ntow ndwom,
Ndzi dɛw, nyi hɛn Wura tumfo ayɛw,
Nyia N'abasa ama nkwagye n',
No dɔ dwuma no bɔ
Ne kɛseyɛ dawur;
No nkotsee nye Nyame a,
Ɔakyerɛ No mbɔbɔrhu;
Wɔmma N'ahotsewfo nsɔr N'.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 885:2
verse:
. Mbusu ber mu yesui frɛɛ No n',
Otsiee hɛn mbɔbɔr su no,
Dza osi biara mu, hom ntwer No.
No dɔ ma yetsim bra mu;
Yefi akoma m' bɔtow
Konyimdzi ndwom ama N';
Sesei ndze nyina nse dɛ,
Wonyi hɛn Nyame ayɛw,
N'ahotsewfo nyi N' ayɛw.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 885:3
verse:
. HOM mfa akoma kor ndzi dɛw ndɛ,
Hom mfa dɛw kɛse ntow ndwom,
Ndzi dɛw, nyi hɛn Wura tumfo ayɛw,
Nyia N'abasa ama nkwagye n',
No dɔ dwuma no bɔ\nNe kɛseyɛ dawur;
No nkotsee nye Nyame a,
Ɔakyerɛ No mbɔbɔrhu;
Wɔmma N'ahotsewfo nsɔr N'.  Amen.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 886:1
verse:
. NYAME, yɛba bɛgye
W'adom mbɔbɔrhu no;
O tsie hɛn mbɔbɔr su,
Na mmfa W'enyim nnsuma!
     Ewuradze, tsen Wo nsa kɛse n',
     Kora hɛn awobea Ghana.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:2
verse:
. O Dɔm Ewuradze, soɛr;
Twe Wo dzin ho nyinkun,
Na pam bɔn a ɔhyɛ fɛr n'
Fi hɛn man yi nyina m'.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:3
verse:
. Hue W'akyɛdze etsitsir n'
Fi sor dɛ nhyira pii,
Ama yeehuhor Wo,
Eeyi Wo ayɛw mbordo.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:4
verse:
. Hɔn a ama hɔn tum no,
Fa sor nyansa ma hɔn,
Ma wɔnyɛ W'asomfo,
Mbu man tsenenee mu.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:5
verse:
. Fa dɔ ne gya krɔnn no
Nunu Wo Ba N' Asɔr n';
Kyekyer hɔn bɔ mu bio,
Na nkwa na nokwar mbra.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:7
verse:
. O ma yɛndɔ Wo fie
Na yɛntsew Wo da ho,
Mfa hɛn anohobadze
Nye hɛn 'nyidzii mbrɛ Wo.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:8
verse:
. Ma hɛn asomdwee, hɛn ber mu',
Mma tamfo biara mmbɛn,
Mma yɛmmfa emumuyɛ
Nngu W'ahentum ho fi.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:9
verse:
. Yɛyɛ mberɛw, tsew etua,
Naaso yɛyɛ Wodze;
Yɛnnkɛfrɛ 'biara dɛ
Hɛn Nyame gyedɛ Ɔwo.   Amen.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 886:66
verse:
. Fa adom na tum hyehyɛ 
Wo nguankuw do asɔfo,
Ma hɔn gyedzi nye ndam
Ma wɔnyɛ asɔfo pa.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 887:1
verse:
. HƐN egyanom Nyame, Ɔwo na
Hɛn egyanom sui frɛɛ W' mbusu m',
Na Ɔwo maa wohun Wo tum nsa n'
N'anwanwandze a otum yɛ no.
Wosui tɔɔ Wo do, na itsiei;
Wɔfrɛɛ Wo, na egyee hɔn nkwa:
Ndɛ, hɔn mba so, yɛtwe bɛn Wo 
Yi Wo dzin ayɛw, serɛ Wo mboa.
     Dɔm Ewuradze, ma Wo nsa do,
     Bɔ hɛn man ho ban, hyira hɛn.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 887:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, ahentum n' Wodze a,
Na idzi ndzɛmba nyina do;
Sɛ Ɔwo ehyɛ a, ahemfo na
Aman soɛr anaa wɔhwe ase.
Ma boka nye anee nsupruw
Nyina so mbɔ m' ntow ayɛyi
Mma Wo, dɔm Nyankopɔn kunyin,
Nnyɛ hɛn bi à a na mbom Ɔwoara a.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 887:3
verse:
. Sɛ W'adom bɛma yɛahyerɛn
Wɔ ndaamba ber bi a ɔreba a,
Ɔno yɛserɛ Wo, boa hɛn
Ma yɛnhwehwɛ W' mboa, ntonton Wo:
Yɛnnsɛ wɔ kasa na awoo mu,
Mbom yɛbɔ m' som W'ahengua enyim,
Na hɛn Egya Ne nyɛe dzi hɛn 
Nyina do wɔ wiadze nyina. Amen.
title: Arthur Campbell Ainger, 1841-1919.

name: MHB 888:1
verse:
. O AHEMFO Hen na dɔm Wura a
W'ahengua Wɔ sorsor,
Na ɔtra asaase do aman nyina,
Ɔsor nsordaafo no,
Hɔn a woedzi mu n' hɔn esunsum
Na wotum tow Wo ndwom,
Na hɛn, Wo mba so yɛsom Wo a,
Ayɛyi nyina yɛ W'dze.
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 888:2
verse:
. Ɔwo a edze Wo nkorɔfo fiir edzi
Na igyaa adaduafo;
Edze po ato hɛn asaase
Yi n'anaafo afamu ara,
Na ayɛ ha dɛ bea krɔnkrɔn,
Bea a sika nkanea hyerɛn,
Na nyimpa akoma dze dɔ weɔn
Apam adaka no.
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 888:3
verse:
. Ɔwo a edze nworaba apetse wimu,
Dze ada W'adwen edzi,
Na edze adom pii abɔ hɛn man
Yi abɔtsir mapa;
Wo mbɔbɔrhu, yenntum yɛnnkan!
Wo dɔ, W'adom, nhwɛdo;
'Yinom bor hɛn hia nyina do,
Ɔtra hɛn mpaabɔ mpo.
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 888:4
verse:
. O ahemfo Hen, dɔm Wura,
Egyaam na hɛn Nyame
Ka hɛn ho; na sɛ ehum bi
Rubotu hɛn ndaamba a,
Ma Wo dɔ n' nhwira mununkum n' mu,
Mpepa hɛn nyinsuwa,
Gya hɛn fa mber pa m' kɔ heaven
Da a ɔmmbɔ adze no mu.
title: Henry Burton, 1840-1930.

name: MHB 889:1
verse:
. EGYAAM Nyame a ifi tsetse,
Hɛn akodzi mpasuar do Sahen,
Wo tumdzi ase na yedzi nyim,
Eehum na aaham nyinara do;
Dɔm Ewuradze, ka hɛn ho,
Amma hɛn werɛ eemmfir da!
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 889:2
verse:
. Gyigyeegye na ntseamu n' bɔ adze,
Supifo na ahemfo no kɔ;
Wo tsetse afɔr no tsim hɔ,
Akoma a abobɔ na abotow.
Dɔm Ewuradze, ka hɛn ho,
Amma hɛn werɛ eemmfir da!
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 889:3
verse:
. Hɛn nsordaafo kɔ akono
Kodum anhwea m' na akoko do gya;
Naaso hɛn ndeda hyerɛpɛɛ nyina
Tse dɛ Nineveh na Tyre dze n'!
Aman Tsɛmbuafo, fa kyɛ hɛn,
Amma hɛn werɛ eemmfir da!
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 889:4
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn eyiedzi kɔ hɛn tsir mu,
Ma dɛm ntsi yɛhyɛ ase horan.
Dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛ a aman nkaa no a,
Wɔnnto hɛn koraa mpo n' yɛ n';
Dɔm Ewuradze, ka hɛn ho,
Amma hɛn werɛ eemmfir da!
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 889:5
verse:
. Na abosonsɔr akoma a
Ɔtwer ndadze etur na nkrantsee,
Mbanyinndam hun a onntum nngyina,
Na ɔroweɔn a ɔmmfa Wo nnweɔn,
Ntuw gyangyan na nkwanseasɛm so -
Ewuradze, dom hɛn tsia yinom.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 890:1
verse:
. APONKƐSE, hom mbuebue yie,
Hom nhwɛ, enyimnyam Hen n' rotweɔn!
Ahemfo Hen no rotwe bɛn,
Wiadze Agyenkwa no wɔ ha;
Nkwa na nkwagye na ɔdze nam,
Ntsi hom ndzi dɛw na hom ntow ndwom.
Egya, yeyi W' ayɛw,
Bɔadze, nyansfo nye W'.
title: George Weissel, 1590-1635;

name: MHB 890:2
verse:
. Ewuradze yɛ pɛrpɛr boafo,
Ɔyɛ mbɔbɔrhu daa nyina,
Krɔnkrɔnyɛ nye N'ahenkyɛw daa,
Mbɔbɔrhu nye N'ahempoma
Ɔdze hɛn mbusu n'ewiei nam,
Ntsi wiadze dze enyigye tow ndwom,
Egya, yeyi W' ayɛw,
Ɔwo a eyɛ etumdze.
title: George Weissel, 1590-1635;

name: MHB 890:3
verse:
. O nhyira nye asaase na kurow a 
Wɔbɔ Ɔhen Christ no Ne dzin,
O siar nye akoma na fidua a
Dɛm konyimdzi Hen yi ba mu!
Ɔno nye dɛw, Ewia ketee a
Ɔdze enyigye mapa nam.
Sunsum Werɛkyekyefo,
W'adom dɔɔ sō, ampa.
title: George Weissel, 1590-1635;

name: MHB 890:4
verse:
. Bue w'akoma n' apon n' petee,
Yɛ n' asɔrfi a woeyi esi
Nkyɛn ama sor dwumadzi nko,
Na mpaabɔ, dɔ na dɛw aahyɛ n' ma;
Dɛm n' na Ɔwo Hen no bɛhɛn mu,
Na bra fofor kɛse aahyɛ ase.
Nyame, Ɔwo na ayɛyi 
Nka W' kasa na nyɛe mu.
title: George Weissel, 1590-1635;

name: MHB 890:5
verse:
. Pomfo, bra, yebue hɛn akoma
Petee ma Wo dɛ tsena mu!
Ma yɛntse Wo nka dɛ ewɔ m';
Da W'adom dɔ n' edzi, hɛn mu,
Ma Wo Sunsum no ndzi hɛn kan,
Kesi dɛ yebenya botae n'.
Ayɛyi a ɔmmbɔ adze
Na yɛdze ma Wo dzin.  Amen.
title: George Weissel, 1590-1635;

name: MHB 891:1
verse:
. KUROW fɛɛfɛw no ne Hen,
Wimu man a otsim hɔ daa,
Nkyɛ hɛn nkurow nyina aayɛ
Krɔnkrɔn wɔ W'enyi do,
Wɔaasan efi sum ndwuma ho
Aayɛ kan nkurow!
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.

name: MHB 891:2
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.

name: MHB 891:3
verse:
. Ma etutuwpɛ mbɔ adze,
Tu asabokwafo bɔr;
Ɔwo nye Duyɛfo kor a
Esa akoma yarba,
Ema adwen ntanta si pi,
Na etsen brafun.
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.

name: MHB 891:4
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.

name: MHB 891:5
title: George Thomas Coster, 1835-1912.

name: MHB 892:1
verse:
. ONNYIEWIEI Nyame a idzi hen wimu na
Nsaase do, na wɔtow ndwom ma Wo daa,
Ɔwo a igya aman abamba fi sum
Kebii mu kɔ enyimnyam da kɛse n' mu;
Dzi hen hɛn akoma mu, ama yeenya
W'akwankyerɛ, W'ahoɔdzen na Wo mboa.
title: John White Chadwick, 1840-1904.

name: MHB 892:2
title: John White Chadwick, 1840-1904.

name: MHB 892:3
verse:
. Yɛbɛyɛ kor ako etsia bɔn nyina,
Ayɛ kor dɔ m' wɔ dza oye nyina ho;
Ayɛ kor wɔ dɛw a ɔma adwontow mu,
Ayɛ kor wɔ nkrum a ɔba mpaabɔ mu,
Ayɛ kor wɔ tum a ɔma adehyehyɛ m',
Ma yeetsin nokwar do, eedzi W'ekyir.
title: John White Chadwick, 1840-1904.

name: MHB 892:4
title: John White Chadwick, 1840-1904.

name: MHB 893:1
verse:
. O HOM a hom ehu dɛ dɔ yɛ dɛw,
Hom nyɛ akwankyerɛ mma 'kyingyefo a
Wofintsiw kwan do hwehwɛ dɔ n'.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 893:2
verse:
. Hom ntow dɔ ho ndwom ama nyia
Ɔbɛtse n' ekyirekyir n' eetsie,
Aasoɛr, aadwendwen, aatwe abɛn.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 893:3
verse:
. Hom mbɔ dɔ ho bra, daa ma hɔn a
Wohu hom bra n' hɔn so dze dɔ
Aahyerɛn na wɔabɔdɔm hom.
title: Christina Georgina Rossetti, 1830-94.

name: MHB 894:1
verse:
. EGYA a ihue akyɛdze pii
Fi W'akorae ma nyimpa mba,
Ma Wo nkorɔfo tum amma
Wɔannsɛɛ W'akyɛdze no kwa.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 894:2
verse:
. Ma enyigye pa ahomgye mu,
Ahohyɛdo wɔ enyigye m'
Yɛmfa ha ndzɛmba nyɛ papa,
Hɛn ho ntsew, hɛn sunsum nhyerɛn.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.
