name: MHB 894:3
verse:
. Yi dza ɔsan hɛn adze fi
Ɔman yi nye aman nyina mu;
Dwedwe nsɔhwɛ no bɔr ano,
Ma W'atamfo mfi hɔ nguan.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 894:4
verse:
. Kā hɛn ho, ma hɛn W'ahoɔdzen,
Ama yɛdze ahoɔdzen a ɔnnsā 
Eehyia hɛn atamfo biara
Na yeegyina kō no mu.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 894:5
verse:
. Ɔwo a eyɛ hɛn Sahen daa,
Dzi hɛn enyim wɔ nkodzen mu,
Ma W'Asɔr ngye wiadze nsi hɔ;
Ma hɛn nyansa na ahoɔdzen.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 894:6
verse:
. Egya a ahwehwɛ hɛn ehu hɛn,
Nyame Ba a Wo dɔ akyekyer hɛn,
Sunsum a ewɔ hɛn mu, hɛn nkyɛn,
Nyame Egya kɛse, tsie hɛn.   Amen.
title: Percy Dearmer, 1867-1938.

name: MHB 895:1
verse:
. BEEBI a ɔbra akwan hyia,
Beebi a nyimpa horow sū,
Adasa gyigyeegye nyina m'
Yɛtse Wo ndze, O Nyimpa Ba.
title: Frank Mason North, 1850-1936.

name: MHB 895:2
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrwa na ohia mpasuar do,
Sum akwan a suro wɔ do,
Akwan a emim etsim do,
Mbea yi na yehu Wo nyinsu.
title: Frank Mason North, 1850-1936.

name: MHB 895:3
verse:
. Mbofraber mberɛwyɛ nyina m'
Mbaa su, na mbanyin fona mu,
Nye akra a wɔato bahaw so,
W'akoma mmfii yinom ho da.
title: Frank Mason North, 1850-1936.

name: MHB 895:4
verse:
. Nsu a wɔdze ma wɔ Wo dzin mu,
Da W'adom no foforyɛ edzi;
Naaso dɔmpepe rohwehwɛ
W'enyim fɛɛfɛw noara ahwɛ.
title: Frank Mason North, 1850-1936.

name: MHB 895:5
verse:
. O hɛn Wura, fi bepɔw n' do
Ntsɛmara bɛsa 'yinom yar;
Bɛnye ahoperfo yi ntsena,
Bɛnantsew hɛn abrɔn mu bio.
title: Frank Mason North, 1850-1936.

name: MHB 895:6
verse:
. Kesi dɛ yebosua Wo dɔ n',
Na yeedzi W'ekyir W'akwan do,
Na hɛn Nyankopɔn Kurow no
So nam enyimnyam mu aba.
title: Frank Mason North, 1850-1936.

name: MHB 896:1
verse:
. AFEI yeyi ekunyin ayɛw,
Egyanom a wɔgyee hɔn dzin;
Na yɛkamfo Ewuradze no a
Ɔkyerɛ N'enyimnyam nyimpa m'.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 896:2
verse:
. Yɛkamfo enyansafo nà abràn a,
Wɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɔm enyimnyam;
Woyinom boaa ndzepa, tsiaa bɔn,
Dze maa nkorɔfo yɛɛ ɔman.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 896:3
verse:
. Yeyi ekunyin nyinara
Na adwontofo so ayɛw;
Hɔn ndwom pegyaa akra kɔr sorsor,
Tse dɛ mframa dzendzen bi.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 896:4
verse:
. Yeyi edwimfo a wosisii
Adan fɛɛfɛw so ayɛw,
Wodzii edwin mapa, nam dɛm
Kaa edwumayɛfo bɔɔ mu.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 896:5
verse:
. Yehuhor edzin a yɛkaa,
Na hɔn a ɔnam mber ntsi
Yenntum nnkaa hɔn no so nyina,
Yembu hɔn ɔdɔ kɛse mu.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 896:6
verse:
. Hɔn mbiew rohom asomdwee mu,
Woewie hɔn edwuma yɛ;
Wohyiraa asaase wɔ hɔn bra m',
Nyame na adasa ehyira hɔn.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 896:7
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi yeyi ekunyin ayɛw,
Egyanom a wɔgyee hɔn dzin;
Na yɛkamfo Ewuradze no a
Ɔkyerɛ N'enyimnyam nyimpa m'.
title: William George Tarrant, 1853-1928.

name: MHB 897:1
verse:
. YENSI dɛn nsom wo yie papa,
Hɛn Awobea a yɛdɔ wo?
'Bɛn na hɛn nsa, akoma na adwen
Bɛyɛ akyerɛ hɛn dɔ?
Ndaamba regye hɛn mboa daa daa,
Wo tsetse ndze n' pia hɛn;
Ana hɛn Wo mba nye mbabaa
Nnkɛfata dɛ hɛn egyaam?
title: Ernest Dodgshun, 1876-1944.

name: MHB 897:2
verse:
. Nnyɛ akodzi nko na yɛnam do
Som anyɛnkoyɛman no;
Akodzi a ɔkrɔn kɛse kyɛn dza
Yenyim n' sesei bɛba;
Asomdwee ho ndwuma m' empiresi,
'Brabɔ m' nyimpa ho som
Yinom bɛhyɛ akodzi anan mu,
Adwedwe hɛn aperdzi.
title: Ernest Dodgshun, 1876-1944.

name: MHB 897:3
verse:
. Mber tsentsen na bɔn tum afa
Wiadze nyina ndɔmmum,
Mber tsentsen na akodzi amen
Dasanyi n' frɛ a mu dɔ.
O m'afɛ, hom nhwehwɛ dza ɔkrɔn!
Hom mfua dza ɔsom bo m'!
Ɔtan ne mber etwa mu kɔ:
Hom mbɔ Christ mbra dawur.
title: Ernest Dodgshun, 1876-1944.

name: MHB 897:4
verse:
. Aman nyina Ewuradze, soma
Wo nkwa mframa n' sesei,
Siesie hɛn ma nkwa ho ndwuma,
Gye hɛn fi owu ndwuma m';
Fa hɛn ka W'akodɔm no ho,
Yɛnko nyɛ adehye,
Akofrɛ no nye Enuadɔ a
Ɔkyekyer aman nyina.
title: Ernest Dodgshun, 1876-1944.

name: MHB 898:1
verse:
. BER wɔ hɔ ma nyimpa na aman
Dɛ wɔfa adwen pa bi,
Wɔ nokwar na ator akodzi n' mu,
Dɛ wɔfa papa anaa bɔn;
Nyankopɔn Ne Christ no, anaa
Apam bi a ɔkyerɛ siar anaa ndom;
Na sum anaa kan n' ne nyii no a
Otwa mu a, ɔnnsan mmba bio da.
title: James Russell Lowell, 1819-91.

name: MHB 898:2
verse:
. Sɛ yɛgye nokwar nwen no
Ber a yennhun ne nhyira a,
Na yebohu siar a ɔdze nam,
Na pɛrpɛr mu prɔmprɔmyɛ;
Ber n' na ɔkatakyi bɛyɛ adwen
Na okotoo begyina nkyɛn,
Kesi dɛ ɔdodow n' bohu dɛ
Gyedzi a wɔapow no ho hia.
title: James Russell Lowell, 1819-91.

name: MHB 898:3
verse:
. Atɔfo a wɔrehyew hɔn kan n' m',
Christ, yehu W' bɔgyaa anamɔn
Dɛ ɔdze mbeamudua pii rotow
Kɔ kan ridzi ako daa.
Mber fofor kyerɛ asodzi fofor,
Mber sɛɛ dza wɔagye ato mu,
Na hɔn a wɔnye nokwar besian n'
Wɔ dɛ wɔtow kɔ kan daa.
title: James Russell Lowell, 1819-91.

name: MHB 898:4
verse:
. Bɔn ne pɛ bɛyɛ prɔmprɔm dze,
Naaso nokwar na otsim;
Kaansa ne kyɛfa nye ɔsɛntwer,
Na bɔn tse ahengua do mpo a,
Ɔsɛntwer n' bɔwosow ndaamba,
Nyame so wɔ sum n' ekyir
Rohwɛ dza yennyim nyina mu,
Rohwɛ Nankasa N' dze do.
title: James Russell Lowell, 1819-91.

name: MHB 899:1
verse:
. HƐN Awobea, yɛdze hɛn dɔ
Na berɛ sua ma wo ber nyina;
Ber a yeenyin na yeesi do
Dɛ mbanyin na mbaa wɔ hɛn man m'.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:2
verse:
. Hɛn sor Egya a edɔ obiara,
O boa Wo mba ber a wɔfrɛ;
Ma wɔaakyekyer ɔman krɔnkrɔn
Wɔ mbersantsen nyinara mu.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:3
verse:
. Kyerɛ hɛn yɛnsoa kɔndua n' mbabun m',
Yɛmfa mbɔdzembɔ, nokwardzi;
Ma hɛn ber mu aadom Wo nkowaa
Nokwar a ɔma aman gyina.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:4
verse:
. Kyerɛ hɛn ma yendzi hɛnho do,
'Hohyɛdo na ahotsew m' ber nyina,
Ma yɛdze enyikan afɔrbɔ
Eepue W'enyim ber a ɔsɛ mu.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:5
verse:
. Kyerɛ hɛn ma nyina m' yɛnhwɛ Wo
Dɛ Tsɛmbuafo, na nnyɛ nyimpa a,
Ama yɛnye Wo aanantsew a
Yenkosuro nyimpa, nnhwɛ hɔn enyim.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:6
verse:
. Kyerɛ hɛn ahoɔdzen a wɔmmfa nnsisi
'Bɔbɔfo, wɔ ndzeyɛɛ na adwen m',
Ama yɛhyɛ W'ase n' yeenya
Mbanyinndam dze ahyɛ nyimpa ma.
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:7
verse:
. Ma hɛn enyi ngye ndzɛmba nkumaa ho,
Ndzi dɛw a ommfi binom yaw mu,
Yɛmfa hɛn mfom nkyekyɛ hɛnho,
Na yɛndɔ adasamba nyina!
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 899:8
title: Rudyard Kipling, 1865-1936.

name: MHB 900:1
verse:
. ME man, medze famu ha ndzɛmba a odzi mu na ɔkrɔn
No mu tsitsir kɛse a ɔyɛ mo dɔ som hyɛ wo bɔ,
Ɔdɔ a ɔnnyɛ nyiyiano, na ɔsɔw nsɔhwɛ nyina,
Na ɔdze dza ɔsom bo na oye nko bɔ afɔr,
Ɔdɔ a ɔmmpa ara da, ɔdɔ a otua kaw nyina,
Ɔdɔ a onnsuro dɛ ɔdze noho botwa akyer mpo.
title: Cecil Spring Rice, 1859-1918.

name: MHB 900:2
title: Cecil Spring Rice, 1859-1918.

name: MHB 901:1
verse:
. NYAME a Wo ho yɛ hu! Ɔhen a ehyɛ ma
Ehum yɛ W' mbɛn, na enyinam Wo nkrantsee;
Fi sor W'ahendzi bea kyerɛ ayamuhyehye,
Ewuradze, ma hɛn asomdwee hɛn ber m'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 901:2
verse:
. Nyame a eyɛ tsimbɔbɔr! Wiadze apow
Wo siar kwan n', etsiatsia W'asɛm no do;
Mma mma W'ebufuw huuhu no nnosɛr hɛn do,
Ewuradze, ma hɛn asomdwee hɛn ber m'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 901:3
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 901:4
verse:
. Nyansabuakwa Nyame! W'enyimka n' ne gya m'
Wiadze bedzi n' ho do; nokwar etsim,
W'ahendzi no nam sum kebii mu rebɛn;
Ewuradze bɛma asomdwee ber yi m'.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 901:5
verse:
. Dɛm no na Wo mbofra dze ɔsom ndaase
Bɛma Nyia ɔgyee hɔn fii mbusu mu n',
Wɔbɔtow ndwom fi mpoano kesi mpoano,
'Somdwee nka aman, 'yɛyi nka Ewuradze.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 902:1
verse:
. ENYIMNYAM nka Nyame wɔ wimu,
Na asomdwee ntsim wɔ asaase do!
O Jesus Wo a wɔakrɔn Wo sor,
Bra bɛyɛ hɛn Wura tumfo!
'Wo a wɔwoo W'hianyi Bethlehem,
Na 'gyee wiadze a ɔayew no nkwa,
O san bra W'abɔdze nkyɛn bio;
Dzi hen W'adom ahenman n' mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 902:2
verse:
. Ebaa nyimpa honandua mu n',
Abɔdze nyina peen W'awoo do;
Enyisɔ afe no nyae bae,
Na heaven so buei ma asaase;
Wiadze a oenya no sor Wura n'
Dze adwensaa kor bɔɔ mu tontoon
Amandwee na dɔ Mafo no,
Asomdwee Wura nye Ɔhen no.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 902:3
verse:
. O nkyɛ wɔama woeehu Wo bio!
Sian wɔ Wo Sunsum su n' mu bio,
Na bɛkyekyer wɔ W'akowaa
Biara m' onnyiewiei ahenman;
Wo nkotoo na itum hyira
Na ema siar aman tsie Wo,
Na ema ɔtan bɔ adze,
Na ema wiadze dzi W'ekyir.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 902:4
verse:
. Ntsi bra Wo nkowaa a wɔrepɛ
Ehu Wo mbae no hɔn nkyɛn bio,
Dua mbɔbɔrhu do fa kyekyer
Wo kommyɛ asomdwee man no;
Awerɛhow boguan W'enyim,
Na ebufuw na tan abɔ adze;
Enyiber na adwembɔn bowu,
Na wentwiwentwi nnkɛhaw hɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 903:1
verse:
. O ƆDƆ Nyame, 'somdwee Hen,
Ma ko mbɔ adze wiadze nyina:
Siw nyimpa bɔn ebufuw kwan,
O Nyankopɔn, ma asomdwee bio.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 903:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, kaa Wo tsetse ndwuma n',
Anwanwadze a hɛn egyaam kae n',
Mma nnkaa hɛn bɔn ne nkekaawa n',
O Nyankopɔn, ma asomdwee bio.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 903:3
verse:
. Woana na yɛngye n' ndzi dɛ Ɔwo?
Yɛntwer ebɛn dɛ Wo nokwasɛm n'?
Obi mmfrɛɛ Wo nngyinaa gyan da;
O Nyankopɔn, ma asomdwee bio.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 903:4
verse:
. Bea a 'hotsewfo na abɔfo wɔ n',
Akoma nyina bɔ mu wɔ dɔ m';
Fa sor nkyehoma n' ka hɛn bɔ m',
O Nyankopɔn, ma asomdwee bio.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 904:1
verse:
. HOM nhwɛ, Ewuradze bepɔw no
Bɔkrɔn ekyir nda n' mu
Akyɛn akoko no nyina,
Na nkorɔfo ahwɛ.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 904:2
verse:
. Aman nye kasa horow pii
Dze dɛw bɛpem akɔ
Nyame bepɔw n' do ase dɛ,
Ne fie na yɛbɔkɔ.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 904:3
verse:
. Kan a ofi Zion bepɔw do n'
Bɛhyerɛn aman nyina pii do;
Nyia odzi hen wɔ Salem 'bansor n'
Bɛyɛ aman nyina Hen.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 904:4
verse:
. Obobu aman ntamu atsɛn,
Nokwar bɛkyerɛ no kwan,
N'ahempoma bɛma bambɔ,
Esi ɔbɔn no mpa.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 904:5
verse:
. Aperdzi na manso biara
Nnkɛba asomdwee ber no m',
Wɔdze hɔn nkrantsee bɔbɔ nsɔw,
Na mpeaa so ayɛ ndar.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 904:6
verse:
. Akodɔm nnkehyia akodɔm bi,
Na asafo dɔm nnkɔtɔr;
Wɔdze akobɛn bɛsɛn ban ho,
Wonnkosua akodzi bio.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 904:7
verse:
. Afei Jacob fifo, hom mbra
Mbɔsom N' krɔnkrɔn-bea do,
Na hom nam Nyame kan no mu n',
Hom ahyerɛn ahoɔfɛw mu.
title: Michael  Bruce, 1746-67.

name: MHB 905:
verse:
NDƆMBA, hom nwosow ngu wimu,
Nkyerɛ mununkum nye awɔw;
Afe n' rokɔ ewiei anafua 'i,
Ndɔmba, hom nwosow ngya no kwan.
title: Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 905:1
verse:
. Hom nhotse nkrumsi nyina ngu,
Hom nwosow mma ewuakɔr so;
Hom nwosow ntu hia ne haw nkɔ,
Hom nwosow mfrɛ dɛw mma adasa.
title: Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 905:2
verse:
. Hom nhotse dza etwa mu ngu,
Nye tsetse aperdzi nyina;
Hom nwosow mfrɛ abrabɔ ho siar,
Ndzeyɛɛ pa, nye ɔbra pa a odzi mu.
title: Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 905:3
verse:
. Hom nwosow ntu guasohantan
Nye dza ɔhyɛ fɛr nyina so;
Hom nwosow mfrɛ ɔdɔ nokwar a ɔtsen,
Hom nwosow ma yie ho dɔ mbra.
title: Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 905:4
verse:
. Hom nhotse koannkɔ yar mfi hɔ,
Nye sikanyiber nyina so!
Hom nhotse ntokwaw dadaw n' gu,
Hom nwosow mfrɛ mfe apem asomdwee.
title: Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 905:5
verse:
. Hom nwosow mfrɛ adehye abran
Nye ebirɛmpɔn na ayamuyiefo;
Hom nwosow ntu hɛn man no sum,
Hom nwosow mma Christ a ɔreba n'.
title: Alfred Lord Tennyson, 1809-92.

name: MHB 906:1
verse:
. OWURA Christ, ebaa nyimpa nkyɛn n'
Wɔkyekyeer Wo mbeamudua do:
Sii Ɔwo ɔgye-ahentum n' atwetwe,
Na wɔsoaa Wo nsoɛ ahenkyɛw;
Sesei so hɛn bɔn da ho wen
Nsoɛ fofor wowɔ W'enyi ekyir
Na ɔdze nyinsu atar hyɛ Wo.
title: Walter Russell Bowie, 1882-

name: MHB 906:2
verse:
. O ɔdɔ nwanwa a oennya kwan
Biara wɔ bra bɔn mu no;
Ɔdze W' bɔkɔ wu dze, na ebɛfa
Do edzi Wo kumfo n' do
Kesi dɛ ɔbo nnkɛda ɔbo do,
Na ɔman biara ahopɔw bogu
Dɛ huntuma wɔ W'enyim.
title: Walter Russell Bowie, 1882-

name: MHB 906:3
verse:
. Christ No dɔ a asan aba bio,
Ana yɛnsan mpow Wo bio
Nkesi dɛ ɔtan na ɔko sum no m'
Yɛbɔhwer Wo na yɛ ahera?
Gye hɛn fi ekyingye dadaw n' mu,
Ma yɛnhwehwɛ W'asomdwee man n',
Ama hɛn nsa aaka Wo.
title: Walter Russell Bowie, 1882-

name: MHB 906:4
verse:
. O Jesus, Wo nsa a wopirae n',
Nyɛ W'adzebɔ n' bio hɛn mu;
Hɛn ntsɛn dɛtse a, hɛn ntuw egu,
Na yɛrotweɔn Wo nyikyerɛ;
O dɔ a odzi nkogu do nyim,
Hɛn akoma ba Wo Dua n' enyim,
Dɛ yɛdze wie Wo nkwagye n'.
title: Walter Russell Bowie, 1882-

name: MHB 907:1
verse:
. TUM nyina Egya, Ɔwo a edze
Nkwa akyɛdze ma atseasefo kwa,
Kyea W'enyi hwɛ bɔn na aperper,
Na fa hɛn kɔ bra a ɔkrɔn mu.
title: John Howard Bertram Masterman, 1867-1933.

name: MHB 907:2
verse:
. Ahemfo Hen, krɔn hɛn akoma
Kɔ dza ɔhyerɛn na oye ho;
Eyiedzi kɛse ho mfonyin
Nye enuadɔ krɔnn ho enyisun.
title: John Howard Bertram Masterman, 1867-1933.

name: MHB 907:3
verse:
. Wo wiadze ne yaw n' ekitsa n',
Emim na mfaso a onnsi kwaa;
Enyidzi a no ho egu fi,
Na ne tsetse bɔn ndwuma no.
title: John Howard Bertram Masterman, 1867-1933.

name: MHB 907:4
verse:
. Tsie mpaa a Wo nkowaa robɔ no
Aman nyina mu ndɛ da yi,
Na ma W' nkwagye kɛse n' mbɛpram
Bɔn no tum a egu no do .  Amen.
title: John Howard Bertram Masterman, 1867-1933.

name: MHB 908:1
verse:
. TSETSE nkwa a wohuee guu weɔɔ,
Nyame dɔ a ɔnnsa, wɔnntɔn a
Ɔpem kwa wɔ nkɔnhyɛsɛm
Na adasa hɔn fahodzi m'.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 908:2
verse:
. Wɔannkam adze biara do
Amma hɔn a woeyi hɔn n' nko;
Mber na mbea nyina dzi wɔ Wo,
Akoma na adwen pa n' bura.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 908:3
verse:
. Mbadwemba nyinara na
Akatakyi mpo twer Wo, 
Ema adwen na ndzeyɛɛ pa,
'Dze nokwar na yie bɔ hyew.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 908:4
verse:
. Etsew edwindzi na ndwom na
Kyerɛwsɛm na akwantu so ho,
Isiw aperdzi na bɔn kwan,
Na 'bue kwan ma fahodzi.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 908:5
verse:
. Tsetse nkwa a wohuee guu weɔɔ,
Nyame dɔ a ɔnnsa, wɔnntɔn a 
Ɔpem kwa wɔ nkɔnhyɛsɛm
Na adasa hɔn fahodzi m'.
title: Samuel Johnson, 1822-82.

name: MHB 909:1
verse:
. MBƆBƆRHU Nyame, dabɛn
Na ebɛgye adasa?
Ewuradze, ɔyɛ nyimpa,
Nnyɛ ahengua na ahenkyɛw,
Na wɔyɛ W'akoma ho nhyiren;
Na mma wonnwu dɛ nkyɛkyɛr kwa,
Na mma sum kebii mmpram hɛn do,
Nyame ngye adasa!
title: Ebenezer Elliott, 1781-1819.

name: MHB 909:2
verse:
. Ana bɔn bɔwo bɔn daa?
Na abran ho ayɛ dzen daa?
Egya, ɔyɛ Wo pɛ dɛ 
Nyimpa bɛhyɛ bɔn ma?
Wo mbepɔw na wimu se dabi!
Nyimpa n'ewia bɛhyerɛn bio,
Na ndwom, nnyɛ nkrum, na wɔbɛtse;
Nyame ngye adasa!
title: Ebenezer Elliott, 1781-1819.

name: MHB 909:3
verse:
. Mbɔbɔrhu Nyame, dabɛn
Na ebɛgye adasa?
Ewuradze, nyimpa yi nye
W'akoma ho nhyiren!
Wɔyɛ Wo mba dɛ abɔfo n' pɛr;
Nyame, gye nyimpa, wɔyɛ W'dze,
Fi bɔn, nhyɛdo, na abawpa mu,
Nyame ngye adasa?
title: Ebenezer Elliott, 1781-1819.

name: MHB 910:1
verse:
. 'YINOM besi : Ɔsantsen a
Wiadze nnhun hɔn saso, dzedze
Fahodzi gya wɔ hɔn akra m',
Na nyimdzee kan wɔ hɔn enyim.
title: John Addington Symonds, 1840-93. tr. from 14th cent. MS.

name: MHB 910:2
verse:
. Wɔbɛyɛ akofo bɔkɔɔ,
Wɔnnkɛka bɔgya bi, na mbom
Wɔbɛfa gya m', pomu, na wimu
Etsia nyimpa wiadze tumdzi.
title: John Addington Symonds, 1840-93. tr. from 14th cent. MS.

name: MHB 910:3
verse:
. Aman nye aman bɛtsena daa
Wɔ asomdwee mu dɛ anyɛnkofo,
Na dɔ bɛka akoma biara,
Na wɔatse amema hɔnho.
title: John Addington Symonds, 1840-93. tr. from 14th cent. MS.

name: MHB 910:4
verse:
. Nyimpa dze akoma krɔnn bɔdɔ
No nua, na wɔdze ndamyɛ tum
Atow ɔsorsor ndwom dɛɛdɛw,
Wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim daa daa.
title: John Addington Symonds, 1840-93. tr. from 14th cent. MS.

name: MHB 910:5
verse:
. Edwindze pii na obopue,
Ba ndwom dehye ahyɛ wimu ma,
Na ndwom bɛhyɛ obiara mu,
Ber a asaase bɛyɛ heaven n'.
title: John Addington Symonds, 1840-93. tr. from 14th cent. MS.

name: MHB 911:1
verse:
. DASANYI, fua wo nyɛnko nyimpa wo bom'!
Bea a tsema wɔ n' Nyame asomdwee wɔ hɔ;
Ɔsom pa nye dɛ hom rododɔ homho,
Serew yɛ ndwom, papayɛ so yɛ asɔr.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 911:2
verse:
. Nyia Jesus dɔɔ no n' akasa nokwar mu:
Som krɔnkrɔn a ɔsɔ N'enyi daa nye dɛ
Edze dza ayew san ba na ekyekye werɛ,
Na enyɛn ekunafo na ngyanka.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 911:3
verse:
. Fa enyidzi kɛse tsin Nyia N'edwuma
Krɔnn nye papayɛ n' ne fasusu do,
Ama wiadze aayɛ hɛn Egya N'asɔrfi,
Na dɔ abrabɔ aayɛ ndaase ndwom.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 911:4
verse:
. Na mpokyerɛ bobubu, na wiadze ha
Ɔsatu ndwom gyigyeegye so begyaa;
Ɔdɔ botutu ebufuw ne gya egu,
Na no nso mu oedua asomdwee dua no.
title: John Greenleaf Whittier, 1807 -92

name: MHB 912:1
verse:
. O NYIMPA, san w'ekyir, pow w'akwan bɔn n';
Wiadze yi rutwa mu, ne mber asa,
Naaso Ɔwo a ewɔ kan abɔtsir no
'Da ho nntse dza wo Nyame ka no dɛ,
O nyimpa, san w'ekyir, pow w'akwan bɔn n'.
title: Clifford Bax, 1886

name: MHB 912:2
title: Clifford Bax, 1886

name: MHB 912:3
title: Clifford Bax, 1886

name: MHB 913:1
verse:
. ASOMDWEE dɛɛdɛw na
Yɛdze gya hɛn nuaam kwan;
Asomdwee nyir dɛ esutsen,
Mma ɔnnwew da.
title: George Watson, 1816-98.

name: MHB 913:2
verse:
. Mpaabɔ ndze bɔkɔɔ na
Yɛdze tu hɛn nuanom
'Nyiber do hyɛ Wo nhwɛdo nsa,
Daapem Nyɛnko.
title: George Watson, 1816-98.

name: MHB 913:3
verse:
. Ɔdɔsɛm tsiaa bi na
Yɛdze ma nantsew yie;
Famu ha hɛn dɔ, na sor Wodze n'
Nye hɔn bɛtsena.
title: George Watson, 1816-98.

name: MHB 913:4
verse:
. Gyedzisɛm dzendzen do
Na yɛnam dze twer Wo;
Dɛ Ɔwo Ewuradze bɛyɛ hɔn
Mboa nkwa na wu m'.
title: George Watson, 1816-98.

name: MHB 913:5
verse:
. Na enyidado mapa
Bɛhyerɛn hɛn do ampa,
Na ɔama dɛw a ɔbor wiadze
Enyisun do.
title: George Watson, 1816-98.

name: MHB 913:6
verse:
. Da yie, enyidado dɔ,
Gyedzi, asomdwee, mpaabɔ m';
Kodu dɛ Nyia Ne fie wɔ sor
Dze hɛn bɔbɔ m'.
title: George Watson, 1816-98.

name: MHB 914:1
verse:
. NYAME nye wo ntsena; yebehyia m' bio,
Mfa N'apam ngya wo, nsuo wo mu,
Mfa wo nka No nguan ho nsie yie,
Nyame nye wo ntsena, yebehyia m' bio.
title: Jeremiah Eames Rankin, 1828-1904.

name: MHB 914:2
verse:
. Nyame nye wo ntsena; yebehyia m' bio,
Mfa W' nhyɛ No bomu mbɔ wo ho ban,
Ɔmma wo daa daa edziban,
Nyame nye wo tsena, yebehyia m' bio.
title: Jeremiah Eames Rankin, 1828-1904.

name: MHB 914:3
verse:
. Nyame nye wo ntsena; yebehyia m' bio,
Sɛ ɔbra m' mbusu kyekyer wo a,
Ɔmfa N'abaw mbɔ wo ho ban,
Nyame nye wo tsena, yebehyia m' bio.
title: Jeremiah Eames Rankin, 1828-1904.

name: MHB 914:4
verse:
. Nyame nye wo ntsena; yebehyia m' bio,
Onyam dɔ frankaa wɔ wo do,
Mbɔ owu mpuw mfi w'enyim daa,
Nyame nye wo ntsena; yebehyia m' bio.
title: Jeremiah Eames Rankin, 1828-1904.

name: MHB 915:1
verse:
. HƐN Egya a Wo nko ara
Nye hɛn boafo daa daa,
Tsie hɛn, ber a yɛsɔr
Ma adɔfo a wɔadɔ mu,
Na fa W'abaw dzendzen no gye
Po na asaase do akwantufo.
title: Edith Jones : Home Hymn Book, 1885.

name: MHB 915:2
verse:
. 'Siandɛ Ɔwo hɛn Egya,
Ewɔ mbea nyinara,
Na ebrɛ W'aso adze
Tsie mpaabɔ bɔkɔɔ mpo,
Na etweɔn ara so hyira
Wo mba a wɔwɔ ase ha nyina.
title: Edith Jones : Home Hymn Book, 1885.

name: MHB 915:3
verse:
. Fa Wo dɔ no numa
Beebi a wɔnam biara,
Ma Wo kan na nokwar
Ngu hɔn akoma do,
Na sɛ hɔn pɛ nye Wodze sɛ a,
Ma hɔn so asomdwee na dɛw.
title: Edith Jones : Home Hymn Book, 1885.

name: MHB 915:4
title: Edith Jones : Home Hymn Book, 1885.

name: MHB 915:5
verse:
. Yɛyɛ ɔbra n'akwan
Do akwantufo wɔ ha,
Yehyia, dzi mpaam', kesi
Dɛ yɛkɔ Nyame hɔ;
Yɛnye hɛn adɔfo bɛtsena
Wɔ sor Egyaman no mu hɔ.
title: Edith Jones : Home Hymn Book, 1885.

name: MHB 916:1
verse:
. KRƆKRƆN Egya, mbɔbɔr mu ara
Tsie hɛn mpaabɔ yi;
Hɛn adɔfo a woetu kwan no,
Hwɛ hɔn do.
title: Isabel Stephana Stevenson, 1843-90.

name: MHB 916:2
verse:
. Agyenkwa Jesus, twe bɛn hɔn,
Ma hɔn kan kwankyerɛ;
Hɔn mberɛwyɛ mu fa hɔn sie
Wo nkyɛn daa.
title: Isabel Stephana Stevenson, 1843-90.

name: MHB 916:3
verse:
. Awerɛhow na mbusu mu,
Ma obi nnkɔ mmba no,
Wo dɔ mu, hwɛ kyekye hɔn werɛ 
Hɔn haw mu.
title: Isabel Stephana Stevenson, 1843-90.

name: MHB 916:4
verse:
. Na ma Wo nkwagye ho dɛw no
Nyɛ hɔn mboa na ahom;
Ma wɔndɔ Wo, nyi Wo ayɛw
Daa nyina.
title: Isabel Stephana Stevenson, 1843-90.

name: MHB 916:5
verse:
. Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, ma Wo nkyerɛkyerɛ
Ntsew hɔn abrabɔ ho;
Dom hɔn ma wondzi konyim daa
Wɔ ɔko n' mu.
title: Isabel Stephana Stevenson, 1843-90.

name: MHB 916:6
verse:
. Egya, Ɔba, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Ɔkorsa Nyame,
Hyira hɔn, gya hɔn abamba
Bɛn Wo ho.
title: Isabel Stephana Stevenson, 1843-90.

name: MHB 917:1
verse:
. DAA daa Egya, Ɔwo a egye nkwa,
Ɔwo a W'abaw si asorɛkye ban,
Ɔwo a ehyɛ po mma onnyir nntra
Bea a Ɔwo ahyɛ no biara do :
O sɛ yesu frɛ Wo ma hɔn a
Worihyia mbusu po do a, tsie hɛn !
title: William Whiting, 1825-78.

name: MHB 917:2
verse:
. Agyenkwa, Ɔwo a mframa na
Asorɛkye yɛɛ setsie maa Wo,
Ɔwo a enantseew po bun enyi,
Na edaa ne gyigyeegye mu mpo:
O sɛ yesu frɛ Wo ma hɔn a
Worihyia mbusu po do a, tsie hɛn!
title: William Whiting, 1825-78.

name: MHB 917:3
verse:
. O Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, Ɔwo a nkan n'
Ibutuuw sum kebii n' enyi,
Ɔwo a emaa ogyaa weɔweɔɔ yɛ
Na emaa kan, nkwa na asomdwee:
O sɛ yesu frɛ Wo ma hɔn a
Worihyia mbusu po do a, tsie hɛn.
title: William Whiting, 1825-78.

name: MHB 917:4
verse:
. O dɔ na tum nyina Ɔkorsa,
Kora hɛn dɔm do, mbusu mu;
Beebi a wɔwɔ biara gye hɔn,
Abo, ehum, gya na ɔtan mu,
Na wɔntow dɛw ayɛyi ndwom
Asaase na po do mma Wo.
title: William Whiting, 1825-78.

name: MHB 918:1
verse:
. O NYAME dɔ a ebaa bɔsɔɔw
Hɛn yaw na hɛn nyinsu wɔ ha,
Yɛtow hɛn dadwen gu Wo do;
Sɛ Ɔwo bɛn a, yennsuro yaw.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1808-94.

name: MHB 918:2
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn kwan no war dɛn ara
Na awerɛhow hyɛ hɛn mber ma a,
Hɛn hyɛber na sum mpo yɛmmpow;
Hɛn akoma se : Ɔwo bɛn hɛn.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1808-94.

name: MHB 918:3
verse:
. Sa enyigye tsiaa dan yɛ nkrumsi,
Na gyedzi a ohim dan suro a,
Mfar na haban a ohinhim mpo
Bɔwasa dɛ : Ɔwo bɛn hɛn.
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1808-94.

name: MHB 918:4
title: Oliver Wendell Holmes, 1808-94.

name: MHB 919:1
verse:
. O EWURADZE, Wo nsa saa yar,
Gyee nkwa tsetsebaado;
Odzii yarba na 'wu, na sum,
Na wumaa do konyim daa.
Ɔwo na efurafo, nye emum,
Ndwedweefo nye mpakye
Na akwatafo nyinara so
Pemee baa Wo hɔ daa.
title: Edward Plumptre, 1821-91.

name: MHB 919:2
verse:
. Hwɛ, Wo nsa maa nkwa na mpɔwmudzen,
Obuee ano na enyi,
Maa abran foforyɛ, dedaa adwen,
Ma ɔgyee Wo kan no;
Sesei, Ewuradze, twe bɛn,
Fa Wo tum n' hyira hɛn,
Abrɔn mu na yar mpa ho dɛ
Mbrɛ osii Genesaret n'.
title: Edward Plumptre, 1821-91.

name: MHB 919:3
verse:
. Kɔ do ara yɛ hɛn Pomfo,
Ɔwo nkwa na owu Wura;
Fa W'ahom kɛse no dwedwe,
Ma do si, na hyira.
Fa sor nyansa no ma hɔn a
Wɔfona, wohu Wo n',
Ma ahoɔdzenfo, na ayarfo
Nyina nyi W' ayɛw daa.
title: Edward Plumptre, 1821-91.

name: MHB 920:1
verse:
. ƆWO a ayarfo na hɔn a woruwu
Baa Wo hɔ, na wɔammba n' kwa,
Na eda ho dze 'yarsa kasa
Dwedwe akoma a wɔwɔ yaw,
Yɛaba W'egua n' enyim yi,
Jesus, mbɔbɔr mu, tsie hɛn.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 920:2
verse:
. Yɛdze dadwen na awerɛhow,
Akɛse na nkumaa so,
Bɔ m' ba W'enyim aber biara a
Wɔtsetsew totɔ hɛn do n'.
Yɛba W'ahengua n'enyim
Ntotɔserɛ mu ara.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 920:3
verse:
. 'Bahatɔfo, ayarfo na
Hɔn a woruwu hia ahwɛfo,
Yɛtwer Wo sor mboa kɛse n' yi,
Ma yɛngye hɔn ndzesoa no,
Mfa hɛn ayɛyɛdze mbra,
Ntotɔserɛ mu ara.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 920:4
verse:
. Ma Wo ba pa biara nnya pɛ
Wɔ ndzeyɛɛ na akoma mu
Mfa ndzi ɔdɔ ho mbra no do,
Wɔnkyerɛ awerɛkyekyer,
Mfa ayɛyɛdze mbra,
Ntotɔserɛ mu ara.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 920:5
verse:
. Ma yardɔm na hɛn awerɛhow
Ntu, W'ayarsa tum n' enyim,
Kesi dɛ nyinsukyifo n' na
Hɔn a wɔapon hɔn nyina
Dze dɛw bɔbɔ mu ehyia
Wɔ W'atsɛmbugua n' enyim.  Amen.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 921:1
verse:
. NYIMDZEE, na suahu nyina so,
Ayamuhyehye na dɔ,
Ne nyina fi Wo nkyɛn nko ba,
O hue, 'yinom fi sor;
Na afei, Ewuradze, kyekyɛ n'
Dɛ mbrɛ hia horow tse,
Ama woeetu hua ama Wo
Wɔ adwen na nyɛe pa mu.
title: Charles Kingsley, , 1819-75.

name: MHB 921:2
verse:
. Na Ewuradze, ma da n' a
Yaw na 'wu botwa n' mbra,
Ber n' na Wo pɛrpɛrdzi bɛma
Apɔwmudzen, kan, 'somdwee;
Wimu bɛtsew nwann wɔ mbea nyina,
Na kwaa bɛyɛ tumm daa,
Na dasanyi ne ndzebɔn no
Nnkɛsɛɛ paradise bio.
title: Charles Kingsley, , 1819-75.

name: MHB 922:1
verse:
. Krɔnkrɔn Nyame a w' enyim 
Atantandze remmba,
Naaso edze mbɔbɔrhu
Ehwɛ bɔn wiadze yi;
Ma hɛn akɔndɔ pa ma
Yembubu bɔn mpokyerɛm',
Ma hɛn Christ mbɔbɔrhu ma
Yɛmpɛ hɔn a wɔayew.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 922:2
verse:
. Hɛn tamfo n' yɛ nyitsewfo; 
No dɔm so ho yɛ hu
Ɔdze mbusu piinara
Sɛɛ hɛn asaase pa;
Hɔn a wɔko tsia hɔn no
Wɔ ɔko dzendzen no mu n',
Wɔ dɛ wɔyɛ dzen mbordo
Wɔ Christ akodze mu.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 922:3
verse:
. 'Wo na ayɛ wɔ hɛn mu 
Ndwuma akɛse a yehu 'i,
Yɛda W' ase dza ayɛ,
Ɔnye dza ebɛyɛ;
Yɛda W' ase wɔ enyidar
A ɔhyɛ hɛn nsa dzen,
Ma yɛper hwehwɛ nhyira a
Ɔkyɛn dza hɛn nsa aka.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 922:4
verse:
. Ahotsew na Mbɔbɔrhu 
Na Dɔ na Tum Nyame e!
Dzi kan kodu dɛ ko yi
Ɔbɔ adze asomdwee mu.
Na hɔn a wɔdze mpaabɔ
Peer gyee hɔn enuanom
Dze konyindwom behyia Wo
O Ɔkorsa Krɔnkrɔn!    Amen.
title: Samuel John Stone, 1839-1900.

name: MHB 923:1
verse:
. Dza yɛdze ma W' biara, 
Hɛn Wura, Woara Wodze a;
Dza yɛwɔ nyina yɛ Wodze:
Edze maa hɛn esie.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 923:2
verse:
. Ma yɛngye W' akyɛdze 
Dɛ ahwɛdofo pa,
Dɛ mbrɛ ihyira hɛn n', yɛmfa dɛw,
Mfa hɛn ndɔbaa mbrɛ Wo.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 923:3
verse:
. 'Koma pii abobɔ, 
Hia wɔ efi pii mu,
Na nguambaa pii a Guanhwɛfo n'
Wui maa hɔn n' atɔ gon.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 923:6
verse:
. Hɛn gyedzi yɛ mberɛw dze, 
So yɛgye W' asɛm dzi;
Nyame, dza yɛyɛ ma Wo mba,
Yɛyɛ ma Woara.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 923:45
verse:
. Ebɛkyekye werɛ, 
'Behyira abɔbɔfo,
Bɔhwehwɛ ankonam nye ngyanka,
Iyi nye nyamesom.
 
. Ebɛgye adaduafo, 
'Dze abɔn bɛbrɛ Nyame,
'Bɛkyerɛ nkwa na asomdwee kwan n',
Yɛ Christianyɛ ampa.
title: William Walsham How, 1823-97.

name: MHB 924:1
verse:
. Christ, W' enyimnyam hyɛ wim' ma, 
Christ, Wo nko nye nokwar kan,
Ndzeyɛtsenenee Ewia, pue,
Hyɛ anago sum nyina do;
Sor Adzekyee, bra me nkyɛn
Hyerɛn m' akomam', yɛ hɔ kann.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 924:2
verse:
. Annka adzekyee ho ammba a, 
Nna da n' nyina ayɛ awerɛhow;
Metse sum nye mbusu mu,
Kɛpem dɛ W' ehumbɔbɔr
Hyerɛn dze dɛw hyɛ mo mu,
Na ɔbɔ m' akoma mu hyew.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 924:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 925:1
verse:
. ANAPA woraba epue :
Ewuradze, yɛserɛ Wo,
Kan a ofi kan a obi annyɛ Wo,
Kyerɛ hɛn kwan.
title: Anonymous, c. 8th cent.; tr. by Greville Phillimore, 1821-84.

name: MHB 925:2
verse:
. Gyirama na nsa ho ntsew,
Na adwen mu nyɛ wansann,
Ma nokwar no nda hɛn ano,
Yɛnyɛ adɔyɛ.
title: Anonymous, c. 8th cent.; tr. by Greville Phillimore, 1821-84.

name: MHB 925:3
verse:
. Adzekyee resen yi,
Kɔ do yɛ hɛn Hwɛfo;
Ewuradze, kora hɛn akoma
Sɔnn fi bɔn mu.
title: Anonymous, c. 8th cent.; tr. by Greville Phillimore, 1821-84.

name: MHB 925:4
verse:
. Ma yendzi hɛn dwuma
Daa nhyɛ Wo enyimnyam;
Na sɛ hɛn mber nye Wo hyɛ ase a,
Ma ɔnye Wo nwie.
title: Anonymous, c. 8th cent.; tr. by Greville Phillimore, 1821-84.

name: MHB 926:1
verse:
. M'EGYA, anafua fofor so
Mu nda na ahomgye pa,
Na anapa kan ho dɛw nyina ntsi
Nhyira nka Wo dzin krɔnkrɔn n'.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 926:2
verse:
. Mutu moho ka da fofor
Yi ho dze hyɛ Wo nsa,
Dɛ me bra nyɛ dɛ dza Ɔwo pɛ,
Na ma Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 926:3
verse:
. Kɛse na kumaa a m'bɛyɛ n' ndɛ,
Dza m'bɛka na m'bɔdwen.
Ma memfa nhyɛ Wo enyimnyam
Wɔ Jesus Ne dzin mu .
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 926:4
verse:
. M'Egya, Wo dzin ntsi na mosɔr,
Gye W'abofra, hyira no.
Na ndɛ dua W'adom do gya m'
Fa tsenenee akwan do.
title: Henry Williams Baker, 1821-77.

name: MHB 927:1
verse:
. AKOMA a wɔgye wi nyan,
Na enyiwa a wohu sor kan no a
Ɔyɛ adze nyina fofor n',
Nya enyigye, yɛ enyansafo.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 927:2
verse:
. 'Napa biara dɔ a onyan hɛn
Na ɔma yɛsoɛr no yɛ fofor;
Ɔdze hɛn twa nda na sum sɔnn
San ba nkwa, tum na nyansa mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 927:3
verse:
. Adzekyeenyim biara a yɛsɔr n',
Mbɔbɔrhu fofor kyin hɛn ho;
Mbusu pa, yenya bɔnfakyɛ,
Nyame ho adwen, sor enyisun.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 927:4
verse:
. Sɛ hɛn daa daa dwumadzi mu
Yɛtsew dza yɛyɛ biara ho a,
Nyame bɛma hɛn ndzepa a ɔsom
Bo pii ma yɛdze aabɔ N'afɔr.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 927:5
verse:
. 'Nyɛnkofo na mbea adadaw
Sakyer yɛ dɛ heaven ma hɛn;
Dɔ na mpaabɔ kan bi bɛhyerɛn
Hɛn amandzehu biara do.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 927:6
verse:
. Hɛn nkukubɔ, hɛn dwumadzi,
Bɛma hɛn dza yehia nyina;
Yebenya kwan apa hɛnho,
Na ɔama daa yaabɛn Nyame.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 927:7
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo dɔ kɛse n' mu,
Siesie hɛn ma sor ahomgye n';
Na boa hɛn ndɛ na daa nyina
Na yɛrosɔr n' yeepinkyɛn Wo daa.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 928:1
title: James Englebert Vanner, 1831-1906.

name: MHB 928:2
verse:
. Asaasè a enyan riyi W' ayɛw,
Wo ndwuma nyina tow
W'enyimnyam,
Ma hɛn akoma a dɔ ebu do no,
Mfa hɔn ayɛdze mbra enyigye m'.
Ɔwo akyerɛ nnoma ndwon,
Ma hɛn akoma nnyi W' ayɛw.
title: James Englebert Vanner, 1831-1906.

name: MHB 928:3
title: James Englebert Vanner, 1831-1906.

name: MHB 928:4
title: James Englebert Vanner, 1831-1906.

name: MHB 929:1
title: Frederic Rudolph Ludwig von Canitz, 1654-99;

name: MHB 929:2
title: Frederic Rudolph Ludwig von Canitz, 1654-99;

name: MHB 929:3
title: Frederic Rudolph Ludwig von Canitz, 1654-99;

name: MHB 929:4
verse:
. Hu dɛ ɔhwɛ w'akwan mu daa,
Ɔda mfom a
Ɔhyɛ hɛn mu biara edzi;
'Nyimguasedze a wɔakata do n'
Oyi to gua,
Na ɔhwehwɛ bɔn biara mu.
title: Frederic Rudolph Ludwig von Canitz, 1654-99;

name: MHB 929:5
verse:
. Wo nkwa mber da a odzi ekyir n',
'Werɛhow apa n',
Ntwa mu wɔ nda dɛɛdɛw mu;
Na efi owu nyinsu sum mu n',
Aasoɛr dɛw mu
Eekehyia Ewia hyɛnhyɛɛn no.
title: Frederic Rudolph Ludwig von Canitz, 1654-99;

name: MHB 929:6
verse:
. Mma nnsɛɛ hɛn Nyame akyɛdze,
Na mma mmpow kan,
Mbom tsie No Sunsum Ne ndze;
Enye N' bɛtsena, na ibohu
Mbrɛ kan reda
Ndzɛmba nyina edzi petee.
title: Frederic Rudolph Ludwig von Canitz, 1654-99;

name: MHB 930:1
verse:
. O NKWA Wura, Wo nkenyan ndze n'
Ma motow anapa ndwom;
Medze enyigye nsɛm bedzi dɛw
Dɛ meyɛ Wodze daa.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 930:2
verse:
. Muhu Wo kan, metse W' mframa,
Wiadze yi yɛ W'asɛm;
Dza onyan m'akoma na m'adwen nye
W'enyim nhunii, Ewuradze.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 930:3
verse:
. Dɛm ntsi mefa dza ɔkrɔn no' na,
Medan m'enyi kyerɛ Wo,
Dɛm ntsi mikenyan m'akoma
Dze som ahokeka mu.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 930:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma mentsena nkwa m' na
Monkɔ do nsoɛr mfi owu m';
Mo Wura, ma m' sunsum enyi ngye,
Ma m' daa daa edziban.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 930:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, kasa m'akoma m'
Ma onya ahokeka;
Kesi dɛ sum na ɔpon bɛba,
Ma mada wɔ Wo mu.
title: George MacDonald, 1824-1905.

name: MHB 931:1
verse:
. Me kra, yɛ ntsɛm nye ewia nnyan 
N-si mu ntu wo daadaa kwan;
Sun akwadwer to nkyɛn na soɛr
Fa dɛw bɔ w' anapa afɔr.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:2
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:3
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:4
verse:
. Me kra, nyan na ma woho do, 
Fa woho bɔ abɔfo ho,
Na hɔndze, anago nyina
Wɔtow ndwom ma Ɔsor Hen daa.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:5
verse:
.	Ayɛyi nka W', Ɔwo a esie m' 
Na ama m' ahomgye a ɔwɔ ndam':
Sɛ mifi wum' so minyan a
Ma mo so me nsa nka daa nkwa.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:6
verse:
. Mobɔ W' anohoba fofor: 
Ma mo bɔn ntwamm' dɛ bɔsu nkɔ,
Woara weɔn m' adwen nsunyiwa,
Fa Wo Sunsum hyɛ me kra ma.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:7
verse:
. M' adwen, me nsɛm, nye me ndeyɛɛ- 
Woara dzi ne nyina do ndɛ,
Na dza mowɔ na dza mutum
Nyina aabɔm' wɔ Wo nkamfom'.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 931:8
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 932:1
verse:
. O NYAME, enyimnyam hyɛnn n' ne fɛw,
Ɔwo a edze kan fi kan m' ba;
O kan mu Kan, kan nsunyiwa,
O Da a ɔma nda nyina kan.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:2
verse:
. 'Wo nokwar Ewia, ma W'ahentum
Hyerɛn nwanwa n' ngyegye hɛn do;
Sunsum N'ahosan nserɛmɛn no
Nhyerɛn hɛn nyimpasu no do.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:3
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn ntotɔserɛ so ba
Daapem enyimnyam Egya N'enyim,
Adom na tum nyina Egya n',
Dɛ ɔmpam hɛn mfi bɔn ho enyigye m'.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:4
verse:
. Ongya hɛn wɔ papayɛ mu,
Ma yɛmfa ɔdɔ nka enyiber nhyɛ,
Ɔmma sasabɔn ndan nyɛ siar,
Na yennya adom ngye hɛn mfom nto m'.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:5
verse:
. Hɛn adwen-nhyɛ Noara Ne nsamu,
Hɛn honam ho ntsew ndzi N' nokwar;
Na gyedzi gya n' na ɔndzɛw hɔ 
Na ɔnhyew Satan no Nworahaban n'.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:6
verse:
. Na Christ bɛyɛ hɛn edziban,
Hɛn nsu fi No hɔ bɛpem kwa,
Sunsum m' wenyin a ɔhyɛ ma n',
Onnsi atwetwe, na ɔma kra n' do.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:7
verse:
. Ma yɛmfa dɛw nhyɛ da yi ase,
Hɛn nwansann nsɛ anapahema,
Hɛn gyedzi ndzɛw dɛ wigyinae,
Na nkrumsi bi mmba witɔree.
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 932:8
title: Ambrosius, 340-97;

name: MHB 933:1
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 933:2
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 933:3
verse:
. Yenyim hɛn me m' bi,
Na yenyim hɛn tamfo n' so, 
Ɔdɔɔ so mpo ma hɛn dɛ
W'enyi tua hɛn mbusu nyina;
Yɛreserɛ Wo yi, mma nnkam hɛn
Wo tsema na dza yehia.
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 933:4
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ yeefua W'asɛm mu,
Yaatsena W'adom no mu daa!
Yeetu hɛnho ahyɛ Wo nsamu
Dze hɛn pɛ nyina ahyɛ W' pɛ ase;
Aadwen, aakasa, aayɛ dza
Ɔbɔsɔ W'enyi ara nko.
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 933:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, tsie hɛn ntsɛm;
Tsie na ma hɛn akyɛdze
Kɛse a Wo dɔ dze ma n',
Nokwar akoma a ɔhwɛ W' nko,
Ma ndɛ na hɛn nkwa nda nyina
Yeeyi W' Christ hɛn Nyame ayɛw.
title: William Bright, 1824-1901.

name: MHB 934:1
verse:
. AYƐYI nka Nyia ɔtse dɛw mu,
Nyia ɔbɔɔ kan na sum no;
N'ahengua yɛ sum wɔ maa a
Wɔammbɔ no bun no mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 934:2
verse:
. N'enyi hwira m' paapaa adwen
Na nyɛe biara m' kofee;
Sum kebii mu dze mpo da edzi
N'enyim dɛ ewia ketee.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 934:3
verse:
. Ahemfo Hen, nyia Ɔwo gya no n',
Mbusu biara nnhaw no;
Wo ntsaban no nwin no ase
Na wɔbɔhom hɔ sɔnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 934:4
verse:
. W'abɔfoe botwe hɔn mpa ho
Ehyia anweɔn hɔn ndaa m',
Wo gyedzi na nokwar bɔweɔn
Hɔn, 'siandɛ Ɔwo nnda.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 934:5
verse:
. Na sɛ ahomgye na adwen papa
Ma yenya foforyɛ a,
Yɛnye adzekyee no tsew hɛn enyi
Na yehyira Siarfo n'.   Amen.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 935:1
verse:
. ƆSOR Egya , maba Wo hɔ,
Mohwe W'enyim dɛ daduanyi,
Ama Wo dɔ no aagye me
Wɔ da yi mu adzesoa ase.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 935:2
verse:
. Memmba dɛ muruguan m'asodzii,
Memmba dɛ muruguan aperdzi n';
Merebɛgye ahom fofor dze asɔw,
Rohwehwɛ tum fofor abɔ bra.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 935:3
verse:
. Pii na wɔhwehwɛ W'enyim pa n'
Dze ekehyiahyia hɔn wu da,
Mbom mihia W'adom wiadze 'i mu,
N-kwasɛm mu yɛ dur kyɛn owu.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 935:4
verse:
. Sɛ anapa kan gyegye wimu,
Ne kan yi mo ho fi edzi
Ma mennsɛ bi a, ana nnse dɛ:
Morohoa w' sen sukwankyɛba?
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 935:5
verse:
. Sɛ ewia ketee hyɛ modo,
Ma nkukubɔ yɛ dzen dodow
Ma nkyɛ meremem a ennka dɛ;
Wo mu na m'ahoɔdzen dzi mu.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 935:6
verse:
. Sɛ sum dze wiadze kɔ ndaa mu a,
Kommyɛ a ɔba n' mu yɛ dur ma,
Nkyɛ ɔbɛhaw naaso ese
Kan bɛba 'wimbirbaa mu no.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 935:7
verse:
. O ma kan ne ngyegyee hyɛnn no
Ntow nhyɛ m'akwan nyina do daa,
Kesi dɛ gyedzi nnkotua enyi
Na hɛn nda bɛyɛ heaven nda.
title: George Matheson, 1842-1906.

name: MHB 936:1
verse:
. ENYIGYE, Kan Nyame
Egya n' N'enyim adom,
Ewuna onnyiewiei ahoɔfɛw;
Ɔsornyi, krɔnn, siarfo,
Hɛn Gyefo Jesus Christ,
Yɛdze dɛw hwɛ Wo mpuei kwan.
title: Anonymous, c. 3rd cent.,

name: MHB 936:2
verse:
. Ansaana wimu bomua
Yehu ewimbir kan n',
Yehyia tow hɛn ndowm dɛɛdɛw;
Dze kamfo tum Egya,
Ɔwo Ne Ba a ɔwoo n' n',
Na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no so.
title: Anonymous, c. 3rd cent.,

name: MHB 936:3
verse:
. Wo nko na ayɛyi ndwom
Krɔnkrɔn nyina yɛ Wodze,
O Nyame Ba, nkwa Mafo,
Dɛm ntsi Ɔwo sorsornyi,
Wiadze hyɛ Wo enyimnyam,
Wobohuhuor Wo daa daa.
title: Anonymous, c. 3rd cent.,

name: MHB 937:1
verse:
. WONHUA N'enyimnyam kan a ɔma akomatɔm'!
Ɔno a ɔyɛ bɛkyebo Egya siarfo,
Krɔnkrɔn mu, Krɔnkrɔn Jesus Christ hɛn Wura
Afei yɛaba 'wimbir ahomgye ber mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 937:2
verse:
. Ewimbir nkandzea hyerɛn hɛn do,
Yɛtow Egya na Ɔba nye Sunsum 
Krɔnkrɔn n' ndwom,
Efata dɛ daa yɛdze gyirama krɔnn
Tow ndwom kamfo Wo',
Ɔwo hɛn Nyankopɔn Ba nkwa Mafo;
Dɛm ntsi W'enyimnyam ahyɛ wiadze nyina ma.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 938:1
verse:
. EGYA a etse sorsor wɔ wimu
Ma hɛn ewimbir ndwom a yɛrotow yi
Nyi W' mbɔbɔrhu kɛse n' nkyerɛ:
Wo dɔ n'anyɛn hɛn ndɛ da yi,
Wo nhwɛdo dze sor ayamuyie pii
Edzi hɛn enyim hɛn bra m'.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 938:2
verse:
. Gyefo, fa ndɛ bɔn nyina kyɛ,
Adwembɔn, nyɛe basabasa,
Enyiber, ntsɛn na ahantan;
O Ɔwo Calvary Eguambaa,
Yi hɛn fi wiadze na honam m',
Gye hɛn nkwa a sesei na daa.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 938:3
verse:
. Yɛ hɛn akokyɛm na hɛn akontar,
Tsia abɔnsam ndaadaa ɔnye
Esunsum bɔn nyina hɔn tum;
Wo tum nwowaw hɛn anafua yi
Na ma sor asomdwee nka hɛn
Na abɔfo so nsian hɛn do.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 938:4
verse:
. Anafua bɔw rososɔ yi,
Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn, ma Wo kommyɛ n'
Nhyɛ akoma biara mu,
Ma yemmua hɛn enyi bɔkɔɔ,
Na ma hɛn akra nhom Wo nko mu,
Ɔwo Ɔkorsa daa siarfo.  Amen.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 939:1
verse:
. EWIA rokɔtɔ ntsɛm,
Adze resa;
Ma dɔ nda no ho edzi
Mbɔ n'ewimbir afɔr.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 939:2
verse:
. Christ sɛɛn mbeamudua no do n',
Ɔbɔɔ N' tsir adze,
Na ɔdze Ne kra hyɛɛ
N'Egya Ne nsamu yie.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 939:3
verse:
. Dɛm ara na m' kra so
Dze noho nyina
Hyɛ Krɔnkrɔnnyi Ne nsa,
Nyia esunsum nyina tse n' mu.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 939:4
verse:
. Afei Egya N'enyim
Na m'bɔhom komm,
Monnkɔdwen hweeara ho,
Ber a meda No bomu n'.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 939:5
verse:
. Ne pɛ na ɔnyɛ hɔ,
Mbrɛ obesi bia 'a;
Oewu ama Noho,
Ndzɛmba nyina bɛn No.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 939:6
verse:
. Dɛm na m'bɛtsena ase
Na nnyɛ emi a,
No tum no dɔ nyina
Tse ase mo mu ndɛ.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 939:7
verse:
. Ɔkorsa Krɔnkrɔn kor,
Ewuradze kor,
Mebɛyɛ Wodze daa,
Wo so yɛ medze daa.   Amen.
title: Edward Caswall, 1814-78.

name: MHB 940:3
verse:
. Fa W' adom a ɔhyɛ kra nkuran n' 
Twe hɛn 'koma kɔ sor man ho;
Boa hɛn ma yɛmfa hɛn enyi
Ntsim sor man n' do.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 940:4
verse:
. Mbrɛ kan na dɛw na asomdwee 
Bɔ mu yɛ kor dzi hen wɔ hɔ n',
Nna sor abɔfo nngyaa hɔn ndwom
Tow ara da n'.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 940:5
verse:
. Mbrɛ ahotsewfo hyɛ ntar fitaa n' 
Na ewimbir sunsuma ngye hɔ da n'
Mbrɛ 'Wo ɔdomankoma Kan mu kan
Yɛ abɔso Hen.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 940:12
verse:
. Anapawi hyɛnhyɛnn n' etwam' 
Ɔahwer ne hyɛnhyɛnn nyina ntsɛm
Adzesaa no sunsuma retsen
Prɛko so bio.
 
. Hɛn nkwa tse dɛ ɔpɛber da 
N' enyimnyam wi n' twam' ntsɛmara
Gya hɛn, O Christ, 'Wo a eyɛ nkwa,
Kodu fie sɔnn.
title: Godfrey Thring, 1823-1903.

name: MHB 941:1
verse:
. OWURA Jesus, tsetsebaado
Beenu nye W' nantseew 'wimbir bi,
Dɔ nwanwa mapa hyɛɛ hɔn ndam
Ma wɔserɛɛ W' dɛ nye hɔn ntsena.
Adze resa yi hɛn so serɛ W'
Dɛ mma nngyaa hɛn witɔree yi.
title: James Aschroft Noble, 1844-96.

name: MHB 941:2
verse:
. Ana hɔn akoma ammfram?
Na kaansa woennhu hɔn Wura mpo a,
Hɔn esunsum ho ammper hɔn?
Woenntum amma Hɔho n' annkɔ.
Hɛn a yenyim Wo sɔr mbordo
Dɛ mma nngyaa hɛn da n'ewiei yi.
title: James Aschroft Noble, 1844-96.

name: MHB 941:3
verse:
. Bi a hɛn so mber pii no yennhu
Nyia ɔnye hɛn anantsew kwan do;
Ɔbra ne begyabegyayɛ m'
Yɛanntse dza ewɔ ka kyerɛ hɛn
Anafua kɔnkɔnnkɔn no mu,
Dɔfo Ewuradze, yɛbɛtse W' ndze.
title: James Aschroft Noble, 1844-96.

name: MHB 941:4
title: James Aschroft Noble, 1844-96.

name: MHB 941:5
verse:
. Owura siarfo, nnyɛ anafua 'i nko,
Yɛnye Wo bɛnantsew daa daa,
Abɔ namɔn akɔ Emmaus
Eketsie Wo dɔ na tum ndze n',
Na anafua biara yɛatsena
Wo nkyɛn ahwɛ W', enya ahomka.
title: James Aschroft Noble, 1844-96.

name: MHB 942:1
verse:
. Gyefo dɔfo, me kra n' ewia, 
Ɔwo 'bɛn a, adze nnsa da;
O mma mununkum biara mmfi fam'
Nn-suma W' mmfi W' akowaa enyiwam'!
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 942:2
verse:
. Ber a enyikom aka me 
Dɛ bɔsu a ogu asaase do,
N-da refa m' a, m' adwen nyɛ
Dɛ Christ bom' nda n' ɔbɛyɛ dɛw!
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 942:3
verse:
. Bra begya m' kwan fi ahema, 
Na innyi hɔ a, munntum mmbɔ bra;
Adze sa so a nye me bɛtsena:
Musuro owu sɛ innyi hɔ a.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 942:4
verse:
. Wo ba bi a ɔafom kwan wɔ hɔ a 
N-dɛ so oetsia W' asɛm do a,
Adom dwuma n' nhyɛ ase ber yim';
Mma ɔnnda ho ara nnda bɔn mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 942:5
verse:
. Hwɛ ayarfo do; ma ehiafo 
Nhyira a ofi W' adom mbordo;
Hɔn a awerɛhow atɔ hɔn do,
Wɔnda dɛ mbɔtoaba berɛww.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 942:6
verse:
. Yenyan a, bra na behyira hɛn 
Ansaana yeesim' etu kwan,
Ekodu dɛ hɛn nkwa yi ayew
Wɔ sorsor Wo dɔ no bun mu.
title: John Keble, 1792-1866

name: MHB 943:1
verse:
. 'NYIMNYAM nka Wo, me Nyankopɔn,
Wɔ da yi mu nhyira no ntsi;
Ahemfo Hen, fa m' sie anafua 'i
Wo ntsaban kɛse no ase.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:2
verse:
. Ewuradze, Wo dɔ Ba no ntsi
Fa da yi mu mo mfom kyɛ me,
Ama meenya asomdwee kɛse 
Ber a morokɔ ndaa mu yi.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:3
verse:
. Kyerɛ me ma mombɔ bra dɛ
Munnsuro owu kwan biara do;
Kyerɛ me owu pa n'akwan,
Ma ewiei no meenyan dɛw mu.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:4
verse:
. O ma me kra nhom wɔ Wo mu,
Na ma nda pa ndeda me yie,
Ma onsiesie mo honandua
Ma maasom me Nyankopɔn yie.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:5
verse:
. Sɛ anafua yi menntum annda a,
Fa adwen pa fi sor dwir me kra;
Mma mma adaaso bɔn bi nnhaw me,
Na sum mu etumfo bi nntsiw me.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:6
verse:
. O ma menyɛ krado daa daa,
Dɛ me kandzea so dze me nsamu;
Muhu sor a, ma m'enyi ngye,
Ber a m'bɛtse Kumfor n' Ne ndze n'.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:7
verse:
. Ayɛyi nka Wo, kan Wura,
Ɔwo a ayɛ kan Wo tsenabea;
Ngyegyee hyɛnhyɛn pem fi Wo nkyɛn,
Enyimnyam nyina Nyame Tsir no.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 943:8
verse:
. Wonyi Nyame domfo n' ayɛw,
Asaase mba, hom nyi N' ayɛw,
Ɔsor mba hom so nyi Egya,
'Ba na Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n' ayɛw.
title: Thomas Ken, 1637-1711.

name: MHB 944:1
verse:
. Adze resa ampa 
Ewimbir aba,
Na enyimkan rudum,
Ma wim' reyɛ sum.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 944:5
verse:
. Hɔn so a wonntum nnda, 
Hyɛ hɔn dzen daa daa;
Hɔn a wɔdwendwen bɔn,
Dan hɔn na twe hɔn.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 944:6
verse:
. W' abɔfo mpa m' mbusu 
Anago yi mu,
Wɔmfa hɔn atsaban
M-bɔ mo ho ban.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 944:7
verse:
. Ao, fa mo bɔn kyɛ me, 
Na ma adze nkye me
Dɛ m' akoma mu tsen
Na mo ho yɛ dzen.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 944:8
verse:
. Enyimnyam nka Egya, 
Enyimnyam nka Ba,
Nye 'Wo, Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn,
Daa, hɛn Nyankopɔn.   Amen.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 944:234
verse:
. Isum rehyɛ ampa, 
Nworaba rupuepue,
Nnoma, mbowa nye nhyiren
Bɛdeda sesei.
 
. Jesus, fa Wo nsa to 
Hɔn a wɔaberɛ do;
Na fa Wo nhyira pa
Dom hɔn ma wɔnda.
 
. Dom mbofra nkakraba 
Ma wonhu Wo daa;
Hɔn a wɔwɔ po do,
Woara hwɛ hɔn do.
title: Sabine Baring-Gould, 1834-1924.

name: MHB 945:1
verse:
. ANAFUA a yɛdze da hom n' aba bio,
Nyankopɔn mma ndzɛmba nyina nyɛ yie:
Yɛnda Ne nhyira a suro nnyi m' no ase,
' Siandɛ ɔbɛn hɛn.
title: Petrus Herbert, d. 1571;

name: MHB 945:2
verse:
. Pam adwembɔn na sunsum bɔn kɔ ekyir;
Hɛn Wura, weɔn hɛn kesi adzekyee,
Bɔ honam na kra ho ban tsia mbusu,
Soma W'abɔfoe n'.
title: Petrus Herbert, d. 1571;

name: MHB 945:3
verse:
. Tsew hɛn mpaabɔ na hɛn adwendwen ho,
Ma yennyan dɛw mu dɛ yɛwɔ Wo nkyɛn,
Yɛnsom Wo ndzɛmba nyina mu na adwen m'
Yenyi W' ayɛw.
title: Petrus Herbert, d. 1571;

name: MHB 945:4
verse:
. Ma ayarfo Woara Wo nda pa no,
Dom adaduafo, fua nyinsukyifo;
Hwɛ ekunafo na ngyanka hɔn hia,
Ka tamfo n' gu.
title: Petrus Herbert, d. 1571;

name: MHB 945:5
verse:
. 'Siandɛ yennyi boafo koraa
Ka Wo sor Nyankopɔn hɛn Hwɛfo n' ho;
Ɔwo nnkɛpa W'adɔfo dabiara,
Kan o, sum o.
title: Petrus Herbert, d. 1571;

name: MHB 945:6
verse:
. Han Egya, ayɛyi nka W', W'ahendzi mbra,
Wɔnyɛ Wo pɛ Wɔ ha dɛ sor ara;
Kora hɛn do, fa hɛn bɔn kyɛ hɛn, gye hɛn,
Sesei na daa.   Amen.
title: Petrus Herbert, d. 1571;

name: MHB 946:1
verse:
. AFEI ndua nyina ada
Na sum na fooyɛ repram
Nkurow na mbowa do;
Na 'wo, m'akoma dze, nyan
Na bɔ mpaa yie aber yi,
Yi w' Bɔfo ayɛw ansaana ada.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 946:2
verse:
. Ewia kan a aka n' rokɔ,
Na nworaba rupuepue
Wɔ wimu na ekyirkyir;
Na sɛ wɔfrɛ w' kɔ sor a,
Nyame mma w' enyimnyam ma
Innsi nkrum bio wɔ wiadze ha.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 946:3
verse:
. Adwendwen na berɛ bɔ adze,
'Siandɛ adzesaa gya abrɛfo
Na ɔma hɔn ahomgye :
M'akoma, ber bi reba a
Ibefi awerɛhow na
Bɔn ho nkowaasom nyina mu.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 946:4
verse:
. Me Jesus, tsena me nkyɛn,
Na mma 'tamfo bi mmbɛn me,
Wo ntsaban ase m' wɔ nkwa;
Sɛ 'tamfo no bɔ m' mpuw a,
Mma ɔnnhaw m' kwan biara do,
Ma W'abɔfoe ntow ndwom ntwa m' ho.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 946:5
verse:
. M'adɔfo, hom ho ndwe hom,
Hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛgye hom
Efi mbusu nyina m',
Na ɔama hom ahomgye,
Na N'abɔfoe aweɔn hom,
Na wɔabɔ hom ho ban daa daa.
title: Paulus Gerhardt, 1607-76;

name: MHB 947:1
verse:
. Ansaana m' bɛda n', yie biara 
Me Nyame
Ayɛ m' ndɛ,
M' bɛda m' Agyenkwa ase.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 947:4
verse:
. Mma nndan me nngya na dɔ me daa; 
W' Asomdwee
Nyɛ me nhyira,
Nkodu dɛ 'beyi me ha.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 947:23
verse:
. Mo Wura, memfa ndaase bɛn mma 
Wo dzin a
Ɔnnsesa n'
Mbɔbɔrhufo, dɔfo?
 
. M' ekyinkyin nyinam' 'Wo na 'gya m' 
Wɔ Wo kwanm',
Tsiee m' asɔr,
Saan me nyɛe nyina ho.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 947:56
verse:
. Mo botan, mo weɔmfo, m' aban, 
Kora m' sɔnn,
Ber a mada,
Fa Wo tum nyinara.
 
. Meka m' enyi gu do wum' a, 
Ma monsoɛr
Dɛ meka
Enyansafo no ho.
title: John Cennick, 1718-55.

name: MHB 948:1
verse:
. Enye me ntsena! onwim ano rotɔ; 
Sum regye, Ewuradze, nye me ntsena!
Aboafo pa, na akyekyewerɛfo sa a,
Onnyibi-ne-bi-a-ɔba, enye m' ntsena!
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 948:2
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 948:3
verse:
. Mihia Wo me nkyɛn aber nyinara, 
W' adom n-ko na ɔka siamfo hyɛ;
Gyafo nye Taafo wɔ hen ka Wo ho?
Isum o, ekan o, enye me ntsena.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 948:4
verse:
. Sɛ menye Wo nam a, munnsuro hwee; 
Ɔyaw nnyɛ durdur, na nyinsu nnyɛ wen:
Owu, wo bɔr na wo konyim wɔ hen?
Mo konyim wɔ do daa, sɛ 'Wo nye m' tse a.
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 948:5
title: Henry Francis Lyte, 1796-1847

name: MHB 949:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, hwɛ, mber tsiabaa bi 
Yefi daa ɔberɛ mu,
Behyia wɔ Wo krɔnkrɔn-bea ha,
Bɔhom kakra, Wo nkyɛn.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 949:2
verse:
. Edwuma, ɔberɛ na atseetsee
Twa hɛn ho hyia daa daa,
Na ɔyɛ dzen ma hɛn dodow;
Yennya mber mpo mmbɔ mpaa.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 949:3
verse:
. Naaso nnyɛ ha nko nye bea a
Wɔdze hwehwɛ Wo wɔ;
Wo nhyira gu famu famu dwuma a
Wodzi n' nokwar m' so do.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 949:4
verse:
. Dwumadze ahorow nyina,
Nsaase pa m' 'gyapadze,
'Bɔdze ho nyimdzee na edwindze
Da Wo nhwɛdo edzi.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 949:5
verse:
. Dɛm a yɛnda hɛn sor awoo
Edzi dza yɛyɛ nyina m',
Na yɛmper wiadze ahendzi mma W'
Na nnyɛ W'atamfo no a.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 949:6
verse:
. Dwuma a wodzi no Wo pɛ do n'
Bɛyɛ dɛ mpaabɔ daa,
Na mpaabɔ a Woara akyerɛ n'
Nye edwuma yɛ adze kor.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 950:3
verse:
. Ɔda ho dze Noho 
Ma ɔkra brɛfo no;
Na ɔdze N' ahengua no ma
Akoma a no mu tsew.
title: John Keble, w. 1,3, 1792-1866; William John Hall, vv. 2,4, 1793-1861.

name: MHB 950:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, yɛrohwehwɛ W' 
Ma nhyira yi nyɛ hɛndze.
Ma hɛn akoma a ɔbotow,
Asɔrfi a ɔsɛ Wo.
title: John Keble, w. 1,3, 1792-1866; William John Hall, vv. 2,4, 1793-1861.

name: MHB 950:12
verse:
. Nhyira nka akomamutsewfo, 
Wobohu hɛn Nyame;
Nyame esumadze yɛ hɔndze
Hɛn kra yɛ Christ ne fi.
 
. Ewuradze a ofii sor 
Brɛɛ hɛn nkwa na asomdwee,
Nye nyimpa bɛtsenaa botooyɛm',
Yɛɛ Fasusu na Hen-
title: John Keble, w. 1,3, 1792-1866; William John Hall, vv. 2,4, 1793-1861.

name: MHB 951:1
title: Anatolius, 8th or 9th cent.;

name: MHB 951:2
verse:
. Da n' ne dɛw etwa mu kɔ :
Hɛn akoma ba Wo hɔ;
Yɛserɛ W' dɛ mma ɔhaw bi mmba
Dɛm sum ndɔnhwer yi mu.
O Jesu, ma hɔn sum nyɛ kan,
Na adzesaa yi mu kora hɛn.
title: Anatolius, 8th or 9th cent.;

name: MHB 951:3
verse:
. Da yi mu fona etwa m',
Yɛtow hɛn ndwom ma Wo,
Yɛserɛ W' dɛ mma mbusu bi
Nnsi sum ndɔhwer yi mu;
O Jesu, ma yengyina W'enyim,
Na adzesaa yi mu kora hɛn.
title: Anatolius, 8th or 9th cent.;

name: MHB 951:4
verse:
. Yɛ hɛn akra korafo,
'Siandɛ Ɔwo na inyim
Mbusu pii a ɔrotweɔn hɛn
Wɔ mfikyir abrɔn mu.
O Jesu dɔyɛfo, tsie hɛn.
Na gye hɛn fi ne nyina mu.  Amen.
title: Anatolius, 8th or 9th cent.;

name: MHB 952:1
verse:
. NYANKOPƆN Egya, bɛn hɛn,
Gye hɛn ɔhaw m' 'nafua yi;
Yɛ hɛn nyina Wo dɔ mba,
Sum no mu yɛ kan ma hɛn.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 952:2
verse:
. Agyenkwa, yɛ hɛn asomdwee,
Yi hɛn bɔn anafua yi;
Ka fahodzi asɛm no
Dan hɛn sum ma ɔnyɛ kan.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 952:3
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 952:4
verse:
. Ɔkorsa Krɔnkrɔn, bɛn hɛn;
Dɔ nwanwa a yɛkamfo Wo,
Abrabɔ m' na 'wu m' boafo,
Ewuradze, tsew hɛn sum do!.  Amen.
title: George Rawson, 1807-89

name: MHB 953:1
verse:
. EWURADZE, Ɔwo a ipue ma dwumadzi m'
Ɔhyew na adzesoa brɛ adze koraa,
Enye mo so ntsena anafua kɔnn yi mu,
Sɛ ewia rokɔtɔ a, nye me ntsena.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 953:2
verse:
. Ewimbir dzinn a nhyira ahyɛ n' ma,
Dze ahomgye dɛɛdɛw bi gu mo do;
M'edwuma bɔ adze na eka mo ho a,
M'etsidaa benya edzi mu wɔ Wo mu.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 953:3
verse:
. Afei, Ewuradze, bra bɛyɛ m' Hɔhoe,
Dafua mu fona na dede ekyir no;
O ma minnya asomdwee, dɛw nye ahomgye,
Brɛ m' nkwagye, na fa mo bɔn nyina kyɛ me.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 953:4
verse:
. Kyekyer epirakur, na dwedwe yaw a
Aka mo bom' wɔ da a etwa m' yi ho n',
Na menda Egya N'bomu dɛ me yaw,
Nyina mo werɛ mfir wɔ nda pa m'.   Amen.
title: Carl Johann Philipp Spitta, 1801-59.

name: MHB 954:1
verse:
. AFE fofor reba bio,
Hɛn Wura pa, ma ɛnyɛ
Afe kor so a wɔdze
Yɛ edwuma, dze tweɔn Wo.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 954:2
verse:
. Afe fofor a mbɔbɔrhu,
Gyedzi na adom wɔ mu,
Afe fofor a W'enyim hyerɛn,
Ma dɛw ahyɛ no ma.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 954:3
verse:
. M-pontu afe fofor a
Ayɛyi ahyɛ ma, 
Afe a ɔma wohu
Wo daa daa nyina no.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 954:4
verse:
. Afe fofor a wodze som,
Dze dzi W' dɔ ho dase;
Afe fofor a wɔdze sua
Sor edwuma krɔnn yɛ.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 954:5
verse:
. Afe fofor reba bio,
Hɛn Wura pa, ma ɔnyɛ
Afe fofor mma Wo sor
Na asaase nyina so.   Amen.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 955:1
verse:
. YEGYINA afe fofor
Abobow ano,
Yehyia awerɛkyekyer nsɛm a
Otu suro nyina,
Hɛn Egya Ne ndze no
Na ɔka no wɔ
Gyedzi ahoɔdzen mu
Dze ma hɛn enyigye.
    Hom nkɔ kan, mma hom nnsuro
    Adzekyee mba nyina :
    N'asɛm runntwa mu da,
    Orunntwa mu da.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 955:2
verse:
. 'Mi Ewuradze nye w' wɔ hɔ,
Mma nnsuro ara da;
Mobɔboa w' ahyɛ w' dzen,
Mma w'abaw nngura!
Medze Me nsa nyimfa
Mubosuo wo mu;
Wɔasan mu eyi wo dɛ
'Begyina M'enyim.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 955:3
verse:
. N-dzepa a wɔahyehyɛ
Afe a ɔreba yi m'!
Nkwa nsu bopue ama
'Bɔbɔfo ehiafo;
N'adom bobu do ama
Abɔn abɔbɔfo.
Bahatɔfo benya
Ahoɔdzen mapa.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 955:4
verse:
. Ɔremmpa hen ara da
Orinngyaa hɛn so;
N'onnyiewiei ahyɛmu no,
Orummbu do da!
Yɛtwer N'anohoba a,
'Bɛn na yebosuro?
Nyankopɔn so dze ma
Afe a ɔreba 'i.
title: Frances Ridley Havergal, 1836-79.

name: MHB 956:1
verse:
. Hom mbra ma yentu 
Hɛn kwan yi fofor
Yɛnye afe yi nkyin,
Na mma yenngyina kyerɛ hɛn Wura aba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 956:4
verse:
. Wɔatow egyen no, 
M-ber no ɔkɔ;
Apem afe no
Ɔrobɔto hɛn, na onnyiewiei aba.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 956:5
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ biara aaka 
Da a ɔbɛba n' dɛ,
Mako ɔko pa n'
Dwuma a edze maa me n' mewie ne nyina yɛ.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 956:6
verse:
. Ao, nkyɛ biara aatse, 
No Wura reka n' dɛ:
M-bo, ayɛ n' yie
Hɛn me dɛw mu na tsena M' ahengua no do.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 956:23
verse:
. Hom ma yɛmfa dɛw 
Yɛnyɛ N' apɛdze,
Yɛmfa abotar
Na dɔ dwumadzi nsi hɛn adom no pi.
 
. Hɛn nkwa yɛ adaaso; 
Hɛn mber tse dɛ nsu a
Ɔrepem hwew hwew
Na mber kobɔnyi no nngyina ara pɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 957:1
verse:
. EGYA, ma muntu afe yi
Nyina nsi hɔ mma W',
Ɔbra mu gyinabew biara a 
Epɛ dɛ mokɔ m',
Awerɛhow, yaw na haw;
Me mpaabɔ ara nye dɛ
'Nyimnyam nka Wo dzin.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 957:2
verse:
. Ana abofra botum akyerɛ
Mbrɛ obesi abɔ bra?
Aso Egya bi n' dɔ bɔpow
Dɛ ɔyɛ dza oye nyina?
Dza yebisa no daa no
Ema ma ɔbor do,
Emmbra hɛn dɛ yɛka dɛ
Enyimnyam nka W' dzin.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 957:3
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 957:4
verse:
. Sɛ efrɛ m' ba mbeamudua n' ho,
Na no sunsuma n' ba,
Na mohwer m'adze nyina,
M'akoma na fie mpo a,
Ma mondwen mbrɛ Wo Ba n' sii
Baa N'enyimnyam mu,
Na mbusu m' monkɔ do nsɔr :
Hyɛ W' dzin enyimnyam.   Amen.
title: Lawrence Tuttiett, 1825-97.

name: MHB 958:1
verse:
. O NYAME, Tsetse Botan,
Ɔwo a ewɔ hɔ daa
Ehumtuber mu nyina
Hɛn asomdwee guandɔbea :
Ansaana erobɔ wiadze
Etse dɛm sesei so,
Mbersantsen nyinara mu,
Bɛkyebo Woara a.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 958:2
verse:
. Hɛn mfe tse dɛ esunsum a
Wi tow gu akoko do,
Anaa nkyɛkyɛr mu nsensan a
Onyin prɔmprɔm dze wu :
Nda, adaaso, kodzi bi a
Ahɔho tow no ntsɛm,
Ndzɛmba a ɔyɛ dadaw ntsɛm
N'enyimnyam a ɔnnkye.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 958:3
verse:
. O Ɔwo a enntɔ nkom nnda,
Na Wo kan so nnhyɛ sum,
Kyerɛ hɛn, yɛnkan hɛn nda yie 
Ansaana mfe n' ahwer.
Wo mbɔbɔrhu nhyerɛn hɛn do
Wo ayamuyie nye hɛn ntsena
Na ma Wo Sunsum nhyerɛn 
Akoma a ehyira no n' mu.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 958:4
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, fa fɛwyɛ na adom
Bɔ hɛn gyedzi abɔtsir,
Kɛpem dɛ kan mu, afebɔɔ
Yebohu W' enyim na enyim:
Enyigye a wonnsusu
Tse dɛ bura a ebu do
Enyigye a ɔpem afebɔɔ
Dɛ po a onnyi mpoano.
title: Edward Henry Bickersteth, 1825-1906.

name: MHB 959:1
verse:
. HOM ntow Jehovah N'ayɛyi,
Nkamfo nyina dzi wɔ N';
Ɔno a ɔma hɛn nda mu war,
Hɛn ndwom pa no fata N'.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 959:2
verse:
. Ɔahwɛ hɛn do dze hɛn etwa
Afe kor so no mu;
Hɛn nyina dzedze ndwom fofor
Befir Nyame N'enyim.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 959:3
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 959:4
verse:
. Hɛn ano na hɛn bra bɛka
Wo dɔ n'anwanwadze;
Yɛnam Jesus N'anamɔn mu
Bohu W'enyim wɔ sor.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 959:5
verse:
. Hɛn nda ne nkaase yɛ Wodze,
Ne nyina yɛdze ma W';
Hɛn tum biara yetu si nkyɛn,
Yɛdze bɔ afɔr ma Wo.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 960:1
verse:
. ADOM mba a wɔapon hom nyina,
Hom nhur dɛw krɔnkrɔn no,
Hom mbɔ ose nyi Pomfo N' ayɛw,
Ntow dasu mu ndwom krɔnn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 960:2
verse:
. Nhyira, ndaase, ɔdɔ na tum,
Wɔmfa mma hɛn Jesus,
Ɔno na ɔdan hɛn sum yɛ kan,
Na ɔdan hɛn hɛll hɛven.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 960:3
verse:
. Hɔ na ogya hɛn gyedzi akra kɔ,
Hɔ na ɔma yɛsoɛr,
Hyɛ hɛn enyigye ahenkyɛw
Dze kehyia No wɔ wimu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 961:1
verse:
. AWƆBER anago fua sum no
Rutwa m' sen wɔ wimu,
Yɛba Wo nkyɛn, N-kwa na Kan,
Behyia wɔ som krɔnkrɔn mu,
Ber a afe n' ewiei reba yi,
Yɛma hɛn ndze do su frɛ Wo,
Totɔ serɛ Wo dɔ n' bio.
title: James Hamilton, 1819-96.

name: MHB 961:2
verse:
. Yɛkotow Wo mbeamudua n'enyim,
Yɛdze hɛn mpaabɔ ba W' nkyɛn,
Rekaa W'adom nyina sesei
Na yɛka hɛn bɔn to gua
Reserɛ Wo afe a ɔreba yi
Dɛ yɛntsena Wo gyedzi na suro m'
Na fa Wo nhyira no ma hɛn.
title: James Hamilton, 1819-96.

name: MHB 961:3
verse:
. Yeehyia dɔnhwer tsiaba yi mu
Rekaakaa W'ehumbɔbɔr n',
Hɛn ndaase ndwom gye W'ayamuyie
Wo dɔ na W' tum ho dase :
'Siandɛ ayɛ hɛn ahoɔdzen na mboa
Wɔ sum na ɔhaw da no mu,
Ɔhaw na abɛbrɛsɛ nyina m'.
title: James Hamilton, 1819-96.

name: MHB 961:4
verse:
. Nyame kɛse, dɛm a, mfe a ɔreba n',
Dza ɔbɔto hɛn biara,
Hɛn fiekɔ akwantu no mu,
Gya hɛn taataa nye hɛn nkɔ
Na mma nngyaa hɛn ɔbra n'ewiei,
Gye hɛn sɔnn wɔ haw na aperdzi m'
Heaven bɛgye hɛn esie.
title: James Hamilton, 1819-96.

name: MHB 962:1
verse:
. NDAASEFO nyina, hom mbra,
Hom mfa ndɔbaa ndwom mbra fie:
Ndzɛmba nyina ayɛ krado,
Ansaana ɔpɛber ehum tu n'
Nyame hɛn Bɔfo Noara
Bɛma dza yehia nyina.
Hom mbra Nyame N'asɔrfi m',
Hom nhur ndɔbaa afahyɛ ndwom n'.
title: Henry Alford,1810-71.

name: MHB 962:2
verse:
. Wiadze nyina yɛ Nyame N' kwa a
Ɔsow ayɛyi aba ma N',
'Wifua na nworahaban wɔ m';
Wɔdze enyigye anaa yaw nyin,
Wonyin nkakrankakra ara
Na afei ɔsow aba.
Ewuradze, boa ma yɛnyɛ
Aba pa a no ho tsew.
title: Henry Alford,1810-71.

name: MHB 962:3
title: Henry Alford,1810-71.

name: MHB 962:4
verse:
. Dɛm a, Ewuradze, bra ntsɛm;
Fa ewiei ndɔbaa n' bra fie,
Boaboa Wo nkorɔfo ano bra m',
Yi hɔn fi yaw na bɔn mu;
Tsew hɔn ho wɔ hɔ da nyina
Ma wɔntsena Wo siar fie,
Enye W' abɔfoe nyina mbra,
Hom mfa ndɔbaa afahyɛ ndwom n'.   Amen.
title: Henry Alford,1810-71.

name: MHB 963:1
verse:
. YƐDƆW nhaban, yɛpe aba a
Oye gu asaase do,
Na Nyame tumfo Ne nsa
Ɔtɔ nsu gugu do;
Ɔma hɛn nsu wɔ duaber
Ɔma ɔhyew huhur aba n',
Ɔbɔ mframa, ofir ewia
Na ɔtɔ nyankonsu.
    'Kyɛdze pa a etwa hɛn ho n',
    Wɔ dze fi sor ma hɛn:
    Da Ewuradze ase, O da N'ase,
    Wɔ N' dɔ nyina ntsi.
title: Matthias Claudius, 1740-1815;

name: MHB 963:2
verse:
. No nko na ɔyɛ ndzɛmba a
Wɔbɛn, wɔ ekyir nyina Yɛfo,
Ogu nhyiren wɔ kwan nkyɛn,
Ɔsɔ anago nworaba;
Mframa na asorɛkye tsie No,
Ɔno na ɔnyɛn nnoma;
Na akantam hɛn, Ne mba,
Ɔma hɛn edziban daa.
title: Matthias Claudius, 1740-1815;

name: MHB 963:3
verse:
. Egya, yɛda Wo ase
Wɔ ndzepa nyina ho,
Duaber na buber, hɛn nkwa,
Apɔwmudzen, na edziban;
Gye akyɛdze a yɛdze aba
Wɔ Wo dɔ nyina ntsi,
Na dza ehwehwɛ kɛse a
Ɔyɛ hɛn ndaase akoma.
title: Matthias Claudius, 1740-1815;

name: MHB 964:1
verse:
. Yɛma hɛn akoma do tow, 
N-tonton ndwom ma W' Wura,
Yɛdze hɛn dɛw afɔr brɛ Wo
Wɔ dɛw esebɔm' ara;
Harban ahyehyɛ sika ntar
Mbepɔw dze dɛw rowosow
Mbɔnsam' ayɛ eburow ma
Ma hɔn so wɔrotow ndwom.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 964:4
verse:
. Nyame Ne bea a apapafo 
Tse do no woehyira do,
Mbrɛ sika haban kɛse wɔ,
Na esutsen hyɛnhyɛn pem.
Dɔm krɔnkrɔ nyina hɔn ndwoma no
Ndɛ ɔnye hɛndze asaa;
Buber ndwom a ɔmmbɔ adze n'
Woehyira do m-prɛnsa.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 964:23
verse:
. N-dɛ hɛn afahyɛ da yim', 
Yɛkaa Wo nsaano ayamuyie n',
Wo nhyira ndɔbaa-kan ndaase n',
Nna yɛdze gu W' enyim no
Adom akyɛdze soronko n'
Edze nyɛn hɛn nkorɔfo akra;
'Wo a 'ma hɛn asaase paanoo,
Ma hɛn onnyiewiei paanoo.
 
. Yɛsɔw adzekyee yim' fona, 
Yɛberɛ hɛn dwumadzi mu;
Na wi tɔ a, edwuma sa,
Ma nyia ɔaberɛ n' nya ahomgye
Sɛ abɔfo buber n' wie a,
N-kyɛ ekyir n' yaafata
Christ sika efiefi no a
Wɔdze kɔ asan fɛɛfɛw do n'.
title: William Chatterton Dix, 1837-98.

name: MHB 965:1
verse:
. ESUSOW aba bio,
Nkwa fir 'pɛber m' epue;
Mfikyir na kwaamu nyinara
Nhyiren apaa fɛɛfɛw.
title: Arthur Christopher Benson, 1862-1925.

name: MHB 965:2
verse:
. O esumasɛm nwanwa,
Dɛ nkwa a osumae no
Bopuei efi asaase mu
Ehyia hɛn n-daase.
title: Arthur Christopher Benson, 1862-1925.

name: MHB 965:3
verse:
. 'Napa kan a eyɛ fɛw,
Anago sum apa;
Ma nda pa a enyigye ahyɛ m' ma
Nhyerɛn hɛn akoma mu.
title: Arthur Christopher Benson, 1862-1925.

name: MHB 965:4
verse:
. Ewuradze, bue hɛn enyi;
Ma hɛn n-kwa fofor,
Ma yeehu W'esumasɛm wɔ
W'esusuowber nwanwa m'.
title: Arthur Christopher Benson, 1862-1925.

name: MHB 966:1
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 966:2
verse:
. Abran a worutwa ndɔbaa
Wɔ haban mu nyina,
Na wɔtwe eburoguanee
Fi kwa mu kɔ fie,
Suo mu tow ayɛyi ndwom
Wɔ witɔree ber,
Dze ma Nyia daa nyina
Ɔkora hɛn do n'.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 966:3
verse:
. Ɔnam ewia na nsu,
Nsutɔree na bɔw
Na esusow na ɔpɛ m'
Dɛw aber no ntsi,
Ɔnam buber no mu
Ndɔbaa bafuu n' ntsi,
Ɔnam dɔ a ɔtwee yinom
Baa hɛn pon ano ntsi.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 966:4
verse:
. Wiadze ndɔbaa rinyin
Wɔ ewia kɛse a
Ɔkyɛn dza ɔma hɛn kan
Wiadze nyina mu n' mu;
Egya, ma edwumafo
Nkɔ mbea a edwuma n' wɔ;
Na boaboa aman n' ano,
Boa hɔn ano, gye hɔn.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 967:1
verse:
. AFEI woehyira afe no
Ber a yebu eburow no :
Yɛma hɛn enyigye ndwom do.
Dze kyerɛ hɛn ndaase so,
Ɔberɛ nye awerɛhow nda a etwa m'
Runntum nnsɛɛ hɛn asomdwee,
'Siandɛ enyigye ahyɛ akoko do,
Na mbɔnsa tsea mu dzi dɛw.
   Ewuradze No nkorɔfo nyina
   Dze nduaba kan brɛ N' ndaase m';
   Yɛtow ayɛyi ma Egya no
   Wɔ buber mu enyigye ntsi.
title: Ellen Thorneycroft Fowler, 1860-1929.

name: MHB 967:2
verse:
. M-fuw nyina dzii ehurusi,
Nhaban nyina yɛɛ ahaebun,
Ber a ewia tsiiw sunsuma
Ɔhar do wɔ adandan ber m;
Buber no mu wɔkaa asɛm a
Ɔfa buber enyidar ho :
Afei ɔbɛsɛber mu enyimnyam
Dze sika furaa asaase.
title: Ellen Thorneycroft Fowler, 1860-1929.

name: MHB 967:3
verse:
. Ana hɛn a hɛn akoma
Da nda a etwa mu no ho n'
Nnkɔtow ayɛyi ndwom akyerɛ
Enyigye a ɔbɛba daakye?
Mununkum ho asomdwee ahyɛmu
Ntsi na nyankontɔn wɔ hɔ,
Mber tsentsen a asaase wɔ hɔ
Yi dze, bubuer runntwa m' da.
title: Ellen Thorneycroft Fowler, 1860-1929.

name: MHB 968:1
verse:
. Nyew, Nyame ye- wɔ sor na ase 
Epo no bun mu na kwaa mu,
Ndze ɔpedu retsea mu dɛ
Nyame bɔɔ hɛn, na Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 968:2
verse:
. Ewia a ɔnam ne kyenan do, 
Na ɔtow ne nserɛmɛn gu ase ha,
Wimu anago dɔm hyɛnhyɛnn n' nyina
Tsea mu dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 968:3
verse:
. Nnoma dze dɛw gye ndwom no do, 
Wɔtow n' fofor afe biara,
Mframa pa a ɔbɔ na nyankom
Wɔsa berɛww dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 968:4
verse:
. Metse n' wɔ mframa a ɔrobɔm', 
Ɔnye tsetse mbepɔw no do,
Sor  a ɔpaapaam', po a ɔwor
Hɔn nyinaa gye do dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 968:5
verse:
. Nyew, Nyame ye, abɔdze ka 
Dɛ mbrɛ Nyame ama kasahom;
Nyimpa mfa ayɛyi mbordo
Ntow ndwom dɛw mu dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 968:6
verse:
. Nyame yɛda W' adom ase, 
Nkanka hɛn sor edziban ho;
W' adom fakyɛ, Wo nkwasɛm no,
Ɔma yɛtow dɛ Nyame ye.
title: John Hampden Gurney, 1802-62.

name: MHB 969:1
verse:
. SOR, asaase na po Wura,
Ayɛyi na enyimnyam nka Wo;
Yensi dɛn nyi hɛn dɔ nkyerɛ Wo,
Ɔwo Ɔmafo?
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 969:2
verse:
. Wo dɔ ma ewia kan, mframa pa
Nhyiren huanhuam na nduaba pii;
Bea a ndɔbaa ber no, hɔ na Ɔwo
Ɔmafo n' wɔ.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 969:3
verse:
. Hɛn asomdwee na hɛn apɔwmudzen
Nye asaase do nhyira nyina ntsi
Yɛdze W' ndaase na ayɛyi kaw,
'Wo a ema ne nyina.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 969:4
verse:
. Annkam hɛn Wo Ba kortoo no,
Edze No maa wiadze a asɛɛ,
Na edze adze nyina kaa Siarfo
No ho dze mae.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 969:5
verse:
. Emaa hɛn Sunsum n' Ne nhyira,
No nkwa, No dɔ, ɔnye No tum;
Ihuee N'adom mbɔho esuon n'
Guu hɛn nyina do.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 969:6
verse:
. Akra a wɔapon hɔn, bɔnfakyɛ
Adom kwan na sor enyidar ntsi,
Ayɛyi nyina nka Wo Egya a
Ema ne nyina.
title: Christopher Wordsworth, 1807-85.

name: MHB 970:3
verse:
. Yɛdze hɛn fifo nyina hyɛ Wo nsa: 
Hɔn ntsi na yɛdɔw haban, yenu po,
Hɔn ntsi na dabaa yebu eburow pa,
Na 'nafua yebu pom' ndɔbaa fɛɛfɛw n'.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: MHB 970:4
verse:
.	Yɛda W' ase na ewia, bɔsu, nyankom, 
Wo tum n-sa no dze fir sor petse;-
Nnoma, mbowa, nam, nhaban, aba, nye eburow:
N-kwa horow nyina Farbaa nye 'Wo.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: MHB 970:5
verse:
. N-kwa Paanoo, aka n' W' asɛm mu dɛ: 
Nyia ɔfa Wo dzi gyedzim' n' onnkowu da!
Fa ehumbɔbɔr tsie Wo mba hɛn sufrɛ:
Ma hɛn ndɛ so hɛn daadaa edziban.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: MHB 970:6
verse:
. Dua Wo dɔ pa n' n' aba wɔ hɛn 'komam', 
Na yeebu abodwee na akomatɔm'.
Na ndaamba sɛ hɛn dwuma bɔ adze a,
Hɛn so yaaka Wo sor ndɔbaa no ho.   Amen.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: MHB 970:12
verse:
. Hɛn Wura, fi Wo sor tsenabew do tsie hɛn: 
Dɛ tsetsemba n' hɛn so yɛfona kwa,
Gyesɛ Ɔwo a eyɛ Kan n' nye hɛn kɔ;
Bra, Ewuradze, ama yeehu W' enyim.
 
. Ewuradze 'Wo na 'dzi po a ɔwor do, 
Ber a oetutu ne tsir sgu do n':
W' abaw yɛ dzen, hɛn ahɛn yɛ mberɛw,
Kaa Galilee, na fa Wo mboa ma hɛn.
title: William Henry Gill, 1839-1923.

name: MHB 971:1
verse:
. YƐDZE dɛw tow ayɛyi ndwom,
Na yɛdze ndaase hyia mu,
Yehyira Nyame dɔ a ɔwɔ sor;
Hɛn domankoma Egya.
     Yɛdze akoma nye ndze dzi dɛw
     Ma Nyia N'enyimnyam mmpa da,
     Nyia Ne nhyehyɛɛ nye hɛn bambɔ,
     Nyia ɔtse ase afebɔɔ.
title: Ambrose Nichols Blatchford, 1842-1924.

name: MHB 971:2
verse:
. Na ɔfrɛ kan fi sum kebii mu,
Na nhyiren so fi dɛtse mu;
Ne nhyira fi mununkum m' ba
Wɔ ewia anaa nsutɔ mu.
title: Ambrose Nichols Blatchford, 1842-1924.

name: MHB 971:3
verse:
. Ne mba gyinagyina N'enyim,
N'abasa bɔ hɔn ho ban;
Nyia Ne nyansaa hwɛ wiadze do,
Atsentsen hɛn anamɔn.
title: Ambrose Nichols Blatchford, 1842-1924.

name: MHB 971:4
verse:
. Biribiara nntɔ famu a onnyim,
Anaa dɛw anaa awerɛhow;
Na Nyia ndeda ohun mbɔbɔr n',
Bɛka hɛn ho ɔkyena.
title: Ambrose Nichols Blatchford, 1842-1924.

name: MHB 971:5
verse:
. Hom mma yɛmfa akoma kor
Nyi Ne dzin kɛse n' ayɛw,
Na yɛnka N' dɔ a ɔnnsesa da
Ho anwanwansɛm daa daa.
title: Ambrose Nichols Blatchford, 1842-1924.

name: MHB 972:1
verse:
. HƐN Wura, yɛdze dza ɔyɛ fɛw nyina ma Wo,
Hɛn turo m' na hɛn haban mu nhyiren,
Akyɛdze a yɛdze ma ayarfo, yenyin dɛ
Ɔwo dwen dɔ n' ho kyɛn sika a yɛma.
title: Abel Gerald Wilson Blunt, 1827-1902.

name: MHB 972:2
verse:
. Hɛn wura, fa iyinom kɛma ayarfo nyina
Ka asomdweesɛm gu hɔn akoma mu;
Kyekye hɔn a wɔayɛ mberɛw n' hɔ werɛ
Ma hɔn a woruwu nkɔ asomdwee m'.
title: Abel Gerald Wilson Blunt, 1827-1902.

name: MHB 972:3
verse:
. Ewuradze, ma hɔn a wɔayar nsoɛr bio,
Ma hɔn abrabɔ nyɛ fɛw dɛ nhyiren;
Fa W'adom ma akra a ama hɔn nkwa nyina
Ma hɔn awerɛhow ndan enyigye.
title: Abel Gerald Wilson Blunt, 1827-1902.

name: MHB 973:1
verse:
. Wondzi dɛw mma onua a oewu yi, 
No wu yi yɛ no mfaso kɛse,
Woeyi ne kra wɔ efiadze,
Woeyi no honam mpokyerɛ n' mu;
Wɔmma yɛmfa ndwom nka no do,
Yɛnye no sunsum mfow ɔsor,
Oefi nsa kɔ kan man no mu,
Ɔakɛtsena dɔ Eden no mu.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 973:2
verse:
. Hɛn nua edu ahɛndwirii hɔ, 
Ɔatsew ehum nye aahow no mu,
Tsiabaa yi ne nsa aka n' ahomgye,
Ɔadan n' afrɛ egya ekyir.
Hɔn wɔda ho da fona pom',
Reper edu siar mpoano hɔ,
Beebi mbrɛ asomdwee nko wɔ,
Na bɔn nye yaw nn-yi hɔ bio.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 973:3
verse:
. Hɔ na ahɛn dɔm nyina hyia, 
Hɔn a wɔnye Agyenkwa nantseew ha n',
Wɔbɔ se wokyiakyia hɔnho,
Na wodzi fona nye wu do nyim:
Ɔbra n' akwantu n' abɔ adze;
Honam n' ahohia no etwam';
M-ber a wodzi n' wɔ sor no,
Ɔnnkɔbɔ adze dabiara pɛn.
title: Charles Wesley, 1707-88.

name: MHB 974:1
verse:
. ATEASEFO Nyame, Ɔwo a
'Bɔdze nyina da W'enyim adagyaw,
Akra nyina yɛ W'dze, yɛnnka dɛ
Hɔn a woewu no ayew koraa;
Woefi hɛn honam wiadze yi m',
Yenyim dɛ wɔtse ase ma Wo.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 974:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 974:3
verse:
. W'asɛm yɛ nokwar, Wo pɛ tsen,
Yɛdze hɔn hyɛ Wo nsa gyedzi m';
Yehyira Wo wɔ ɔdɔ a ogyaa W'
Ma Wo Ba bɛdaa 'wumaa mu,
Amma obiara ennsuor dɛ
Hɔn nyina tse ase wɔ Wo mu.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 974:4
verse:
. Ɔwo a edze ahom ma nyimpa,
Ɔwo a ikitsa owu nsaafee,
Ɔwo a ikenyan nkwa hɛn mu,
Gye hɛn fi owu na bɔn mu :
Na honam, ɔkra na sunsum
Aatsena ama Wo daa nyina.  Amen.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 975:3
verse:
. Ber a sum no enya apa n' 
Ma enyim atsetsew no,
Ma yenhuahua dɛw kan no-
Kan ara afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 975:6
verse:
. Ber a nkwahwea etu kɔ n', 
Ber a wumaa regye nedze n',
Nkwa Wura, yɛnsoa W' ahenkyɛw n'-
Nkwa ara afebɔɔ.  Amen.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 975:12
verse:
. Ber a dwumadzi da asa n', 
Ber a bra 'mpiresi abɔ adze n!
Egya, dom Wo ba fonafo
Ahomgye afebɔɔ.
 
. Ber a bɔn nkodzen abɔ adze n', 
Ber a woeku kra mu tamfo n',
W' adom asɛm no nhyɛ ma-
Asomdwee afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 975:45
verse:
. Ber a yaw atsɛ akoma 
Ma afei oegyaa tow no,
Fa hɛn kɔ mbrɛ nyinsu nnyi n',
Dɛw ara afebɔɔ.
 
. Ber a yɛrodwen nda a yɛasɛɛ n' ho, 
Nda a ɔrennsan mmba bio n',
Wo dɔm' kyerɛkyerɛ ma yensua
Dɔ ara afebɔɔ.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 976:1
verse:
. Ɔsomfo yi apon ndɛ, 
Oewie ɔko pa no ko;
Afei ɔkwantunyi no
Edu esuegya noho: 
Egya, yɛdze Wo ba a ɔada 
Hyɛ W' abaatan dɔ n-sa n' mu.
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 976:2
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 976:5
verse:
. Hɔ na sum mu etumfo 
Nsa nnkɛka ara da;
Ewuradze Christ bɔweɔn hɔn,
Ɔno a owui gyee hɔn nkwa:
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 976:6
verse:
. Fa nkɔ fam', n-so nkɔ nsom'! 
Yɛhyɛ dzen na yɛka yi;
Hɛn so yɛdze enyidar
Yɛhwɛ wusoɛr da no kwan:
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 976:34
verse:
. Hɔ na Guanhwɛfo no dze 
Nguambaa no a wɔayew ba fie,
Ɔkora hɔn wɔ bea a
Pataku n' nnkotum aba:
  
. Hɔn a ɔasakyer wɔ ha, 
Na wɔhwɛ mbeamudua no n',
Wohu Jesus dɔ n' kɛse
Wɔ Ne nkyɛn wɔ Paradise:
title: John Ellerton, 1826-93.

name: MHB 977:1
verse:
. YEEDU fie mpoano sɔnn,
Ntaampee homa tsewee,
'Bradaa tsewee, edziban
Sae, naaso hɛn no ammbɔ;
Engyigye a ɔbaa mpoano hɔ a!
Ber a yɛkaa akwantu mu nsɛm.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 977:2
verse:
. Yeenya 'mpirenyimadze !
Nkyɛ enguantunyi n' rohwe ase;
Ɔfaa ɔhaw nyina mu,
Ɔammfa n' ho tɔtrɔtɔ :
Nyia ɔbɔ konyim abɔtsir no
Serew ber a ɔhaw etwa m' no.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 977:3
verse:
. 'Tamfo n' nntum nnyɛ hwee bio,
Ɔnnkɔtoa hɛn nseraban,
'Nafua ntseam' nnyi hɔ bio,
Yennkehia ɔweɔn kandzea;
Naaso nkyɛ ɔreyɛ ahwe ase,
Nkyɛ ɔtamfo n' reyɛ edzi nyim.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 977:4
verse:
. Ndɔmmumnyi n' edu fie:
'Nafua na adzekyee osu a !
Yɛmmpɛ ekyinkyin bio !
Bɔn, 'kyingye, na suro a.
Awerɛhow sum no yɛ ebɛn?
Ɔhen n' apepa nyinsuwa nyina.
title: John Mason Neale, 1818-66.

name: MHB 978:1
verse:
. Ber a mbusu abrɛ hɛn adze, 
Ber a hɛn nyinsu abor do;
Yerigyam dɔfo a ɔayew n',
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
title: Henry Milman

name: MHB 978:234
verse:
. Ber a hɛn akoma ridzi yaw, 
Wɔ no bɔn ho adwen ntsi,
Ber a suro ekitsa hɛn n',
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
 
. 'Wo abyɛ hɛn honam yi bi. 
'Wo asoa hɛn yaw nyina,
'Wo esu dɛ nyimpa pɛn,
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
 
. 'Wo abɔ Wo tsir adze ewu, 
'Wo ekyi n-kwa bɔgya,
'Wo ada fundaka mu,
Jesu, Mary Ba, tsie hɛn.
title: Henry Milman

name: MHB 979:1
verse:
. HƐN Egya a tsetseber no
W'asomfo sii dan yi,
Ɔwo a Wo nsamu nhyira pii
Dze egu Wo mba do.
W'ehumbɔbɔr a ɔnnsa da n'
Akyerɛ wɔ hɛn kwan do.
Yɛnye hɔn a woedzi hɛn kan
Yi Wo dzin ayɛw ndɛ.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 979:2
verse:
. Nsakyer mfe a onngyina da n'
Dze twitwi etwa m' dzinn;
Mfɛfo dze afofor so
Rebɛka fɛkuw n' ho:
Hɛn werɛ efir binom,
Hɔn 'nyidar hɔn suro so,
Ɔwo a ennsesa da no
Wɔrohom wɔ Wo mu.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 979:3
verse:
. Wommbu hɔn berɛ mu aba,
Yebu dza woedua no;
Hɛn ndɔbaa dze wobobu n'
Wɔ mfe a yennyae nnhunii m'!
Tsetse mba dze akyɛdze pii a
Yenntum nnkamfo ama hɛn;
Hɛn Egya, ma yɛnsom wɔ nda a
Ɔreba n' nokwar mu.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 979:4
verse:
. Hɛn enyim na hɛn nkyɛn nyina
'Da ho kura hɛn Wo nsamu,
Adasefo mununkum a
Yennhu hɔn gyina hɔ :
Yɛyɛ ebusua kortsee,
Yɛbɔ m' dze osebɔ,
Dze akoma kor na ndze kor
Dze yi Wo dzin ayɛw.
title: George Wallace Briggs, 1875-

name: MHB 980:1
verse:
. KAN a ifi tsetse 'nnsakyer,
O Asɛm tseasefo,
Yɛatse Wo gy aa asɔ ne nka,
Yɛatse Wo ndze hɛn mu.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 980:2
verse:
. Adwen krɔnkrɔn, ndwom nye mpaabɔ
Dze Sunsum tum aba,
Ama fasu yi ayɛ fɛw,
Hɛn na Ɔwo hɛn asɔrfi.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 980:3
verse:
. Nyikyerɛ bi a ɔba mfe no mu a!
Nkaakaa pa bi a ɔba a!
Kɛpem dɛ enyiwa dze dɛw su
Ma akoma tow ndwom dɛw m'.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 980:4
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 980:5
verse:
. Hɔn a wɔberɛɛ toow gyedzi fapem
No ammberɛ kwa ara da;
Dɛmara so na hɔn a wɔdze
Dɔ weɔɔn sor ogya n' yɛe!
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 980:6
verse:
. Ogya krɔnkrɔn dzɛw, kɔ do hyerɛn!
Ber a aman soɛr na wogu,
Gyedzi enyidar nye ɔdɔ wɔ hɔ,
Hɔn nye su nyina mu pɔn.
title: Frederick Lucian Hosmer, 1840-1929.

name: MHB 981:1
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 981:2
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 981:3
verse:
. Ma Wo ho nsɛnkyerɛdze
Nyina nda edzi;
Ha mpokyerɛ mbubu,
'Daduafo nkɔ kwa;
Ha ma ekan nhyerɛn
Wɔ kra biara do,
Ompegya adasa
Nkɔ Sunsum no mu.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 981:4
verse:
. Ha wɔntonton Egya,
Christ, Ɔba, Agyenkwa n',
Ɔnye Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn n';
Dɛ wɔyɛ adze kor;
Kɛpem dɛ abɔdze nyina
Bɔhwe W'ananadze,
Na wɔɔatonton Wo dɛ
Hɔn nyina Ewuradze.   Amen.
title: John Samuel Bewley Monsell, 1811-75.

name: MHB 982:1
verse:
. EGYA, Wo mu na adasamba a
Wɔwɔ wiadze nyina bɔm' yɛ kor,
Ma dwuma a yɛahyɛ ase Wo mu ntsim.
Sɛ woara ennsi dan no a
Adansifo no berɛ kwa;
Hyɛ hɛn dzen hɛn mberɛwyɛ mu !
title: Henry Cary Shuttleworth, 1850-1900.

name: MHB 982:2
title: Henry Cary Shuttleworth, 1850-1900.

name: MHB 982:3
verse:
. O Christ, hɛn Nua panyin, Ɔwo a
Esoom nyimpa, yɛɛ Nyame N' pɛ,
Boa ma hɛn so nsom hɛn nuanom.
Gya hɛn ma yentsiw sor ndzɛmba,
Yengyaa adzehun, mpɛ ndzepa.
Yɛntsena ase Wo dɔ mbra mu.
title: Henry Cary Shuttleworth, 1850-1900.

name: MHB 982:4
verse:
. Hɛn dwumadzi na agor nyina m',
Hɛn Wura, hɛn Nyɛnko, yɛ hɛn ahom;
Dzi hɛn enyim kan kɔ da pa n' mu :
Ber n' ma yenhu dɛ ɔbra abɔ adze,
Yɛnye mfɛfo a woedzi hɛn kan,
Nhɛn sor fɛkuwbɔ mu afebɔ.   Amen.
title: Henry Cary Shuttleworth, 1850-1900.

name: MHB 983:1
title: Charles Dent Bell, 1818-98.

name: MHB 983:2
title: Charles Dent Bell, 1818-98.

name: MHB 983:3
verse:
. Ma wontsie ebisafo nkrumsi,
Na aberɛfo so nya ahomgye;
Ma abrɛfo nsu mfrɛ Wo wɔ ha,
Na hɔn a wɔtweɔn n' nnya nhyira.
title: Charles Dent Bell, 1818-98.

name: MHB 983:4
verse:
. 'Ha, wɔtse asɛmpa n' ne nka
Na wɔbɔ nkwagye dzin no a,
Ma akoma mbɔ hyew nkɔ hɔn kan
Na akra nkyer gya n' ne mframee.
title: Charles Dent Bell, 1818-98.

name: MHB 983:5
verse:
. 'Ha wɔmma ewufo nnya nkwa bio,
Mum nkasa, etsitsifo ntse asɛm,
Na mbrɛhoadzefo mma hɔn
Fakyɛ na asomdwee a suro nnyi m'.
title: Charles Dent Bell, 1818-98.

name: MHB 983:6
verse:
. Ma iyi nyɛ Woara W'atsenae,
Ma W'enyim no nka abangua yi m',
Ma iyi nyɛ Nyame Ne fie
Na ha nyɛ ɔsor abobow.
title: Charles Dent Bell, 1818-98.

name: MHB 984:1
verse:
. O ƆWO a Wo nsa dze hɛn
Aba dɛw da yi mu,
Gye hɛn enyigye ndaase yi,
Tsie hɛn, ber a yɛsɔr no;
Na ma ndɛ da yi som ho
Ahoboa a yɛyɛe no,
Ntu hɛnho nyina, pɛ kor mu,
Mma Wo, O Ewuradze.
title: Frederick William Goadby, 1845-80.

name: MHB 984:2
verse:
. Dan a yɛnam W'asɛm do esi
Yi, yeyi W'ayɛw wɔ
Ayamuyie ndzeyɛɛ pa
Na mboa a yenyae nyina ho;
Afei W'asɔrfi yi mu,
Ma yenhu W'enyimnyam,
'Siandɛ Ɔwo nnyi mu a ne fɛw
Na ne kɛse nnyɛ hwee.
title: Frederick William Goadby, 1845-80.

name: MHB 984:3
verse:
. Ber a yehyia ha biara,
Na akoma bɔ mu som n',
Ma nokwar nda no tum edzi,
Na mpaa dzendzen mfow sor;
'Ha na ma nkukubɔnyi
Nnyan nhwehwɛ dza ɔkrɔn,
Mbofra, mpanyin nnya ahoɔdzen 
Na nyimpa nsua Wo dɔ.
title: Frederick William Goadby, 1845-80.

name: MHB 984:4
verse:
. Ber a mber pem kɔ enyim no,
Na ɔdɔ kyekyer hɛn no,
Na nkaa dɛɛdɛw soɛr dura
Bea krɔnkrɔn yi ho no,
Ma n'enyidzi kɛse no 
Nyɛ n'enyimnyam dabaa,
Dɛ dɔm a wohyia wɔ mu n'
Enya ehu Wo nkyɛn kwan.
title: Frederick William Goadby, 1845-80.

name: MHB 984:5
verse:
. Ewuradze, egyaam boafo,
Hɛn dɛw, 'nyidar, na tum,
Ma hɛn nda a ɔreba n' ho
Ndam na nsiyɛ ho adom,
Inyim hɛn akoma apensi;
Yɛtweɔn W'ahengua enyim :
O bra, na ewɔ ha no,
Fa fi yi yɛ Wodze.  Amen.
title: Frederick William Goadby, 1845-80.

name: MHB 985:
verse:
Bra...fie....
      Bra; ao, bra fie!
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: MHB 985:1
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: MHB 985:2
verse:
. Bra fie, bra fie!
Yɛrohwɛ, yɛrotweɔn;
Yegyina abowano
Nwin ano tɔ-ber yi
ꓛba dzesɛɛfo!
Bra fie, ao, bra fie
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: MHB 985:3
verse:
. Bra fie, bra fie!
Fi awrɛhow n' mu bra,
Fi bɔn nye fɛr no mu,
Fi gyigyefo no nsa,
ꓛba dzesɛɛfo!
Bra fie, ao, bra fie!
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: MHB 985:4
verse:
. Bra fie, bra fie!
Edziban pii wɔ hɔ,
Wɔbɛyɛ wo etuu:
Dɛm n-tsi bra sesei!
ꓛba dzesɛɛfo!
Bra fie, ao, bra fie!
title: Mrs. E.H. Gates.

name: MHB 986:1
verse:
. ꓛbɔn, yɛ ntsɛm hu nyansa!
Mma nntweɔn da fofor bi ana;
Sɛ eda ho pow nyansà a
ꓛyɛ dzen ma w' dέ ibenya.
title: T. Scott

name: MHB 986:2
verse:
. Sũ frɛ ehumbɔbɔr ntsɛm!
Mna nntweɔn da fofor bi ana;
Ansaana ndɛ wi bɔtɔ,
Nnà annyέ a wo mber abɛsen.
title: T. Scott

name: MHB 986:3
verse:
. Bɔnyɛnyi, san w'ekyir ntsɛm!
Mma nntweɔn da fofor bi ana;
‘Bɛyɛ na wo kaneà edum,
Ma wo nkwahosan abɔ w'.
title: T. Scott

name: MHB 986:4
verse:
. Bɔnyɛyi, yɛ ntsɛm gye siar!
Mma nntu nnhyɛ da bio ana;
'Bɛyɛ na mbusu ato w'
Ansaana adze akye.
title: T. Scott

name: MHB 987:
verse:
Meda Jesus abawn' sɔnn,
      Motwer No bo mu komm,
      No dɔ no kata mo do,
      Me kra bɔhom hɔ komm.
title: Frances Jane van Alstyne, 1830-1915.

name: MHB 987:1
verse:
. MEDA Jesus abawm' sɔnn,
Meda No bo mu komm,
No dɔ no kata mo do,
Me kra bɔhom hɔ komm.
Tsie! Abɔfo hɔn ndze a;
Wɔdze rotow ndwom frɛ m',
Fir enyimnyam sar no do,
